translation.en: Screenshot of the video shared by the Cauca's Regional Indigenous Council.
translation.swa: Picha ya video iliyotumwa na halmashauri ya mkoa wa wazawa wa Cauca.

translation.en: The video shares images of the protests that took place in the South West of the country earlier in April.
translation.swa: Video inaonesha picha za waandamanaji wa maandamano yaliyotokea Kusini Magharibi mwa nchi mapema mwezi Aprili.

translation.en: Indigenous, Afro-Colombian, and farming communities are staging mass protests around Colombia against President Ivan Duque's National Development Plan.
translation.swa: Wazawa wakolombia weusi na jamii za wakulima wameanza maandamano ya umma nchini Kolombia wakipinga mpango wa maendeleo ya Taifa wa Rais Ivan Duque.

translation.en: The plan comprises an array of directives that, among other things, will encourage foreign investment in large-scale mining and agribusiness which could threaten indigenous territories.
translation.swa: Mpango huo unaonesha kuwa utavutia wawekezaji wakubwa wa kigeni wa madini na kilimo ambao utatishia kuchukuliwa kwa mashamba ya wazawa.

translation.en: In March 2019, indigenous communities shut down a major highway in the Cauca region for 25 days.
translation.swa: Katika mwezi Machi 2019, jamii za wazawa walifunga   barabara kuu katika mkoa wa Cauca kwa siku 25.

translation.en: On April 25, they were joined by other social movements in leading a national strike.
translation.swa: Tarehe 25 Aprili waliungana na maandamano ya jamii zingine ili kuongoza  maandamano ya kitaifa.

translation.en: Besides threats to indigenous rights, strikers have protested against budgets cuts in education and the slow implementation of the 2016 Peace Accords  of which Duque, who's still to complete a year in office, is an outspoken critic.
translation.swa: Pamoja na vitisho kwa haki za wazawa, waandamanaji  wanapinga dhidi ya kukatwa kwa bajeti ya elimu na utekelezaji unaosuasua wa makubaliano ya amani ya mwaka 2016 ambayo Duque ambaye ana mwaka mmoja madarakani ndiye msemaji mkuu.

translation.en: Indigenous peoples have referred to the demonstrations as mingas, a Quechua word meaning collective work widely used in protest movements in South America.
translation.swa: Wazawa wameyaita maandamano hayo mingas, neno la lugha ya Quechua lenye maana ya kazi ya wote linalotumika sana katika maandamno katika Amerika ya Kusini.

translation.en: #NationalStrike | Indigenous communities, farmers, and afros of Tado, are mobilizing from the early hours of the morning all along the highway from Pereira to Quibdo as part of the National Strike #It'sWorthItToProtest
translation.swa: #Maandamano ya kitaifa | Jamii za wazawa, wakulima na watu weusi wa Tado wanahamasishana mapema kuanzia masaa ya  asubuhi kuwa barabarani kutoka Pereira kuelekea Quibdo kama sehemu ya maandamano ya kitaifa # Ni fahari kuandamana

translation.en: The National Development Plan includes reforms in different sectors, such as education, energy, and agriculture.
translation.swa: Mpango wa maendeleo wa Taifa unahusisha mageuzi katika sekta mbalimbali kama elimu, nishati na kilimo.

translation.en: While Duque claims the programs will lift 3,4 million Colombians out of poverty, critics counter that it benefits primarily private corporations.
translation.swa: Wakati Duque  anadai    mpango huo utawasaidia na kuwainua wakolombia milioni 3.4 kutoka katika umaskini, wachambuzi wanaona kuwa utawafaidisha hasa makampuni binafsi.

translation.en: Indigenous minga leaders are particularly concerned with the aspects of the plan that might challenge their right to prior consultation on development projects on their territories.
translation.swa: Viongozi wa wazawa minga   wanahusisha      sana na masuala ya mpango ambao unaweza kuleta changamoto kwenye haki zao bila kuwa na ushauri mzuri wa miradi ya maendeleo unaohusu mashamba yao.

translation.en: While the government has agreed to negotiate with indigenous leaders about the plan, a final agreement is yet to be reached.
translation.swa: Wakati serikali imekubali kuongea na viongozi wa wazawa kuhusu mpango huo, makubaliano ya mwisho bado hayajafikiwa.

translation.en: According to the newspaper El Espectador, the amount of land the government is willing to protect on behalf of indigenous peoples are way below of what the communities demand:
translation.swa: Kutokana na gazeti la El Espectador, ukubwa wa ardhi ambao serikali inataka kutenga kwa ajili ya wazawa ni pungufu ya kile jamii inachohitaji:

translation.en: The difference between what Iván Duque's government offers and what the indigenous communities are asking for in order to open the Panamericana highway is abysmal.
translation.swa: Tofauti kati ya kile ambacho serikali ya Iván Duque inatoa na kile ambacho jamii za wazawa wanakiomba kwa ajili ya kufungua barabara kuu ya Panamericana ni kidogo mno.

translation.en: The President talks about 1,500 hectares to resolve the needs of all the organizations that make up the minga, whereas the requirements of the organizations that are protesting is 40,000 hectares.
translation.swa: Rais anazungumzia keta 1,500 kutatua mahitaji ya taasisi zote ambazo zinaunda minga, ambapo mahitaji ya taasisi ambazo zinaandamana ni hekta 40,000.

translation.en: Peace accords
translation.swa: MAKUBALIANO YA AMANI

translation.en: Signed between former President Juan Manuel Santos and the leaders of the Revolutionary Armed Forces of Colombia, the country's largest guerrilla group, the 2016 Peace Accords ended the country's five-decade internal conflict by proclaiming a definitive ceasefire in exchange for participation by former FARC members in institutional politics.
translation.swa: Yalisainiwa kati ya Rais wa zamani Juan Manuel Santos na viongozi wa majeshi la ukombozi ya Kolombia ambalo ni jeshi kubwa la msituni , Makubaliano ya amani ya 2016  yalimaliza msuguano uliodumu kwa miongo mitano nchini humo na kutangazwa kusitishwa kwa mapingano na wanachama wa FARC ya zamani .

translation.en: The Peace Accords have also created protections to prevent the accumulation of land by individuals and foreign companies in rural areas.
translation.swa: Pia, makubaliano ya amani yamezuia watu na makampuni ya nje kujikusanyia ardhi katika maeneo ya vijijini.

translation.en: It prioritized land redistribution and designated a few areas for indigenous, Afro-Colombian, and farming communities who have been severely affected by the long conflict.
translation.swa: Zaidi ilihamasisha upangaji na ugawaji upya wa maeneo madogo kwa wazawa, wakolombia weusi na jamii za wakulima ambao waliathirika sana na mgogoro huo wa muda mrefu.

translation.en: Unequal land ownership in rural areas was a major reason why FARC group took up arms in the 1960s.
translation.swa: Umilki wa ardhi usiosawa katika maeneo ya vijijini  ilikuwa ni  sababu kuu  iliyosababisha kikundi cha FARC kuchukua silaha miaka ya 1960.

translation.en: However, full implementation of the agreement has remained elusive as many conservative sectors in Colombia are staunchly against those terms.
translation.swa: Hata hivyo, utekelezaji kamili wa makubaliano umetelekezwa kwa kuwa sekta nyingi zisizobadilika Kolombia zipo kinyume na masharti ya makubaliano.

translation.en: Meanwhile, smaller armed groups remain active in the countryside, where they have staged deadly disputes for control over FARC's former territories.
translation.swa: Wakati, vikundi vidogo vidogo vyenye silaha vinaendelea katika maeneo ya nchi na wameanza vita vya kutawala maeneo yalikuwa yanatawaliwa na FARC.

translation.en: As a consequence, the number of killed social leaders in rural areas has skyrocketed since the Accords signature.
translation.swa: Matokeo yake idadi ya viongozi wa jamii za vijijini wanaouwawa imeongezeka tangu kusainiwa kwa makubaliano.

translation.en: While figures vary depending on how a social leader is defined, the Colombian ombudsman's office says 460 social leaders have been killed between 2016 and March 31, 2019.
translation.swa: Wakati tarakimu zinatofautiana kutegemea namna kiongozi wa jamii anavyotafsiriwa, ofisi ya mkuu wa itifaki  imetaja  kuwa viongozi wa jamii 460 wameuwawa kati ya mwaka 2016 na tarehe 31 Machi, 2019.

translation.en: Duque, along with his main ally, former President Álvaro Uribe, is among the most prominent detractors of the peace agreement.
translation.swa: Duque pamoja na mshirika wake mkuu, Rais wa zamani Álvaro Uribe, ni miongoni mwa wanaokashifu sana makuabaliano ya amani.

translation.en: In recent months, he has attempted to weaken the authority of the Special Jurisdiction for Peace (JEP) a judicial body created by the Accords to try both guerrilla and government actors suspected of war crimes.
translation.swa: Katika miezi ya hivi karibuni, amejaribu kudhoofisha nguvu ya chombo maalumu  (JEP) cha utekelezaji  wa mapatano ya amani kilichoundwa na mwanajeshi wa msituni na serikali.

translation.en: Many groups are outraged at those measures, which they say could undermine the chances of true reconciliation.
translation.swa: Makundi mengi yamekasirika  kwa hatua hizo ambazo wanasema zinaweza kudidimiza makubaliano ya kweli.

translation.en: People shared their reasons for joining the April 25 strike with the hashtag #VamosAlParoPor (We Are Going to Strike For) and #MingaNacionalPorLaVida (National Minga For Life).
translation.swa: Watu walishirikishana sababu zilizowafanya waungane kwenye maandamano tarehe 25 Aprili  wanaenda kuandamana kwa kuwa nii kazi ya taifa ya pamoja kwa maisha

translation.en: We are going to strike for the indigenous minga, because we demand protection to social leaders, former fighters, in support of the JEP and the implementation of the peace accords.
translation.swa: Tunaenda kuandamana kwa ajili ya umoja wa wazawa kwa sababu tuanahitaji kuwalinda viom=ngozi wa jamii, wakulima wapiganaji katika kuunga mkono JEP na utekelezaji wa makubaliano ya amani.

translation.en: For better labor conditions for teachers and workers centrals.
translation.swa: Pia, kuwepo na mazaingira bora ya walimu na wafanyakazi wa serikali kuu.

translation.en: La Pulla, a YouTube channel of political commentary, delved into the growing tension in a video titled This is What Happens when a Government Ignores its People), where they examine the long history of government neglect in the countryside, particularly the departments of Cauca, Nariño, La Guajira, and Catatumbo.
translation.swa: La Pulla ambayo ni redio kupitia  YouTube inayojihusisha na masuala ya kisiasa iliingia Katika mgogoro huu unaokuwa ilifanya uchunguzi wa kina wa video yenye kichwa cha habari Hiki ndicho huwa kinatokea pale serikali inaposahau watu wake wakichunguza historia ndefu ya serikali kutowajali katika maeneo ya nchi, hasa idara ya  Cauca, Nariño, La Guajira, na Catatumbo.

translation.en: The journalist states:
translation.swa: Mwandishi wa habari anaeleza:

translation.en: The minga reminds us that it is not the only place where people live with unfulfilled (promises), with the government flicking them off every time it can.
translation.swa: Umoja unatukumbusha kwamba watu hawawezi kuishi bila kutekelezewa ahadi na serikali ikiwapiga muda wote inavyoweza.

translation.en: We see four regions of the country that the state ignores completely.
translation.swa: Tunaona mikoa minne ambayo serikali imeisahau moja kwa moja.

translation.en: No definite solution has been given to the minga's and strikers demands, so protests are likely to continue in the coming months.
translation.swa: Hakuna suluhusho la kudumu lililotolewa kwa mahitaji ya waandamanaji, kwa hiyo maandamano yanaweza kuendelea katika miezi inayokuja.

translation.swa: Swichi ya kuwasha na kuzima.

translation.en: [Creative Commons (CC BY-NC 2.0)/ Flickr, January 20, 2007]When they awoke on April 28, ready to cast their ballots in Benin's parliamentary election, voters could not rely on WhatsApp or Facebook to communicate with one another, or to seek information about where to vote.
translation.swa: [Creative Commons (CC BY-NC 2.0)/ Flickr, Tarehe 20 Januari, 2007]Walipoamka tarehe 28 Aprili, wakiwa tayari kupiga kura katika uchaguzi wa wabunge nchini Benin wapigakura hawategemea kukuta WhatsApp au Facebook ambazo zinatumika kuwasiliana au kupata habari wapi pa kupigia kura.

translation.en: These and several other major web platforms, including Twitter, Instagram, Telegram and Viber, went dark in the early hours of the day.
translation.swa: Baadhi ya mitandao mikubwa ikiwemo Twitter, Instagram, Telegram na Viber ilikuwa imezimwa mapema siku ile.

translation.en: By 11 am, 99.5 percent of internet connections became inactive, sending the West African country into a nationwide internet shutdown that lasted well into the night.
translation.swa: Mpaka saa 5 Asubuhi, asilimia 99.5 ya upatikanaji wa mtandao  ulikuwa haupatikani na kuipeleka nchi ya Afrika magharibi kutokuwa na mtandao nchi nzima ambapo mtandao ulifunguliwa usiku.

translation.en: Human rights groups and election monitors were dismayed but not shocked by the outage, which appears to have been orchestrated by the sitting government.
translation.swa: Vikundi vya haki za binadamu na waangalizi wa uchanguzi walikatishwa tamaa lakini bila taharuki kwa ajili ya kukosekana kwa mtandao ambako inaonekana kupangwa na serikali iliyopo madarakani.

translation.en: New electoral laws pushed by the incumbent administration of President Patrice Talon have re-oriented politics in Benin, which until this year had multiple political parties competing with one another.
translation.swa: Sheria mpya za uchaguzi zilizowekwa na uongozi uliopo wa Rais Patrice Talon  umefanya mageuzi ya siasa  katika Benin ambapo hadi mwaka huu ina vyama vingi vya siasa vinavyoshindana.

translation.en: But under new policies that raise the threshold for party participation in elections, only two political parties made the cut to put up candidates for parliamentary election.
translation.swa: Lakini chini ya sera mpya ambazo zinaweka kizingiti kwa chama kushiriki katika chaguzi isipokuwa vyama viwili ambavyo vimeweza kuweka wagombea katika uchaguzi huu wa wabunge.

translation.en: Both parties are closely aligned with the president.
translation.swa: Vyama hivyo vyote vipo karibu na Rais.

translation.en: In the lead-up to the election, a series of public protests  which took place despite a blanket ban on street protests  were dispersed by law enforcement officials, who used tear gas and batons to break up demonstrations.
translation.swa: Katika kuelekea uchaguzi, kulikuwa na mfululizo wa maandamano ya wananchi  ambayo yalitokea ingawa kulikuwa na kuzuiliwa kwa waandamaji mtaani waliosambatishwa na vyombo vya jeshi la polisi ambavyo vilitumia mabomu ya kutoa mchozi na marungu kuvunja maandamano.

translation.en: Amnesty International reported that multiple political opposition leaders were arrested during demonstrations.
translation.swa: Shirika la kimataifa la haki za binadamu la Amnesty International liliripoti  kuwa viongozi wa vyama vya upinzani wengi walikamatwa kipindi cha maandamano.

translation.en: Open web activists at the Media Foundation for West Africa, Internet Sans Frontieres, CIPESA, Access Now, Global Voices (sub-Saharan Africa) and other groups condemned the shutdown in a joint statement:
translation.swa: Wanaharakati mtandao wa wazi wa shirika la vyombo vya habari kwa Afrika Magharibi , Mtandao bila mipaka , CIPESA, Access Now, Sauti za Dunia (Kusini mwa Jangwa la Sahara Afrika) na makundi mengine yalishtumu kuzimwa kwa mtandao katika taarifa ya pamoja:

translation.en: The UN Human Rights Committee, the official interpreter of the International Covenant on Civil and Political Rights, emphasizes in General Comment no.34 that restrictions on speech online must be strictly necessary and proportionate to achieve a legitimate purpose.
translation.swa: Kamati ya Haki za binadamu ya Umoja wa mataifa ambayo ndiyo mtafsiri rasmi wa mkataba wa kimataifa wa haki za kiraia na kisiasa inasistiza katika kutoa maoni ya jumla namba 34 kwamba makatazo ya kuongea mtandaoni ni lazima yatiliwe umuhimu ili kupata malengo halisi.

translation.en: [7] Shutdowns, by contrast, disproportionately impact all users, and unnecessarily restrict access to information and emergency services communications during crucial moments.
translation.swa: [7] Kuzima kuna matokeo yasiyo mazuri kwa watumiaji na pia nikuwanyima fursa ya kupata habari na mawasiliano ya dharura wakati huu muhimu.

translation.en: Shutdowns are neither necessary to, nor effective at, achieving a legitimate aim, as they often spread confusion and encourage more people to join public demonstrations.
translation.swa: Kuzima sio muhimu pia huadhiri upatikanaji wa malengo halisi kwa kuwa mara nyingi hueneza kutokuelewa na kuhamasisha watu wengi kujiunga kwenye maandamano.

translation.en: We respectfully call on you to:
translation.swa: Kwa heshima tunawaomba:

translation.en: Ensure that social media is restored
translation.swa: kuhakikisha kwamba mitandao ya kijamii inarudishwa katika hali yake ya mwanzo

translation.en: Publicly declare your commitment to keep the internet on, and to notify the public of any disruptions
translation.swa: Tangazeni kwa umma ahadi yenu ya kuhakikisha mtandao utakuwa wazi na mtaarifu umma kwa usumbufu wowote utakaotokea

translation.en: Encourage telecommunications and internet services providers to respect human rights through public disclosures on policies and practices impacting users.
translation.swa: Wahimizeni watumiaji wa mawasiliano na mtandao kuheshimu haki za binadamu kupitia uwazi wa sera na vitendo vyenye matokeo mabaya kwa watumiaji.

translation.en: Speaking with Internet Sans Frontieres, Beninese writer and activist Mylène Flicka of Irawo media noted:
translation.swa: Akiongea na mtandao bila mipaka mwandishi na mwanaharakati raia wa Benini Mylène Flicka wa gazeti la Irawo alisema:

translation.en: Shutting down the Internet on election day only adds suspicion to an already flawed electoral process.
translation.swa: Kuzima mtandao siku ya uchaguzi inaongeza tu mashaka kwa mchakato wa uchaguzi ambao tayari una dosari.

translation.en: Benin is now performing very poorly in terms of democracy.
translation.swa: Kwa sasa Benin inafanya vibaya katika masuala ya Demokrasia.

translation.en: All internet connections had been restored as of the morning of April 29, at which point voting had concluded.
translation.swa: Mitandao yote iliunganishwa na kuwashwa asubuhi tarehe 29 Aprili muda ambao kupiga kura kulikuwa kumefungwa tayari.

translation.en: #AllForJan demonstration in memory of murdered journalist Ján Kuciak and his fiancée Martina Kušnírová in Bratislava, 2 March 2018.
translation.swa: Maandamano ya #WoteKwaJan kwa ajili ya kumkumbuka mwandishi wa habari Ján Kuciak aliyeuawa pamoja na mchumba wake Martina Kušnírová huko Bratislava, Machi 2, 2018.

translation.en: Photo by Peter Tkac, CC BY-SA.
translation.swa: Picha na Peter Tkac, CC BY-SA.

translation.en: Businessman Marián Kočner has been charged with ordering the killing of journalist Ján Kuciak and his fiancée Martina Kušnírová in 2018, according to a March 15 announcement by Slovakia's Special Prosecutions Office.
translation.swa: Mfanyabiashara Marián Kočner ameshtakiwa kwa kuamuru mauaji ya mwanahabari Ján Kuciak na mchumba wake Martina Kušnírová mwaka 2018, kulingana na tamko la Machi 15 la Ofisi Maalum ya Mashtaka ya Slovakia.

translation.en: Before he was killed, Kuciak was working with the Organized Crime and Corruption Reporting Project (OCCRP) and his outlet, Aktuality.sk, to investigate possible links between an Italian criminal group and its presence in Slovakia.
translation.swa: Kabla ya kuuawa Kuciak alikuwa akifanya kazi na Mradi wa Kupambana na Uhalifu na Kuripoti Rushwa na chombo chake, Aktuality.sk, kupeleleza uhusiano baina ya kikundi cha uhalifu cha Waitalia na uwepo wake nchini Slovakia.

translation.en: He also wrote about the business dealings of Kočner.
translation.swa: Pia alikuwa akiandika kuhusu masuala ya biashara za Kočner.

translation.en: The murders caused widespread shock in the country.
translation.swa: Wauaji walisababisha hofu kusambaa nchini.

translation.en: Demands for justice led to massive protests which forced the resignation of then Prime Minister Robert Fico.
translation.swa: Watu waliokuwa wakitaka haki itendeke waliongoza maandamano makubwa yaliyolazimisha kujiuzulu kwa aliyekuwa Waziri Mkuu, Robert Fico.

translation.en: Kuciak was the real target while Kušnírová was killed for simply being in their house when the killers barged in.
translation.swa: Kuciak ndiye alikuwa mlengwa wakati Kušnírová aliuawa kwa sababu alikutwa nyumbani wauaji walipoingia.

translation.en: They were both 27 years old and had planned to marry in May 2018.
translation.swa: Wote walikuwa na umri wa miaka 27 na walikuwa wamepanga kuoana Mei 2018.

translation.en: According to the prosecution, Kočner personally threatened Kuciak by phone in September 2017 and then ordered the murder that took place on 21 February 2018 in the village of Veľká Mača.
translation.swa: Kulingana na mashtaka, Kočner mwenyewe alishamtishia Kuciak kwa njia ya simu Septemba 2017 na kisha aliamuru mauaji yaliyofanyika Februari 21, 2018 katika kijiji cha Veľká Mača.

translation.en: Slovak law enforcement initially detained four people for the killing of Kuciak and Kušnírová.
translation.swa: Mamlaka za sheria za Slovakia ziliwatia nguvuni watu wanne kwa kumuua Kuciak na Kušnírová.

translation.en: Kočner's assistant Alena Zsuzsová was accused of paying 50,000 euros (about US $57,000) in cash and the forgiveness of more than 20,000 euros (about US $22,700) in debt to three people  a pizza parlor owner, a former police officer and a former soldier  to organize and commit the murder.
translation.swa: Msaidizi wa Kočner, Alena Zsuzsová alituhumiwa kwa kulipa yuro 50,000 (karibu dola $57,000 za Marekani) na kusamehe zaidi ya yuro 20,000 (karibu dola $22,700) alizokuwa akiwadai watu watatu ambao ni mmiliki wa mgahawa wa pizza, askari polisi wa zamani na mwanajeshi wa zamani ili waweze kupanga na kutekeleza mauaji.

translation.en: During the summer, Kočner was arrested for financial crimes investigated by Kuciak, but it took authorities six more months to arrest the subordinates of the controversial entrepreneur and directly connect him to the assassination plot.
translation.swa: Wakati wa majira ya joto, Kočner alikamatwa kwa makosa ya kifedha na alichunguzwa na Kuciak, lakini ilizichukua mamlaka miezi sita zaidi kuwakamata wahusika wadogo wa mwekezaji huyo mtata na kumuunganisha moja kwa moja na mpango wa mauaji.

translation.en: The reason for the murder was the journalistic work of the victim, a special prosecutor, who was left unnamed for security reasons, told reporters at a March 15 news conference near Bratislava.
translation.swa: Sababu za mauaji ni kazi za uhandishi wa habari za mlengwa, mwendesha mashtaka maalum, ambaye hakutajwa jina kwa sababu za kiusalama, aliwaambia wanahabari hapo Machi 15, katika mkutano wa habari karibu na Bratislava.

translation.en: Protest in Bratislava on 9 March 2018 in response to the murder of Ján Kuciak and Martina Kušnírová.
translation.swa: Maandamano huko Bratislava, Machi 9 2018 kwa sababu ya mauaji ya Ján Kuciak na Martina Kušnírová.

translation.en: Photo by Slavomír Frešo via Wikipedia, CC BY-SA 4.0.
translation.swa: Picha na Slavomír Frešo kupitia Wikipedia, CC BY-SA 4.0.

translation.en: The indictment was welcomed by media rights organizations and human rights advocates.
translation.swa: Mashtaka yalipokelewa na Taasisi za Haki za Vyombo vya Habari na Mawakili wa Haki za Binadamu

translation.en: On Twitter, the Committee to Protect Journalists Gulnoza Said stated:
translation.swa: Huko twita, Mwanakamati ya Kulinda wanahabari Gulnoza Said alisema:

translation.en: We welcome the news that Slovak authorities have charged a suspected mastermind for the murder of investigative journalist #JánKuciak.
translation.swa: Tunapokea habari kuwa mamlaka za Slovakia zimemshtaki mtuhumiwa aliyechora mpango wa kumuua mwanahabari za uchunguzi#JánKuciak.

translation.en: This is a significant step, and a rare one in murders of journalists.
translation.swa: Hii ni hatua muhimu na ya kipekee katika mauaji ya wanahabari.

translation.en: We hope authorities keep their promise to bring all perpetrators to justice, thereby making all journalists in Slovakia safer from violence.
translation.swa: Tunaamini mamlaka zitatimiza ahadi yake ya kuwaleta wahusika wote mbele ya sheria, hivyo basi kuwafanya wanahabari wote kuwa salama dhidi ya uhalifu nchini Slovakia.

translation.en: Harlem Desir from the Organization for Security and Co-operation in Europe also noted:
translation.swa: Harlem Desir kutoka Taasisi ya Ulinzi na Ushirikiano ndani ya Ulaya aliandika:

translation.en: I commend today's indictment against instigator of murder of journalist #JanKuciak in #Slovakia.
translation.swa: Ninapongeza mashtaka ya leo dhidi ya mchochezi wa mauaji ya mwanahabari #JanKuciak huko #Slovakia.

translation.en: He paid unacceptable price for investigating corruption at the highest level & has become symbol for freedom of media to tackle mafia & crime.
translation.swa: Alilipa gharama ambayo hakustahili kwa sababu ya kuchunguza rushwa kwa viwango vya juu kabisa, amekuwa alama ya uhuru wa vyombo vya habari kupambana na uhalifu wa mafioso.

translation.swa: OSCE Uhuru wa vyombo vya habari (@OSCE_RFoM) March 14, 2019

translation.en: In May 2018, Kuciak was posthumously awarded the inaugural award for Journalists, Whistleblowers and Defenders of the Right to Information, by the European United Left/Nordic Green Left (GUE/NGL) in the EU Parliament.
translation.swa: Mei 2018, baada ya kifo chake Kuciak alipewa tuzo ya Mwanahabari, Mfichuaji Maovu na Mlinda Haki ya Kuhabarishwa, na Umoja wa Ulaya Magharibi/Nordic Green Left (GUE/NGL) ndani ya Bunge la Umoja wa Ulaya.

translation.en: Named for slain Maltese journalist Daphne Caruana Galizia, the award is intended to recognize the work and courage of individuals in exposing corruption and wrongdoing by the powerful.
translation.swa: Ikiitwa kwa jina la mwanahabari wa Maltese aliyeuawa Daphne Caruana Galizia, tuzo hiyo imekusudiwa kuzitambua kazi na ushupavu wa watu katika kufichua uhalifu na rushwa kwa nguvu.

translation.en: Continuing Ján Kuciak's legacy
translation.swa: Kuendeleza Urithi wa Ján Kuciak

translation.en: After Kuciak was murdered, OCCRP and its member centers completed and published some of his unfinished research.
translation.swa: Baada ya Kuciak kuuawa, OCCRP na vituo vyake wanachama walimalizia na kuchapisha  baadhi ya tafiti zake zilizokuwa hazijakamilika.

translation.en: In February 2019, they released a report based titled Unfinished lives, unfinished justice.
translation.swa: Februari 2019, walitoa ripoti iliyokuwa na kichwa cha habari Maisha Yasiyokamili, Haki Isiyokamili.

translation.en: This was compiled by OCCRP, the Investigative Reporting Project Italy, Investigace.cz, and the Investigative Centre of Ján Kuciak (ICJK) based on Kuciaks reporting about organized crime in Slovakia and its ties to politics and law enforcement.
translation.swa: Hii ilikamilishwa na OCCRP, Mradi wa Ripoti za Uchunguzi Italia, Investigace.cz na Kituo cha Uchunguzi cha Ján Kuciak (ICJK) ikihusika na ripoti za Kuciak, akiripoti kuhusu mipango ya uhalifu nchini Slovakia na uhusiano katika siasa na vyombo vya kusimamia sheria.

translation.en: But ICJK revealed via Twitter how some authorities were not cooperating with them and that they were prevented from attending the press conference announcing the indictment of Kočner.
translation.swa: Lakini ICJK iliweka wazi kupitia twita jinsi baadhi ya mamlaka hazitoi ushirikiano na pia walizuiwa kushiriki katika mkutano wa waandishi wa habari ambapo mashtaka dhidi ya Kočner yalitangazwa.

translation.en: Today at 13:00, a press conference to the investigation of Martina and Jans murder will be held at the Special Prosecutor's Office.
translation.swa: Leo saa saba mchana, mkutano wa waandishi wa habari kuhusu upelelezi juu ya kifo cha Martina na Jan utafanyika katika ofisi za Mwendesha mashtaka maalum.

translation.en: We will not be there.
translation.swa: Hatutakuwa pale.

translation.en: According to the prosecution, we are not journalists, just a curious public who can read it in the paper.
translation.swa: Kulingana na mashtaka, sisi sio wanahabari ni raia wadadisi tu ambao tunaweza kusoma tu gazetini.

translation.en: Investigative Center of Jan Kuciak (@icjkuciaka) March 14, 2019
translation.swa: Kituo cha upeleleze cha Jan Kuciak (@icjkuciaka) March 14, 2019

translation.en: Despite the fact that authorities have now charged the alleged mastermind of the killing, journalists and media advocates insist there are still unresolved questions related to the case, such as the rumored involvement of prominent politicians.
translation.swa: Pamoja na ukweli kwamba mamlaka sasa zimewashtaki wahusika wa mpango wa mauaji, wanahabari na mawakili wa habari wanasisitiza kuwa bado haujapatikana ufumbuzi wa maswali kuhusiana na kesi kama vile tetesi za kuhusika kwa mwanasiasa mkubwa.

translation.en: In particular, advocates are interested in learning what the former prime minister Fico and Robert Krajmer, former head of the Anti-Corruption Unit of the Slovak National Crime Agency, may have known about the murders.
translation.swa: Hasa hasa mawakili wanania ya kufahamu waziri mkuu wa zamani Fico na Robert Krajmer, Mkuu wa idara ya kupambana na rushwa na kitengo cha uhalifu nchini Slovakia wanajua nini kuhusu mauaji.

translation.en: Friends and family of Kuciak and Kušnírová have already asked authorities to investigate the ties of newly indicted Kočner with powerful officials that protected him over the last two decades.
translation.swa: Marafiki na familia za Kuciak na Kušnírová tayari zimeshazitaka mamlaka kuchunguza uhusiano uliopo baina ya mshtakiwa mpya Kočner na maafisa wenye mamlaka ambao walikuwa wakimlinda kwa miongo miwili iliyopita.

translation.en: Kušnírová's family lawyer is worried that Kočner's close friendship with Slovakias former general prosecutor, Dobroslav Trnka, could affect the progress of the case.
translation.swa: Mwanasheria wa familia ya Kušnírová anahofia kuwa urafiki wa karibu baina ya Kočner na mwendesha mashtaka mkuu wa zamani wa Slovakia, Dobroslav Trnka, unaweza kuathiri mwenendo wa kesi.

translation.en: Screenshot of the website papa.mk, set up by the Government of Republic of North Macedonia on occasion of the Pope's visit on 7 May 2019.
translation.swa: Picha za skirini kutoka katika tovuti ya papa.mk, imewekwa na Serikali ya Jamuhuri ya Makedonia Kaskazini wakati Papa alipowatembelea Mei 7, 2019.

translation.en: Pope Francis will visit North Macedonia in May 2019, just two days after the second round of presidential elections.
translation.swa: Papa Francis ataitembelea Makedonia Kaskazini Mei 2019, kwa siku mbili baada ya raundi ya pili ya uchaguzi wa Rais.

translation.en: It will be the first time a pope visits North Macedonia.
translation.swa: Itakuwa ni mara ya kwanza kwa Papa kutembelea Makedonia Kaskazini.

translation.en: The visit is part of a three-day regional tour which will also include a stop in Bulgaria.
translation.swa: Kutembelewa huko itakuwa ni sehemu ya ziara ya siku tatu katika ukanda huo ambapo pia atatua Bulgaria.

translation.en: The government of North Macedonia has set up a website, papa.mk to facilitate the visit.
translation.swa: Serikali ya Makedonia Kaskazini imetengeneza tovuti, ya papa.mk kuwezesha ziara hiyo.

translation.en: In line with the multicultural character of the country, the website contents are available in three languages: Macedonian, Albanian and English.
translation.swa: Kutokana na uwepo wa tamaduni mbalimbali katika nchi, maudhui katika tovuti hizo yanapatikana kwa lugha tatu tofauti ambazo ni Kimakedonia, Kialbania na Kiingereza.

translation.en: Some citizens have questioned the government's ownership of the website, claiming that it contradicts the country's secular character.
translation.swa: Baadhi ya wananchi wameuliza kuhusu serikali kumiliki tovuti hiyo, wakisema kuwa inaleta utata kwa sababu serikali hiyo haina dini.

translation.en: Macedonian citizens can apply for tickets to the Pontiff's Holy Mass, which are free of charge, through local churches, while foreigners must secure their places through the website.
translation.swa: Wananchi wa Makedonia wanaweza kuomba tiketi za kuhudhuria Ibada Takatifu itakayoendeshwa na Papa ambapo tiketi hizo zinapatikana bure katika makanisa nchini wakati wageni toka nje ya nchi wanaweza kupata nafasi kwa kupitia tovuti.

translation.en: The Mass will take place at the main square of the capital Skopje on May 7.
translation.swa: Ibada hiyo itafanyika katika viwanja vya Mji Mkuu wa Skopje, Mei 7.

translation.en: Catholics make up less than one percent of the population of North Macedonia, where about 65 percent have professed faith for Orthodox Christianity and about 33 percent are Muslim.
translation.swa: Wakatoliki wanwanaf angalau asilimia moja ya watu wote wa Makedonia Kaskazini ambapo asilimia 65 ni Wakristo wa ki-Orthodox na angalau asilimia 33 ni Waislamu.

translation.en: Despite its small size, the local Catholic community is considerably diverse as it includes ethnic Macedonians, Albanians, Croats, Slovenes, and Poles.
translation.swa: Pamoja na idadi yao ndogo, jamii ya Kikatoliki ina watu mbalimbali kama vile Wamakedonia, Waalbania, Wakroeshia, Waslovenia na Wapoland.

translation.en: On the other hand, the country has religious significance for Catholicism because the capital Skopje is the birthplace of Mother Theresa (1910-1997), officially honored as Saint Theresa of Calcutta.
translation.swa: Kwa upande mwingine, nchi hii ina maana kubwa katika ukatoliki kwa sababu mji wake mkuu Skopje ndipo alipozaliwa Mama Theresa (1910-1997), ambaye alitunukiwa kuwa Mtakatifu Teresa wa Calcutta.

translation.en: One of the most popular missionaries of the 20th century, and a recipient of the Nobel Peace Prize, she was born in an ethnic Albanian family whose house was situated precisely on what is now the main town square.
translation.swa: Mmoja kati ya wamisionari wa karne ya 20 na mshindi wa tuzo ya amani ya Nobel, alizaliwa katika familia yenye asili ya ki-Albania ambapo nyumba yao ilikuwa pale ambapo kwa sasa ni uwanja mkuu wa mji.

translation.en: The political aspect of the visit surpasses its religious significance.
translation.swa: Kipengele cha kisiasa katika ziara hiyo kinafunika umuhimu wake kidini.

translation.en: As a head of state, the pontiff is scheduled to meet the prime minister and the outgoing president, whose mandate will end five days afterward.
translation.swa: Kama mkuu wa nchi, Papa amepangiwa kuonana na waziri mkuu na rais anayemaliza muda wake , ambaye madaraka yake yatakoma siku tano baadaye.

translation.en: The Macedonian public appears to see the visit as a sign of recognition by the West, and a boost to the government's efforts to bring the country closer to membership of NATO and the European Union.
translation.swa: Wamakedonia wanaona ziara hii kama ishara ya kutambuliwa na nchi za Magharibi na kuinua jitihada za serikali kuiweka nchi karibu na uanachama wa NATO na Umoja wa Ulaya.

translation.en: Such sentiment is apparent in a tweet from retired police general Stojanche Angelov, who commented on the preparatory visit by the chief of Macedonian Public Safety Bureau to the Vatican.
translation.swa: Hisia hizi zinapatikana huko twita katika chapisho la jenerali mstaafu wa polisi Stojanche Angelov, ambapo alitoa maoni katika ziara ya maandalizi ya Mkuu wa Taasisi ya Usalama wa Raia ya Makedonia kwa Vatican.

translation.en: Thanks to the wise, brave and determined international politics of this government, our small state moves forward with great strides!
translation.swa: Asante kwa siasa za hekima na za kijasiri zilizoamuliwa na serikali hii, nchi yetu ndogo inasonga mbele kwa kasi kubwa.

translation.en: The Director of PSB Sasho Tasevski prepares the highest security level for the Pope Francis stay in Skopje.
translation.swa: Mkurugenzi wa Taasisi ya Usalama wa Raia, Sasho Tasevski aliandaa usalama wa hali ya juu kwa ajili ya Papa Fransis atakapokuwa hapa Skopje.

translation.en: Stevo [Pendarovski] for president!
translation.swa: Stevo [Pendarovski] kwa urais!

translation.en: A month ahead of Pope's journey, Vatican News, the information system of the Holy See, added Macedonian language to its repertoire.
translation.swa: Mwezi mmoja kabla ya safari ya Papa, habari za Vatican mfumo wa habari wa Holy See, waliongeza lugha ya Kimakedonia  katika kazi zake.

translation.en: It is the 34th language available on the portal.
translation.swa: Ni lugha ya 34 inayopatikana katika chombo hicho.

translation.en: Skopje Bishop Kiro Stojanov said this is a first-fruit of Pope Francis Apostolic Visit.
translation.swa: Askofu wa Skopje, Askofu Kiro Stojanov alisema hili ni tunda la awali la ziara ya kitume ya Papa Francis.

translation.en: Ahead of #PopeFrancis Apostolic Journey to #NorthMacedonia on 7 May, @VaticanNews adds a page dedicated to the Macedonian language.
translation.swa: Kabla ya safari ya Kitume ya#PapaFrancis kuelekea #MakedoniaKaskazini hapo Mei 7, @VaticanNews waongeza ukurasa unaoandikwa kwa Lugha ya Kimakedonia.

translation.en: In September, the Pope will visit Mozambique, Madagascar, and Mauritius.
translation.swa: Septemba, Papa atatembelea Msumbiji, Madagascar na Mauritius.

translation.en: Global Voices has covered the reactions in Mozambique to the tour.
translation.swa: Global Voices imeandika mrejesho kutoka Msumbiji kuhusu ziara hiyo.

translation.en: Screenshot of the video taken during a Paris rally on March 28.
translation.swa: Picha za skrini za video iliyochukuliwa wakati wa maandamano ya Paris Machi 28.

translation.en: The protester holds a sign saying they have killed my friend and marches next to a list with victims names.
translation.swa: Mwandamanaji akiwa amebeba bango linalosema wamemuua rafiki yangu na akiandamana  pembeni ya orodha ya majina ya wahanga.

translation.en: Video shared on YouTube by Agence France Press in Spanish.
translation.swa: Video imeshirikishwa huko YouTube na Agence France Press kwa Kihispania.

translation.en: On April 5, a group of around 20 Colombian activist collectives delivered a formal request to the International Criminal Court (ICC) for it open a criminal investigation about the mass killings of social leaders in their country.
translation.swa: Aprili 5, kikundi cha WaColombia wapatao 20 na umoja wa wanaharakati umewasilisha ombi rasmi kwa mahakama ya Kimataifa ya makosa ya jinai (ICC) kupeleleza uhalifu kuhusu mauaji makubwa ya viongozi wa kijamii  nchini mwao.

translation.en: The collectives and their supporters delivered the letter in person at The Hague after marching for over a week from Paris, while stopping in different cities in France and Belgium along the way where they've staged rallies and performances.
translation.swa: Umoja huo na wanaowaunga mkono wamewasilisha barua wenyewe huko The Hague baada ya kuandamana kwa juma moja huko Paris huku wakisimama katika miji tofauti tofauti ya Ufaransa na Ubelgiji katika njia zote walizokuwa wakiandamana.

translation.en: The photo below is from the kick-off gathering in Paris:
translation.swa: Picha inayofuata ni ya kusanyiko lililofanyika huko Paris:

translation.en: A homage to the 472 social leaders assassinated in Colombia, the walkers of The Hague made a piece of fabric with the names of [each of] the 472 [leaders].
translation.swa: Heshima kwa ajili ya viongozi wa kijamii 472 waliouawa nchini Colombia, watembeaji kuelekea The Hague wametengeneza bango la kitambaa lenye majina yao wote.

translation.en: We hope the government has enough with their security policies and this number doesn't continue swelling.
translation.swa: Tunaamini serikali ina mambo ya kutosha kuhusu sera yao ya ulinzi na idadi hii haitaendelea kuongezeka.

translation.en: The march was spearheaded by The Netherlands Colombian Citizens Diplomacy Collective with other groups joining forces later on.
translation.swa: Maandamano yalianzishwa na Umoja wa Wacolombia walio Uholanzi  na vikundi vingine kuunga mkono baadaye.

translation.en: Participants have used the hashtag #MarchamosALaHaya (Marching to The Hague) and #MarchamosALaHaya5abril (Marching to The Hague April 5) to spread information about the initiative.
translation.swa: Washiriki walitumia hashitagi #MarchamosALaHaya (Kuandamana kuelekea The Hague) na #MarchamosALaHaya5abril (Kuandamana kuelekea The Hague Aprili 5) kueneza taarifa kuhusu mpango huo.

translation.en: Colombian politicians Gustavo Bolívar and Antonio Sanguino have expressed support for the march.
translation.swa: Wanasiasa wa Colombia Gustavo Bolívar na Antonio Sanguino wameonesha kuunga mkono maandamano hayo.

translation.en: Senator Gustavo Petro, who lost presidential elections in 2010 and 2018, also participated in the march through his organization Colombia Humana (Human Colombia).
translation.swa: Seneta Gustavo Petro, ambaye alipoteza kinyang'anyiro cha urais 2010 na 2018 pia alishiriki maandamano hayo kupitia taasisi yake ya Colombia Humana (Binadamu wa Colombia).

translation.en: A video by Adriaan Alsema, the founder of online media outlet Colombia Reports, shows some images of previous protests that were staged inside and outside Colombia against the killings of social leaders.
translation.swa: Video ya Adriaan Alsema, mwanzilishi wa chanzo cha habari mtandaoni Colombia Reports, ikionesha baadhi ya picha za maandamano yaliyopita ambayo yalifanyika ndani na nje ya Colombia dhidi ya mauaji ya viongozi wa kijamii.

translation.en: It also includes a brief explanation of the problem.
translation.swa: Pia ilihusisha maelezo mafupi kuhusu tatizo hili.

translation.en: Over 163  community leaders and activists  referred under the umbrella term líderes sociales in Colombia  have been murdered over the past three years in Colombia, according to the UN's High Commissioner for Human Rights.
translation.swa: Zaidi ya viongozi wa kijamii 163  na wanaharakati  wanaofahamika kama líderes sociales nchini Colombia  wameuawa kwa kipindi cha miaka mitatu na hii ni kulingana na Kamishna Mkuu wa Haki za Binadamu  Umoja wa Mataifa.

translation.en: The Colombian Ombudsman has a much higher figure  over 460 killings since 2016.
translation.swa: Mpelelezi wa serikali ya Columbia ana idadi kubwa zaidi ya mauaji 460 tangu mwaka 2016.

translation.en: By any accounts, the number of violent deaths has soared since the 2016 peace agreement that for the most part ended the country's decades-long conflict between the government and the guerrilla group FARC.
translation.swa: Kwa namna yeyote idadi ya vifo vya kikatili imepaa tangu 2016 ulipofanyika mkataba wa amani  ambao kwa sehemu kubwa ukimaliza mgogoro uliodumu nchini kwa kipindi kirefu baina ya serikali na kikundi cha waasi cha FARC.

translation.en: Among many other directives, the peace agreement stipulates that the FARC will surrender all assets in exchange for participation in institutional politics.
translation.swa: Moja kati ya maelekezo yaliyowekwa na Mkataba wa amani  ni kuwa FARC watakabidhi mali zao zote huku wakipewa nafasi za ushiriki katika taasisi za kisiasa.

translation.en: But the FARC has left a vacuum of power since it left its former territories, which have now been occupied either by paramilitary groups or guerrilla dissidents that don't accept the peace process.
translation.swa: Lakini FARC wameacha ombwe la mamlaka tangu waachie maeneo yao ya zamani ambayo kwa sasa yanashikiliwa aidha na vikundi vya wanamgambo na waasi ambao hawakubaliani na mchakato wa amani.

translation.en: Social leaders are targeted for defending their communities from such groups, who usually run a monopoly on illegal drug trade or illegal mining on the areas they control.
translation.swa: Viongozi wa kijamii wanalengwa kwa sababu wanatetea jamii zao dhidi ya vikundi hivyo ambavyo mara nyingi huongozwa na wauza dawa za kulevya au wachimbaji haramu wa madini katika maeneo wanayoyashikilia.

translation.en: According to Carlos Guevara, who coordinates the organization Somos Defensores (we are defenders, in Spanish), the social leaders are often killed in their own homes, in front of their families, and usually have no support from authorities when they seek justice:
translation.swa: Kulingana na Carlos Guevara, ambaye anaongoza taasisi ya Somos Defensores (sisi ni walinzi),  mara nyingi viongozi wa kijamii huuawa wakiwa majumbani mwao, mbele ya familia zao na mara zote hukosa msaada kutoka kwa mamlaka wanapotafuta haki:

translation.en: Aggressions against people devoted to defend human rights in Colombia [has reached the level of] a humanitarian crisis [] they're being killed because they're pushing to move away from an economy deemed illegal and beneficial to drug traffickers and armed groups.
translation.swa: Ukatili dhidi ya watu waliojitolea kutetea haki za binadamu nchini Colombia umefikia viwango vya janga la kibinadamu, wamekuwa wakiuawa kwa sababu ya kupambana katoka katika uchumi ambao ni haramu na unaowanufaisha wauzaji wa dawa za kulevya na vikundi vya wanamgambo wenye silaha.

translation.en: The Government is not taking action to protect these leaders
translation.swa: Serikali haichukui hatua yoyote kuwalinda viongozi hao

translation.en: Meanwhile, The National Conference of Afrocolombian Organizations highlights an important aspect of the mass killings that tends to be set aside: the fact that most social leaders belong to ethnic minorities.
translation.swa: Wakati huo huo, Kongamano la kitaifa la taasisi za Kicolombia ilionesha jambo la msingi kuhusu mauaji hayo ambalo limekuwa likiwekwa pembeni: ukweli kwamba viongozi wengi wa kijamii wanatoka katika jamii zisizo na watu wengi.

translation.en: In addition, female leaders suffer from an additional layer of violence, as they are subjected to additional kinds of gender-based aggressions.
translation.swa: Kwa kuongezea, viongozi wanawake wanateseka zaidi kwa kuwepo kwa tabaka lingine la ukatili, kwa sababu wanahusishwa na aina nyingine za ukatili unaolenga jinsia.

translation.en: Colombia Twitter often uses the hashtag #NosEstánMatando (they're killing us) to talk about the killings of social leaders.
translation.swa: Mtandao wa twita nchini Colombia mara zote hutumia hashitagi ya #NosEstánMatando (wanatuua) kwa sababu ya kuzungumzia mauaji ya viongozi wa kijamii.

translation.en: With the ICC march, activists hope to raise the international profile of their plight.
translation.swa: Kwa maandamano ya kwenda ICC wanaharakati wanatarajia kuamsha mtazamo wa kimataifa kuhusu hatma yao.

translation.en: Meanwhile, the numbers don't cease to soar.
translation.swa: Wakati huo huo, idadi inaendelea kuongezeja.

translation.en: Since the start of 2019, 73 social leaders have been threatened just in the central Boyacá department.
translation.swa: Tangu kuanza kwa mwaka 2019, viongozi 73 wameshatishiwa katika eneo la idara ya Boyacá pekee.

translation.en: Bruno Saraiva won an award in Hong Kong | photo provided by Bruno (20.04.2019)
translation.swa: Bruno Saraiva alishinda tuzo nchini Hong Kong | picha ilitolewa na Bruno (20.04.2019)

translation.en: On 17 April, the Mozambican athlete Bruno Saraiva won an international bodybuilding competition in Hong Kong.
translation.swa: Tarehe 17 Aprili, mwanariadha raia wa Msumbiji Bruno Saraiva aliishinda mashindano ya kimataifa ya kutunisha misuli nchini Hong Kong.

translation.en: After beating five competitors, the athlete won first place in the category of classic bodybuilding (classic physique), the most popular and important category in the event, which seeks to find the athlete who best displays their musculature in various positions.
translation.swa: Baada ya kuwashinda wapinzani watano, mwanariadha huyo alishinda nafasi ya kwanza katika kundi la watunisha misuli bora kundi ambalo ni muhimu na linapendwa na watu wengi ambalo alikuwa anatafutwa mwanariadha mzuri ambaye huonesha maumbo yake katika mikao mbalimbali .

translation.en: Bruno also won in the overall category for the best athlete across all the sub-categories.
translation.swa: Pia, Bruno alishinda tuzo ya ujumla kwa wanariadha bora katika kundi la pili.

translation.en: He participated in three categories in the Hong Kong Bodybuilding contest: mens athletic physique, mens fitness physique, mens sports model.
translation.swa: Alishiriki katika makundi matatu kushindana na watunisha misuli wa kiume katika shindano la watunisha misuli nchini Hong Kong: Wanaume wenye maungo  ya kimwanariadha, wanaume wenye maungo thabiti na wanaume wenye maungo ya kimichezo mashindano yaliyopangwa kufanyika tarehe 23 Juni.

translation.en: The contest is scheduled to be held next on 23 June.
translation.swa: kama mrejesho wa  maombi yetu yaliyotumwa kupitia mazungumzo ya Facebook kuhusu mashindano yalivyokwenda Saraiva alieleza kuwa yalikuwa ni mashindano ya kwanza ambayo yalikuwa na muda mfupi wa maandalizi:

translation.en: In response to our request sent by Facebook chat about how the competition went, Saraiva highlighted that it was his first time at the contest, as well as the limited time he had for preparation:
translation.swa: Eu fui preparado pelo Castro Cazé em apenas poucos dias e lá fomos fazer as inscrições, e ele disse Bruno tu vais fazer a categoria que eu sempre quis que fizesses: a mais conhecida por Classic Physique e logo na minha primeira aparição ganhei na minha categoria e fui ganhar ainda o overall, como se fosse chamar todos os primeiros lugares da tua categoria.

translation.en: Eu fui preparado pelo Castro Cazé em apenas poucos dias e lá fomos fazer as inscrições, e ele disse Bruno tu vais fazer a categoria que eu sempre quis que fizesses: a mais conhecida por Classic Physique e logo na minha primeira aparição ganhei na minha categoria e fui ganhar ainda o overall, como se fosse chamar todos os primeiros lugares da tua categoria.
translation.swa: Tafsri: Nilifanyiwa mazoezi na Castro Cazé kwa siku chache sana na kisha tukaenda kujisajili.

translation.en: I was trained by Castro Cazé in only a few days and then we went to do the registration, and he said Bruno youre going to do the category that I always wanted you to do: the one best known as Classic Physique and soon in my first appearance I won in my category and I then also won the overall, as it is called for all the first places of your category
translation.swa: Bruno alisema alishindana katika kundi ambalo huwa anataka kushindana ambalo linajukana kama ni kundi la watusha msuli bora na nilivyotokea tu kwa mara kwanza nikashinda katika kundi langu na kisha nikashinda kwa ujumla kwa sababu ya kushika nafasi ya kwanza katika kila kundi.

translation.en: Followed by over 24 thousand people on his Instagram account, Bruno, who resides in the capital Maputo, is a figure of reference for bodybuilders in Mozambique.
translation.swa: Watu wapatao elfu 24 walimfuatilia kwenye akaunti yake ya Instagram, Bruno ambaye anaishi mji mkuu Maputo ana umbo la pekee kwa watunusha misuli katika Msumbiji.

translation.en: According to the Wikipedia entry for bodybuilding:
translation.swa: Kutokana na  Wikipedia kiingilio katika shindano la kutunisha misuli:

translation.en: Bodybuilding is the use of progressive resistance exercise to control and develop one's musculature for aesthetic purposes.
translation.swa: Kunisha msuli ni zoezi endelevu la ukinzani kutawala na kuendeleza misuli kwa madhumuni ya uzuri.

translation.en: An individual who engages in this activity is referred to as a bodybuilder.
translation.swa: Mtu anayejiunga katika shughuli hiyo anaitwa mtunisha misuli.

translation.en: In competitive bodybuilding, bodybuilders appear in lineups and perform specified poses (and later individual posing routines) for a panel of judges who rank the competitors based on criteria such as symmetry, muscularity, and conditioning.
translation.swa: Katika mashindano mtunisha misuli husimama katika mstari na kuonesha mikao mbalimbali ili jopo la waamuzi liwapime na kuwaweka katika matabaka ya uzuri kwa kuzingatia vigezo kama hali zao, misuli na ulinganifu.

translation.en: Saraiva expressed his happiness with winning the award in Hong Kong in an Instagram post:
translation.swa: Saraiva alielezea furaha yake ya kushinda tuzo huko Hong Kong kwa kutuma ujumbe kupitia Instagram:

translation.en: Thank you for the victory, Lord.
translation.swa: Nakushukuru kwa ushindi, Bwana.

translation.en: It is with much joy that I have the pleasure of announcing and sharing with you all my victory in the category Classic Physique and having won the overall in the global classic competition in Hong Kong
translation.swa: Ninayo furaha kubwa ya kutangaza na kushirikiana nanyi kwa ushindi wangu katika kundi bora la watunisha misuli na kushinda ushindi wa jumla katika mashindano ya kimataifa ya kutunisha misuli nchini Hong Kong.

translation.en: In another post, though, Bruno recounted the difficulties he went through before going to Hong Kong:
translation.swa: Katika  ujumbe mwingine , Bruno alielezea vikwazo au ugumu aliokutana nao kabla ya kwenda nchini Hong Kong:

translation.en: Please my friend read this message with a lot of kindness, because it is the purest reality.
translation.swa: Tafadhali rafiki yangu soma ujumbe huu kwa ukarimu kwa sababu ni uhalisia.

translation.en: I have no shame in saying it and I know that many will overreact.
translation.swa: Sina soni kuuelezea na najua wengi watahamaki sana.

translation.en: When I was about to come to Hong Kong to compete I went around a lot of places knocking on doors asking for support, I spoke with various friends some of whom I was sure could help, and the answers from some were:
translation.swa: Nilipokuwa nakaribia kuja Hong Kong kumalizia nilipita sehemu nyingi nikipiga hodi na kuomba msaada, niliongea na marafiki zangu wengi ambao wengi niliamini watanisaidia na majibu yao yalikuwa haya:

translation.en: 1.Bruno you're not going to make it or you dont have any chance of winning nor of finishing among the best;
translation.swa: 1.Bruno, hutashinda na huna nafasi ya kushinda au kumaliza miongoni mwa wale bora;

translation.en: 2.Others said that they couldnt help me because it would be throwing away the money;
translation.swa: 2.Wengine walisema hawawezi kunisaidia kwa sababu watakuwa wanapoteza fedha yao;

translation.en: 3.Others even said Bruno you must be smoking a lot of cannabis.
translation.swa: 3.Wengine hata waliniambia Bruno, lazima unavuta bangi.

translation.en: Ould Mkhaitir was sentenced to death in 2014 over an opinion piece published online.
translation.swa: Ould Mkhaitir alihukumiwa kifo mwaka 2014 kutokana na maoni aliyoyatoa katika kipande cha habari kilichochapishwa mtandaoni.

translation.en: Despite having his death sentence commuted more than a year ago, Mauritanian blogger Mohamed Cheikh Ould Mkhaitir is still in prison.
translation.swa: Pamoja na hukumu yake ya kifo kubadilishwa  zaidi ya mwaka mmoja uliopita, mwanablogu wa Mauritania Mohamed Cheikh Ould Mkhaitir bado yuko gerezani

translation.en: Ould Mkhaitir was sentenced to death in 2014 over an opinion article published on the website of the newspaper Aqlame.
translation.swa: Ould Mkhaitir alihukumiwa kifo mwaka 2014 baada ya kutoa maoni katika makala iliyochapishwa katika tovuti ya gazeti la Aqlame.

translation.en: In the article, entitled Religion, Religiosity and Craftsmen, Ould Mkhaitir criticised the role of religion in Mauritanias caste system, using stories from the lifetime of prophet Muhammad to support his argument.
translation.swa: Katika makala hiyo yenye kichwa cha habari Dini, Udini na Wafanyabishara, Ould Mkhaitir alikosoa majukumu ya mfumo wa dini nchini Mauritania na alitumia hadithi za maisha ya Mtume Muhammad kuthibitisha maoni yake.

translation.en: The original article has since been taken down by Aqlame, but is still available online.
translation.swa: Makala halisi iliondolewa katika tovuti hiyo na Aqlame lakini bado ipo katika mitandao

translation.en: A court convicted him of apostasy and sentenced him to death under Article 306 of the Mauritanian Penal Code.
translation.swa: Mahakama ilimkuta na kosa la kuisaliti dini na alihukumiwa kifo chini ya Kifungu cha sheria 306 na Hukumu ya Kifo ya Mauritania.

translation.en: In April 2016, a court of appeal upheld his sentence and referred his case to the Supreme Court, which then returned it to the appeal court for procedural irregularities.
translation.swa: Hapo April 2016, mahakama ya rufaa iliendelea kukazia hukumu hiyo na kuihamishia kesi yake katika mahakama kuu ambapo nayo iliirudisha  kesi hiyo katika mahakama ya rufani kwa sababu ya kukiukwa kwa taratibu.

translation.en: In November 2017 his death sentence was commuted and reduced to two years in jail and a fine by the court of appeal.
translation.swa: Hapo Novemba 2017  hukumu yake ya kifo ilibatilishwa na kupunguzwa hadi kifungo cha miaka miwili gerezani na faini  katika mahakama ya rufaa.

translation.en: However, despite having already served more than two years in prison, the authorities did not release Ould Mkhaitir.
translation.swa: Hata hivyo, pamoja na kuwa alishakaa gerezani zaidi ya miaka miwili, mamlaka husika hazikumwacha huru Ould Mkhaitir.

translation.en: Almost 18 months after the appeal court's decision to release him, he remains behind bars.
translation.swa: Karibu miezi 18 baada ya uamuzi wa mahakama ya rufaa kumwachilia huru, ameendelea kuwa kizuizini.

translation.en: On April 24, 2019 Mauritania's justice minister said that Mkhaitir was in temporary detention and that only the Supreme Court can rule on his fate.
translation.swa: Hapo Aprili 24, 2019 Waziri wa sheria wa Mauritania alisema kwamba Mkhaitir alikuwa katika  kizuizi cha muda mfupi na ndio maana ni mahakama kuu pekee inayoweza kutoa uamuzi wa majaaliwa yake.

translation.en: Article 306 of the Penal Code previously provided that if the convicted person repents before his or her execution, the Mauritanian Supreme Court could commute the death sentence to a jail sentence of between three months and two years, and a fine.
translation.swa: Kifungu cha sheria namba 306 cha hukumu ya kifo, mwanzoni kilikuwa kinasema kuwa ikiwa aliyehukumiwa atatubu kabla ya kunyongwa kwake, mahakama kuu ya Mauritania inaweza kubadili hukumu ya kifo kuwa kifungo cha miezi mitatu mpaka miaka miwili gerezani pamoja na faini.

translation.en: But in April 2018, the Mauritanian National Assembly passed a law making the death penalty mandatory for anyone convicted of blasphemous speech and acts deemed sacrilegious.
translation.swa: Lakini hapo Aprili 2018, Bunge la Mauritania lilipitisha sheria kuwa hukumu ya kifo ni lazima kwa yeyote atakayekutwa na makosa ya kutoa kauli za dhihaka  na matendo ambayo ni ya kudhalilisha vitu vitakatifu.

translation.en: The timing of the enactment of the law just a few months after the court of appeal ordered Mkhaïtirs release appears to be related to his case, Human Rights Watch said in November 2018.
translation.swa: Kutungwa kwa sheria hii kunahusishwa na kesi ya Mkhaïtir kwa sababu ni miezi michache tu baada ya Mahakama kuu kuamuru Mkhaïtir kuachiliwa huru,  Shirika la Uangalizi wa Haki za Binadamu walisema haya hapo Novemba 2018.

translation.en: Critiques of racism and the caste system are taboo in Mauritania, and have spurred many political and legal threats against journalists and activists in recent years.
translation.swa: Ni makosa makubwa kukosoa ukabila na mfumo wa udini nchini Mauritania, na vimetengenezwa vitisho vingi vya kisiasa na kisheria dhidi ya wanahabari na wanaharakati katika miaka ya hivi karibuni.

translation.en: In 1981, Mauritania became the last country on earth to officially abolish slavery, and only criminalized the practice in 2007.
translation.swa: Mwaka 1981, Mauritania ilikuwa nchi ya mwisho kabisa duniani kukomesha biashara ya utumwa na ilifanya utumwa kuwa jinai tu, mwaka 2007.

translation.en: But since that time, UN officials and human rights workers have documented evidence that thousands of people, many of them ethnic Haratines of black African origin, are still enslaved, living in situations of forced labour, or otherwise facing caste-based discrimination.
translation.swa: Lakini kuanzia wakati huo wafanyakazi wa Umoja wa Mataifa na wafanyakazi wa Haki za Binadamu wamekusanya nyaraka zinazothibitisha kuwa watu weusi wa kabila la Waharatine bado wako katika utumwa wakiishi maisha magumu ya kutumikishwa kwa lazima, na pia hukumbana na ubaguzi wa kidini.

translation.en: The Mauritanian government denies that slavery still exists in the country, and many people like Ould Mkhaitir, who speak out against the practice and discrimination against Haratines, have been jailed and prosecuted.
translation.swa: Serikali ya Mauritania hukataa kuendelea kuwepo kwa utumwa katika nchi na watu wengi kama vile Ould Mkhaitir, ambao huzungumza wazi kuhusu matendo ya ubaguzi dhidi ya Waharatine wamekuwa wakishtakiwa na kufungwa.

translation.en: Last September, authorities jailed and charged activist Abdallahi Salem Ould Yali with incitement to violence and racial hatred for posting messages in WhatsApp group denouncing the plight and the marginalisation of his community.
translation.swa: Septemba iliyopita mamlaka  zilimfunga mwanaharakati Abdallahi Salem Ould Yali, kwa kutuma ujumbe katika kundi la WhatsApp wenye  uchochezi na kueneza chuki za kikabila na kuharibu  usalama wa jamii yake.

translation.en: Shawkan enjoying a day out, before he is locked again for the night.
translation.swa: Shawkan akiufurahia mchana kabla hajafungiwa tena wakati wa usiku.

translation.en: Photo taken by Wael Abbas and posted on the photojournalist's Twitter account.
translation.swa: Picha imepigwa na Wael Abbas na kubandikwa katika ukurasa wa Mwanahabari za Picha huko Twitter.

translation.en: Egyptian photojournalist Mahmoud Abu Zeid, also known as Shawkan, spent five years in prison for simply doing his job as a journalist.
translation.swa: Mwanahabari za picha wa Misri Mahmoud Abu Zeid, ambaye pia hufahamika kama Shawkan, alitumukia miaka mitano gerezani kwa kutimiza wajibu wake tu kama mwanahabari.

translation.en: He was detained on August 14, 2013 as he was photographing the deadly dispersal of the Rabaa El Adaweya sit-in, in which supporters of former Egyptian president Mohamed Morsi gathered to protest a military coup that ended his presidency on July 3 that same year.
translation.swa: Aliwekwa kizuizini Agosti 2013 alipokuwa akipiga picha mtawanyiko wa kikao cha Rabaa El Adaweya ambapo waungaji mkono wa Rais wa zamani wa Misri Mohamed Morsi walikusanyika wakipinga mapinduzi ya kijeshi ambapo uongozi wake uliishia Julai 3 mwaka huo huo.

translation.en: Egyptian security forces killed at least 817 people and injured many more, according to Human Rights Watch, when they dispersed the sit-in.
translation.swa: Vyombo vya ulinzi vya Misri vilipowatawanya watu hao, waliuwawa watu karibu 817 kujeruhi wengi wao na hii ni kulingana na Shirika la Haki za Binadamu.

translation.en: Shawkan, who was working for Demotix at the time of his arrest, spent almost four years in pre-trial detention before his trial, along with 739 other defendants in what came to be known as the Rabaa Dispersal Case, began.
translation.swa: Shawkan, aliyekuwa akifanya kazi na Demotix wakati wa kukamatwa kwake, alitumia karibu miaka minne akiwa mahabusu kabla ya kuanza kusikilizwa kwa kesi yake akiwa na watuhumiwa wengine 739 wa shauri lililokuja kujulikana kama Kesi ya Mtawanyo wa Rabaa, kuanza.

translation.en: In September 2018, a Cairo Criminal Court convicted him on spurious charges of murder and affiliation with the Muslim Brotherhood, and a few months later he was released from jail.
translation.swa: Septemba 2018, Mahakama ya Jinai ya Cairo ilimkuta na hatia ya kosa la mauaji na kujihusisha na kikundi cha Kiislam Cha Muslim Brotherhood, na miezi michache baadaye aliachiliwa huru kutoka gerezani.

translation.en: Shawkans supporters were thrilled to see him reunited with his loved ones when he was released on March 4.
translation.swa: Wanaomuunga mkono Shawkan walifurahishwa kwa kumuona akiungana na wapendwa wake alipoachiliwa Machi 4.

translation.en: But the journalist is actually only partially free.
translation.swa: Lakini mwandishi huyo ni kuwa hayupo huru moja kwa moja.

translation.en: Every evening at 6pm, he has to report to his local police station where he has to spend the night, before he is free again at 6am the following morning.
translation.swa: Kila siku jioni saa 12 anatakiwa kuripoti katika kituo cha polisi cha karibu naye na hulala hapo usiku wote kisha huruhusiwa tena kuondoka saa 12 asubuhi inayofuata.

translation.en: Shawkan needs to do this every day for five years after his release.
translation.swa: Shawkan anapaswa kufanya hivi kila siku kwa miaka mitano baada ya kuachiliwa kwake.

translation.en: I want to be free so I can return to normal life, Shawkan told Deutsche Welle after his release in reference to his probation period.
translation.swa: Ninataka kuwa huru ili niweze kuyarudia maisha yangu ya kawaida, Shawkan aliiambia Sauti ya Ujerumani-Deutsche Welle Baada ya kuachiliwa kwake  katika kipindi chake cha uangalizi.

translation.en: On Twitter and Instagram, the journalist has been reflecting and posting about his life under these restrictive conditions and his daily hours of freedom, from 6am to 6pm.
translation.swa: Uko Twitter na Instagram, mwanahabari huyo amekuwa akitafakari na kushirikisha kuhusu maisha yake chini ya sheria hizi zinazombana na masaa yake ya uhuru kuanzia saa 12 asubuhi mpaka saa 12 jioni.

translation.en: On March 31, he posted about his visit to the pyramids in Giza.
translation.swa: Machi 31, aliandika kuhusu yeye kutembelea mapiramidi huko Giza.

translation.en: The pyramids are at the back.
translation.swa: Mapiramidi yako kwa nyuma.

translation.en: A trip nearby the place of supervision [police station where he has to spend the night] because of the [lack of] time.
translation.swa: Matembezi katika eneo la karibu na kituo cha uangalizi (kituo cha polisi ambapo anatakiwa kulala usiku) kwa sababu ya (ukosefu Wa) muda.

translation.en: On April 6, using the hashtag _# (half freedom in English) he posted a photo on Instagram, taken from his seat on a motorcycle.
translation.swa: Aprili 6 akitumia hashitagi ya _# (Nusu Uhuru) alibandika picha huko Instagram, aliyopiga akiwa kwenye pikipiki.

translation.en: He explained that in order to arrive to the police station on time each night, he travels by motorcycle so he can avoid traffic.
translation.swa: Alielezea kuwa ili kufika katika kituo cha polisi kwa wakati kila usiku husafiri kwa pikipiki ili kuwahi foleni barabarani .

translation.en: Shawkans story is not unique in Egypt.
translation.swa: Habari ya Shawkan sio mpya kwa Wamisri.

translation.en: Prominent Egyptian blogger and activist Alaa Abd El Fattah, who was released from jail on March 28, is also under a similar probation period.
translation.swa: Mwanablogu maarufu na mwanaharakati wa Misri Alaa Abd El Fattah, ambaye aliachiliwa huru kutoka gerezani Machi 28 naye yupo katika uangalizi na kwa muda wa namna hiyo hiyo.

translation.en: Alaa spent five years in jail for defying a protest ban, and like Shawkan, he has to spend the night at a police station for the next five years.
translation.swa: Alaa alitumia miaka 5 gerezani kwa kudharau zuio la maandamano na kama Shawkan anatakiwa kulala katika kituo cha polisi kila siku kwa kipindi cha miaka mitano.

translation.en: Freedom for Alaa.
translation.swa: Uhuru kwa Alaa.

translation.en: Since his release, Alaa has been speaking out against the conditions of his probation.
translation.swa: Tangu aachiliwe huru Alaa amekuwa akizungumzia kuhusu taratibu za uangalizi wake.

translation.en: Photo by the Freedom for Alaa campaign.
translation.swa: Picha na Kampeni ya Uhuru kwa Alaa.

translation.en: Alaa has also been reflecting on life under probation.
translation.swa: Alaa naye amekuwa akitafakari kuhusu maisha yake chini ya uangalizi huo.

translation.en: I am happy to see your joy over my release, but I am unfortunately not free, Alaa wrote on Facebook days after his release.
translation.swa: Ninafurahi kuiona furaha yenu juu ya kufunguliwa kwangu, lakini siko huru kwa kweli, Alaa aliandika huko Facebook siku kadhaa baada ya kuachiliwa kwake.

translation.en: Every day I surrender myself to a humiliation called [police] monitoring.
translation.swa: Kila siku ninakutana na udhalilishaji unaoitwa uangalizi wa polisi.

translation.en: In another post, he wrote: I do not know how to describe the beautiful feeling of seeing [his son] Khaleds swimming lesson for the first time.
translation.swa: Katika bandiko jingine aliandika: Sijui namna nzuri ya kuelezea hisia za kumuona Khaled (mwanae wa kiume) akijifunza kuogelea kwa mara ya kwanza.

translation.en: I also dont know how to describe the cruelty of leaving him in mid-lesson to be on time for the monitoring.
translation.swa: Lakini pia sijui jinsi ya kuuelezea ukatili wa kumuacha katikati ya mafunzo yake ili niwahi kwenye ukaguzi

translation.en: Alaas sister, Mona Seif, who is also a human rights activist, likened the conditions of her brothers imprisonment every night to solitary confinement.
translation.swa: Dada yake Alaa, Mona Seif, ambaye pia ni mwanaharakati wa Haki za Binadamu, alifananisha masharti ya kifungo cha kaka yake kila siku usiku kama vile Bughudha ya faragha.

translation.en: Alaa has to turn himself in to Dokki police station every day at 6 pm and they let him go at 6 am.
translation.swa: Alaa hutakiwa kujipeleka kwenye Kituo cha polisi cha Dokki kila siku saa 12 jioni na humwachilia huru kila siku saa 12 asubuhi.

translation.en: When he turns himself in, they keep him isolated from all others in a small wooden kiosk within the police station.
translation.swa: Anaporipoti kituoni, humtenga na wengine katika kibanda kidogo cha mbao kilicho ndani ya kituo cha polisi.

translation.en: They lock him in for 12 hrs.
translation.swa: Humfungia humo kwa masaa 12.

translation.en: These are worst conditions than the ones he had to endure in prison for five years.
translation.swa: Hizi taratibu mbaya kabisa kuliko zile alizovumilia akiwa gerezani kwa miaka mitano.

translation.en: Alaa is practically now spending half his day in solitary confinement in the police station, and he is looking at five years more of this nightmare
translation.swa: Alaa kwa sasa anatumia nusu siku yake kifungoni katika kituo cha polisi na anaitazama miaka hiyo mitano ya jinamizi hili

translation.en: Alaa has also learned that speaking out against these conditions can pose a risk of additional jail time.
translation.swa: Alaa ametambua kuwa kuna hatari ya kuongezewa muda wa kifungo gerezani ikiwa ataendelea kuzizungumzia taratibu hizo.

translation.en: On the night of April 9, security officers threatened to throw him back in jail if he keeps exposing the conditions of his probation.
translation.swa: Katika usiku wa Aprili 9, maafisa wa usalama walimtishia kumrudisha gerezani ikiwa ataendelea kuzungumzia taratibu za kipindi chake cha uangalizi.

translation.en: Ahmed Maher, a political activist with the April 6 Youth Movement, spent three years behind bars for illegal demonstration.
translation.swa: Ahmed Maher, mwanaharakati za kisiasa aliyekuwa na harakati za vijana Aprili 6, alitumikia miaka mitatu gerezani kwa kufanya maandamano haramu.

translation.en: He was released in January 2017 and placed under police monitoring a period equal to the amount of time he spent in jail.
translation.swa: Aliachiliwa huru  Januari 2017 na aliwekwa chini ya uangalizi wa polisi kwa kipindi sawa na kile alichokaa gerezani.

translation.en: On Twitter, he described the conditions of this period:
translation.swa: Huko Twitter, alielezea taratibu za wakati huo:

translation.en: Under police monitoring, where we sleep is much dirtier than in prison and there is more arbitrariness, even though according to law, they do not have the right to imprison us in a police station or to deprive us of our children, our work, our studies and our normal lives.
translation.swa: Chini ya uangalizi wa polisi, tulipokuwa tunalala palikuwa pachafu kuliko gerezani na kulikuwa na uholela uliopitiliza ingawa kulingana na sheria, hawakuwa na haki ya kutufungia kwenye vituo vya polisi au kutunyima watoto wetu, kazi zetu, masomo na maisha yetu ya kawaida.

translation.en: According to law, monitoring should be more gentle and more humane, but it is clear that the motivation is nothing but a desire to abuse and humiliate.
translation.swa: Kulingana na sheria, uangalizi unatakiwa uwe wa Kistaarabu na wa kkibinadamu lakini ni wazi kuwa msingi wake ni kiu ya kuumiza na kudhalilisha

translation.en: This practice of locking former prisoners overnight is an abuse of power.
translation.swa: Kitendo hiki cha kuwafungia wafungwa wa zamani wakati wa usiku ni kutumia madaraka vibaya.

translation.en: According to legal analysts and human rights NGOs, those placed under monitoring are supposed to be able to spend the night in their homes.
translation.swa: Kulingana na Mchambuzi wa sheria na taasisi binafsi ya Haki za Binadamu, wale wote waliowekwa chini ya uangalizi wa polisi wanapaswa wawe wanatumia usiku majumbani mwao.

translation.en: Only those who are without a place to live in the area of their local police station, are required to spend the night in official custody.
translation.swa: Wale pekee ambao hawana sehemu ya kuishi karibu na kituo cha polisi ndio wanaotakiwa kulala kituoni chini ya Uangalizi maalum.

translation.en: Yasmin Omar and Mai El-Sadaby of the Tahrir Institute for Middle East Policy wrote:
translation.swa: Yasmin Omar na Mai El-Sadaby wa Taasisi ya Sera za mashariki ya kati Tahri waliandika:

translation.en: After an individual is sentenced to a probation period decided by the judge at sentencing, the law empowers the sentenced individual to designate a residence at which to serve his or her probation period.
translation.swa: Baada ya mtu kuhukumiwa kwa kipindi cha uangalizi kilichoamuliwa na jaji wakati wa hukumu, sheria huwasaidia waliohukumiwa kutengeneza makazi ambapo atatumia kwa muda wa kutumikia kipindi chake cha uangalizi.

translation.en: However, the law additionally authorizes authorities to select a location for probation if no residence is provided, as well as to determine whether or not a location selected by the defendant is appropriate for police surveillance.
translation.swa: Hata hivyo, kwa kuongezea mamlaka hupewa nafasi ya kuchagua eneo la uangaliIzi ikiwa makazi hayatatolewa pia kuangalia kama eneo lililochaguliwa na mtuhumiwa linafaa kwa uangalizi wa polisi au lah.

translation.en: This discretion has been used to systematically erode the right of individuals to complete their probation periods at their stated residencea right guaranteed to them under lawand instead force individuals who have residences where police surveillance can clearly occur to spend them at police stations.
translation.swa: Busara hii imekuwa ikitumika kuondoa haki ya mtuhumiwa kumaliza muda wake wa uangalizi katika maeneo yaliyotajwa, haki ambayo amepewa chini ya sheria na badala yake huwalazimu watu wenye makazi yao sehemu polisi wanaweza kufanya ufuatiliaji wao kutumia muda wao kwenye vituo vya polisi .

translation.en: Yet at the end of each day, many Egyptians are forced to retreat to a small cell in a police station, away from their loved ones and the rest of the world: they are out of prison, but not really free.
translation.swa: Lakini mwisho wa kila siku WaMisri wengi wanalazimishwa kurudi kwenye vyumba vidogo vya selo za polisi, mbali na wawapendao na ulimwengu wote: wako nje ya magereza lakini hawako huru kwa kweli.

translation.en: Many are activists, protesters and journalists, whose only crimes were to exercise their fundamental rights to freedom of expression, assembly and protest.
translation.swa: Wengi wao ni wanaharakati, waandamanaji na wanahabari ambao kosa lao pekee lilikuwa ni kutumia haki yao ya msingi ya uhuru wa kujieleza, kukusanyika na kuandamana.

translation.en: Army officers on patrol in Rio de Janeiro, in 2018.
translation.swa: Maafisa wa jeshi wakiwa katika ulinzi huko Rio de Janeiro, mwaka 2018.

translation.en: Image: Tânia Rêgo/Agência Brasil, republication permitted with attribution.
translation.swa: Picha: Kwa heshima imeruhusiwa kuchapishwa tena na Tânia Rêgo/Agência Brasil.

translation.en: On April 7, a Sunday, musician Evaldo dos Santos Rosa, 51, was on his way to a baby shower in Guadalupe, a poor neighborhood in the city of Rio de Janeiro.
translation.swa: Jumapili April 7, mwanamuziki Evaldo dos Santos Rosa, 51, alikuwa njiani kuelekea kwenye sherehe huko Guadalupe, mji mdogo na maskini pembezoni mwa jiji la Rio de Janeiro.

translation.en: In the car with him were his father-in-law, his wife, their 7-year-old son, and a friend.
translation.swa: Katika gari yake alikuwa na mkewe, baba mkwe wake, mtoto wao wa miaka 7 na rafiki yao.

translation.en: The sun was up, and it seemed like a regular weekend in Brazil's largest coastal city.
translation.swa: Jua lilikuwa limechomoza na ilionekana kuwa mwisho wa juma wa kawaida katika mji huo mkubwa wa mwambao wa Brazili.

translation.en: As they drove by an army compound nearby, soldiers fired a hail of bullets towards the car.
translation.swa: Walipokuwa wanaendesha kupita eneo la karibu na  kambi ya jeshi , wanajeshi waliachilia mvua ya risasi kulielekea gari hilo.

translation.en: Evaldo was killed on the spot, while his father-in-law along with a passerby that was near the scene were injured.
translation.swa: Evaldo aliuwawa papo hapo wakati baba mkwe wake na mpita njia mmoja walijeruhiwa katika tukio hilo.

translation.en: The other passengers managed to escape.
translation.swa: Abiria wengine walisalimika.

translation.en: The police, which inspected the scene, later revealed the car was shot 80 times.
translation.swa: Jeshi la polisi, ambao ndio waliokagua eneo la tukio baadaye, walitabanaisha kwamba gari hilo lilipigwa risasi 80.

translation.en: Leonardo Salgado, police chief, said he believed the officers mistook Evaldo's car to another one used by criminals which they were after, according to news website G1.
translation.swa: Mkuu wa Jeshi la polisi Leonardo Salgado, alisema kuwa anaamini kuwa wanajeshi hao walikosea kwa kulifananisha gari la Evaldo na gari lingine la waalifu walilokuwa wanalifuatilia, na hii ni kutokana na tovuti ya habari ya G1.

translation.en: He added that police didn't find any weapons on Evaldo's car.
translation.swa: Aliongeza kuwa polisi hawakukuta silaha yoyote katika gari la Evaldo.

translation.en: Luciana Nogueira, Evaldo's wife of 27 years who survived the shooting, told Estado de S. Paulo:
translation.swa: Mke wa Evaldo, Luciana Nogueira mwenye miaka 27 aliyesalimika katika shambulio hilo aliwaambia Estado de S. Paulo kuwa:

translation.en: Os vizinhos começaram a socorrer (o meu marido), mas eles continuaram atirando.
translation.swa: Os vizinhos começaram a socorrer (o meu marido), mas eles continuaram atirando.

translation.en: Eu botei a mão na cabeça, pedi socorro, disse pra eles que era meu marido, mas eles não fizeram nada, ficaram de deboche.
translation.swa: Eu botei a mão na cabeça, pedi socorro, disse pra eles que era meu marido, mas eles não fizeram nada, ficaram de deboche.
