translation.en: The neighbors started to help (my husband), but [the soldiers] kept shooting.
translation.swa: Majirani walianza kwa kumsaidia mume wangu lakini askari waliendelea kurusha risasi.

translation.en: I put my hands on my head, cried for help, told them that he was my husband, but they didnt do anything, the just stood there with debauchery.
translation.swa: Niliweka mikono yangu kichwani, nikiomba msaada, nikiwaambia ni mume wangu lakini hawakufanya chochote, walisimama kwa kiburi.

translation.en: While the brutal murder of an innocent man by state officials has shocked Brazil, President Jair Bolsonaro remained silent about the incident for six days.
translation.swa: Wakati mauaji ya kikatili ya mtu asiye na hatia yakifanywa na maafisa wa serikali yakiwashtua wengi, Rais Jair Bolsonaro ameendelea kuwa kimya juu ya jambo hili kwa siku sita.

translation.en: When he finally spoke, at a press conference on April 12, he said: The army didn't kill anyone, the army is of the people, and you can't accuse the people of murder.
translation.swa: Hatimaye alipozungumza, katika mkutano na vyombo vya habari Aprili 12, alisema:  Jeshi halijamuua mtu yeyote, jeshi ni la wananchi na hamuwezi kuwatuhumu wananchi kuua.

translation.en: Previously, the only words that came out of Planalto Palace, the executive's seat, was through the president's spokesperson, who referred to Evaldo's execution as an incident without offering condolences to his family.
translation.swa: Hapo kabla, maneno pekee yaliyotoka kwa Planalto Palace, nafasi pekee ya utawala, yalikuwa ni kupitia msemaji wa Rais, ambaye alizungumzia mauaji ya Evaldo kama tukio tena bila kutoa salamu za rambirambi kwa familia yake.

translation.en: In the evening of April 8, Rio de Janeiro's State Governor Wilson Witzel, an ally of Bolsonaro, declared that it wasnt up to him to make a judgment
translation.swa: Jioni ya Aprili 8, gavana wa Rio de Janeiro Wilson Witzel na mshirika wa Bolsonaro, alitangaza kuwa haikuwa juu yake kuhukumu

translation.en: Two days later, Minister of Justice and Public Security Sergio Moro only said the killing was unfortunate during an interview to a TV show.
translation.swa: Siku mbili baadaye, katika mahojiano na kituo cha runinga, Waziri wa Sheria na Ulinzi wa Raia Sergio Moro alisema mauaji hayo yalikuwa ya bahati mbaya .

translation.en: Número de menções no Twitter do primeiro escalão do governo Bolsonaro ao fuzilamento de um carro de família no Rio de Janeiro
translation.swa: Número de menções no Twitter do primeiro escalão do governo Bolsonaro ao fuzilamento de um carro de família no Rio de Janeiro

translation.en: Sim, o gráfico está VAZIO, pois ninguém se posicionou, nem ao menos para lamentar o ocorrido
translation.swa: Sim, o gráfico está VAZIO, pois ninguém se posicionou, nem ao menos para lamentar o ocorrido

translation.en: O carro foi atingido por 80 tiros disparados p/ militares pic.twitter.com/K2tbvxwrff
translation.swa: O carro foi atingido por 80 tiros disparados p/ militares pic.twitter.com/K2tbvxwrff

translation.en: Gabriel Zanlorenssi (@gzanlorenssi) April 9, 2019
translation.swa: Gabriel Zanlorenssi (@gzanlorenssi) April 9, 2019

translation.en: This is the number of mentions on Twitter by Bolsonaros cabinet to the shooting aimed at a family car in Rio de Janeiro.
translation.swa: Hii ni idadi ya mara walizotajwa baraza la Bolsonaro huko katika mtandao wa Twita kuhusu shambulizi lililolenga gari la familia huko Rio de Janeiro.

translation.en: Yes, the graphic is EMPTY, because no one manifested themselves, not even to say they felt sorry for what happened.
translation.swa: Ndiyo,  mchoro ni MTUPU kwa sababu hakuna aliyejiweka wazi, hata kwa kusema samahani kwa lililotokea.

translation.en: The car was shot 80 times by military men.
translation.swa: Gari lilipigwa risasi 80 na wanajeshi .

translation.en: Military investigation
translation.swa: Upelelezi wa Jeshi

translation.en: Shortly after news about the episode began circulating in the media, the army put out a statement saying its men were responding to unfair aggression by assailants.
translation.swa: Muda mfupi baada ya taarifa hizi kuanza kusambaa katika vyombo vya habari, jeshi lilitoa waraka unaosema kuwa vijana wake walikuwa wanakutana na lawama zisizo za haki kutoka kwa wanaowashambulia.

translation.en: Later in the evening of April 7, it released a different note, this time saying that it would conduct an investigation.
translation.swa: Baadaye, jioni ya Aprili 7, jeshi liliachia taarifa nyingine tofauti kabisa ambapo walisema litafanya uchunguzi.

translation.en: Although the civil police inspected the scene, they will not investigate the case.
translation.swa: Ingawa polisi wa kiraia walikagua eneo la tukio, hawataweza kufanya uchunguzi.

translation.en: The army itself will do it instead, and a military court will eventually try the soldiers.
translation.swa: Jeshi lenyewe litafanya hivyo badala yake na mahakama ya kijeshi itawahukumu wanajeshi hao.

translation.en: That's thanks to a 2017 law that says armed forces themselves are responsible for investigating homicides committed by their personnel while on duty.
translation.swa: Ishukuriwe sheria ya 2017 inayosema kuwa jeshi lenyewe linawajibika kupeleleza mauaji yanayofanywa na watumishi wake wakiwa kwenye majukumu.

translation.en: Human Rights Watch, who has criticized the law at the time of its approval by President Michel Temer, put out a statement on April 9 calling for an impartial investigation of the murder of Evaldo, and for the law to be repealed.
translation.swa: Shirika la Haki za binadamu, ambao waliikosoa sheria hiyo wakati wa kupitishwa na Rais Michel Temer, walitoa waraka wao Aprili 9 wakitaka ufanyike uchunguzi yakinifu juu ya mauaji ya Elvado na pia wakitaka sheria hiyo ifutwe.

translation.en: On April 8, the military arrested 10 of the 12 officers who had been deployed to the scene and charged them with homicide and attempted homicide, according to local newspaper Extra.
translation.swa: Aprili 8, jeshi liliwakamata wanajeshi 10 kati ya 12 ambao walikuwa wamepelekwa katika eneo lilipotokea tukio hilo na wameshitakiwa kwa kesi ya mauaji na jaribio la mauaji, kulingana na gazeti la Extra.

translation.en: A judge released one of the 10 officers on April 10 following a hearing.
translation.swa: Jaji alimuachilia huru mmoja wa maafisa hao 10 hapo Aprili 10 baada ya kesi kuanza kusikilizwa.

translation.en: Not the first time
translation.swa: Siyo mara ya kwanza

translation.en: Brazil's police are known for shooting first, asking later, a saying that has been proven right time and again.
translation.swa: Polisi wa Brazili wanafahamika kwa kupiga risasi kwanza, na kuuliza baadaye ambapo huu ni msemo ambao umeendelea kuthibitika tena na tena.

translation.en: An International Amnestys report released this year says Brazilian police is the most deadly in the world.
translation.swa: Ripoti ya Kimataifa ya shirika la Haki za binadamu iliyotolewa mwaka huu inasema Polisi wa Brazili ni hatari na katili zaidi duniani.

translation.en: Only in 2018, 15,6 percent of all homicides in the country were committed by law enforcement agents.
translation.swa: Mwaka 2018 pekee asilimia 15.6% ya mauaji yote nchini yalifanywa na maofisa wa vyombo vya kusimamia sheria.

translation.en: Just in Rio de Janeiro state, and just in January 2019, police have killed 160 people.
translation.swa: Katika jimbo la Rio de Janeiro kwa mwezi Januari 2019, polisi wameshaua watu 160.

translation.en: A bill dubbed anticrime package which the Bolsonaro's government is proposing in Congress could potentially increase those already-staggering figures.
translation.swa: Muswada uliopambwa na mfuniko wa kuzuia uhalifu ambao serikali ya Bolsonaro umeuwasilisha katika Bunge unaweza kuongeza idadi ya matukio ambayo yamekwisha kutokea.

translation.en: The bill seeks to change several directives that will either scrape or significantly reduce penalties of police and military officers when they kill someone while on duty.
translation.swa: Muswada huo unataka mabadiliko ya baadhi ya maelekezo ambayo huenda yakaondoa au yanalenga kupunguza adhabu kwa polisi na maafisa wa jeshi watakapofanya mauaji ya mtu wakiwa kazini.

translation.en: The circumstances of the murder of Evaldo, a 51-year-old black man, is not an exception but the rule in Brazil, as Samira Bueno and Renato Sérgio de Lima, directors of the Brazilian Forum of Public Security, have said in an article for Folha de São Paulo:
translation.swa: Mazingira ya mauaji ya Evaldo, mwanaume mweusi mwenye miaka 51 sio ya kipekee lakini ni ya kawaida sana Brazili kama vile Samira Bueno na Renato Sérgio de Lima, wakurugenzi wa Jukwaa la Ulinzi wa Raia Brazili, walivyosema katika makala ya Folha de São Paulo:

translation.en: Evaldo teve sua vida ceifada por aqueles que juraram defendê-la.
translation.swa: Evaldo teve sua vida ceifada por aqueles que juraram defendê-la.

translation.en: Seu filho jamais se livrará do trauma de ter assistido ao pai ser fuzilado por agentes estatais.
translation.swa: Seu filho jamais se livrará do trauma de ter assistido ao pai ser fuzilado por agentes estatais.

translation.en: Mas que fique claro que a culpa não é apenas daqueles que apertaram o gatilho.
translation.swa: Mas que fique claro que a culpa não é apenas daqueles que apertaram o gatilho.

translation.en: Ou começamos a responsabilizar toda a cadeia de comando pelos atos cometidos, ou vamos continuar contando os nossos mortos e desacreditando as nossas instituições.
translation.swa: Ou começamos a responsabilizar toda a cadeia de comando pelos atos cometidos, ou vamos continuar contando os nossos mortos e desacreditando as nossas instituições.

translation.en: Evaldo has had his life taken from him by those who had sworn to defend it.
translation.swa: Evaldo amenyang'anywa maisha yake na wale waliowekwa kuyalinda.

translation.en: His son will never be over the trauma of watching his father being shot at by state agents.
translation.swa: Mwanae wa kiume hatatokwa na mshtuko huo wa kumuona baba yake akipigwa risasi na maafisa wa serikali.

translation.en: But let us be clear that the fault lies not only with those who have pulled the trigger.
translation.swa: Lakini tuwekane sawa kwamba makosa sio ya wale tu waliofyatua risasi.

translation.en: Either we start holding the entire chain of command accountable to their acts, or we will continue to count our dead while discrediting our institutions.
translation.swa: Labda tuanze kwa kuuwajibisha mnyororo wote wa mamlaka kwa vitendo vyao au tutaendelea kuhesabu wanaokufa huku tukizilaumu taasisi zetu.

translation.en: Dr. Wairagala Wakabi [Image by CIPESA and used with permission]Wairagala Wakabi, a leading digital rights advocate from Uganda, was detained at Julius Nyerere International Airport in Dar es Salaam, Tanzania on April 25.
translation.swa: Dr. Wairagala Wakabi [Picha na CIPESA na imetumiwa kwa ruhusa]Wairagala Wakabi ni wakili kutoka Uganda anayeongoza shirika linalotetea haki za kidijitali alishikiliwa  katika uwanja wa ndege wa kimataifa wa Julius Nyerere Dar es Salaam Tanzania tarehe 25 Aprili.

translation.en: Wakabi was invited to speak at the annual Tanzania Human Rights Defenders Day hosted by the Tanzania Human Rights Defenders Coalition (THRDC).
translation.swa: Wakabi alialikwa katika siku ya kilele cha mkutano wa mwaka wa watetezi wa haki za Binadamu Tanzania ambao mwenyeji wake ni muungano wa walinda haki za Binadamu Tanzania (THRDC).

translation.en: Wakabi is the Executive Director of the Collaboration on International ICT Policy for East and Southern Africa (CIPESA), one of the foremost organizations working on internet policy and online free speech in Africa.
translation.swa: Wakabi ni mtendaji mkuu  wa muungano wa sera ya TEHEMA kimataifa Mashariki na kusini mwa mwafrika (CIPESA),  moja ya shirika linalojihusisha na sera ya mtandao na uhuru wa kutoa maoni mtandaoni katika Afrika.

translation.en: Wakabi was deported back to Uganda after several hours of interrogation, during which he was denied access to a lawyer.
translation.swa: Wakabi alifukuzwa na kupelekwa Uganda baada ya masaa kadhaa ya mahojiano ambapo alinyimwa kuwasiliana na mwanasheria.

translation.en: Attorneys from the Tanzania Human Rights Defenders Coalition attempted to advocate on his behalf, but were told only that Wakabi was being deported on grounds of national interest:
translation.swa: Wanasheria kutoka muungano wa watetezi wa haki za Binadamu Tanzania walijaribu kumtetea lakini waliambiwa tu kwamba Wakabi anarudishwa Uganda kwa sababu ya maslahi ya taifa:

translation.en: UPDATE: After hours of interrogation, Dr. Wakabi has been deported back to #Uganda this evening.
translation.swa: UPDATE: Baada ya masaa ya mahojiano, Dkt.

translation.en: However, lawyers remained unable to establish the basis of the detention & deportation.
translation.swa: Hata hivyo, wanasheria walishindwa kujua chanzo cha kuzuiliwa na kufukuzwa.

translation.en: They report that authorities denied him entry into #Tanzania on grounds of national interest.
translation.swa: Waliaarifu kuwa mamlaka zilikataa asiingie nchini Tanzania kwa sababu ya maslahi ya taifa.

translation.en: pic.twitter.com/FfEPJTMiz2
translation.swa: pic.twitter.com/FfEPJTMiz2

translation.en: CIPESA (@cipesaug) April 25, 2019
translation.swa: CIPESA (@cipesaug) April 25, 2019

translation.en: Though the ordeal lasted only a few hours, it brought great consternation among rights advocates in the region, who have grown wary of Tanzania's treatment of activists and journalists.
translation.swa: Ingawa tatizo liliisha baada ya masaa machache lakini lilisababisha fadhaa na mshangao mkubwa kwa wanasheria wa haki za binadamu ambao wameonesha wasiwasi juu ya namna Tanzania inavyoshughulikia wanaharakati na waandishi wa habari.

translation.en: In November last year, Angela Quintal and Muthoki Mumo both staff of Committee to Protect Journalists, were detained for several hours in Dar es Salaam, Tanzania, and had their passports temporarily seized.
translation.swa: Novemba mwaka jana Angela Quintal na Muthoki Mumo wote wakiwa wajumbe wa Kamati ya kutetea waandishi habari walishikiliwa  na pasipoti zao kwa masaa kadhaa Dar es Salaam, Tanzania.

translation.en: Is Tanzania on a deliberate crusade to silence human rights defenders by harassing them in order to dissuade them from coming into the country?
translation.swa: Je, Tanzania ina mpango wa makusudi wa kunyamanzisha watetezi wa haki za binadamu kwa kuwanyanyasa ili kuwazuia kuja nchini?

translation.en: Late last year it was @pressfreedoms @angelaquintal and @muthokimumo not Dr Wakabi?
translation.swa: Mwishoni mwa mwaka jana alikuwa @pressfreedoms @angelaquintal and @muthokimumo sio Dkt Wakabi?

translation.en: This cannot silence us!
translation.swa: Hii haiwezi kutunyamanzisha!

translation.en: #FreeDrWakabi
translation.swa: #FreeDrWakabi

translation.en: Felicia Anthonio (@FelAnthonio) April 25, 2019
translation.swa: Felicia Anthonio (@FelAnthonio) April 25, 2019

translation.en: Human Rights Watch asserted that Tanzania under the leadership President John Magufuli has witnessed a marked decline in respect for free expression, association and assembly.
translation.swa: Shirika la haki za binadamu la Human Rights Watch lilieleza kuwa Tanzania chini ya uongozi wa Rais John Magufuli limeshuhudia  kushuka kwa hali ya juu katika uhuru wa kutoa maoni, kukusanyika na kukutana.

translation.en: In 2015, the United Republic of Tanzania promulgated the Cybercrimes Act.
translation.swa: Mwaka  2015, Jamhuri ya Tanzania ilitangaza rasmi sheria ya makosa mtandaoni .

translation.en: Within a year of the passing of that law, at least 14 Tanzanians were arrested and prosecuted under the law for insulting the president on social media.
translation.swa: Ndani ya mwaka ambao sheria hiyo ilipitishwa   watanzania 14  walikamatwa na kushitakiwa kwa sheria hiyo kwa kumtukana Rais kupitia mitandao ya kijamii.

translation.en: March 2018 saw the passing of the Electronic and Postal Communications (Online Content) Regulations, making it mandatory for bloggers to register and pay roughly US $900 per year to publish online.
translation.swa: Mwezi Machi 2018 tuliona kupitishwa kwa Kanuni za Mawasiliano ya Kielektroniki na Posta (Maudhui ya habari za mtandaoni), na kuwalazimisha mabloga kujisajili na kulipa dola 900 za Marekani kwa mwaka ili kutuma habari mtandaoni.

translation.en: This caused many independent blogs to go dark.
translation.swa: Hii ilisababisha blogu nyingi za kujitegemea kufungwa .

translation.en: The stifling of independent media through a mixture of sanctions against media outlets and legal threats against journalists has created an atmosphere of intimidation, self-censorship and fear of expressing alternative views about the countrys leaders.
translation.swa: Kuzuia vyombo vya habari binafsi  kupitia vikwazo mbalimbali dhidi ya vyombo vya habari na vitisho vya kisheria dhidi ya waandishi wa habari imejenga mazingira ya vitisho, udhibiti binafsi na woga wa kueleza habari mbalimbali kuhusu viongozi wa nchi.

translation.en: The detention and subsequent deportation of Wakabi back to Uganda appears to be a continuation of the Tanzania's government assault on free speech and dissent.
translation.swa: Kushikiliwa na baadaye kurudishwa Uganda kwa Wakabi kunaonekana kuwa mwendelezo wa serikali ya Tanzania kushambulia uhuru wa kutoa maoni na hasa yanayokinzana na serikali.

translation.en: Alpha Condé at the World Economic Forum in 2012 CC BY-SA 2.0
translation.swa: Alpha Condé akiwa katika mkutano wa jukwaa la uchumi ulimwenguni mwaka 2012 CC BY-SA 2.0

translation.en: Although Guineas constitution allows only two consecutive terms in office, the country's current president, Alpha Condé, recently announced that he intended to seek a third term.
translation.swa: Ingawa katiba ya Guenea inaruhusu  tu  mihula miwili mfululizo  kuwa madarakani, Rais wa sasa wa nchi hiyo Alpha Condé, hivi karibuni alitangaza kwamba ana nia ya kugombea urais kwa muhula wa tatu mfululizo.

translation.en: To help achieve this, he has not hesitated to make calls to violence.
translation.swa: Ili kusaidia kufanikisha hilo, hakusita kushawishi wafuasi wake kufanya vurugu.

translation.en: In an analysis published on Horizon Guinée, Sonny Camara, a journalist based in Conakry (the country's capital), reported parts of a speech the president made on March 24, 2019:
translation.swa: Katika uchambuzi uliochapishwa na gazeti la Horizon Guinée, mwandishi wa bahari Sonny Camara anayeishi Conakry (mji mkuu wa nchi hiyo), alilipoti sehemu za hotuba ambayo Rais alihutubia tarehe 24 Machi, 2019:

translation.en: I will be taking off my president's hat.
translation.swa: Nitakuwa ninavua kofia yangu ya Urais.

translation.en: I am putting on my activist's hat, because now I am ready to fight against these people [in the opposition] [] Be ready for confrontation [] Nobody in Guinea will stop me from going before my people to ask them what they want [for the country] [] If [the opposition] wants to walk all over you, be ready to walk all over them so that they know that you are afraid of nothing.
translation.swa: Nitavaa kofia ya uanaharakati kwa sababu sasa niko tayari kupambana dhidi  ya watu hawa [katika upinzani] [] mwe tayari kukabiliana [] Hakuna mtu yeyote katika Guinea atakayenizuia kuwauliza watu wangu wanachokitaka  [kwa ajili ya nchi] [] Kama [Upinzani] wanataka kushinda kirahisi, muwe tayari kuwashinda ili wajue hamuogopi kitu chochote.

translation.en: Condé was elected as President of Guinea in 2010 as the first freely elected president in the country's history.
translation.swa: Condé alichaguliwa kuwa Rais wa Guinea mwaka 2010. Ni Rais wa kwanza kuchaguliwa kidemokrasia katika historia ya nchi hiyo.

translation.en: However, the 2010 elections were not without controversies as observers, including the Carter center reported that nearly 1 million voters ballot were lost from the final count.
translation.swa: Hata hivyo, uchaguzi wa mwaka 2010 ulikuwa na malalamiko kutoka kwa waangalizi wa uchaguzi ikiwepo kituo cha Carter ambapo ililipotiwa kuwa karibu kura milioni moja zilipotea katika uhesabuji wa mwisho.

translation.en: Condé was reelected in 2015 with almost 58 percent of the vote.
translation.swa: Condé alichaguliwa tena mwaka 2015 kwa asilimia karibu 58 ya kura zote.
mwaka 2016.

translation.en: FRANCE 24 news channel reported that the mining company Rio Tinto paid Guinean government official $10.5 million for mining rights in the Simandou Region.
translation.swa: Idhaa mpya ya redio ya FRANCE 24 ilitangaza kuwa kampuni ya madini  ya Rio Tinto ilimlipa afisa wa serikali ya Guinea dola milioni 10.5 kwa ajili ya kupata haki  ya kuchimba madini katika mkoa wa  Simandou.

translation.en: A few months after his re-election in May 2015, Condé began to suggest his intention to seek a third term.
translation.swa: Miezi michache  baada ya kuchaguliwa mwezi Mei 2015, Condé alianza kupendekeza nia yake ya kugombea muhula wa tatu.

translation.en: Ibrahima Diallo, director of Liberté FM, a radio station in Conakry, highlighted this 2016 report on Nouvelles de Guinée:
translation.swa: Ibrahima Diallo ambaye ni mkurugenzi wa Liberté FM, kituo cha redio kilichopo Conakry, ilisistiza  juu ya ripoti ya hali ya Guinea:

translation.en: Mais, à entendre Alpha Condé dire à lopinion publique nationale et internationale que le «souverain peuple» de Guinée décidera ou non dun troisième mandat pour lui sous  entend que celui qui voulait être la «synthèse» de feu Mandela et dObama pour son pays est «pire» que ses prédécesseurs quil a toujours combattus durant sa vie déternel opposant.
translation.swa: Mais, à entendre Alpha Condé dire à lopinion publique nationale et internationale que le «souverain peuple» de Guinée décidera ou non dun troisième mandat pour lui sous  entend que celui qui voulait être la «synthèse» de feu Mandela et dObama pour son pays est «pire» que ses prédécesseurs quil a toujours combattus durant sa vie déternel opposant.

translation.en: Aujourdhui, quand Koro dit «cest le peuple qui décidera», il veut juste faire porter par le vaillant peuple de Guinée le mérite pour lui de briguer «un éventuel mandat» après les deux consécutifs.
translation.swa: Aujourdhui, quand Koro dit «cest le peuple qui décidera», il veut juste faire porter par le vaillant peuple de Guinée le mérite pour lui de briguer «un éventuel mandat» après les deux consécutifs.

translation.en: But, to hear Alpha Condé say to national and international audiences that the sovereign people of Guinea will decide whether or not he will have a third term implies that he who wanted to be the synthesis of the late Mandela and Obama for his country is worse than his predecessors, whom he has fought all his life as an eternal opponent.
translation.swa: Lakini, kusikia Alpha Condé akiwatangazia  wananchi na watu wakimataifa kuwa watu wa Gunea walio huru wataamua kama atagombea au hatagombea muhula wa tatu inamaanisha kwamba yeye ambaye alitaka kuwa kiunganishi kati ya marehemu Mandela na Obama kwa nchi yake ni mbaya zaidi ya mtangulizi wake ambaye alipambana maisha yake yote kama mpinzani wa maisha.

translation.en: Today, when Koro (ed's note: nickname for Alpha Condé) says its the people who will decide, he just wants to make the valiant people of Guinea legitimize his seeking a possible term after the two consecutive ones.
translation.swa: Leo, wakati Koro (Jina la utani la Alpha Condé) anataka kuwafanya watu mashujaa wa Guinea kuhalalisha lengo lake la kugombea muhula wa tatu baada ya ile mihula miwili mfululizo.

translation.en: Condé stuck to his plan by taking measures to ensure he avoided any bad surprises, including dismissing the president of the constitutional court, Kéléfa Sall, a move which did not follow legal procedure.
translation.swa: Condé amenuia kutekeleza mpango wake kwa kuchukua hatua kuhakikisha hakosi kwa kumuondoa rais wa mahakama ya katiba, Kéléfa Sall, hatua ambayo haikufuata utaratibu halali.

translation.en: Amadou Tham Camara, a reporter with Guinée News, wrote:
translation.swa: Amadou Tham Camara, mwandishi wa habari wa gazeti la Guinée News, aliandika :

translation.en: After the undermining of the CENI [the national independent electoral commission], it is now the second constitutional institution in charge of national elections which has been irreparably weakened.
translation.swa: Baada ya kudhoofisha CENI [Tume huru ya Taifa ya uchaguzi], hii ni taasisi ya katiba ambayo imepewa majukumu ya kusimamia uchaguzi wa kitaifa ambayo imedhoofishwa.

translation.en: From now on, for the party in power, there is an avenue to having the qualified majority of two thirds of deputies during the legislative elections scheduled for the first quarter of 2019.
translation.swa: Kuanzia sasa na kuendelea, chama kilichopo madarakani kinatakiwa kuwa na theluthi mbili ya watu wengi wenye sifa wakati wa uchaguzi wa wabunge uliopangwa katika robo ya kwanza ya mwaka 2019.

translation.en: This majority being the necessary condition for initiating the revision of the constitution.
translation.swa: Watu hawa iwe ndiyo kigezo cha kuanzisha marekebisho ya katiba.

translation.en: It is thus a giant step which has been taken to break through the constitutional lock which limits the number of terms as President of the Republic at two.
translation.swa: Kwa hiyo itakuwa hatua kubwa ambayo imechukuliwa ya kutoondoa kizuizi cha katiba ambacho kinazuia idadi ya mihula ya rais wa Jamhuri kuwa miwili.

translation.en: It seems that Sall's mistake was to warn Condé  during his second term swearing-in ceremony, no less  against modifying the constitution.
translation.swa: Inaonekana kosa la Sall lilikuwa kumuonya Condé  wakati alipokuwa kwenye sherehe ya kuapa kuongoza nchi kwa muhula wa pili dhidi ya kubadilisha katiba.

translation.en: Sall said then:
translation.swa: Sall alisema :

translation.en: The management of the nation must gather us around what is essential.
translation.swa: Uongozi wa taifa lazima utukusanye kwa pamoja kwa jambo la muhimu.

translation.en: We do not surround ourselves with extremists who are harmful to national unity.
translation.swa: Hatutakusanyika na watu wenye msimamo mkali ambao ni hatari kwa umoja wa taifa.

translation.en: Always avoid slips toward paths forbidden under democracy and good governance.
translation.swa: Epuka njia zinazokatazwa na Demokrasia na utawala bora.

translation.en: Refrain from succumbing to the song of revisionist sirens because, although the people of Guinea gave you and renewed their confidence, they nevertheless remain legitimately vigilant.
translation.swa: Acha kukumbwa na wimbo wa vigora vya mbadilisha itikadi ya siasa, ingawa wananchi wa Guinea wamekuchagua na kuweka matumaini yao kwako, hawaendelei kuwa watazamaji tu.

translation.en: The reaction of Guineans has been lively.
translation.swa: Upinzani wa wananchi wa Guinea umekuwa wazi.

translation.en: At a press conference on March 29, organized by former members of the National Transition Council (a type of interim parliament) and hosted by the collective Ne Touche pas à ma Constitution (Dont Touch My Constitution), Boubacar Siddighy Diallo, one of the speakers, recalled that Guineas constitution comprises two parts which form an indivisible whole.
translation.swa: Kwenye mkutano na waandishi wa habari  tarehe 29, Machi ambao uliandaliwa na wanachama wa zamani wa halmashauri ya mpito ya taifa (aina ya bunge la mpito) na mwenyeji alikuwa ni umoja wa usiguse katiba yangu.

translation.en: He made the point that together, these parts shield the constitution from any possible tampering which could have consequences that compromise the peace and stability of our country.
translation.swa: Boubacar Siddighy Diallo, mmoja wa wazungumzaji alikumbushia  kuwa katiba ya Guinea ina sehemu mbili ambazo zinafanya katiba kamili.. Alisema kuwa kwa pamoja sehemu hizi zinalinda katiba kutobadilishwa badilishwa ili isisababishe kuathiri amani na umoja wa taifa.

translation.en: Opponents reacted strongly.
translation.swa: Wapinzani walijibu kwa hasira.

translation.en: At an opposition meeting, Cellou Dalein Diallo, president of the Union des Forces Démocratiques de Guinée (The Union of Democratic Forces of Guinea, a liberal political party), said:
translation.swa: Kwenye mkutano wa wapinzani, Cellou Dalein Diallo ambaye ni rais wa umoja wa nguvu ya kidemokrasia ya Guinea, chama huru cha siasa alisema:

translation.en: The Republican opposition has reaffirmed its readiness to form a coalition with all the active movements of the nation, to oppose democratic retreat and the presidency for life that Alpha Condé wants to grant himself
translation.swa: Wapinzani wa jamhuri wamethibitisha utayari wao wa kuunda umoja na vyama vingine vyote katika taifa kupinga kurudishwa nyuma kwa demokrasia na urais wa Maisha ambao Alpha Condé anataka kujigawiya

translation.en: Sekou Koundouno, leader of the Forces Sociales de Guinée (FSG) the Social Forces of Guinea) announced on Facebook that his civil society group wrote to the Prosecutor of the International Criminal Court asking her to keep a close eye on our country and take a public stand to avoid chaos in Guinea.
translation.swa: Sekou Koundouno ambaye ni kiongozi wa  nguvu ya umma ya Guinea  (FSG)  alitangaza  kupitia Facebook kuwa Kundi la wanajamii walimwandikia mwanasheria mkuu wa mahakama ya makosa ya jinai ya kimataifa wakimuomba kutupia jicho la karibu kwa taifa letu na kuchukua msimamo wa umma kuepuka vurugu katika Guinea.

translation.en: Similarly, Guinean citizens reacted on Twitter:
translation.swa: Pia wananchi wa Guinea walijibu kupitia Tweeter :

translation.en: The words of the president of the republic are extremely serious for peace and social calm in Guinea.
translation.swa: Maneno ya Rais wa Jamhuri yanahatarisha amani na utulivu wa jamii katika Guinea.

translation.en: Yet again, I strongly condemn this not very honourable habit of our country.
translation.swa: Bado pia, ninalaani sana tabia  hii ya mheshimiwa wa nchi yetu.

translation.en: We absolutely must call on the CEDEAO [the Economic Community of West African States], the African Union, the UN, etc.
translation.swa: Hakika, nilazima kuwaita Jumuia ya kiuchumi ya nchi za Afrika magharibi [CEDEAO], Umoja wa Afrika, Umoja wa Mataifa n.k.

translation.en: Everywhere in Guinea, the people are speaking out against the third term.
translation.swa: Kila mahali nchini Guinea, Watu wanaongea wakipinga mihula mitatu.

translation.en: Such was the case in Coyah [a prefecture in Guinea's Kindia region] earlier. Four young people were reportedly arrested on the instructions of one of the promoters of the third term.
translation.swa: Kama ilivyokuwa mapema katika Coyah [Mkoa wa Kindia ambayo ni makao makuu ya polisi] vijana wanne walilipotiwa kukamatwa kutokana na maelekezo ya wafuasi wa mihula mitatu.

translation.en: No intimidation will stop Guineans in their quest for democracy.
translation.swa: Hakuna kitisho kitasimamisha wananchi wa Guinea katika suala la Demokrasia.

translation.en: Popular Facebook personality Alimou Sow chose irony as a way of commenting on the situation, alluding to the strong winds which hit Conakry on the night of April 2:
translation.swa: Mtumiaji mashuhuri wa Facebook , Alimou Sow alichagua kejeli  kama njia ya kutoa maoni kuhusu suala hili, akidokeza upepo mkali ambao uliipiga Conakry usiku wa tarehe 2 Aprili:

translation.en: It seems that in Greek mythology Aeolus was the god of the winds (whence the adjective Aeolian).
translation.swa: Inaonekana kwamba katika Ugiriki mythology Aeolus alikuwa mungu wa upepo (ambapo Aeolian ni kivumishi).

translation.en: So, to Guinea Aeolus went that night to blow away, not only the demagogic posters, but also those who put them up and promote the third [term] #Nambara [Problems].
translation.swa: Kwa hiyo, Aeolus wa Guinea alikwenda usiku ule kuvuma, sio tu kwenye picha cha mfitini, bali hata wale walioiweka picha hiyo na kushabikia muhula wa tatu ni matatizo.

translation.en: Gone with the wind.
translation.swa: Ameenda na upepo.

translation.en: Good night #ennui
translation.swa: Usiku mwema

translation.en: The most significant reaction, however, came from the Guinean writer and economist, Ibrahima Sanoh.
translation.swa: Hata hivyo majibu ya msingi yalitoka kwa mwandishi na mchumi wa Guinea, Ibrahima Sanoh.

translation.en: On January 2, he launched his movement, Patriotes pour lAlternance et le Salut (Patriots for Alternation and Salvation), to oppose any attempt by Condé to seek a third term in 2020.
translation.swa: Tarehe 2, Januari alianzisha  chama chake cha Wazalendo kwa ajili ya mabadiliko na ukombozi kupinga kila anachojaribu kufanya Condé katika kutafuta muhula wa tatu mwaka 2020.

translation.en: Emília Nhalevilo, dean of Púnguè University.
translation.swa: Emília Nhalevilo, Mkuu wa chuo kikuu cha Púnguè.

translation.en: Photo by Emília Nhalevilo, used with permission.
translation.swa: Picha na  Emília Nhalevilo, na imetumiwa kwa idhini .

translation.en: In March 2019, Mozambican professor Emília Nhalevilo took office as dean of the recently-created Púnguè University, becoming thus the first women to ever lead a public university in the African country.
translation.swa: Mwezi  Machi 2019, Profesa wa Msumbiji Emília Nhalevilo aliteuliwa kuwa mkuu wa chuo kikuu kilichoanzishwa hivi karibuni cha Púnguè , hivyo kuwa mwanamke wa kwanza kabisa kuongoza chuo kikuu cha umma katika  nchi hii ya kiafrika.

translation.en: She was nominated by President Filipe Nyusi, but the decision about the recently-created universities was announced by the Council of Ministers on January 29.
translation.swa: Aliteuliwa  na Rais Filipe Nyusi, lakini maamuzi hayo juu ya chuo hicho kilichoanzishwa hivi karibuni yalitangazwa na halmshauri ya mawaziri  tarehe 29 mwezi Januari.

translation.en: Nhalevilo will remain in office, in principle, for a period of four years.
translation.swa: Kisheria, Nhalevilo ataendelea kuwepo ofisini kwa muda wa miaka minne.

translation.en: Born in Nampula, the most populous province in Mozambique, Nhalevilo holds a doctorate and master's degree in education from the University of Perth, Australia, and a bachelor's degree in science education from Pedagogical University (UP).
translation.swa: Nhalevilo ambaye ni Daktari alizaliwa Nampula ambalo ni jimbo maarufu Msumbiji. Ana shahada ya uzamili ya Elimu kutoka chuo kikuu cha Perth, Uastralia na shahada ya elimu ya sayansi kutoka chuo kikuu cha Pedagogical  (UP).

translation.en: From 2005 to 2007, she worked as Professor at Curtin University of Technology, in Australia.
translation.swa: Kuanzia mwaka 2005 hadi 2007, alifanya kazi kama Profesa katika Chuo kikuu cha Teknolojia cha Curtin kilichopo Australia.

translation.en: In 2008, Nhalevilo became the head of the chemistry department at UP, and then took office as deputy director of the Center for Mozambican Studies and Ethnoscience, a research center at the same institution.
translation.swa: Mwaka 2008, Nhalevilo alikuwa mkuu  wa idara ya kemia pale Chuo kikuu cha Pedagogical, na halafu akateuliwa kuwa mkurugenzi msaidizi  wa kituo cha mafunzo ya Msumbiji na elimu ya dunia, kituo cha utafiti katika taasisi hiyo.

translation.en: In 2017, she was a fellow with the Fulbright Visiting Scholar Program at the Steinhardt School of Culture, Education, and Human Development of New York University, in the United States.
translation.swa: Mwaka 2017, alikuwa mjumbe wa program ya matembezi ya wanafunzi ya Fulbright  katika shule ya utamaduni, elimu na Maendeleo ya rasilimali watu cha chuo kikuu cha New York, Marekani.

translation.en: Nhalevilo was the vice-dean for research and extension in the UP since 2018.
translation.swa: Nhalevilo alikuwa mkuu wa kitivo cha utafiti na ugani katika chuo kikuu cha Pedagogical tangu mwaka 2018.

translation.en: As dean of a public university, her current position is equivalent to that of a minister in Mozambique.
translation.swa: Nafasi aliyonayo ya Mkuu wa chuo kikuu cha umma ni sawa na nafasi ya waziri katika nchi ya Msumbiji.

translation.en: Eliana Nzualo, an activist and feminist blogger, says Nhalevilo's appointment is a historic moment:
translation.swa: Eliana Nzualo, mwanaharakati na  feministi bloga , anasema kuteuliwa kwa  Nhalevilo ni kwa kihistoria:

translation.en: Professor Emília Nhalevilo is the first woman to lead a Public University in Mozambique.
translation.swa: Profesa Emília Nhalevilo ni mwanamke wa kwanza kuongoza Chuo kikuu cha umma katika Msumbiji.

translation.en: Congratulations to the Magnificent Rector!
translation.swa: Hongera Mkuu wa Chuo Adhimu!

translation.en: For more women in the Universities,
translation.swa: Kwa wanawake wengi katika vyuo vikuu,

translation.en: For more women in the lead!
translation.swa: Kwa wanawake wengi kuongoza!

translation.en: In Mozambique, women still face challenges in accessing leadership and management positions.
translation.swa: Katika Msumbiji wanawake bado wanakabiliana na changamoto ya kuingia katika nafasi za  uongozi na utawala.

translation.en: But there have been improvements: in the current parliament, for example, both the president of the assembly and the heads of the two largest political caucus are women.
translation.swa: Lakini kumekuwepo na uboreshaji: katika bunge la sasa, kwa mfano Rais wa bunge na viongozi wa taasisi kubwa pili za kisiasa vyote vinaongozwa na wanawake.

translation.en: But gender inequality still prevails in the southern African country.
translation.swa: Lakini kuna tofauti ya kijinsia inayoendelea katika nchi hii ya kusini mwa Afrika.

translation.en: The UNDP's 2016 Africa Human Development Report, whose title is Accelerating Gender Equality and Women's Empowerment in Africa, revealed that Mozambican women and girls continue to suffer from inequalities, such as poor access to justice, poor access to school and health care, and repeated acts of violence.
translation.swa: Ripoti ya UNDP ya  mwaka 2016 ya Maendeleo ya rasilimali katika Afrika , yenye kichwa cha habari kuongeza usawa wa kijinsia na Kuinua wanawake katika Afrika, ilionesha kuwa wanawake na mabinti wa Msumbiji wanaendela kuteseka na tofauti iliyopo kama vile kunyimwa haki zao, ukosefu wa elimu na matibabu na kuendelea kwa vitendo vya kikatili.

translation.en: In 2018, there were 25,356 cases of domestic violence in Mozambique, of which 12,500 were against women and 9,000 against children.
translation.swa: Mwaka 2018 katika Msumbiji, kulikuwa na matukio yapatayo 25,356 ya vitendo vya kikatili majumbani   ambapo matukio 12,500 yalikuwa dhidi ya wanawake na 9,000 dhidi ya watoto.

translation.en: Mozambique ranks 10th in the world for child marriages, according to a UNICEF report from 2015.
translation.swa: Msumbiji inashika nafasi ya 10 ulimwenguni  kwa ndoa za utotoni kutokana na taarifa ya UNICEF ya mwaka 2015.

translation.en: The organization defines child marriage as a marital union in which at least one person is under the age of 18.
translation.swa: Shirka hilo hutafsiri ndoa za utotoni kama muungano wa ndoa ambapo angalau mmoja wa wanandoa hao ana miaka chini ya 18.

translation.en: In mid-2018, pilot Admira António became the first woman to ever captain a flight in Mozambique, while in December 2018, an all-female flight crew took to the skies for the first time.
translation.swa: Katikati ya mwaka 2018, rubani  Admira António alikuwa mwanamke wa kwanza kuwa rubani wa ndege katika Msumbiji wakati mwezi Desemba 2018, ndege yenye wahudumu wa kike wote iliruka kwa mara kwanza.

translation.en: In 2014, when the Police of the Republic of Mozambique turned 39, Arsenia Massingue was presented as the first woman general in the corporation.
translation.swa: Mwaka  2014, wakati askari polisi wa Jamhuri ya Msumbiji ilipopandisha vyeo askari 39, Arsenia Massingue aliteuliwa kuwa mwanamke wa kwanza kuwa jenerali  katika jeshi hilo.

translation.swa: Papa Francisco | Gabriel Trujillo  maelezo na ShareAlike ya 2.0(CC BY-SA 2.0)

translation.en: Pope Francis will visit Mozambique in September 2019, just weeks before elections that will choose the new president, members of the Republican Assembly, and provincial governors.
translation.swa: Papa Francis atatembelea Msumbiji Mwezi Septemba 2019, wiki kadhaa kabla  ya uchaguzi ambao utamchagua Rais mpya, Wabunge na Magavana wa majimbo.

translation.en: The Pope was invited by Mozambiques president, Filipe Nyusi, in September 2018.
translation.swa: Papa amealikwa na Rais wa Msumbiji Filipe Nyusi mwezi Septemba 2018.

translation.en: The visit was announced as confirmed on 26 March in a solemn ceremony which involved bodies of the Catholic Church in the country.
translation.swa: Matembezi hayo yalitangazwa na kuthibitishwa tarehe 26 Machi katika hafla ya ibada  iliyojumuisha viongozi wa kanisa la Roma Katoliki katika nchi hiyo.

translation.en: President Nyusi said that the Popes visit would help to strengthen peace talks with the opposition party RENAMO, which stopped military hostilities with the government in 2017 as part of a process which is still fraught with tensions.
translation.swa: Rais Nyusi alisema matembezi ya Papa yataimarisha mazungumzo ya amani na RENAMO ambacho ni chama cha upinzani kilichosimamisha mapigano ya kijeshi na serikali mwaka 2017 kama sehemu ya mchakato wa kutafuta amani ambao bado umejaa wasiwasi.

translation.en: He added that it would also be an occasion to reflect on the conflict with paramilitary groups acting in the north of the country, specifically in the province of Cabo Delgado.
translation.swa: Aliongeza kwamba itakuwa pia ni muda wa kufanya tathmini juu ya mgogoro na makundi ya wanamgambo  waliopo hasa katika jimbo la Cabo Delgado kaskazini mwa nchi.

translation.en: John Paul II was the last pope to visit Mozambique, in September 1988.
translation.swa: John Paul II alikuwa ni Papa wa mwisho kutembelea Msumbiji mwezi Septemba 1988.

translation.en: The confirmation of the Popes visit had already been anticipated since mid-February.
translation.swa: Uthibitisho wa matembezi ya  papa ulikuwa tayari umetegemewa katikati ya mwezi wa Februari.

translation.en: Mozambique will hold elections this October and it's still recovering from the devastation of Cyclone Idai, which left over 500 dead and more than a million homeless.
translation.swa: Msumbiji itakuwa na uchaguzi mkuu mwezi Oktoba  ingawa  haijapata ahueni kutokana na kimbunga cha    Idai, ambacho  kilisababisha vifo vya zaidi ya watu 500 na wengine zaidi ya milioni kukosa makazi  ya kuishi.

translation.en: The Pope has shown solidarity with the victims:
translation.swa: Papa ameonesha mshikamano na waathirika:

translation.en: Expresso a minha dor e a minha solidariedade às queridas populações de Moçambique, Zimbábue e Malauí, atingidas pelo ciclone Idai.
translation.swa: Expresso a minha dor e a minha solidariedade às queridas populações de Moçambique, Zimbábue e Malauí, atingidas pelo ciclone Idai.

translation.en: Confio as inúmeras vítimas e suas famílias à misericórdia de Deus.
translation.swa: Confio as inúmeras vítimas e suas famílias à misericórdia de Deus.

translation.en: #PrayForAfrica #cycloneIdai
translation.swa: #PrayForAfrica #cycloneIdai

translation.en: Papa Francisco (@Pontifex_pt) 20 mars 2019
translation.swa: Papa Francisco (@Pontifex_pt) 20 mars 2019

translation.en: I express my pain and my solidarity with the beloved peoples of Mozambique, Zimbabwe, and Malawi, hit by Cyclone Idai.
translation.swa: Nina maumivu na ninaungana na wapendwa wananchi wa Msumbiji, Zimbabwe na Malawi walioathirika na kimbunga cha Idai.

translation.en: I entrust the countless victims and their families to the mercy of God.
translation.swa: Ninawakabidhi katika rehema za Mungu wote walioathiriwa pamoja  na familia zao.

translation.en: The disaster caused by the cyclone, already considered one of the worst to have ever hit the Southern Hemisphere, struck the city of Beira in central Mozambique on 14 March, and then hit the neighbouring countries of Zimbabwe and Malawi.
translation.swa: Balaa lilisababishwa na mojawapo ya vimbunga vibaya sana vilivyowahi kupiga katika eneo la kusini, lilipiga mji wa Beira katikati ya Msumbiji tarehe 14, Machi na halafu katika nchi jirani za Zimbabwe na Malawi.

translation.en: More than 300 people died in these two countries.
translation.swa: Zaidi ya watu 300 walikufa katika nchi hizi mbili.

translation.en: Since then, the country has remained in a state of emergency, which has led the government to review the electoral calendar and postpone the registration period.
translation.swa: Tangu balaa hilo,  nchi ipo katika hali ya hatari ambalo limeifanya serikali kupitia tena kalenda ya uchaguzi na kuahirisha muda wa uandikishaji wa wapiga kura.

translation.en: In the middle of a disaster, govnt still trying to figure out how to rescue & accommodate thousands of people after #CycloneIdai, president Nyusi gives LIVE tv statement to the nation to announce that the Pope is set to visit Mozambique in September.
translation.swa: Katikati ya balaa, serikali inajaribu kupanga namna ya kuwaokoa kwa kuwatafutia makazi ya kuishi maelfu ya watu baada ya madhara yaKimbunga Idai. Rais Nyusi alitoa taarifa mbashara kwa taifa kutangaza kwamba Papa anatazamia kutembelea Msumbiji mwezi Septemba.

translation.en: Bad timing is understatement.
translation.swa: Kutoeleza vizuri ni vibaya.

translation.en: Zenaida Machado (@zenaidamz)
translation.swa: Zenaida Machado (@zenaidamz)

translation.en: The fact that the elections will be held soon after the papal visit has raised questions from some citizens, who are concerned that it could have an impact on campaigning:
translation.swa: Ukweli ni kwamba uchaguzi kufanyika baada tu ya kutembelewa na Papa kumeibua maswali kutoka kwa wananchi ambao wanaona kuwa kutakuwa na athari katika mchakato wa kupiga kampeni:

translation.en: It is clear that Pope Francis visit in September plays in favour of #Frelimo and Filipe #Nyusi.
translation.swa: Ni wazi kuwa ujio wa Papa Francis mwezi Septemba unampendelea Filipe Nyusi na Frelimo.

translation.en: Directly or indirectly the visit will be politically profited from.
translation.swa: Matembezi yake yanaweza kumfaidisha kisiasa  moja kwa moja au la.

translation.en: It would be good if it was postponed to November, that is, after the confusion of the general elections scheduled for 15 October.
translation.swa: Ingekuwa vizuri kama ungeahirishwa hadi mwezi Novemba baadala ya mkanganyiko wa uchaguzi mkuu ulipangwa tarehe 15 Oktoba.

translation.en: Screenshot of La Pulla's episode Pablo Escobar is a Hero, available on YouTube.
translation.swa: Picha ya skrini kutoka katika tamthilia ya La Pulla Pablo Escobar ni shujaa, inapatikana YouTube.

translation.en: The phenomenon didn't start with the Netflix series, but Narcos certainly helped revive 1980s Colombian drug lord Pablo Escobar's status in North American popular culture.
translation.swa: Jambo hili halikuanza na tamthilia kutoka  Netflix, lakini Narcos kwa hakika ilisaidia  kufufua hadhi ya muuzaji mkubwa wa dawa za kulevya  kwa miaka ya 1980 wa Colombia ndugu Pablo Escobar katika utamaduni maarufu Amerika Kaskazini.

translation.en: Since it premiered in 2015, the controversial series has fueled conversations about Colombia's persistent international image as a cocaine paradise dominated by charismatic drug traffickers.
translation.swa: Tangu imezinduliwa mwaka 2015, tamthilia zenye utata zimechochea mijadala kuhusu Colombia kuendelea kuonekana kimataifa kama  Paradiso ya dawa za kulevya inayoshikiliwa na wauza dawa za kulevya wachakaramu.

translation.en: As a response, the Colombian journalists behind YouTube channel La Pulla (in Spanish, the taunt), a project by Colombian newspaper El Espectador, made a video responding to people who still glorify Escobar as a hero.
translation.swa: Kama kujibu hilo, mwandishi wa habari wa Colombia aliye nyuma ya chaneli ya YouTube ya La Pulla (kwa Kihispania, Kauli), ambapo ni mradi wa gazeti la ki-Colombia la El Espectador, alitengeneza video akijibu watu ambao bado wanamtukuza Escobar kama shujaa.

translation.en: Among other things, the video highlights tragic episodes  and statistics  of one of the darkest periods of Colombia's history, such as the assassination of El Espectador's former director Guillermo Cano on December 17, 1986, and the bomb attack next to their offices in September 1989.
translation.swa: Kati ya mambo mengine, video hiyo inaonesha vipengele vya majanga na takwimu za vipindi vibaya zaidi katika historia ya Colombia kama vile kuuawa kwa mkurugenzi wa zamani wa  El Espectador, Guillermo Cano Disemba 17, 1986, na shambulizi la bomu  karibu na ofisi zao Disemba 1989.

translation.en: It is common in other countries to see people with T-shirts of him, encouraged by series such as Netflix's Narcos.
translation.swa: Ni kawaida katika nchi nyingine kuona watu na fulana zake, wakihamasishwa na tamthilia kutoka Netflix kama vile Narcos.

translation.en: And then when they come to Colombia they pay a lot of money to go on a tour so they can admire his great accomplishments.
translation.swa: Na watu wanapokuja Colombia hulipa fedha nyingi sana ili kwenda kutalii na kuona na kufurahia mafanikio yake makubwa.

translation.en: This hero prompted thousands of people to run towards drug trafficking money [like] pigeons chasing corn and rendered the national economy into a little pot to launder the money that came from drug trafficking.
translation.swa: Shujaa huyu aliyehamasisha watu wengi kukimbilia fedha za biashara ya dawa za kulevya [kama] njiwa wanavyokimbilia punje za mahindi na kusababisha uchumi wa nchi kuwa chungu kidogo cha kutakatisha fedha kutoka katika uuzaji wa dawa za kulevya.

translation.en: This hero was not a friend of the people: he committed 623 attacks, left 1710 civilians in pain, and killed 402.
translation.swa: Shujaa huyu alikuwa sio rafiki wa watu: alifanya mashambulizi 623, aliwaachia raia 1710 maumivu na aliuwa watu 402.

translation.en: This hero forced us to escape from an abandoned briefcase in the street or from a stationed car with no one inside [thinking] there [it was] one more bomb.
translation.swa: Shujaa huyu alitulazimisha kulikimbia kila sanduku lililotelekezwa mtaani au katika gari lililoegeshwa bila kuwemo mtu ndani yake [tukifikiri] kuwa [litakuwa] ni bomu lingine moja.

translation.en: This hero forced us to stay indoors, to suspect from everyone, and to react with fire and violence.
translation.swa: Shujaa huyu alitulazimisha kujifungia ndani, kumshuku kila mtu na kujihami kwa moto na vurugu.

translation.en: This hero forced us to live in constant fear.
translation.swa: Shujaa huyu alitulazimisha kuishi maisha ya hofu isiyokoma .

translation.en: The tours referenced in the video are known as Narco Tours, and they guide tourists around the city of Medellin through famous spots related to Pablo Escobar's life.
translation.swa: Waongoza watalii waliojumuishwa katika video hii wanafahamika kama Waongozaji wa Narco, na huwaongoza watalii kuzunguka mji wa Medellin kupitia maeneo maarufu yanayohusiana na maisha ya Pablo Escobar.

translation.en: In 2018, Global Voices partner Radio Ambulante described the tour in one of the episodes of their award-winning podcast.
translation.swa: Mwaka 2018, mshirika wa Global Voices, Radio Ambulante aliwaelezea waongozaji hao katika moja ya sehemu ya vipindi vyao vya podcast vilivyopata tuzo.

translation.en: A photo of the deputy Ana Paula on the first day in office.
translation.swa: Picha ya makamu, Ana Paula katika siku yake ya kwanza ofisini.

translation.en: Source: Facebook Personal Page, fair use.
translation.swa: Chanzo: Ukurasa binafsi wa Facebook, tumia vizuri.

translation.en: For her state legislature inauguration on January 31, newly-elected Brazilian deputy Ana Paula da Silva wore a bright red dress and jewelry.
translation.swa: Katika kuzindua bunge la jimbo lake hapo Januari 31, makamu mpya wa Brazili aliyechaguliwa karibuni Ana Paula da Silva alivaa nguo angavu nyekundu na mapambo.

translation.en: She posted a photo of the occasion on her Facebook and, on the next day, she woke up with a flurry of hateful comments.
translation.swa: Aliweka picha ya tukio hili katika ukurasa wake wa Facebook na, siku iliyofuata aliamka na kukutana na mafuriko ya maoni yenye chuki.

translation.en: The reason: her cleavage.
translation.swa: Sababu: Kifua chake.

translation.en: Ana Paula da Silva is one of the five women out of 40 legislators elected to the legislative assembly of Santa Catarina, a southern Brazilian state.
translation.swa: Ana Paula da Silva ni mmoja wa wanawake watano kati ya wabunge 40 waliochaguliwa katika bunge la Santa Catarina, jimbo la kusini mwa Brazili.

translation.en: Her photo received 6,400 comments and 6,447 shares, including many offenses and threats.
translation.swa: Picha yake ilipata maoni 6,400 na ilishirikishwa mara 6,447 ikiambatana na  vitisho na matusi mengi.

translation.en: But that is not the first time in Brazil that a woman's outfit choice has eclipsed her skills on her workplace
translation.swa: Lakini kwa Brazili hii sio mara ya kwanza uchaguzi wa nguo kwa mwanamke kuingilia uwezo wake katika sehemu ya kazi kuleta shida.

translation.en: Male guide to female attire
translation.swa: Muongozo wa wanaume juu ya mavazi ya kike

translation.en: In 2009, Porto Alegre city councilor Fernanda Melchionna took to the house's tribune wearing a black-and-white striped tie to protest a bill that would impose a dress code on female legislators.
translation.swa: Mwaka 2009, kansela wa mji wa Porto Alegre,  Fernanda Melchionna aliingia katika kikao cha ndani  akiwa amevaa tai yenye mistari miyeusi na nyeupe akipinga muswada uliokuwa unataka kupitisha aina ya mavazi kwa ajili ya wabunge wanawake.

translation.en: Melchionna, who is now a state deputy, usually goes to work wearing jeans and trainers, which a male colleague thought was inappropriate.
translation.swa: Melchionna, ambaye sasa ni makamu wa jimbo, mara nyingi huenda kazini akiwa amevaa jinzi au nguo za michezo na watumishi wenzake wa kiume huona kuwa sio sawa.

translation.en: She said that the debate around women's wardrobes was fit for the lazy, for those who do not use their mandates to work on social problems.
translation.swa: Alisema kuwa mijadala juu ya nguo za wanawake inawafaa wavivu, wale wasiotumia mamlaka zao kushughulikia changamoto za kijamii.

translation.en: It is not only in politics that women go through such experiences.
translation.swa: Sio katika siasa pekee wanawake wanakumbana na masuala kama hayo.

translation.en: In 2017, lawyer Pamela Helena de Oliveira Amaral vowed to sue a judge after he interrupted a trial to scold her choice of clothing.
translation.swa: Mwaka 2017, mwanasheria Pamela Helena de Oliveira Amaral aliapa kumshitaki jaji baada ya kuahirisha kesi  na kuanza kukosoa mavazi yake.

translation.en: Pamela was wearing a long blue dress that revealed her shoulders.
translation.swa: Pamela alikuwa amevaa gauni refu la bluu ambalo lilikuwa likionesha mabega yake.

translation.en: Judge Eugênio Cesário left the room and only came back after Pamela had borrowed a blazer from a female colleague.
translation.swa: Jaji Eugênio Cesário aliondoka ukumbini na alirudi baada ya Pamela kuazima nguo ya kujifunika kutoka kwa mfanyakazi mwingine wa kike.

translation.en: Pamela said in an interview at that time:
translation.swa: Pamela alisema katika mahojiano katika kipindi kile kuwa:

translation.en: I was astonished, confused.
translation.swa: Nilishangazwa na kuchanganyikiwa.

translation.en: I still haven't quite comprehended it all.
translation.swa: Bado sijaelewa kwa ujumla.

translation.en: It was humiliating, embarassing and disturbing what he made me go through in front of my colleagues.
translation.swa: Alichofanya nipitie kilinidhalilisha na kutia aibu mbele ya wenzangu.

translation.en: The room was full of students and other lawyers.
translation.swa: Ukumbi ulikuwa umejaa wanafunzi na wanasheria wengine.

translation.en: On a post titled Girl Power and Power Dressing: femininity in politics, blogger Nawsheen Rumjaun analyzes how people tend to perceive women's choice of dress in political environments:
translation.swa: Katika chapisho lenye kichwa Nguvu ya Msichana na Nguvu ya Mavazi: uanamke katika siasa, mwanablogu Nawsheen Rumjaun alichambua jinsi watu wanavyopenda kuchukulia uchaguzi wa nguo kwa wanawake katika mazingira ya kisiasa:

translation.en: the number of powerful women is increasing, but being a woman in politics is still tough.
translation.swa: Idadi ya wanawake wenye nguvu inaongezeka, lakini bado ni ngumu sana kuwa mwanamke katika siasa.

translation.en: The clothes they choose constitute a weapon to establish their authority in this mans world.
translation.swa: Nguo wanazochagua zinageuka kuwa silaha ya kuweka misingi ya mamlaka yao katika ulimwengu huu wa wanaume.

translation.en: In politics, there is no pre-set dress-code but an unspoken rule that men should wear a suit, and women should have a decent outfit.
translation.swa: Katika siasa hakuna muongozo wa mavazi lakini kuna sheria bubu kwamba wanaume watavaa suti na wanawake watavaa nguo za heshima.

translation.en: Those who cross the fine line between what is judged decent, and what is not, are at risk of being blamed because of their attire.
translation.swa: Wale wanaovuka mstari ule ulio kati ya kile kinachodhaniwa kuwa ni ya heshima na isiyo ya heshima wapo katika hatari ya kulaumiwa kwa sababu ya mavazi yao.

translation.en: The length of the neckline
translation.swa: Urefu wa Mstari wa Shingo

translation.en: Ana Paula received 51,739 votes, making her the fifth most voted legislator in her state.
translation.swa: Ana Paula alipata kura 51,739 na kumfanya mbunge wa tano ambaye alishawahi kupigiwa kura nyingi jimboni kwake.

translation.en: In an interview for Universa, a local website that covers women's issues, she commented on the attacks: The participation of women in society is so tiny that a neckline can become a huge issue, she said.
translation.swa: Katika mahojiano na Universa, tovuti ya nyumbani inayojihusisha na masuala ya wanawake, alisema hivi kuhusu mashambulizi aliyopokea:  Ushiriki wa wanawake katika jamii ni mdogo sana kiasi kwamba mstari wa shingo tu unaweza kuwa jambo kubwa sana, alisema.

translation.en: She also posted a video on her Facebook page responding to the offenses.
translation.swa: Pia aliweka video katika ukurasa wake wa Facebook akijibu mashambulizi hayo.

translation.en: The comments on that video, however, were also packed with insults.
translation.swa: Hata hivyo, maoni katika video hiyo yalikuwa yamejaa matusi.

translation.en: A user named Vitor said:
translation.swa: Mtumiaji mwenye jina Vitor alisema:

translation.en: With all due respect, but have you forgotten in what environment you will work in the next few days?
translation.swa: Kwa heshima kubwa, je umesahau ni katika mazingira gani utakuwa unafanya kazi siku chache zijazo?

translation.en: Formality, please.
translation.swa: Ustaarabu tafadhali.

translation.en: Be respectful!
translation.swa: Kuwa na heshima!

translation.en: Parliamentary decorum.
translation.swa: Jamala wa Bunge.

translation.en: Another user, a woman named Yelena Sier, received 252 replies to her comment in which she criticized the politician:
translation.swa: Mtumiaji mwingine mwanamke anayeitwa Yelena Sier, alipokea maoni 252 ndani ya maoni yake ambapo alimkosoa mwanasiasa huyo:

translation.en: Geral não entende!!
translation.swa: Watu hawaelewi!!

translation.en: No one goes to a hospital wearing a bikini, children do not go to school in pajamas, men do not go to buy bread in their underwear, no one has surgery wearing whatever clothes, no one goes to sweet fifiteen parties or a wedding in their pajamas, etc. every occasion requires an appropriate attire, in companies there are uniforms and so on, and everyone knows that.
translation.swa: Hakuna mtu huenda hospitali akiwa amevaa bikini, watoto hawaendi shuleni wakiwa wamevaa nguo za kulalia, wanaume hawaendi kununua mkate wakiwa wamevaa nguo za ndani na hakuna mtu anaweza fanya upasuaji akiwa amevaa nguo holela, hakuna mtu anaweza kwenda harusini akiwa amevaa nguo za kulala n.k Kila tukio lina mavazi yake rasmi, katika makampuni kuna sare na kadhalika na kila mmoja anajua hilo.

translation.en: The issue here is not about what a woman wears or doesn't wear, but that each place has an appropriate attire.
translation.swa: Jambo la msingi hapa sio ni kitu gani mwanamke amevaa au hakuvaa lakini kila sehemu ina mavazi yake rasmi.

translation.en: On a different post, Rosimere Furtado defended Ana Paula's right to dresses as she chooses:
translation.swa: Katika chapisho lingine tofauti Rosimere Furtado alitetea  haki ya Ana Paula kuvaa kama atakavyo:

translation.en: Congratulations for raising this issue!
translation.swa: Hongereni kwa kuibua suala hili!

translation.en: While a state representative in a highly-respectful dress persecutes educators and states that education does not need financial investment, you have started a discussion about the importance of women in politics, about femicide, about causes that are independent of color or attire.
translation.swa: Wakati mwakilishi wa jimbo akiwa katika mavazi ya heshima ya hali ya juu akiwakisoa waalimu  na akisema kuwa elimu haihitaji uwekezaji wa fedha, mmeanzisha mjadala wa umuhimu wa wanawake katika siasa na sababu ambazo ni uhuru wa rangi au mavazi.

translation.en: In a world where the mind is misrepresented and sexuality is exarcebated, any cleavage is a subject of war!!
translation.swa: Katika ulimwengu ambapo fikra haziwakilishwi ipasavyo jinsia hukosolewa na nguo ya kuonesha kidogo huwa sababu ya vita!

translation.en: Ana Paula fired back at her attackers by reminding them of her curriculum: before she was elected to the state assembly, she had been twice elected mayor of the city of Bombinhas and left office with a 90 percent approval rate.
translation.swa: Ana Paula aliwajibu wanaomshambulia kwa kuwakumbusha historia yake: kabla hajachaguliwa kuwa mbunge, alishachaguliwa mara mbili kuwa meya wa mji wa Bombinhas na aliiacha ofisi ikiwa na ufanisi wa kukubalika kwa asilimia 90.

translation.en: Ana Paula also posted on Facebook an interview in which she said: Women are in politics and society has to get used to them as they are.
translation.swa: Ana Paula pia aliposti katika ukurasa wa Facebook mahojiano ambapo alisema: Wanawake wapo katika siasa na jamii inatakiwa ianze kuwazoea kama walivyo.

translation.en: There are much more important issues for the legislative assembly to discuss.
translation.swa: Kuna mambo mengi ya msingi kwa bunge la wawakilishi kujadili.

translation.en: She also documented the attacks and said that she would sue the people who have harassed her.
translation.swa: Pia aliyahifadhi mashambulizi hayo na kusema kuwa atawashitaki  watu waliomdhalilisha.

translation.en: She told another interviewer:
translation.swa: Alimwambia mhojaji mwingine :

translation.en: Vou continuar vestindo o que eu quero.
translation.swa: Vou continuar vestindo o que eu quero.

translation.en: Não pretendo me violentar para agradar ninguém
translation.swa: Não pretendo me violentar para agradar ninguém

translation.en: I will continue to wear whatever I want.
translation.swa: Nitaendelea kuvaa ninavyotaka!

translation.en: I do not intend to abuse myself in order to please others.
translation.swa: Sikusudii kujiumiza mwenyewe kwa kuwafurahisha wengine.

translation.en: Human rights activist Ahmed Mansoor is currently serving a ten-year jail sentence in the UAE.
translation.swa: Mwanaharakati wa Haki za binadamu Ahmed Mansoor sasahivi anatumikia kifungo cha miaka kumi jela katika Falme za Kiarabu.

translation.en: Photo Credit: Martin Ennals Foundation, via Citizen Lab.
translation.swa: Picha na: Taasisi ya Martin Ennals, kupitia Citizen Lab.

translation.en: Emirati human rights defender Ahmed Mansoor has endured an open-ended hunger strike since approximately mid-March 2019.
translation.swa: Mtetea haki za binadamu katika Falme za Kiarabu Ahmed Mansoor ameendelea na mgomo wake wa kutokula ulioanza tangu katikati ya mwezi Machi 2019.

translation.en: His supporters say his health is rapidly deteriorating.
translation.swa: Wafuasi wake wanasema afya yake imedhoofika sana.

translation.en: Security officials arrested Mansoor from his home on March 20, 2017 over comments he posted online.
translation.swa: Maafisa usalama walimkamata Mansoor nyumbani kwake tarehe 20, mwezi Machi 2017 kutokana na maoni aliyoyatoa mtandaoni.

translation.en: In May 2018, he was convicted under the 2012 Cybercrime Law of insulting the status and prestige of the UAE and publishing false reports and information on social media to damage the UAE's relationship with its neighbouring countries.
translation.swa: Mwezi Mei 2018, alihukumiwa  chini ya sheria ya makosa mtandaoni ya mwaka 2012  ya kutukana ustawi na heshima ya Falme za Kiarabu na kuchapisha taarifa za uongo na habari katika  mitandao ya kijamii zinazoharibu uhusiano wa Falme za Kiarabu na nchi majirani zake.

translation.en: A court sentenced him to ten years in jail and fined him 1,000,000 Emirati Dirhams (US $270,000).
translation.swa: Mahakama ilimuhukumu  miaka kumi jela na faini ya 1,000,000 fedha ya Falme za Kiarabu (sawa na dola za Kimarekani 270,000).

translation.en: Mansoor has been advocating for democratic reform and protection of human rights in his country and the region for more than a decade.
translation.swa: Mansoor amekuwa akitetea mageuzi ya kisiasa na kulinda haki za binadamu nchini mwake na barani kwa zaidi ya muongo mmoja.

translation.en: He is the 2015 laureate of the Martin Ennals Foundation, which supports human rights defenders who are at risk.
translation.swa: Ni mshindi wa Nobel wa taasisi ya Martin Ennals 2015, ambayo hutetea na kulinda haki za binadamu ambao wapo katika hatari.

translation.en: He is a member of the Human Rights Watch Middle East and North Africa Advisory Committee.
translation.swa: Ni mwanachama wa shirika la haki za binadamu la Human Rights Watch Mashariki ya kati na Kamati ya ushauri Kaskazini mwa Afrika.

translation.en: This is not Mansoor's first time behind bars.
translation.swa: Hii si mara ya kwanza kwa Mansoor kuwekwa kizuizini.

translation.en: In 2011, he and four other political activists were jailed in relation to their connections to UAEHewar.net, an online discussion forum run by Mansoor.
translation.swa: Mwaka 2011, yeye na wanaharakati wa kisiasa wanne walifungwa jela  kutokana na kuhusishwa na kuendesha mjadala mtandaoni kupita UAEHewar.net.

translation.en: He also used the forum to publish a petition calling for democratic reforms in the UAE.
translation.swa: Pia alitumia jukwaa hilo kuchapisha ombi akiomba mageuzi ya kisiasa katika Falme za Kiarabu.

translation.en: State officials used this as a basis for charging Mansoor with insulting UAE leaders.
translation.swa: Maafisa usalama waliutumia wito huo kama msingi wa kumshtaki Mansoor kwa kutukana viongozi wa Falme za Kiarabu.

translation.en: He was convicted and sentenced to three years in prison, but was released on presidential pardon after serving only seven months.
translation.swa: Alitiwa hatiani na kuhukumiwa miaka mitatu jela lakini aliachiwa huru  kwa msamaha wa Rais baada ya kutumikia miezi saba tu.

translation.en: Prior to his 2017 arrest, he campaigned online on behalf of jailed activists in the UAE and elsewhere in the region.
translation.swa: Kabla ya kukamatwa kwake mwaka 2017 alipiga kampeni mtandaoni kwa niaba ya wanahakati waliokuwa wamefungwa jela katika Falme za Kiarabu na mahali pengine.

translation.en: The day before his arrest, he tweeted his concern about the continuous and arbitrary detention of Emirati activist Osama al-Najjar, who remained in prison despite having completed his three-year jail sentence.
translation.swa: Siku moja kabla ya kukamatwa kwake alituma ujumbe kupitia tweeter juu ya kuendelea kukamatwa kiholela kwa mwanaharati katika Falme za Kiarabu Osama al-Najjar, ambaye ameendelea kuwepo jela ingawa amemaliza  kifungo chake cha miaka mitatu jela.

translation.en: According to Human Rights Watch, he also signed a joint letter with other activists in the region calling on leaders at the Arab League summit in Jordan in March 2017 to release political prisoners in their countries.
translation.swa: Kutokana na shirika la haki za binadamu la Human Rights Watch, pia alisaini  barua ya pamoja na wanahakati wengine wakiomba viongozi wa The Arab League katika mkutano mkuu wao mwezi Machi 2017 huko Jordan kuawaachia  wafungwa wa kisiasa katika nchi zao.

translation.en: In December 2018, the State Security Chamber of the Federal Supreme Court, whose verdicts are final, confirmed his ten-year sentence.
translation.swa: Mwezi Desemba 2018, Baraza la usalama wa taifa la Mahakama kuu ya Shirikisho ambalo ndilo lenye maamuzi ya mwisho, lilithibitisha hukumu yake ya miaka kumi.

translation.en: According to the Gulf Center for Human Rights (GCHR), Mansoor began the strike to protest poor prison conditions and his unfair trial:
translation.swa: Kutokana na kituo cha Ghuba cha haki za binadamu (GCHR), Mansoor alianza  mgomo  kupinga hali mbaya ya gerezani na uendeshwaji mbaya wa kesi yake:

translation.en: Mansoor is believed to be currently held in Al-Sadr prison in Abu Dhabi, where he is kept in isolation.
translation.swa: sasa hivi Mansoor amefungwa katika gereza la Al-Sadr lililopo Abu Dhabi, ambapo amewekwa peke yake.

translation.en: A source told GCHR that he is being held in terrible conditions in a cell with no bed, no water and no access to a shower.
translation.swa: Chanzo kiliiambia GCHR kwamba amefungwa katika hali mbaya katika chumba kidogo bila kitanda, maji na hakuna bafu.

translation.en: His health has deteriorated greatly and he is in bad shape.
translation.swa: Afya yake imedhoofika sana na yupo katika hali mbaya.

translation.en: Human rights groups expressed concerns about the activist's health, calling on the UAE authorities to set him free.
translation.swa: Makundi ya watetezi wa haki za binadamu wameeleza kuguswa na afya ya mwanahakati huyo, na kuomba mamlaka za UAE kumuachia huru.

translation.en: Ahmed Mansoor is risking his health to call attention to his deeply unjust imprisonment simply because he advocated for the kind of tolerant, progressive society the UAE claims to be, said Sarah Leah Whitson, Middle East director at Human Rights Watch.
translation.swa: Ahmed Mansoor anahatarisha afya yake akiomba uangalizi wa kifungo chake cha dhuruma kwa sababu alitetea jamii ya uvumilivu na Maendeleo ambayo Falme za Kiarabu hudai kujenga, alisema  Sarah Leah Whitson, Mkurugenzi wa taasisi ya haki za binadamu ya Human Rights Watch katika Mashariki ya kati.

translation.en: UAE authorities should immediately and unconditionally release Mansoor so that he can continue to serve as a voice for justice in a region desperately in need of it, she added.
translation.swa: Mamlaka za UAE zinapaswa haraka na bila ya maasharti kumuachia  Monsoor ili aendelee kutumika kama sauti kwa ajili ya haki katika bara hili kwa kuwa inahitajika sana, aliongeza.

translation.en: The International Campaign for Freedom in the UAE called on the authorities to treat Mansoor in accordance with international human rights standards and to allow international rights groups to visit him in prison:
translation.swa: Kampeni ya kimataifa ya uhuru katika UAE iliomba  mamlaka kumhudumia Mansoor kwa kufuata viwango vya haki za binadamu kimataifa na kuruhusu makundi ya kimataifa ya haki za binadamu kumtembelea.

translation.en: We reiterate our call for the immediate and unconditional release of Ahmed Mansoor.
translation.swa: Tunasistiza wito wetu wa kuachiwa huru Ahmed Mansoor haraka na bila ya masharti.

translation.en: Pending this, we urge the Emirati authorities to treat him in line with the UNs Standard Minimum Rules for the Treatment of Prisoners, which guarantees the provision of medical care and sanitary prison conditions.
translation.swa: Kutokana na hili, tunashauri mamalaka za Falme za Kiarabu kumhudumia kwa kufuata viwango vya chini vya Umoja wa mataifa vya kuhudumia wafungwa ambavyo vinaruhusu utolewaji wa matibabu na usafi magerezani.

translation.en: To ensure this, it is imperative that international NGOs be allowed access to al-Sadr prison to visit Mansoor.
translation.swa: Ili kuhakikisha hili, ni muhimu mashirika binafsi  yaruhusiwe kuingia na kumtembelea Mansoor.

translation.swa: Jifunze juu ya athari za kimwili zinazotokana na mgomo wa kutokula kwa kutumia mkusanyiko wa maandishi na majdwali hapa chini, iliandaliwa na washirika wa Visualizing Impact.

translation.swa: Mabaraza ya Wanawake ya Jirga yanaendelea katika majimbo yote ya Afhanistani.

translation.en: In the coming months, Afghanistan will host its first-ever national-level all-women council, where thousands are coming together to remind the government and the Taliban that a long-awaited peace is impossible without their voice.
translation.swa: Katika miezi inayokuja Afghanistan itaandaa mkutano wa kwanza kabisa wa wanawake kwa ngazi ya kitaifa, ambapo wanawake maelfu wataungana kuikumhusha serikali na na Taliban kuwa amani wanayoisubiri kwa kipindi kirefu haitawezekana bila sauti zao.

translation.en: Over the past decades of war, women in Afghanistan have experienced shocking oppression that has deepened their social isolation and made them politically cautious.
translation.swa: Kwa miongo kadhaa iliyopita ya vita, wanawake wa Afghanistan wamekumbana na unyanyasaji wa kutisha ambao umeongeza kutengwa kijamii na kuwafanya wawe na tahadhari kisiasa

translation.en: Anti-women policies at state level peaked under the Taliban, who took power in the mid-1990s before they were ousted by a U.S.-led invasion.
translation.swa: Kanuni za kuwatenga wanawake katika ngazi ya taifa ziliibuka chini ya utawala wa Taliban ambao uliichukua nchi katikati ya 1990 kabla haujaondolewa na uvamizi ulioongozwa na Marekani.

translation.en: The woman's jirga councils are taking place in provinces across Afghanistan.
translation.swa: Mabaraza ya Wanawake ya Jirga yanaendelea katika majimbo yote ya Afhanistani.

translation.en: Photos used with permission from Afghan Women for Peace.
translation.swa: Picha imetumika kwa ruhusa kutoka kwa Wanawake wa Afghanistan kwa ajili ya Amani.

translation.en: That invasion led to gains in universal education, but women remain plagued by insecurity and the threat of violence.
translation.swa: Uvamizi huo ulisababisha kupatikana kwa elimu ya msingi lakini wanawake walibaki na jinamizi la kutokuwa salama na tishio la vurugu.

translation.en: Quotas for female representation in the legislature have not fundamentally changed the male-dominated nature of Afghan political culture.
translation.swa: Upendeleo dhidi ya wawakilishi wanawake katika bunge haujabadili asili ya utamaduni wa siasa za Afghanistan ambao umetawaliwa na wanaume zaidi.

translation.en: Now, a resurgent Taliban's appearance at negotiating tables in Moscow and Doha has put even these qualified achievements under threat.
translation.swa: Kuanza kuonekana tena kwa Taliban katika meza za mazungumzo huko Moscow na Doha imekuwa tishio kubwa kwa mafanikio haya yaliyofikiwa kwa sasa.

translation.en: The group remains steadfast in its non-recognition both of women's role in the public space and the Afghan government, with whom it has not yet held direct talks.
translation.swa: Kikundi hicho kimeendelea kushikilia msimamo wake wa kutokutambua nafasi ya mwanamke katika Umma na katika serikali ya Afghanistan ambayo bado hawajafanya nayo mazungumzo ya ana kwa ana.

translation.en: Presently the Taliban prefers to speak to Washington, Moscow and select groups of Afghan politicians.
translation.swa: Hivi karibuni Taliban wamependelea kuzungumza na Washington, Moscow na kuchagua vikundi vya wanasiasa wa Afghanistan.

translation.en: The group has said its position on women's rights is in line with that of Afghanistan's main religion, Islam and remains hostile to gender equality activism.
translation.swa: Kikundi hicho kimesema kuwa nafasi yake katika haki za wanawake iko mstari mmoja na ile ya dini kuu Afghanistan, Uislam na imebaki na uhasama na uharakati wa kutafuta usawa wa kijinsia.

translation.swa: Mabaraza ya Wanawake ya Jirga yanaendelea katika majimbo yote ya Afhanistani.
