translation.en: Being heard
translation.swa: Kuwa Umesikika

translation.en: In the meantime, Afghan women and womens rights activists from all walks of life came together and established Afghan Women for Peace, a 15,000 plus movement with members come from all 34 provinces.
translation.swa: Na wanawake wa Afghanistan na wanaharakati wa haki za wanawake kutoka maeneo yote wamekutana na kuunda kampeni ya Wanawake wa Afghan kwa ajili ya Amani, a  ikiwa na washiriki 15,000 na zaidi kutoka katika majimbo yote 34.

translation.en: The movement began six months ago as a shared initiative of the Afghan Womens Network, Ministry of Women Affairs, High Peace Council, and the Office of the First Lady of Afghanistan.
translation.swa: Kampeni hiyo ilianza miezi sita iliyopita kama mpango shirikishi wa Mtandao wa Wanawake wa Afghan, Wizara ya Masuala ya Wanawake, Baraza Kuu la Amani, na Ofisi ya Mke wa Rais wa Afghanistan.

translation.en: 15,000 women across the country came together in 34 gatherings, one in each province, to raise their voices & discuss what peace means in their own community, what are their expectations & what are the costs of peace.
translation.swa: Wanawake 15,000 pote nchini walijumuika katika makusanyiko 34 moja katika kila jimbo kupaza sauti zao, kujadili maana ya amani katika jamii yao, nini matarajio yao na ni nini gharama za amani.

translation.en: Afghan Women for Peace (@AfgWomen4Peace) February 20, 2019
translation.swa: Wanawake wa Afghan kwa ajili ya Amani (@AfgWomen4Peace) Februari 20, 2019

translation.en: In every province, Afghan Women for Peace brought together university students and female governmental employees, as well as literate and illiterate women looking to contribute.
translation.swa: Katika kila jimbo, Wanawake wa Afghan kwa ajili ya Amani waliwaleta pamoja wanafunzi wa kike kutoka vyuo vikuu, wanawake wafanyakazi serikalini pamoja na wanawake waliosoma na wasiosoma wakitoa maoni yao.

translation.en: Together they have shared their demands and thoughts on peace.
translation.swa: Kwa pamoja wameshirikishana matakwa na mitazamo yao kuhusu amani.

translation.en: The woman's jirga councils are taking place in provinces across Afghanistan.
translation.swa: Mabaraza ya Wanawake ya Jirga yanaendelea katika majimbo yote ya Afhanistani.

translation.en: Photos used with permission from Afghan Women for Peace.
translation.swa: Picha imetumika kwa ruhusa kutoka kwa Wanawake wa Afghanistan kwa ajili ya Amani.

translation.en: The organizers have spoken about the role of women in the government and in society, and shared ways to have a positive impact on society and make their voices heard by local and national authorities.
translation.swa: Waandaaji walizungumza kuhusu nafasi za wanawake katika serikali na jamii na walishirikisha njia za kuwa na matokeo chanya katika jamii na kufanya sauti zao kusikika na mamlaka zote za ngazi ya shina na Taifa.

translation.en: The first aim is to create a national consensus that Afghan women shouldn't be forgotten.
translation.swa: Kusudi la awali ni kutengeneza makubaliano ya kitaifa kuwa wanawake wa Afghanistan wasisahaulike.

translation.en: Women need to take part in the peace talks and share their demands and expectations for the future of the county.
translation.swa: Wanawake wanahitaji kupata nafasi katika mazungumzo ya amani na kushirikisha matakwa yao na matarajio yao ya baadaye kwa ajili ya Taifa.

translation.en: The woman's jirga councils are taking place in provinces across Afghanistan.
translation.swa: Mabaraza ya Wanawake ya Jirga yanaendelea katika majimbo yote ya Afghanistan.

translation.en: Photos used with permission from Afghan Women for Peace.
translation.swa: Picha imetumika kwa ruhusa kutoka kwa Wanawake wa Afghanistan kwa ajili ya Amani.

translation.en: Conferences have already been held in a number of provinces including Panjshir, Khost, Parwan, Baghlan, Ghazni, and Logar.
translation.swa: Makongamano tayari yalishafanyika katika majimbo kadhaa ikiwemo Panjshir, Khost, Parwan, Baghlan, Ghazni, na Logar.

translation.en: Conferences will continue in 28 other provinces over coming weeks.
translation.swa: Makongamano yataendelea katika majimbo mengine 28 yaliyosalia kwa majuma kadhaa yajayo.

translation.en: What follows are the highlights  of the conference Khost province:
translation.swa: Kifuatacho ni kibwagizo cha kongamano la jimbo la Khost:

translation.en: Peace should begin from the frontier provinces
translation.swa: Amani lazima ianzie katika majimbo ya pembezoni

translation.en: Khost province is the economic and political corridor of Afghanistan
translation.swa: Khost ni jimbo la ukanda wa kisiasa na kiuchumi wa Afghanistan

translation.en: People at the district level should be included in the peace process
translation.swa: Watu katika ngazi ya wilaya lazima washirikishwe katika mchakato wa amani.

translation.en: Engaging people who are in touch with the families of insurgents is crucial
translation.swa: Kuwashirikisha watu ambao wako karibu na familia za Taliban hao walioibuka upya ni muhimu

translation.en: If social justice is in place and laws implemented, peace will come
translation.swa: Kama utawala wa sheria upo mahali pake na sheria zinafuatwa amani itakuja.

translation.en: God and the prophet ( PBUH), and the people all want peace
translation.swa: Mungu na Mtume( PBUH), na watu wanahitaji amani.

translation.en: Women and girls should be allowed to go to school
translation.swa: Wanawake na wasichana waruhusiwe kwenda shuleni

translation.en: Female literacy should be increased so that children are brought up properly.
translation.swa: Idadi ya wanawake waliopata elimu iongezeke hivyo kufanya watoto kupata malezi stahiki.

translation.en: Todays women are aware and religious scholars should not undermine the importance of womens roles
translation.swa: Wanawake wa sasa wanajitambua na waalimu wa dini wasidharau umuhimu wa nafasi ya mwanamke.

translation.en: Sharia dictates about women need to be interpreted properly
translation.swa: Sharia inakandamiza wanawake inatakiwa itafsiriwe sawasawa.

translation.en: Peace begins in the family, then in the community, and then reaches the government
translation.swa: Amani huanzia katika familia, kisha kwenye jamii na ndipo huifikia serikali.

translation.en: Peace means accepting one another and supporting each others positive actions
translation.swa: Amani inamaanisha kukubaliana sisi kwa sisi na kusaidiana katika masuala chanya.

translation.en: At the conclusion of every conference, participants approve such a resolution about the priorities and problems facing local women.
translation.swa: Katika hitimisho la kila kongamano washiriki waliafiki kuhusu azimio kuhusu vipaumbele na changamoto wanazokutana nazo wanawake nchini.

translation.en: While no date has yet been set for the national-level jirga (tribal council), the event promises to bring together the work of all the provincial level groups.
translation.swa: Wakati hakuna tarehe yoyote iliyowekwa kwa ajili ya kongamano la kitaifa (baraza la kikabila), tukio hili liliahidi kuweka pamoja kazi zote za makundi kwa ngazi za majimbo.

translation.en: Work at the provincial level is important.
translation.swa: Kufanyia kazi katika ngazi ya jimbo ni muhimu sana.

translation.en: Whilst there are women representatives in the parliament in Kabul, women governors are very rare, as is female representation in other important.
translation.swa: Wakati kuna wanawake wawakilishi katika bunge huko Kabul wanawake magavana ni wachache sana kama ambavyo uwakilishi wa wanawake ni muhimu katika mengine.

translation.en: For many women in the frontier provinces, these jirgas have been a first-ever opportunity to participate in the political process and have their voices heard.
translation.swa: Kwa wanawake wengi wa majimbo ya pembezoni makongamano haya yamekuwa fursa pekee ya kwanza kabisa kwao kushiriki katika mchakato wa kisiasa na sauti zao kusikika.

translation.en: Women in Ghazni stated:
translation.swa: Wanawake wa Ghazni walisema:

translation.en: Peace does not mean just an end to the war, and no country can be successful in its national programs without the participation of women; therefore women must have a role in the social and political peace process.
translation.swa: Amani haimaanishi kuisha kwa vita pekee, na hakuna Taifa litakalofanikiwa katika mipango yake ya Kitaifa bila ushirikishwaji wa wanawake; kwa hiyo wanawake lazima wapewe nafasi katika mchakato wa amani ya kisiasa na kijamii.

translation.en: João Lourenço, President of Angola.
translation.swa: João Lourenço, Rais wa  Angola.

translation.en: Photo: Wikimedia Commons CC BY-SA 2.0
translation.swa: Picha: Wikimedia Commons CC BY-SA 2.0

translation.en: An interview given by the President of Angola João Lourenço to RTP, Portugals public television channel, in which he stated that there was no hunger in his country, caused some outrage among citizens.
translation.swa: Mahojiano  aliyoyafanya Rais wa Angola João Lourenço na RTP,  Kituo cha Televisheni ya Taifa ya Ureno ambapo alisema kuwa hakuna njaa nchini kwake yamesababisha ghasia miongoni mwa wananchi.

translation.en: During the 30-minute interview broadcast on 4 March, the Portuguese journalist of RTP África referred to a UNICEF report which stated people were dying of hunger in Angola.
translation.swa: Katika mahojiano ya dakika 30 yaliyorushwa Machi 4, mwanahabari wa Kireno kwa RTP Áfrika alirejea ripoti ya UNICEF iliyosema kuwa wananchi wanakufa kwa njaa nchini Angola.

translation.en: Lourenço then rejected the existence of starvation in the country, while admitting that there was malnutrition.
translation.swa: Rais Lourenço alikataa kuwepo kwa njaa nchini mwake, wakati akikubali kuwa kuna utapiamlo.

translation.en: He said:
translation.swa: Alisema:

translation.en: Our struggle is to reduce the rates of poverty, owing to the long years of armed conflict.
translation.swa: Mapambano yetu ni kupunguza kiwango cha umaskini uliotokana na kipindi kirefu cha vita.

translation.en: Today there is a supply of food in Angola, one cannot say that today there is [serious] hunger in Angola, it is a question of some malnutrition.
translation.swa: Kwa sasa kuna chakula Angola, huwezi kusema kuna njaa [kali] kwa sasa, ni suala la utapiamlo kidogo tu.

translation.en: President João Lourenço said this just before the visit to Angola of Portuguese President Marcelo Rebelo de Sousa, and a few days before a Catholic priest and human rights activist criticized the death of Angolans from hunger in a region suffering from drought.
translation.swa: Rais João Lourenço  alisema haya siku chache kabla ya kutembelewa na Rais wa Ureno Marcelo Rebelo de Sousa, na siku chache kabla ya Kasisi wa Kikatoliki na mwanaharakati wa haki za binadamu kukosoa vifo vya Waangola kwa sababu ya njaa katika maeneo yanayokabiliwa na ukame.

translation.en: The activist Manuel Mapanda, better known as Dago Nível, questioned the Presidents comments:
translation.swa: Mwanaharakati Manuel Mapanda anayefahamika zaidi kama Dago Nível, alihoji  kuhusu kauli ya Rais :

translation.en: How is the gentleman going to say that hunger does not exist in Angola?
translation.swa: Inakuwaje mwanaume anaenda kusema hakuna njaa Angola?

translation.en: Did he not read the criticism of Father Jacinto Wacussanga about the death of an Angolan from hunger?
translation.swa: Hakusoma ukosoaji wa Kasisi Jacinto Wacussanga kuhusu vifo vya Waangola kwa sababu ya njaa?

translation.en: Does it mean that in Gambos and Curoca there is now no hunger?
translation.swa: Ina maana huko Gambos na  Curoca hakuna tena njaa?

translation.en: As soon as Jlo [João Lourenço] assumed the presidency the majority of Angolans got basic essential goods, and hunger was eliminated?
translation.swa: Muda ule ule Jlo [João Lourenço] alipochukua madaraka ya Urais Waangola walipata mahitaji yao muhimu  na njaa ikafutiliwa mbali?

translation.en: During the unfortunate interview, the Angolan head of state also made clear his intention to combat corruption, which is part of the party's electoral programme:
translation.swa: Wakati wa mahojiano hayo mabaya,  pia Mkuu huyo wa nchi ya Angola alieleza kuhusu kusudio lake la kukomesha rushwa ambapo ni sehemu ya mpango wa chama  wakati wa uchaguzi:

translation.en: Ninguém pode garantir que daqui para a frente não haverá corrupção e, que não haverá corruptos, mas que não ficarão impunes tal como sempre foi.
translation.swa: Ninguém pode garantir que daqui para a frente não haverá corrupção e, que não haverá corruptos, mas que não ficarão impunes tal como sempre foi.

translation.en: Não haverá mais intocáveis, segundo João Lourenço.
translation.swa: Não haverá mais intocáveis, segundo João Lourenço.

translation.en: Esse tempo ficou para trás.
translation.swa: Esse tempo ficou para trás.

translation.en: Nobody can guarantee that from this moment onwards there will be no corruption and that there will be no corrupt people, but that they will not remain unpunished.
translation.swa: Hakuna mtu anayeweza kuhakikisha kuwa kuanzia wakati huu na kuendelea kutakuwa hakuna rushwa na hakutakuwa na watu wala rushwa lakini hawatabaki bila kuadhibiwa.

translation.en: There will be no more untouchables, according to João Lourenço.
translation.swa: Kulingana na João Lourenço, hakutakuwa tena na wateule wasioguswa.

translation.en: That time is behind us.
translation.swa: Kipindi hicho kilishapita.

translation.en: In 2018, the Regional Forum for University Development (FORDU), a civic association in the field of education headquartered in southern Angola, produced a documentary (with no online version) entitled Angola, a country at risk.
translation.swa: Mwaka 2018,  Regional Forum for University Development (FORDU), Jukwaa la Maendeleo ya Vyuo Vikuu lenye makao yake makuu huko kusini mwa Angola, lilitengeneza makala (ambapo hakuna nakala ya mtandaoni) iliyokuwa na jina la Angola, nchi iliyo hatarini.

translation.en: It highlights the high number of people searching for food in bins, both in the urban centre of Huambo province, the documentary focus, and in the countrys capital Luanda.
translation.swa: Makala hiyo ilionesha idadi kubwa ya watu wakitafuta chakula katika majalala katika maeneo ya katikati ya mji wa Huambo eneo ambalo makala hii ililenga na katika makao makuu ya nchi Luanda.

translation.en: Screengrabs from the documentary, available only on DVD | Photo of the author, Simão Hossi  used with permission
translation.swa: Picha za skrini kutoka katika makala hiyo, inapatikana katika DVD pekee | Picha ya mmiliki Simão Hossi  imetumika kwa ruhusa

translation.en: On JM.
translation.swa: Huko JM.

translation.en: We need to recognize that there are still many people in Angola living at the margins of society, a problem that will be difficult to resolve if there is not a promotion of credible programs of social inclusion, where it is held accountable.
translation.swa: Tunahitaji kutambua kuwa bado wapo watu wengi ambao wanaishi maisha magumu nchini Angola, tatizo ambalo ni vigumu kulitatua ikiwa hakutakuwa na mpango wa kuaminika wa kukuza ushirikishwaji  wa jamii ambapo ndipo  inawajibika.

translation.en: And not with this birth of a new elite of crooks who didnt get away with it before, who take advantage of the opening now where the main protagonist and financier of the nation is J.Lourenço.
translation.swa: Na sio kwa kuzaliwa kwa wasomi wapya wahuni wanaochukua fursa kwa kuwa mlango uko wazi kwa sasa kwa kuwa jemedari mkuu na mwezeshaji wa nchi ni J.Lourenço.

translation.en: Look at what the main challenges are right in front of your eyes, to overcome problems in the areas of health, education, housing, etc., which should at least already be showing some signs even if slight, but nothing can be seen
translation.swa: Ziangalie chamgamoto kuu ziko mbele ya macho yako, kukabiliana na matatizo katika sekta za afya, elimu,  nyumba n.k. ambapo ingetakiwa iwe imeshaanza kuonesha dalili tayari hata kidogo, lakini hakuna chochote kinachoonekana.

translation.en: A Screenshot of ICT Minister Idah Nantaba who survived the assassination attempt, via YouTube video.
translation.swa: Picha  Waziri wa Nchi Teknolojia, Habari na Mawasiliano Idah Nantaba iliyopigwa kwenye video ya Youtube ambaye alinusurika kuuwawa katika jaribio la mauaji.

translation.en: On March 24, 2019, news broke that Ugandan Information and Communications Technology Minister of State Hon. Idah Nantaba had survived an assassination attempt.
translation.swa: Tarehe 24, mwezi Machi, 2019,  ilitangazwa habari kuwa Waziri wa nchi Teknolojia, Habari na Mawasilano Mheshimiwa Idah Nantaba amenusurika na  jaribio la mauaji.

translation.en: Ugandan police shot and killed one of her assailants in the small town of Nagojje, 53 kilometers east of the capital Kampala.
translation.swa: Askari wa Uganda wamebahatika kumpiga na kumuua mmoja wa washambuliaji katika mji mdogo wa Nagojje ulipo kilometa 53 Mashariki mwa mji mkuu Kampala.

translation.en: Over the last five years, numerous cases of assassinations of high-profile political, religious or military people have led to few concrete convictions or clear reports.
translation.swa: Kwa zaidi ya miaka mitano iliyopita, matukio mbalimbali ya mauaji ya viongozi vigogo wa kisiasa, kidini au kijeshi yamesababisha kuwepo kwa hukumu chache halisi  au taarifa sahihi kuhusu matukio hayo.

translation.en: Ugandan citizens were, therefore, relieved to hear that the police had taken swift action.
translation.swa: Wananchi wa Uganda walirahisishiwa kwa mara kwanza kwa kusikia kwamba askari wamechukua hatua za haraka.

translation.en: However, a more complicated story has emerged regarding mistaken identity. Here's what happened:
translation.swa: Hata hivyo, habari ya kuchanganya imeibuka kuhusu mtu hasa aliyeuawa.

translation.en: Nantaba called the police to inform them that two men on a motorbike had been trailing her for more than 40 kilometers.
translation.swa: Nantaba aliwataarifu askari polisi akiwathibitishia kwamba wanaume wawili waliokuwa wanaendesha pikipiki walikuwa wanamfuatilia kwa zaidi ya kilometa  40.

translation.en: Police swung into action and intercepted two men on a motorbike near the Nagojje Trading center.
translation.swa: Askari polisi walichukua hatua na kuwazuia wanaume wawili waliokuwa kwenye pikipiki karibu na mji wa biashara wa Nagojje.

translation.en: Ronald Ssebulime, 40, a single father of four, was a driving a regular motorcycle and carried a passenger behind him.
translation.swa: Ronald Ssebulime, mwenye miaka 40, na ambaye ni baba pekee wa watoto wanne alikuwa akiendesha pikipiki na akiwa amebeba abiria.

translation.en: Police mistook the two men as Nantaba's assailants.
translation.swa: Polisi walikosea wakidhani kuwa watu wawili ndio waliokuwa wakitaka kumshambulia Nantaba na walijaribu kuwakamata waliokuwa wakiendesha pikipiki.

translation.en: A chase ensued and Ssebulime hit a hump.
translation.swa: Kulitokea purukushani ya kukimbizana  na Ssebulime aligonga nundu.

translation.en: He and his passenger fell off the bike and the two fled on foot. Police fired shots in the air and Ssebulime eventually surrendered.
translation.swa: Wale watu wawili walitelekeza pikipiki na kujaribu kutoroka kwa mguu, lakini askari polisi walipiga risasi hewani na mwisho Ssebulime alisalimu amri.

translation.en: The passenger fled.
translation.swa: Abiria wake alikimbia.

translation.en: Ssebulime pleaded innocent, but police handcuffed and threw him into a police vehicle.
translation.swa: Ssebulime aliwasihi kuwa yeye hana hatia lakini askari polisi walipiga pingu na kumtupia ndani ya gari la polisi.

translation.en: They drove for a short distance and then said the order had changed before they shot and killed him, according to several eyewitnesses who spoke with NTV Uganda.
translation.swa: Waliendesha kwa umbali mfupi na kisha walisema  amri imebadilika kabla hawajampiga risasi na kumuua, haya yalitolewa na mashuhuda wa tukio hilo waliongea na NTV ya Uganda.

translation.en: One eyewitness said:
translation.swa: Shahidi mmoja alisema:

translation.en: [Ssebulime] was picked up from the patrol van [already in] handcuffs and shot.
translation.swa: [Ssebulime] alichukuliwa kutoka kwenye gari dogo la doria [akiwa amefungwa] pingu na kupigwa risasi.

translation.en: Another said:
translation.swa: Mwingine alisema:

translation.en: The policeman took two steps back and shot him twice.
translation.swa: Askari polisi alirudi hatua mbili nyuma na kumpiga risasi mara mbili..

translation.en: Botched investigation
translation.swa: Uchunguzi mbovu

translation.en: In the confusion that followed, police tweeted that the shooting was justified because the men riding on the motorbike refused to surrender:
translation.swa: Mshangao uliofuata, askari walituma ujumbe kupitia tweeter kwamba kumpiga risasi ilikuwa ni halali kwa sababu watu waliokuwa wanaendesha pikipiki walikataa kusalimu amri:

translation.en: Several shots were fired in their direction, to cause them to surrender, but all in vain.
translation.swa: Risasi kadhaa zilipigwa kuelekea upande wao ili waweze kusalimu amri lakini ilikuwa bure.

translation.en: In the process, Sebbulime Ronald a resident of Nakabugo Village, Nakabugo Parish, Pakiso Sub County, and Busiro County in Wakiso District was shot dead during the pursuit.
translation.swa: Katika harakati hizo Sebbulime Ronald mkazi wa Kijiji cha Nakabugo, katika kata ya Nakabugo, kaunti dogo ya Pakiso iliyopo kaunti ya Busiro katika wilaya ya Wakiso alipigwa risasi na kuuawa katika purukushani

translation.en: Uganda Police Force (@PoliceUg) March 24, 2019
translation.swa: tarehe 24 Machi 2019, Jeshi la polisi Uganda lilisema;

translation.en: They added that a second suspect disappeared and fear he is armed and dangerous, although police could not confirm this.
translation.swa: Waliongeza kusema kuwa mshukiwa wa pili alitoweka na wanahofia kuwa ni hatari kwa kuwa ana silaha, angawa askari polisi hawakuthibitisha hilo.

translation.en: Police is still searching the area with canine dogs for the second suspect, who is feared armed and dangerous.
translation.swa: Askari polisi wanaendelea kutafuta kwa kutumia mbwa eneo alipo mshukiwa wa pili ambaye anaogopwa kuwa na silaha na ni hatari.

translation.en: We want to inform the public that the Minister, despite the scare is very safe and was not attacked at any stage as alleged in the media.
translation.swa: Tunataka kuutaarifu umma kuwa waziri, ingawa anahofu yupo salama na hakushambuliwa kama ilivyolipotiwa na vyombo vya habari.

translation.en: Police spokesman Fred Enanga said that the minister, witnesses and police officers involved in the pursuit would give statements while they continue to investigate Ssebulime's phone records as well as registration papers belonging to his motorbike.
translation.swa: Mzungumzaji wa jeshi la polisi Fred Enanga alisema kwamba waziri, mashahidi na maafisa polisi waliohusika katika kupurkushani wangetoa kauli wakati wanaendea kuchunguza kumbukumbu zilizomo kwenye simu ya Ssebulime pamoja na karatasi za usajiri wa pikipiki yake..

translation.en: Irene Nakazibwe, sister of the deceased, insists her brother was at the wrong place at the wrong time.
translation.swa: Irene Nakazibwe ambaye ni dada yake na marehemu anasistiza kuwa kaka yake alikuwa katika nafasi na muda usiyosahihi.

translation.en: According to Nakazibwe, Ssebulime was, in fact, heading to St. Andrews Secondary School to visit two of his children studying senior one and senior three classes, in an interview with NTV.
translation.swa: Katika mahojiano, Nakazibwe alisema, kwa kweli Ssebulime alikuwa anaelekea shule ya sekondari ya Mt. Andrews kutembelea  watoto wake wawili wanaosoma kidato cha kwanza na cha tatu.

translation.en: They had spoken earlier in the day about the visit.
translation.swa: Waliongelea suala la kufanya matembezi hayo mapema siku ile.

translation.en: Ssebulime lost his wife back in 2012 and has been taking care of his four children as a single father.
translation.swa: Ssebulime alifiwa na mke wake mwaka 2012 na amekuwa akitunza watoto wake wanne akiwa ndiye mzazi pekee.

translation.en: It is unclear why he tried to run from the police when he had a National ID card and a driving permit.
translation.swa: Haijulikani kwa nini alijaribu kuwakimbia askari polisi wakati ana kitambulisho cha taifa na leseni ya udereva.

translation.en: Nakazibwe tells her story on NTV Uganda:
translation.swa: Nakazibwe alieleza habari hiyo NTV ya Uganda:

translation.en: On March 27, 2019, the police finally admitted that Ssebulime was mistakenly identified and wrongfully murdered by officers and sent sympathies to the family of the deceased.
translation.swa: Tarehe 27 mwezi Machi, 2019,askari polisi walikubali kwamba  Ssebulime aliuwa kimakosa na maafisa wa polisi na walitoa pole kwa familia ya marehemu.

translation.en: They also confirmed that Ssebulime was unarmed and only carried a bag full of soda and food intended for his children.
translation.swa: Pia, walithibitisha kuwa Ssebulime alikuwa hana silaha yoyote na alikuwa amebeba mkoba uliokuwa umejaa vinywaji vya soda na chakula kwa ajili ya Watoto wake.

translation.en: Boda-boda paranoia
translation.swa: Boda-boda Wazimu

translation.en: The death of Ssebulime has stirred mixed emotions among those who use boda-boda, or motorcycle taxi, as a popular form of affordable transport.
translation.swa: Kifo cha Ssebulime kimeibua hisia tofauti miongoni mwa waendesha pikipiki au pikipiki za kukodiwa ambao ni usafiri rahisi.

translation.en: At least five high profile murders involving military chiefs, members of parliament, religious leaders have occurred in the last three years  all performed by hitmen riding on motorbikes.
translation.swa: Angalau vifo vinavyohusisha vigogo watano  wakiwemo wakuu wa jeshi, Wabunge, viongozi wa dini vimetokea katika miaka mitatu iliyopita  vyote vikisababishwa na  kuwagonga waendesha pikipiki .

translation.en: This has put both boda-boda drivers and high-level officials on high alert.
translation.swa: Hii imewafanya waendesha pikipiki na maofisa wakubwa kuwa makini zaidi.

translation.en: Twitter user Ganda Gannyana thinks the reason Ssebulime was killed without substantial proof of intentions to assassinate the minister stems from directives following the murder of Member of Parliament Hon. Ibrahim Abiriga.
translation.swa: Mtumiaji wa Twitter, Ganda Gannyana anafikiri kuwa sababu ya Ssebulime kuuwa bila kuchukuwa tahadhali yakutosha inatokana na maelekezo yaliyotolewa baada ya kuuawa kwa mheshimiwa Mbunge Ibrahim Abiriga

translation.en: President Yoweri Museveni said that if a leader suspects someone is trailing them with bad intentions, they should sort that person out:
translation.swa: Rais Yoweri Museveni alisema pindi kiongozi anapomhisi  mtu yeyote anamfuatilia akiwa na nia mbaya, wanapaswa kumuondoa mtu huyo.

translation.en: It was a stupid directive from @KagutaMuseveni that if you only suspect anyone trailing you, sort them out first and quick and the rest we sort later.
translation.swa: Yalikuwa maelekezo ya kipuuzi kutoka kwa Kaguta Museveni kwa kumhisi tu yeyote anakufatilia muondoe kwanza halafu waliobaki tutawaondoa baadaye.

translation.en: Now see!?
translation.swa: Sasa unaona

translation.en: An innocent #SsebulimeRonald has been slain.
translation.swa: Mtu asiyekuwa na hatia  Ssebulime Ronald amechinjwa.

translation.en: Shot in handcuffs; thats cold blood
translation.swa: kupigwa risasi ukiwa umefungwa pingu; hayo ni makusudi

translation.swa: Kuna habari tofauti kuhusu nani aliyemuua anayedhaniwa kuwa mshambuliajina namna alivyoua.

translation.en: But most touching is the tell of his kids now at school.

translation.swa: Walipoteza mama yao, na baba yao ametoweka sasa.

translation.en: Twitter user Angelo Peter is furious that the police failed to produce any evidence that Ssebulime was dangerous before they shot and killed him:
translation.swa: Mtumiaji wa Twitter Kyeyune Moses anaona mkanganyiko kwenye kifo cha Ssebulime.Habari ya Ronald Ssebulime ni kubwa sana is bigger than meets the eyes.

translation.en: When @PoliceUg wanted to pin BobiWine for treason they produced guns they found in his hotel room in less than 24hrs.
translation.swa: Mtumiaji wa Twitter Angelo Peter alighadhabika kwamba askari polisi walishindwa kutoa ushahidi kuwa Ssebulime ni hatari kabla ya kumuua:

translation.en: But they can't produce and show us the gun Ronald ssebulime had before they shot him dead after arrest.
translation.swa: Lakini hawawezi kutuonesha bunduki aliyokuwa nayo Ssebulime kabla hawajamuua.

translation.en: In a press briefing, Nantaba narrates her story and questions who might have given the order to murder Ssebulime.
translation.swa: Alipongea na waandishi wa bahari kwa ufupi, Nantaba alisimulia habari yake na kuuliza maswali juu ya nani aliyepewa amri ya kumuua Ssebulime.

translation.en: She suggests the whole scenario could have been orchestrated as a cover-up by masterminds of high profile assassinations   and still believes Ssebulime may have been involved in her assassination attempt:
translation.swa: Alipendekeza mazingira mazima ya tukio hilo inawezekana yamepangwa na waongozaji wa mauaji wa watu wakubwa  na bado anaamini Ssebulime ameangukia katika jaribio la kumuua:

translation.en: The masterminds of these assassinations that have been happening in this country and according to what we see will still continue because [Ssebulime] was the one who was supposed to be a witness but the primary witness has been killed!
translation.swa: Mipango ya mauaji haya ambayo yamekuwa yakitokea katika nchi yetu na kutokana na kile tunachokiona kitaendelea kwa sababu [Ssebulime] alikuwa ni mtu ambaye alipaswa kuwa shahidi lakini alikuwa wa kwanza kuuawa !

translation.en: Edward Lowassa was a long-time ruling party CCM member until he was banned from running for president and joined opposition party CHADEMA.
translation.swa: Edward Lowassa alikuwa mwanachama wa muda mrefu wa chama tawala CCm hadi alipoondolewa katika kinyanganyiro cha kugombea Urais na alijiunga chama cha Upinzani CHADEMA.

translation.en: Recently, he bounced back to CCM.
translation.swa: Hivi Karibuni, amerudi CCM.

translation.en: Screenshot via KTN News Kenya on YouTube.
translation.swa: Picha ilipigwa kwenye YouTube kupitia chombo cha habari cha KTN cha Kenya.

translation.en: October 18, 2015.
translation.swa: Tarehe 18 Octoba, 2015.

translation.en: In Tanzania, high-profile opposition party members have defected to the ruling party, Chama Cha Mapinduzi, or the Party of the Revolution, casting a shadow on multi-party politics in the East African nation.
translation.swa: Katika Tanzania, wanachama vigogo wa vyama vya upinzani wamehama na kurudi chama tawala, Chama cha Mapinduzi, hali hiyo imeadhiri siasa za vyama vingi katika taifa hili la Afrika Mashariki.

translation.en: Most defectors come from the leading opposition party, Chama cha Demokrasia na Maendeleo, or CHADEMA, the Democracy and Development party. Four CHADEMA members of parliament, 75 councilors and several village chairmen have joined CCM in the last few years.
translation.swa: Wanachama wengi ni wale waliokuwa katika chama kikuu cha upinzani, chama cha Demokrasia na Maendeleo au CHADEMA, ambapo miaka michache iliyopita wabunge wake wanne, madiwani 75 na baadhi ya wenyeviti wa vijiji wamehamia CCM.

translation.en: The Tanzania Constitution Forum has called for a constitutional amendment to bar defections. The aim is to avoid unnecessary costs the government incurs in organizing frequent by-elections, said TCF chairman Hebron Mwakagenda, according to the East African.
translation.swa: Jukwaa la katiba Tanzania  limedai kuwepo na marekebisho ya katiba kwa kuwa yanaweza kuzuia kuhama huko  lengo ni kuepuka gharama zisizo za lazima ambazo serikali inaingia katika kuendesha na kuratibu mara kwa mara chaguzi za marudio, alieleza Hebron Mwakagenda mwenyekiti wa TCF.

translation.en: The National Electoral Commission has conducted several by-elections at a high cost that yielded below 50 percent voter turnouts.
translation.swa: Tume ya Uchaguzi ya Taifa imeratibu  mara kadhaa chaguzi za marudio  kwa gharama kubwa ambayo matokeo yake kumekuwepo na idadi ndogo ya wapiga kura.

translation.en: Campaigns have created fear and lack of trust among citizens.
translation.swa: Lakini pia mchakato wa kupiga kampani umejenga hali ya woga na kutokuaminiana miongoni mwa wananchi.

translation.en: The case of Edward Lowassa
translation.swa: Suala la Edward Lowassa

translation.en: On March 1, 2019, retired prime minister Edward Lowassa, member of the central committee of CHADEMA, bounced back to CCM, his longtime party, after defecting from it four years ago.
translation.swa: Tarehe 1 mwezi Machi, 2019, Waziri Mkuu aliyejiuzulu Edward Lowassa na mjumbe wa Halmashauri kuu ya CHADEMA alikihama chama hicho na kurudi chama chake cha zamani cha CCM baada ya kukihama miaka minne iliyopita.

translation.en: At a brief public ceremony, CCM chairman and Tanzanian President John Pombe Magufuli warmly welcomed  Lowassa:
translation.swa: Katika sherehe fupi ya kumkaribisha, mwenyekiti wa CCM na Rais wa Tanzania  John Pombe Magufuli alimkaribisha Lowassa kwa mikono miwili :

translation.en: Mr. Lowassa has shown himself to be a true gentleman.
translation.swa: Ndugu Lowassa amejionyesha kuwa yeye ni mtu muungwana.

translation.en: We are taught to forgive and our aim is to build a new, united Tanzania with no political conflicts.
translation.swa: Tumefundishwa kusamehe..na nia yetu ni kujenga nchi mpya, Tanzania yenye Umoja bila siasa za kuleta migogoro.

translation.en: Lowassa confirmed that he is back home and there is no reason now for him to be in opposition.
translation.swa: Lowassa alithibitisha kuwa   amerudi nyumbani  na hakuna sababu kwa sasa hivi kuwa katika chama cha upinzani.

translation.en: Lowassa is one of few groomed by one of the earliest parties, the Tanganyika African National Union party, or TANU, formed before Tanzania's independence from Britain in 1961, and later, CCMs youth wing during the days of a single-party system.
translation.swa: Lowassa ni mmoja wa makada wachache waliolelewa na kuandaliwa na chama cha umoja wa kitaifa au TANU ambacho ni miongoni mwa vyama cha kwanza vilivyoundwa kabla Tanzania kupata uhuru kutoka kwa Mwingereza mwaka 1961, na baadaye aliandaliwa na umoja wa Vijana wa CCM kipindi cha mfumo wa chama kimoja.

translation.en: Read more: Even the Best Dancer Leaves the Dance Floor: African Strongmen and Political Transition
translation.swa: Soma zaidi : Hata mnenguaji mzuri huondoka jukwaani: Viongozi maarufu Afrika: Katika kipindi cha mpito cha Siasa

translation.en: Under the auspices of CCM, Lowassa served as MP for the Monduli district for 25 years and held ministerial responsibilities in parliament over four decades.
translation.swa: Chini ya uangalizi wa CCM, Lowassa aliwahi kuwa mbunge wa jimbo la Monduli kwa miaka 25 na kushika nyadhifa za uwaziri kwa miongo minne.

translation.en: In 2008, while serving as prime minister under then-President Jakaya Kikwete, Lowassa was forced to resign after being implicated in a fraud scandal.
translation.swa: Mwaka 2008 kipindi cha Rais wa awamu ya nne Jakaya Kikwete  wakati Lowassa ni waziri mkuu  Lowassa alilazimika  kujihuzuru  baada ya kuhusishwa na udanaganyifu katika sakata la kampuni ya kufua umeme ya RICHMONDI.

translation.en: Lowassa moved to CHADEMA on August 4, 2015, just before the general election, after the CCM banned him from running as a presidential candidate.
translation.swa: Lowassa alijiunga na CHADEMA tarehe 4 Agosti , 2015, kuelekea uchaguzi mkuu baada ya CCM kumuondoa kwenye orodha ya wagombea urais katika chama hicho.

translation.en: He condemned CCM and its leaders as dictators, undemocratic and greedy power mongers.
translation.swa: Baada ya kuondolewa aliishtumu CCM na viongozi wake kuwaita madikteta, wasio na demokrasia na wenye uchu wa madaraka.

translation.en: CHADEMA then nominated Lowassa as a presidential candidate under UKAWA, a coalition of opposition parties.
translation.swa: Baada ya kuhamia CHADEMA, chama hicho na washirika wake walimteua Lowassa kuwa mgombea Urais chini ya UKAWA ambao ulikuwa ni umoja wa vyama vya upinzani.

translation.en: In the 2015 general election, Lowassa obtained 6 million votes, around 40 percent, against CCMs Magufuli, who got 8.8 million votes or nearly 60 percent.
translation.swa: Katika uchaguzi mkuu huo wa mwaka 2015, Lowassa alipata kura milioni sita sawa  na asilimia 40, dhidi ya kura milioni 8.8 za Magufuli wa CCM ambazo zilikuwa sawa na asilimia 60.

translation.en: With Lowassas political influence, opposition parties, CHADEMA earned 70 seats in parliament compared to 48 in 2010, while the Civic United Front (CUF), also a member of UKAWA, earned 45 seats compared to 36.
translation.swa: Kutokana na ushawishi wa kisiasa aliokuwa nao Lowassa, vyama vya upinzani kama, CHADEMA kilivuna viti 70 vya ubunge ukilinganisha na viti 48 vya mwaka 2010, wakati Chama cha wananchi (CUF), pia kikiwa mwanachama wa UKAWA kilipata viti 45 ukilinganisha na 36.

translation.en: Welcomed or lured back?
translation.swa: Ni kukaribishwa au Kushawishiwa ?

translation.en: Lowassas return to the ruling party sparked both praise and ridicule from politicians and prominent political analysts.
translation.swa: Kurudi kwa Lowassa  katika chama tawala kumeibua pongezi na kejeli kutoka kwa wanasiasa na wachambuzi maarufu wa mambo ya siasa.

translation.en: CCM spokesman Humphrey Polepole congratulated Lowassa for his bold move to return to his longtime party:
translation.swa: Mwenezi na msemaji wa CCM, Humphrey Polepole alimpongeza Lowassa kwa maamuzi yake shupavu ya kurudi kwenye chama chake cha zamani na cha muda mrefu:

translation.en: To come back to apologize is a great wisdom and humility.
translation.swa: kurudi na kuomba msamaha ni uungwana na unyenyevu mkubwa.

translation.en: Others have argued that high defection rates are not good for national politics.
translation.swa: Watu wengine wamesema kuwa kiwango kikubwa cha wanachama kuhama vyama sio jambo zuri kwa siasa kitaifa.

translation.en: Magdalena Sakaya, CUF deputy secretary general for mainland Tanzania, said the move is bad for democracy, and signals a conspiracy to kill the opposition, she added.
translation.swa: Naibu Katibu mkuu wa chama cha CUF Tanzania bara, Magdalena Sakaya, alisema kuhama huko ni hatari kwa ustawi wa Demokrasia na inaashiria mkakati wa siri wa kuua upinzani, aliongeza.

translation.en: Dr. Adolf Mihanjo, head of the faculty of philosophy and religious studies at the University of Dar es Salaam, termed defectors as people who lack ideology and only seek leadership positions:
translation.swa: Mkuu wa kitivo cha Falsafa na mafunzo ya Dini, Chuo Kikuu cha Dar es Salaam, Dkt. Adolf Mihanjo, aliwaita wanaohama vyama kuwa ni watu ambao hawana itikadi na wanatafuta nafasi za uongozi tu:

translation.en: People have started feeling that defectors are being bribed  this is dangerous.
translation.swa: Watu wameanza kuona kuwa wanaohama vyama wanashawishiwa kwa kupewa rushwa  hii ni hatari.

translation.en: Likewise, CUF deputy secretary general for the islands of Zanzibar, Nassoro Mazrui, expressed pessimism with Tanzanias political future, saying corruption has engulfed multi-party politics.
translation.swa: Pia, naibu Katibu mkuu wa chama cha CUF visiwa vya Zanzibar, Nassoro Mazrui, alieleza wasiwasi juu ya msitakabali wa siasa za Tanzania kwa muda ujao alisema rushwa  imeghubika siasa za vyama vingi.

translation.en: CHADEMA chairperson Freeman Mbowe believes that defectors are being lured by CCM as a way of muzzling the opposition.
translation.swa: Mwenyekiti wa CHADEMA, Freeman Mbowe anaamini wanaohama vyama wanakuwa wameshawishiwa na CCM kama njia ya kunyamazisha upinzani.

translation.en: However, Maulid Mtulia and Godwin Mollel, two defectors who joined CCM last year, said they made the switch out of satisfaction with Magufulis performance.
translation.swa: Hata hivyo, Maulid Mtulia na Godwin Mollel ambao walijiunga na CCM mwaka jana, walisema kuwa wamehama kutokana na kuridhishwa na kazi nzuri inayofanywa na Magufuli.

translation.en: Opposition party leader Zitto Kabwe, of the ACT-Wazalendo party and MP for Kigoma Urban, rejected their claims, calling them empty reasons without grounds and backings.
translation.swa: Kiongozi wa chama cha upinzani cha ACT-Wazalendo na mbunge wa Kigoma mjini, Zitto Kabwe aliyakataa madai hayo, na kuyaita ni  madai au sababu zilizotupu ambazo hazina vigezo wala ushahidi.

translation.en: Dr. Richard Mbunda, a political science professor at the University of Dar es Salaam, cautioned that it is hard to regain legitimacy once it's gone.
translation.swa: Dkt. Richard Mbunda ambaye ni Profesa wa sayansi ya siasa chuo kikuu cha Dar es Salaam, alionya kuwa ni vigumu kurudisha uhalali pindi unapotoweka.

translation.en: Defections create self-disenfranchisement which can be disastrous: The government could slip as a democracy which could then lead to civil disobedience and illegitimate governance, he observed.
translation.swa: Wanaohama vyama wanajenga hali ya kupigia kura mtu yeyote ambayo ni janga kwa taifa: Serikali yoyote inaweza kuingizwa kidemokrasia na baadaye inaweza kusababisha uasi wa raia au utawala haramu, alisema.

translation.en: Squeezed civic space for opposition political parties
translation.swa: Kuminywa kwa nafasi ya kisiasa kwa vyama vya Upinzani

translation.en: Tanzania legalized multi-party democracy in 1992 under Article 3 (1) of the constitution.
translation.swa: Tanzania ilihalalisha kuwa na siasa za vyama vingi mwaka 1992 chini ya ibara ya 3 (1) ya katiba.

translation.en: In a multi-party democracy, political parties play a fundamental role in providing stability and peace needed for peaceful political transitions.
translation.swa: Katika siasa za vyama vingi, vyama vya siasa vina jukumu muhimu katika kuimarisha amani inayohitajika katika mahusiano ya kisiasa kitaifa.

translation.en: However, the current government has imposed a series of restrictions that limit the power of opposition parties, such as limitations on political rallies and live-broadcasting parliamentary sessions.
translation.swa: Hata hivyo, serikali iliyopo madarakani imeweka vikwazo vinavyozuia uwezo wa vyama vya upinzani kama vile vyama kutokuwa na mikutano ya siasa na kutooneshwa kwa mijadala ya bungeni kipindi bunge linaendelea.

translation.en: In February, new amendments to the Political Parties Act were passed that further limit opposition politics.
translation.swa: Mwezi Februari, marekebisho mapya ya sheria ya vyama vingi yalipitishwa ambayo yanazuia zaidi vyama vya siasa kufanya siasa kwa uhuru.

translation.en: Since Magufuli assumed power in 2015, there's been a continuous squeeze on civic, political and social spaces through various bills and legislation to limit freedom of expression online and in the streets.
translation.swa: Tangu Magufuli aingie madarakani mwaka 2015, kumekuwa na kuendelea kuminywa nafasi ya kufanya siasa kupitia miswada na sheria mbalimbali kuzuia uhuru wa kutoa maoni au kujieleza mtandaoni.

translation.en: Read more: An owl refuses to leave Tanzanian parliament.
translation.swa: Soma zaidi: Bundi akataa kuondoka katika Bunge la Tanzania.

translation.en: What does it all mean?
translation.swa: Ina maana gani?

translation.en: Politicians  including national party leaders  are only allowed to hold rallies within their constituencies.
translation.swa: Wanasiasa  pamoja na viongozi wa kitaifa wa vyama vya siasa wameruhusiwa kufanya mikutano ya kisiasa  katika majimbo yao.

translation.en: Violators face arrest and prosecution.
translation.swa: Wanaokwenda kinyume hukamatwa na kushtakiwa.

translation.en: ACTs Kabwe was ordered to report to the regional police commander of the southern region of Lindi for conducting a political rally out of his constituency.
translation.swa: Kabwe ambaye ni kiongozi wa ACT-Wazalendo aliamuliwa kuripoti kwa kamanda mkuu wa polisi wa mkoa wa kusini mwa Tanzania, mkoa wa Lindi kwa kuendesha mkutano wa kisiasa nje ya jimbo lake.

translation.en: Kawe district MP Halima Mdee was arrested after speaking to her voters for the reason of conducting a meeting without permission.
translation.swa: Halima mdee, mbunge wa Kawe alikamatwa baada ya kuongea na wapiga kura wake kwa sababu ya kufanya mkutano bila kibali.

translation.en: Given the current state of Tanzania multi-party politics with defections of heavyweight opposition party members like Lowassa, multi-party politics struggle to thrive.
translation.swa: Kutokana na hali ya siasa ya vyama vingi iliyoghubikwa na wanachama wake vigogo kuhama kama Lowassa, vyama vya siasa vinapambana kuwepo.

translation.en: Since its beginning, though, the hope was for the scope of democracy to expand.
translation.swa: Ingawa tangu kuanzishwa kwa vyama vingi vya siasa tumaini lilikuwa kukua kwa Demokrasia.

translation.en: Photo via Nasser Weddady on Twitter
translation.swa: Picha kupitia Nasser Weddady akiwa anawasiliana kupitia Twitter

translation.en: Mauritanian authorities arrested two bloggers, Abderrahmane Weddady and Cheikh Ould Jiddou, for reporting on corruption.
translation.swa: Mamlaka za Mauritania ziliwakamata  mabloga wawili, Abderrahmane Weddady na Cheikh Ould Jiddou kwa kutoa taarifa juu ya Rushwa.

translation.en: Weddady and Jiddou were arrested on March 22, after they appeared before Mauritanias Economic Crimes Unit to respond to a summons.
translation.swa: Weddady  na Jiddou walikamatwa tarehe 22 Machi baada ya kuitika wito wa kuitwa na kitengo cha makosa ya kiuchumi cha Mauritania.

translation.en: Both had investigated and reported on allegations of corruption involving the countrys president, Mohamed Ould Abdel Aziz.
translation.swa: Wote walichunguza na kutoa taarifa kuhusu tuhuma kuwa Rais wa nchi Mohamed Ould Abdel Aziz anajihusisha na rushwa.

translation.en: Prior to their arrests, they both wrote on Facebook about the alleged ties of Ould Abdel Aziz to a US $2 billion bank account in Dubai.
translation.swa: Kabla ya kukamatwa kwao,  wote waliandika kupitia Facebook kuhusu tuhuma za Dolla za Kimarekani bilioni 2 zinzomhusu Ould Abdel Aziz katika akaunti yake iliyopo Dubai.

translation.en: According to media reports, Emirati authorities had frozen the account at the request of the US Department of the Treasury, in its fight against money laundering.
translation.swa: Kutokana na  taarifa ya chombo cha habari, mamlaka ya Falme za Kiarabu zilisimamisha akaunti yake kutokana na maombi ya idara ya Fedha ya Marekani katika mapambano dhidi ya kutakatisha fedha.

translation.en: Weddady wrote on his Facebook page that police questioned him about his sources and asked why he did not wait for the state to investigate the matter.
translation.swa: Weddady aliandikakwenye ukurasa wake wa Facebook kuwa askari polisi walimhoji kuhusu chanzo chake na kwa nini hakusubiri serikali kuchunguza suala hilo.

translation.en: He answered that the news of the frozen assets was reported online and by foreign media, and that he has no faith in a serious investigation into any crime involving the president and those around him.
translation.swa: Alijibu kwamba kufungiwa kwa akaunti kuliripotiwa mtandaoni na chombo cha habari cha nje na kwamba  hana imani juu ya uchunguzi makini juu maovu yanayomhusisha Rais na wale wanaomzunguka.

translation.en: In early March, both bloggers were summoned and questioned by the unit about their writings on the alleged assets.
translation.swa: Mwanzoni mwa mwezi Machi, mabloga wote waliitwa na kuhojiwa na kitengo cha makosa ya kiuchumi juu ya taarifa yao dhidi ya rasilimali zinazotuhumiwa.

translation.en: Authorities confiscated their passports and national ID cards, and then released them that same day.
translation.swa: Mamlaka ziliwanyanganya pasi za kusafiria na vitambulisho vyao vya taifa na baadaye waliachiwa siku hiyo hiyo.

translation.en: Then on March 22, police arrested the two men after the public prosecutor's office concluded that the reports were untrue and pledged to investigate and prosecute those who disseminated them to harm the country, its institutions, its citizens and its judicial and financial systems.
translation.swa: Pia, tarehe 22 Machi askari polisi waliwakamata watu hao wawili baada ya ofisi ya mwanasheria mkuu wa serikali kuhitimisha  kwamba taarifa zilizotolewa ni za uongo na walitarajia kuchunguza na kukamata wote waliozisambaza kwa sababu walitaka kuidhuru nchi, taasisi zake, wananchi na mifumo wa mahakama na fedha.

translation.en: The two bloggers stand accused of spreading false accusations against Ould Abdel Aziz under Article 348 of Mauritanias Penal Code.
translation.swa: Mabloga hao wawili wapo kizimbani wakishitakiwa kwa kusambaza shutuma za uongo dhidi ya Ould Abdel Aziz chini ya kifungu cha 348 cha sheria katika kanuni za adhabu za Mauritania.

translation.en: They risk between six months to five years in jail each.
translation.swa: Wanakabiliwa na kifungo kuanzia miezi sita hadi miaka mitano jela kila mmoja.

translation.en: They remain in jail pending trial.
translation.swa: Wanaendelea kuwa jela wakisubiri kutajwa kwa kesi yao.

translation.en: In an interview with Global Voices via WhatsApp, Nasser Wedaddy, the brother of Abderrahmane Weddady and a Global Voices community member, said that prosecutors have failed to present actual evidence against Abderrahmane and Ould Jiddou.
translation.swa: Katika mahojiano na Global Voices kupitia WhatsApp, Nasser Wedaddy, kaka yake na Abderrahmane Weddady na mjumbe mmoja wa jumuia ya Global Voices alisema waendesha mashtaka wameshindwa kuonesha Ushahidi halisi  dhidi ya Abderrahmane na Ould Jiddou.

translation.en: He also noted that their lawyers have found no actual evidence on file for the case.
translation.swa: Pia alieleza kuwa mwanasheria wao amegundua hakuna kesi yoyote dhidi yao: Alisema.

translation.en: He said: The prosecutor alleges that the evidence was lost.
translation.swa: Muendesha mashtaka alidai kuwa ushahidi ulipotea.

translation.en: It's his euphemism for we don't have any evidence to charge them, and we made it all up.
translation.swa: Ni tafisida yake badala ya hatuna ushahidi wowote wa kuwatia hatiani.

translation.en: Since 2016, Abderrahmane Weddady had also been reporting and writing about a real estate scam, in which a man with alleged ties to the presidents family, fraudulently acquired ownership of houses of thousands of Mauritania to resell them, his brother Nasser Weddady said.
translation.swa: Tangu mwaka 2016, Abderrahmane Weddady amekuwa akiandika na kuripoti Kuhusu kashfa ya mali isiyohamishika, ambayo mtu mmoja ambaye anadaiwa kuwa na uhusiano na familia ya Rais kumiliki kwa udanganyifu maelfu ya nyumba za Mautania na kudaiwa kuziuza, kaka yake Nasser Weddady said.

translation.en: Jiddou also wrote about the scam on his Facebook page, his wife told Human Rights Watch.
translation.swa: Jiddou pia aliandika kuhusu kashfa hiyo kupitia ukurasa wake wa Facebook, mke wake aliliambia  shirika la haki za binadamu la Human Rights Watch.

translation.en: Nasser Wedaddy also commented on this work:
translation.swa: Pia, Nasser Wedaddy alitoa maoni juu ya kazi hii:

translation.en: My brother's 39-month investigation into the country's biggest ponzi scheme since its independence has been credited by many as a service to society.
translation.swa: Uchunguzi wa miezi 39 wa kaka yangu juu ya mpango mkubwa wa nchi wa ponzi tangu uhuru wake umesifiwa na watu wengi kama huduma kwa jamii.

translation.en: He managed to uncover a swindle that ended up costing over 700 families their homes and savings.
translation.swa: Aliweza kuweka wazi utapeli uliogharimu nyumba na akiba zao za zaidi ya familia 700.

translation.en: He even uncovered how the current President is protecting and benefiting from the scam.
translation.swa: Aliweka wazi pia namna Rais wa sas anavyolinda na kufaidi kutokana na kashfa hiyo.

translation.en: Freedom of expression is tightly restricted in Mauritania and the authorities often use criminal defamation laws to silence human rights activists, bloggers and journalists who speak out against the regime or expose government wrongdoing.
translation.swa: Uhuru wa kutoa maoni umeminywa kweli katika Mauritania na mara nyingi mamlaka hutumia sheria ya kukufuru kuwanyamanzisha wanaharakati wa haki za binadamu, Mabloga na waandishi wa habari ambao huongea dhidi ya utawala au kuweka wazi mabaya yanayofanywa na serikali

translation.en: In a statement to Global Voices, the family of Abderrahmane Weddady demanded that both men be released and all charges against them dropped:
translation.swa: Katika taarifa kwa Global Voices, familia ya Abderrahmane Weddady ilidai kwamba watu hao wawili waachiwe na mashtaka dhidi yao yafutwe :

translation.en: We demand the immediate and unconditional release of both Abderrahmane Weddady and Cheikh Ould Jiddou.
translation.swa: Tunahitaji wote wawili Abderrahmane Weddady na  Cheikh Ould Jiddou kuachiwa huru kwa haraka na bila masharti.

translation.en: And the formal dismissal of any legal procedures against them, and a formal apology from the Mauritanian government for this gross and arbitrary subversion of the legal system to persecute political opponents.
translation.swa: Na kusikilizwa kwa shauri dhidi yao kufutwe na serikali ya Mauritania iombe radhi rasmi juu ya uchochezi huu mkubwa na holela wa serikali kuwakamata wapinzani wa kisiasa.

translation.en: Osama al-Najjar remains in detention, despite completing his jail sentence two years ago.
translation.swa: Osama al-Najjar bado yupo kizuizini, ingawa alimaliza kutumikia kifungo chake miaka miwili iliyopita.

translation.en: Photo Credit: the activist's Twitter account
translation.swa: Picha : Akaunti ya Twiita ya mwanaharakati

translation.en: Emirati activist Osama al-Najjar remains in unlawful detention, despite having completed his three-year jail sentence more than two years ago.
translation.swa: Mwanaharati wa Falme za Kiarabu Osama al-Najjar anaendelea kuwa kizuizini kimakosa, ingawa alishamaliza kutumikia kifungo chake cha miaka mitatu jera zaidi ya miaka miwili iliyopita.

translation.en: Al-Najjar was arrested in March 2014 for posting tweets denouncing that his father had been tortured in prison, and calling for his release and that of other prisoners of conscience in the Emirates.
translation.swa: Al-Najjar alikamatwa mwezi Machi 2014 kwa kutuma jumbe kupitia  tweeter akishtumu kwamba baba yake aliteswa gerazani na kutoa wito aachiliwe huru na wafungwa wengine waliofungwa kwa kutoa maoni yao katika Falme za Kiarabu.

translation.en: Osama's father, Hussain Al-Najjar, is one of 94 Emirati activists who were prosecuted en masse in 2013 for calling for political reform in the Emirates on charges related to harming State Security.
translation.swa: Hussain Al-Najjar ambaye ni baba yake Osama, ni miongoni mwa wanaharakati  94 katika Falme za Kiarabu ambao walishtakiwa kama kikundi  mwaka 2013 kwa mashtaka ya  kuhatarisha usalama wa Taifa baada ya kutoa wito wa mageuzi ya kisiasa katika Falme za Kiarabu.

translation.en: He is currently serving 11 years in prison.
translation.swa: Kwa sasa anatumia miaka 11 jera.

translation.en: In November 2014, the State Security Chamber of the Federal Supreme Court, whose verdicts cannot be appealed, sentenced Osama to three years in jail under the country's cybercrime law on a number of charges that include instigating hatred against the state and designing and running a website [with] satirical and defaming ideas and information.
translation.swa: Mwezi Novemba 2014, Baraza la usalama wa Taifa la Mahakama kuu ya shirikisho, ambalo maamuzi yake hayawezi kukatiwa rufaa, lilimuhukumu  Osama miaka mitatu jera kwa kutumia sheria ya nchi ya makossa ya mtandaoni kwa mashtaka ambayo yalijumuisha kuchochea chukidhidi ya taifa kwa kuandaa na kuendesha tovuti yenye fikra na habari za dhihaka na kukashifu..

translation.en: He was due to be released on 17 March, 2017, but at the request of public prosecution, the court deemed him a threat to national security and extended his detention without specifying for how long.
translation.swa: Alitakiwa kuachiwa tarehe 17 mwezi Machi, 2017, lakini kwa takwa la kushtakiwa na umma, Mahakama ilimuona kuwa ni tiishio kwa usalama wa Taifa na iliongeza kizuizi chake bila kuthibitisha kitachukua muda gani.

translation.en: Two year later, Osama remains behind bars, with no end to his detention in sight.
translation.swa: Miaka miwili baadaye, Osama ameendelea kuzuiliwa, bila kuwepo mwisho wa kizuizi chake.

translation.en: In a recent statement marking the anniversary of the end of his official sentence, the International Campaign for Freedom in the UAE said:
translation.swa: Taasisi ya kimataifa ya kutetea uhuru na mageuzi ya kisiasa katika Falme za Kiarabu, hivi karibuni katika taarifa yake ya kuadhimisha kumbukumbu ya mwisho wa kifungo cha Osama rasmi  ilisema :

translation.en: As there is no trial proceeding this form of detention, those transferred to such facilities can be held indefinitely with the government  rather than the judiciary  handing down punishment.
translation.swa: Kwa kuwa hakuna shauri linaloendelea juu ya kizuizi hiki, wale wote wenye tatizo hili ni bora wakamatwe na serikali badala mahakama kutoa adhabu.

translation.en: This type of administrative detention grossly violates international standards of due process.
translation.swa: Aina hii ya uendeshaji wa kutoa kizuizi unakiuka viwango vya kimataifa vya mchakato wa utoaji vizuizi.

translation.en: Although he was not convicted of a terrorist offence, Osama is being held at a counselling centre at al-Razeen prison under the country's counter-terrorism law.
translation.swa: Ingawa hakutiwa hatiani kwa makosa ya ugaidi, Osama anaendelea kushikiliwa kituo cha kutoa ushauri nasaha katika gereza la al-Razeen kwa sheria ya nchi ya kupambana na ugaidi.

translation.en: Emirati authorities claim that the purpose of these facilities is to offer guidance to those considered to be a threat against the state.
translation.swa: Mamalaka za Falme za Kiarabu zinadai  kwamba madhumuni ya maamuzi hayo ni kutoa uangalizi kwa wale ambao wanaonekana ni tiishio dhidi ya Taifa.

translation.en: However, rights groups say that authorities are using counter-terrorism and these so-called counselling centres as a pretext to indefinitely extend the detention of prisoners of conscience.
translation.swa: Hata hivyo, vikundi vya haki za binadamu, vinasema kwamba mamlaka zinatumia sheria ya kupambana na ugaidi na hizi zinazoitwa vituo vya kutoa ushauri nasaha kama kisingizio cha kuendeleza vizuizi visivyokuwa na muda usiojulikana kwa wafungwa waliofungwa kwa kutoa maoni.

translation.en: Six students were detained on Tuesday, March 12, in Kirundo province in northeast Burundi for scribbling on pictures of President Pierre Nkurunziza in five textbooks.
translation.swa: Wanafunzi sita waliwekwa kizuini siku ya Jumanne tarehe 12 katikaMkoa wa Kirundo  kaskazini-mashariki  mwa  Burundi kwa kuchorachora kwenye picha ya Rais Pierre Nkurunziza katika vitabu vitano vya kiada.

translation.en: The students were accused of insulting the head of state.
translation.swa: Wanafunzi hao walishtakiwa kwa kumfedhehesha mkuu wa nchi.

translation.en: The National Federation of Associations Engaged in Children's Welfare in Burundi (FENADEB) reported that another student, 13, had been immediately released because he was a minor under the age of 15.
translation.swa: Shirikisho la Taifa la Mashirika (FENADEB) yanayojihusisha na masuala ya Watoto katika Burundi  limetaarifu kuwa mwanafunzi mwingine mwenye miaka 13 aliachiwa mara moja kwa sababu ya kuwa na umri mdogo chini ya miaka 15.

translation.en: Three students were reportedly provisionally released on Friday, March 15, but, the remaining three were kept in custody.
translation.swa: Wanafunzi watatu ilisemekana waliachiwa kwa muda siku ya Ijumaa  tarehe 15 Machi lakini watatu waliobaki waliwekwa rumande.

translation.en: The girls, aged 15 to 17, if found guilty, risk up to five years in prison for insulting the president.
translation.swa: Wasichana wenye umri wa miaka 15 hadi 17, kama watapatikana na hatia wanaweza kufungwa  miaka mitano jela kwa kumdhihaki Rais.

translation.en: Iwacu newspaper reported that families affected were deeply distressed.
translation.swa: Gazeti la Iwacu lilitaarifu kuwa familia za Watoto waliokamatwa walikuwa na huzuni sana.

translation.en: Scribbling [on the presidents picture] is a punishable offense under the Burundian law, according to a Reuters report.
translation.swa: Kuchorachora [kwenye picha ya Rais] ni kosa linalostahili adhabu kwa sheria ya Burundi, kutokana na ripoti ya Reuters.

translation.en: However, the age of the offenders may serve as a mitigating circumstance in these students trial.
translation.swa: Hata hivyo, umri wa mtenda kosa unaweza kutumika kama  jambo la kuzuiakatika kesi hii ya wanafunzi.

translation.en: As a teacher anonymously noted, the textbooks had not been checked for several years and are often shared by students, so it is difficult to know who marked them.
translation.swa: Mwalimu ambaye hakutaka jina lake kutajwa

translation.en: A similar episode occurred in 2016, following the controversy over the presidents third term, where high school students scribbled on textbook pictures of Nkurunziza.
translation.swa: Alibainisha kuwa vitabu hivyo  vya kiada vilikuwa havijakaguliwa kwa miaka kadhaa na mara kwa mara vimekuwa vikitumiwa na wanafunzi wengine, kwa hiyo ni vigumu kujua nani kaviwekea alama.

translation.en: Authorities took this as a serious insult and expelled hundreds of students from various schools across the country.
translation.swa: Tukio kama hilo lilitokea mwaka 2016, kutokana na mabishano juu ya Rais kugombea mhula wa tatu, ambapo wanafunzi wa elimu ya sekondari ya juu walichorachora kwenye picha ya Nkurunziza katika vitabu vya kiada.

translation.en: Eleven students were charged with insulting the head of state and threatening state security, although they were reportedly later cleared.
translation.swa: Mamlaka zilichukulia jambo hili kama kumdhihaki sana Rais na kuamua kuwafukuza mamia ya wanafunzi kutoka shule mbalimbali nchi nzima, wanafunzi.

translation.en: These actions were highly criticized.
translation.swa: kumi na moja walishtakiwa kwa kumfedhehesha mkuu wa nchi na kuhatariisha amani ya nchi, ingawa baadaye ilitaarifiwa kuachiwa.

translation.en: Zeid Ra'ad Al Hussein, United Nations High Commissioner for Human Rights, issued a statement on June 29, 2016:
translation.swa: Vitendo hivi alivikosowa sana  Zeid Ra'ad Al Hussein wa shirika la haki za binadamu la umoja wa mataifa ilitoa taarifa tarehe 29 Juni, 2016:

translation.en: I am dismayed by continuing reports of the suspension and arrest of schoolchildren and students for having scribbled on pictures of the president in textbooks.
translation.swa: Nimefadhaishwa na kuendelea kuripotiwa kusimamishwa shule na kukamatwa kwa Watoto wa shule na wanafunzi kwa kuchorachora kwenye picha ya Rais katika vitabu vya kiada.

translation.swa: Nkurunziza ni Kiongozi Mkuu wa Milele

translation.en: Pierre Nkurunziza has been president of Burundi since 2005.
translation.swa: Pierre Nkurunziza amekuwa Rais wa Burundi tangu mwaka 2005.

translation.en: In 2015, he was controversially nominated by his party for a third term in office.
translation.swa: Mwaka 2015, aliteuliwa kuiongoza Burundi muhula wa tatu na chama chake katika mazingira ya kutatanisha.

translation.en: In March last year, Nkurunziza was named eternal supreme guide by his political party, the National Council for the Defense of Democracy-Forces for the Defense of Democracy (CNDD-FDD).
translation.swa: Mwezi Machi mwaka jana, Nkurunziza alitajwa  na chama chake cha  CNDD-FDD kuwa kiongozi mkuu wa milele,.

translation.en: Evariste Ndayishimiye, CNDD-FDDs secretary general explained why that title was conferred on Nkurunziza:
translation.swa: Katibu mkuu wa CNDD-FDD,  Evariste Ndayishimiye alielezea kwa nini Nkurunziza  alitunukiwa cheo hicho:

translation.en: He is our leader.
translation.swa: Ni kiongozi wetu.

translation.en: Therefore in our party no one is comparable to him.
translation.swa: Kwa hiyo katika chama chetu hakuna hata mmoja anayelinganishwa naye.

translation.en: He is our parent; he is the one who advises us.
translation.swa: Ni mzazi wetu; Ndiye anayetushauri.

translation.en: That is why I ask all our members to respect that because a home without the man (its head) can be overlooked by anybody.
translation.swa: Ndiyo maana, nawaomba wanachama wetu kumheshimu kwa sababu nyumba isiyokuwa na mwanaume  (Kichwa) inaweza kudharauliwa na yeyote.

translation.en: For us, we have the best.
translation.swa: Kwetu, tuna kiongozi mzuri sana.

translation.en: While the CNDD-FDD downplayed the title, Nkurunzizas reinforced status as the eternal supreme guide has made it difficult for anyone to disagree with his choices, including his move to change the two-term limit enshrined in the countrys constitution.
translation.swa: Wakati chama  CNDD-FDD kikishusha hadhi ya cheo chake, Hadhi ya Nkurunziza inayoshinikizwa ni kuwa Kiongozi mkuu wa milele imefanya kuwa vigumu kwa mtu yeyote kukataa maamuzi yake , ukijumuisha na hoja yake ya kubadilisha mihula ya miaka miwili inayoruhusiwa na katiba ya nchi.

translation.en: This reflects a centralization of power in the ruling party around Nkurunziza and supporters, and of the partys control of state institutions.
translation.swa: Hii inaakisi mamlaka ya utawala wa chama tawala kuwa yapo kwa mtu mmoja Nkurunziza na wanaomuunga mkono na hasa taasisi zinazoongoza nchi.

translation.swa: Wachoraji wakiwa na mshikamano

translation.en: The government of #Burundi jailed schoolgirls for allegedly scribbling on photos of the president.
translation.swa: Serikali ya Burundi imewafunga jela Watoto wa shule  kwa madai ya kuchorachora picha za Rais.

translation.en: We tweeted our scribbled photos in solidarity.
