translation.en: Crackdown on criticism
translation.swa: Kuchukuliwa hatua kali ukosoaji

translation.en: Burundi's government has become increasingly sensitive to criticism since 2015, after a failed coup, clashes with rebel groups, criticisms of rights abuses, sanctions, economic hardships and a refugee crisis.
translation.swa: Serikali ya Burundi imekuwa makini juu ya ukosoaji tangu mwaka 2015, baada ya kushindwa  kwa Mapinduzi yaliyopelekea mapigano wa vikundi vya waasi, ukosoaji  wa ukiukwaji wa haki za binadamu,  vikwazo , vya uchumi ugumu na  migogoro ya wakimbizi .

translation.en: Nkurunzizas third term bid was opposed by the European Union, and the United Nations, who demanded a restoration of stability before elections.
translation.swa: Jaribio la Nkurunziza la kutaka kuongoza muhula wa tatu lilipingwa  na Umoja wa ulaya na Umoja wa mataifa ambao walitaka kurejeshwa kwa amani  kabla ya uchaguzi.

translation.en: Faced with these challenges, a siege mentality hardened and authorities clamped down more harshly on perceived threats.
translation.swa: Kukiwa na changamoto hizi,  kuzingirwa na mawazo kulifanya mamlaka kuwa wakali na kuminya kwa nguvu wale walioonekana tishio.

translation.en: The Human Rights Watch May 2018 special report discovered that Burundian state security forces, intelligence services, and members of the ruling partys youth league, the Imbonerakure, carried out brutal, targeted attacks on opponents or suspected opponents, human rights activists, and journalists, killing an estimated 1,700 people and forcibly disappearing, raping, torturing, beating, arbitrarily detaining, and intimidating countless others.
translation.swa: Taasisi ya kimataifa inayojihusisha na haki za Binadamu (The Human Rights Watch) mwezi Mei 2018 katika taarifa yake maalumu iliweka wazi kuwa majeshi ya nchi ya Burundi, usalama wa taifa na wanachama wa umoja wa vijana wa chama kinachotawala ambao wanajulikana kama Imbonerakure walifanya ukatili wakilenga wapinzani, wanaharakati wa haki za binadamu na waandishi wa habari, wakiuwa watu wapatao 1,700, ubakaji, mateso, kupigwa, vitisho na kukamata watu ovyo.

translation.en: This has led to a refugee crisis that has seen Burundians fleeing particularly to Tanzania, Rwanda, the Democratic Republic of Congo (DRC) and Uganda.
translation.swa: Hii imesababisha mgogoro wa wakimbizi ambao umepelekea warundi kukimbilia hasa Tanzania, Rwanda, Jamhuri ya kidemokrasia ya Kongo (DRC) na Uganda.

translation.en: While thousands have returned, the United Nations High Commissioner for Refugees recorded over 347,000 total Burundian refugees in February 2019
translation.swa: Wakati maelfu wamerudi, shirika la wakimbizi la Umoja wa mataifa (UNHCR) lilitoa taarifa ya zaidi wakimbizi wa Burundi 347,000 mwezi Februari 2019.

translation.en: UNHCR asserts:
translation.swa: UNHCR inadai:

translation.en: [P]olitical unrest in Burundi took a deadly turn in 2015 after the president announced plans to seek a third term.
translation.swa: vurugu za kisiasa Burundi zilikuwa mbaya sana mwaka 2015 baada ya Rais kutangaza mpango wa kugombea kuongoza kwa muhula wa tatu.

translation.en: Street protests led to violent clashes, and hundreds of thousands fled to nearby countries in search of safety.
translation.swa: Maandamano mtaani yalipelekea mapigano makali na mamia elfu walikimbilia nch jirani kutafuta usalama.

translation.en: Earlier this month, Burundi closed the United Nations human rights office after 23 years, saying it was no longer needed.
translation.swa: Mapema mwezi huu Burundi imefunga ofisi za shirika la umoja wa mataifa linalojihusisha na haki za binadamu baada ya kukaa humo miaka 23, ikisema kuwa halihitajiki tena.

translation.en: The government was incensed with former United Nations High Commissioner for Human Rights, Zeid Ra'ad Al Hussein, who described Nkurunzizas Burundi as one of the most prolific slaughterhouses of humans in recent times in February 2018.
translation.swa: Serikali ilikasirishwa na kamishina wa zamani wa Shirika la Umoja wa Mataifa  linalojihusisha na haki za binadamu ndugu, Zeid Ra'ad Al Hussein, ambaye mwezi Februari mwaka  2018  alieleza Burundi ya Nkurunziza  kama moja ya nyumba iliyochinja watu wengi sana hivi karibuni.

translation.en: Media outlet closures, harassment of opponents, and clampdowns on NGOs and restrictions in political space for alternative narratives and arguments.
translation.swa: Vyombo vya habari na  magazeti kufungwa, unyanyasaji kwa wapinzani, kuyaminya mashirika binafsi  na kuminywa  kwa nafasi za kisiasa za kuzungumza na kutoa maoni.

translation.en: For example, rights activist Germain Rukiki who documented acts of torture committed by Nkurunzizas regime was sentenced to 32 years in jail in 2018 for participation in an insurrectional movement, undermining state security and rebellion.
translation.swa: Kwa mfano, mwanaharakati wa kijerumani Rukiki ambaye aliandika juu ya vitendo vya mateso yaliyofanywa na utawala wa Nkurunziza alihukumiwa  kwenda jela miaka 32 mwaka 2018 kwa madai kwamba alishiriki katika mpango wa kuipinga serikali, alidhohofisha usalama wa taifa na uasi.

translation.en: Rukiki's trial was also marred by irregularities and came weeks before the controversial constitutional referendum.
translation.swa: Kesi ya Rukiki ilighubikwa na ukiukwaji wa taratibu za uendeshaji kesi na ililetwa kabla ya  kura ya maoni ya katiba yenye utata.

translation.en: The scribbling affair is also indicative of the governments increasingly conservative, moralizing approach, including mandatory marriages for cohabiting non-married couples in 2017, clampdowns on prostitution and begging.
translation.swa: Suala la kuchorachora pia ni moja ya viashiria vya serikali isiyobadilika, inayokatisha tamaa ukijumuisha ndoa za kulamisha mwaka 2017 kwa kuwafanya wachumba ambao hawajaoana kukaa kinyumba, kuminya makahaba na omba omba.

translation.en: Voting in progress during Nigeria's presidential election on March 28, 2015, in Abuja, Nigeria.
translation.swa: Upigaji kura ukiendelea wakati wa uchaguzi wa Rais Machi 28, 2015 huko Abuja Nigeria.

translation.en: Photo by US Embassy / Idika Onyukwu (CC BY-SA 2.0)
translation.swa: Picha na Ubalozi wa Marekani/Idika Onyukwu.

translation.en: Nigeria will hold a presidential election on February 16, 2019, and all eyes are on this election as a test to prove the strength of Nigeria's democratic norms, values and unity.
translation.swa: Nakshi za picha: Sio ya Kibiashara 2.0 Generic (CC BY-NC 2.0)

translation.en: This year, there are five main candidates in the race out of 73 total presidential candidates.
translation.swa: Nigeria itafanya uchaguzi wa Raisi hapo Februari 16, 2019 na macho yote yapo katika uchaguzi huu kuthibitisha nguvu ya mila, desturi na umoja katika demokrasia ya Nigeria.

translation.en: Two major contenders include the incumbent President Muhammadu Buhari (All Progressive Congress) and the opposition candidate and former Vice President Atiku Abubakar (Peoples Democratic Party).
translation.swa: Mwaka huu kuna  wagombea wakuu watano kati ya wagombea wote 73wa kinyang'anyiro hiki cha Uraisi.. Wagombea wakuu wawili akiwepo Rais anayemaliza muda wake Muhammadu Buhari (Chama cha Maendeleo kwa Wote) na mgombea kutoka chama cha Upinzani; Makamu wa Raisi wa zamani Atiku Abubakar (Chama cha Demokrasia kwa Watu).

translation.en: The other three candidates, Obiageli Ezekwesili, Kingsley Moghalu and Omoyole Sowore, have been termed the third force because they lack political experience but still present significant competition.
translation.swa: Wagombea wengine watatu ni Obiageli Ezekwesili, Kingsley Moghalu na Omoyole Sowore, ambao wameitwa Nguvu ya tatu kwa sababu wanakosa uzoefu katika siasa lakini wanawakilisha upinzani muhimu.

translation.en: Amid the cacophony of electoral campaigns and the attendant passion from supporters  both online and offline  here are the key issues that may get lost in the noise.
translation.swa: Huku kukiwa na manung'uniko kuhusu kampeni za uchaguzi na mahudhurio ya wanaounga mkono wagombea mitandaoni na nje ya mitandao haya ni mambo ya msingi ambayo yanaweza kupotelea ndani ya manung'uniko hayo.

translation.en: Read more: Meet Nigeria's presidential candidates of 2019
translation.swa: Soma zaidi: Kutana na Wagombea Urais wa Nigeria wa 2019

translation.en: Old and the strongman syndrome
translation.swa: Kiwewe cha Mzee na Mwenye nguvu

translation.en: Nigeria's two major contenders, Buhari, 76, and Atiku, 72, both have long histories of political engagement in Nigeria, leaving many to question their health and longevity as presidential hopefuls.
translation.swa: Wagombea wakuu wa urais wa urais wa Nigeria Buhari, 76 na Atiku, 72, wote wana historia ndefu katika kujihusisha na siasa za Nigeria wakiacha maswali mengi kuhusu afya zao na urefu wa muda wao kama watarajiwa wa Urais.

translation.en: With the end of longtime rulers like South African President Jacob Zuma, 76, and Zimbabwe's Robert Mugabe, 94, who was forced out of power after 37 years as president, it has felt like an end to regimes led by the old and strong men in Africa.
translation.swa: Ukiwa mwisho wa watawala wa muda mrefu kama vile Rais wa Afrika Kusini Jacob Zuma, 76 na wa Zimbabwe Robert Mugabe 94 ambaye alilazimishwa kutoka madarakani baada ya miaka 37 kama rais, imekuwa kama vile ndio mwisho wa utawala unaoongozwa na wazee  Afrika.

translation.en: But this hope has not lasted. Paul Biya, 84, was re-elected as president of Cameroon, making him the oldest political leader in sub-Saharan Africa.
translation.swa: Lakini tumaini hilo halikudumu sana baada ya Paul Biya, 84, kuchaguliwa tena kama Rais wa Cameroon na kuwa kiongozi wa kisiasa mwenye umri mkubwa zaidi Afrika katika ukanda wa Sahara Afrika.

translation.en: The health of Nigerias leaders became a major political consideration after late President Umaru Musa YarAdua died in office on May 5, 2010.
translation.swa: Afya ya viongozi wa Nigeria imekuwa kigezo kikuu cha kisiasa baada ya Rais Umaru Musa YarAdua kufariki akiwa ofisini Mei 5, 2010.

translation.en: YarAdua's illness and continued absence created a power vacuum because he did not hand it over to his deputy, Goodluck Jonathan, before he traveled abroad for treatment.
translation.swa: Ugonjwa wa YarAdua na kuendelea kutokuonekana kulitengeneza Ombwe la uongozi kwa sababu hakumkabidhi ofisi makamu wake, Goodluck Jonathan, kabla hajasafiri kwenda ughaibuni kwa matibabu.

translation.en: Incumbent President Buhari has made about ten trips to the United Kingdom for medical treatment of an undisclosed ailment.
translation.swa: Raisi anayemaliza muda wake Rais Buhari ameshafanya zaidi ya safari kumi kwenda Uingereza kwa ajili ya matibabu ya ugonjwa ambao haujawekwa wazi.

translation.en: He has spent more than 170 days in London on official medical leave since becoming president in 2015, according to the New York Times.
translation.swa: Ameshatumia zaidi ya siku 170 akiwa London kwa likizo rasmi ya ugonjwa tangu awe Rais mwaka 2015, kulingana na New York Times.

translation.en: Can younger candidates stand a better chance?
translation.swa: Je mgombea kijana anaweza kupata nafasi?

translation.en: This year, there are 10 candidates under the age of 40 and 16 candidates between the ages of 45-49.
translation.swa: Mwaka huu kuna wagombea 10 ambao wana umri chini ya miaka 40 na wagombea 16 wenye miaka kati ya 45-49.

translation.en: But younger candidates may not fare well because Nigerias long history of military rule has embedded a culture of political actors who have both the clout and wealth to fund party politics and this takes time and connections to cultivate.
translation.swa: Lakini wagombea vijana wanaweza wasivuke salama kwa sababu ya historia ndefu ya uongozi iliyotengeneza utamaduni kushikamana na wanasiasa wenye utajiri wa kufadhili siasa za chama na hili huchukua muda na huitaji mtandao kulifanikisha.

translation.en: Buhari and Abubakar both have strong political bases.
translation.swa: Buhari na Abubakar wote wana msingi imara wa kisiasa.

translation.en: Buhari has a loyal following in the northern part of the country, while Abubakar is perceived as widely accepted across different tribes and religions in the country.
translation.swa: Buhari anao wafuasi waaminifu kutoka upande wa kaskazini mwa nchi wakati inaaminika kuwa Abubakar anakubalika kwa upana zaidi katika makabila na dini mbali mbali pote nchini.

translation.en: Their ages do not appear to be a factor in garnering support and loyalty.
translation.swa: Miaka yao haionekani kuwa kikwazo katika kuungwa mkono.

translation.en: Ethnicity and religion
translation.swa: Ukabila na Udini

translation.en: Nigeria is what's known as an ethnic fault line state  ethnicity and religion have long played a central role in elections and general politics.
translation.swa: Nigeria inajulikana kama nchi iliyo mstari wa mbele katika ukabila ambapo ukabila na udini umechukua nafasi kubwa sana katika chaguzi na siasa kwa ujumla.

translation.en: The 2015 elections showed that the two major contestants received bloc votes from their various states and geopolitical zones, according to an article in the Journal of African Elections.
translation.swa: Uchaguzi wa 2015 ulionesha kuwa wagombea wakuu wawili walipata kura nyingi kutoka katika majimbo mbalimbali na maeneo yao ya kisiasa, na hii ni kulingana na makala kutoka  Jarida la Chaguzi za Afrika.

translation.en: Also, ethnic sentiments were used to appeal to voters.
translation.swa: Pia, hisia za kikabilazilitumika kuwarubunj wapiga kura.

translation.en: Ethnocentric hate speech surged both online and offline, before and after the 2015 presidential elections.
translation.swa: Hotuba zenye chuki za kikabila ziliongezeka mitaani na mitandaoni, kabla nabaada ya uchaguzi wa Rais wa 2015.

translation.en: Similarly, in 2017, some Nigerian writers raised alarm over the vile ethnic hate speech that almost consumed the nation.
translation.swa: Vilevile mwaka 2017, baadhi ya waandishi some Wa Nigeria walipiga kelele kuhusu hotuba yenye chuki ya kikabila ambayo kidogo ilimeze taifa.

translation.en: Former President Goodluck Jonathan lost in the polls over his failure to handle the Islamic militant group Boko Haram's bombings that rattled the nation and caused widespread insecurity.
translation.swa: Rais wa zamani Goodluck Jonathan alipoteza kura kwa sababu alishindwa kudhibiti kikundi cha wanamgambo wa Kiislamu cha Boko Haram  mabomu yaliyorindima nchini na kusababisha kuenea kwa hofu ya haki ya usalama.

translation.en: Boko Haram's abduction of schoolgirls in Chibok led to a global outcry of #BringBackOurGirls when it was clear to citizens that the government was not doing enough to intervene.
translation.swa: Boko Haram kuteka wasichana wa shule huko Chibok kulileta kilio Cha #WarudisheniMabintiZetu kote ulimwenguni baada ya raia kugundua kuwa serikali haifanyi juhudi zozote za kuingilia kati.

translation.en: Buhari and Abubakar will both rely on ethnic alliances to win votes.
translation.swa: Buhari na Abubakar wote watategemea miungano ya kidini au kikabila kushinda uchaguzi.

translation.en: Buhari, a northerner (Fulani/Muslim), has retained Yemi Osibanjo as his vice-presidential candidate in order to garner votes from the southwestern (Yoruba/Christian) part of the country.
translation.swa: Buhari kutoka kaskazini kwa (waFulani/Waislam), amemshikilia Yemi Osibanjo kama makamu wake kati ugombea wa uraisi ili kuvuna kura kutoka kwa watu wa kusini ambapo ni sehemu ya nchi ya (Wayoruba/Wakristo).

translation.en: Abubakar, a northerner (Fulani/Muslim) has picked his vice-presidential candidate from the southeastern (Igbo/Christian) part of the country.
translation.swa: Abubakar, ni kutoka kaskazini (Fulani/Muislam) amemchagua mgombea mwenza wa urais kutoka kusini mwa nchi ambapo ni sehemu ya (Waigbo/Wakristo)

translation.en: Because Buhari and Abubakar are from the same ethnoreligious group, tensions may not be as high as they were in 2015 elections when Jonathan Goodluck, a southern minority Ijaw Christian, ran against Buhari.
translation.swa: Kwa sababu Buhari na Abubakar Wanatokea katika kikundi kimoja cha kidini msukumo unaweza usiwe mkubwa kama ilivyokuwa katika uchaguzi wa mwaka 2015 ambapo ilikuwa kati ya Jonathan Goodluck kutoka kusini kwenye kabila dogo la Ijaw na Mkristo dhidi ya Buhari.

translation.en: Free speech and press freedom
translation.swa: Uhuru wa Habari na Kujieleza

translation.en: Buhari's administration has been accused of major human rights violations and many hashtags have trended on social media in 2018 calling for the release of detained netizens and journalists.
translation.swa: Utawala wa Buhari umekuwa ukituhumiwa kwa uvunjaji mkubwa wa haki za binadamu na hashtagi nyingi zilivuma katika mitandao ya kijamii mwaka 2018 zikitaka kufunguliwa kwa raia wa mitandaoni na wanahabari.

translation.en: On March 17, 2016, Nigerian journalist Yomi Olomofe was brutally assaulted and detained by Nigerian police in an attack against free speech.
translation.swa: Hapo Machi 17, 2016, Mwandishi wa habari wa Nigeria Yomi Olomofe alishambuliwa kikatili na kuwekwa kizuizini na polisi wa Nigeria wakizuia uhuru wa kujieleza.

translation.en: Nigerian journalist Daniel Elombah and his brother, Timothy Elombah, were arrested on New Year's Day 2017 for a story they did not even write.
translation.swa: Mwanahabari wa Nigeria Daniel Elombah na kaka yake Timothy Elombah, waliwekwa kizuizuni siku ya mwaka mpya 2017 kwa sababu ya habari ambayo hata hawakuiandika.

translation.en: In August that year, Nigerian trader Joe Fortemose Chinakwe was arrested by for naming his pet dog Buhari.
translation.swa: Agosti mwaka ule, mfanyabishara wa Nigeria Joe Fortemose Chinakwe alikamatwa kwa kumpa mbwa wake wa kufugwa jina la Buhari.

translation.en: Jones Abiri, publisher of Weekly Source, was arrested on July 21, 2016, by state security (DSS) agents at his office in Yenagoa, Bayelsa State.
translation.swa: Jones Abiri, mchapishaji wa Chazo cha Wiki alikamatwa Julai 21, 2016 na maajenti wa usalama wa Taifa (DSS) akiwa ofisini kwake huko Yenagoa, Jimbo la Bayelsa.

translation.en: #FreeJonesAbiri trended for several days on Twitter until Abiri was released on August 15, 2018, after a two-year detention.
translation.swa: #MfungueniJonesAbiri ilivuma kwa siku kadhaa huko Twita mpaka Abiri alipoachiliwa Agosti 15, 2018, baada ya kukaa kizuizini kwa miaka miwili.

translation.en: #FreeSamuelOgundipe trended when Nigerian journalist Samuel Ogundipe was detained for three days by Nigerias Special Tactical Squad after refusing to name his sources for a story concerning the forceful prevention of lawmakers by security agents from entering the Nigerian National Assembly in early August 2018.
translation.swa: #MwachieniSamuelOgundipe ilivuma pale mwanahabari wa Nigeria Samuel Ogundipe alipowekwa kizuizini kwa siku tatu na kikosi maalum baada ya kukataa kutaja chanzo chake cha taarifa kuhusu kuwazuia kwa nguvu watunga sheria kuingia katika ukumbi wa Bunge la Nigeria mwanzoni mwa Agosti 2018.

translation.en: Deji Adeyanju, a political activist and member of the opposition party, was re-arrested in December 2018 and has been in detention since then due to a fresh petition.
translation.swa: Deji Adeyanju, mwanaharakati wa kisiasa na mwanachama cha upinzani alikamatwa tena Disemba 2018 na amekuwa kizuizini tangu hapo kwa sababu ya mswada mpya.

translation.en: Buhari has openly expressed his aversion to a free press and freedom of speech.
translation.swa: Kwa uwazi kabisa Buhari amekuwa akionesha chuki dhidi ya uhuru wa kujieleza na uhuru wa habari.

translation.en: In an address to lawyers last year, he stated that the rule of law must be subject to the supremacy of the nations security and national interest.
translation.swa: Katika hotuba yake kwa wanasheria mwaka jana, alisema kuwa utawala wa sheria ni lazima uwe chini na mamlaka ya mkuu wa ulinzi na kwa maslahi ya nchi.

translation.en: On the other hand, Abubakar has promised to run an inclusive governance structure that will harness Nigeria's diversity and uphold a just and fair environment where the rights of all citizens are protected by a transparent government.
translation.swa: Upande mwingine Abubakar ameahidi kuendesha serikali  ya mfumo shirikishi ambayo itaunganisha utofauti wa Wanigeria na kuweka mazingira sawa na ya haki ambapo haki za raia wote zitalindwa na serikali yenye uwazi.

translation.en: Only time will tell how these issues will unfold throughout the election period and beyond.
translation.swa: Ni muda pekee utakaoonesha ni jinsi gani mambo haya yatakavyojifunua katika kipindi hiki cha uchaguzi na baada ya hapo.

translation.en: The Great Mosque of Mecca, considered the holiest city in Islam.
translation.swa: Msikiti Mkuu wa Mecca, inaaminiwa kuwa sehemu takatifu zaidi kwa Waislamu.

translation.en: Photo by Wikimedia user Basil D Soufi [CC BY-SA 3.0].When Saudi journalist and Washington Post columnist Jamal Khashoggi was killed last October in the Saudi consulate in Istanbul, it cast a long shadow on the exercise of free speech for journalists from Saudi Arabia and across the Arab region.
translation.swa: Picha na Wikimedia mtumiaji Basil D Soufi [CC BY-SA 3.0].Wakati mwanahabari wa Saudia na mwandishi wa makala katika Washington Post, Jamal Khashoggi alipouawa Oktoba katika ubalozi wa Saudia huko Instabul, kuleta giza totoro katika uhuru wa kujieleza kwa wanahabari kutoka Saudi Arabia na ukanda wote wa Arabuni.

translation.en: The resulting political fallout also shook some of the most powerful institutions and voices in Islam.
translation.swa: Matokeo ya anguko hili la kisiasa limetikisa baadhi ya mamlaka zenye nguvu sana na sauti kubwa katika Uislamu.

translation.en: After the circumstances of Khashoggi's disappearance and death came to light, multiple world leaders openly accused Saudi crown prince Mohammad Bin Salman of ordering the journalist's murder.
translation.swa: Baada ya tukio la kupotea kwa Khashoggi na kifo chake kufahamika, viongozi mbakimbali wa duniani wamemtuhumu mwana wa mfalme wa Saudia Mohammad Bin Salman kuagiza mauaji ya mwanahabari huyo.

translation.en: In what appeared to be a response to these accusations, the Imam of the Grand mosque in Mecca delivered a Friday sermon on October 19 in which he exalted Bin Salman, the Kingdom's de facto ruler.
translation.swa: Katika kile kilichoonekana kama majibu ya tuhuma hizo,  Imam Mkuu wa msikiti huko Mecca alitoa mawaidha ya Ijumaa ya Oktoba 19, ambapo alimsifia mtawala mkuu wa Ufalme Bin Salman.

translation.en: Sheikh Abdulrahman al-Sudais lauded the modernizing reforms of Bin Salman and denounced attacks against these blessed lands in his sermon, which was pre-approved by Saudi authorities.
translation.swa: Sheikh Abdulrahman al-Sudais katika mawaidha yake yaliyokuwa yamepitiwa kwanza na mamlaka za Saudia, alitaja mabadiliko ya kisasa aliyoyafanya Bin Salman na kukosoa mashambulizi dhidi ya ardhi hizi zilizobarikiwa.

translation.en: He went on to conclude that it [was] the solemn duty of all Muslims to support and obey the king and the faithful crown prince, the protectors and guardians of the holy sites and Islam.
translation.swa: Alihitimisha kwa kusema kuwa [lilikuwa] jukumu la waislamu wote kuunga mkono na kumtii Mfalme na Mrithi wa Kiti cha Ufalme Mtiifu, mlinzi na kiongozi wa maeneo matakatifu na Uislamu

translation.en: Responding in a opinion piece for the New York Times, UCLA School of Law professor Khaled M. Abou El Fadl said the sermon had desecrated and defiled the podium of the prophet.
translation.swa: Akijibu katika kipande kidogo cha maoni katika gazeti la New York Times, Profesa katika shule ya Sheria ya UCLA, profesa Khaled M. Abou El Fadl alisema mawaidha yale yalinajisi na kuchafua misingi ya Mtume.

translation.en: By using the Grand Mosque to whitewash acts of despotism and oppression, he wrote, Prince Mohammed has placed the very legitimacy of the Saudi control and guardianship of the holy places of Mecca and Medina in question.
translation.swa: Kwa kutumia msikiti mkuu kusafisha vitendo vya unyanyasaji na udhalimu aliandika, Mwana wa mfalme Mohammed ameweka misingi ya Uhalali ya Saudia kuongoza na kulinda maeneo matakatifu ya Mecca na Medina katika maswali.

translation.en: Saudi Arabia's long history of politics in religion
translation.swa: Historia ndefu ya Saudi Arabia katika Siasa na Dini

translation.en: With its theocratic system of governance, this is not uncommon in the ultraconservative kingdom.
translation.swa: Kwa utaratibu wa kuongoza kwa kutumia sheria za dini, hili sio jambo la ajabu katika Ufalme huu wa kihafidhina uliokithiri.

translation.en: In fact, Saudi leaders have long used religion as a tool of political power since the Kingdom's inception.
translation.swa: Kwa hiyo, viongozi wa Saudia wamekuwa wakiitumia dini kama zana ya nguvu kisiasa tangu kuanzishwa kwa ufalme huo.

translation.en: Saudi Arabia is home to Islams two holiest sites, Mecca and Medina.
translation.swa: Saudi Arabia ni nyumbani mwa maeneo mawili matakatifu ya Uislam, Mecca na Medina.

translation.en: Every year, millions of Muslims from around the world travel to Mecca to perform Hajj or pilgrimage, one of Islam's five pillars.
translation.swa: Kila mwaka, Mamilioni ya Waislamu kutoka kote ulimwenguni husafiri kuelekea Mecca kwa ajili ya kuhiji ambapo ni moja ya nguzo tano za Uislamu.

translation.en: This has allowed the Saudi government to claim a special form of religious legitimacy in Islam.
translation.swa: Hili limeifanya serikali ya Saudia kudai uhalali maalum wa kidini katika Uislamu.

translation.en: The Kingdom has exploited this legitimacy to gain and maintain political power.
translation.swa: Ufalme umekuwa ukiutumia uhalali huo kupata na kuendeleza mamlaka yake ya kisiasa.

translation.en: When the first Saudi state was established in 1744, Muhammad ibn Saud, emir of the small oasis town of Diriya, made a pact with religious leader and theologian Muhammad ibn Abd al-Wahhab.
translation.swa: Wakati mamlaka ya kwanza ya Saudia ilipoanzishwa mwaka 1744, Amiri wa mji mdogo wa vijito vya Diriya Muhammad ibn Saud, alifanya makubaliano na viongozi wa kidini na muumini wa dini ndugu Muhammad ibn Abd al-Wahhab.

translation.en: Abd al-Wahhab started an ultraconservative religious movement (today known as Wahhabism) based on an austere interpretation of Quran and prophetic traditions.
translation.swa: Abd al-Wahhab alianzisha mchakato wa uhafidhina wa kidini uliopitiliza (kwa sasa unafahamika kama Uwahhabi) ukilenga tafsiri yenye msimamo mkali wa Korani na desturi za Mtume.

translation.en: Fanack, an independent media and analysis site focused on the MENA region, explains that the union was intended to create an Islamic realm ruled by a strict interpretation of Islam.
translation.swa: Fanack, chombo huru cha habari na tovuti ya uchambuzi iliyojikita kwenye mji wa  MENA, inafafanua  kuwa muungano ulikusudiwa kutengeneza mazingira ya Kiislamu yenye kuongozwa na tafsiri zenye msimamo mkali wa Uislam.

translation.en: This first Saudi state collapsed decades later, and a second state was established in 1824, only to collapse again in 1891.
translation.swa: Mamlaka hii ya kwanza ya Saudia ilianguka miongo kadhaa baadaye na mamlaka ya pili iliundwa mwaka 1824, na ilianguka tena mwaka 1891.

translation.en: In 1924 and 1925, the Ibn-Saud family invaded Mecca and Medina (Islams two holiest cities) respectively, with the help of Wahhabi fighters.
translation.swa: Mwaka 1924 na 1925, familia ya Ibn-Saud iliivamia Mecca na Medina (Miji mitakatifu ya Uislamu) wakisaidiwa kwa ukaribu na wapiganaji wa Wahhabi.

translation.en: In 1932, the Kingdom of Saudi Arabia was established.
translation.swa: Mwaka 1932, Ufalme wa Saudi Arabia ulianzishwa rasmi.

translation.en: Ever since, Saudi rulers have continued to use religion to serve their political interests.
translation.swa: Tangu hapo, viongozi wa Saudia wameendelea kuitumia dini kutumikia malengo yao ya kisiasa.

translation.en: Voices challenging official religious discourse silenced
translation.swa: Sauti zinazotaka mjadala rasmi wa kidini zanyamazishwa.

translation.en: Today, the kingdom's history is at the top of mind for many Saudis as they grapple with rising levels of repression under the leadership of Mohammad Bin Salman.
translation.swa: Leo historia ya ufalme wa Saudia ipo juu kabisa katika vichwa cha Wasaudia wengi kwa jinsi wanavyokubaliana na ongezeko la viwango vya ukandamizwaji chini ya uongozi wa Mohammad Bin Salman.

translation.en: Religious clerics are enlisted to treat those who denounce rights violations or call for reform as enemies of Islam, and state authorities continue to deploy religious discourse to serve the political interests of rulers.
translation.swa: Watoa mihadhara ya kidini wameorodheshwa ili kuwaondosha wale wanaokemea uvunjaji wa haki au kupigania mabadiliko kwa kuwaita maadui wa Uislamu na mamlaka za nchi zimeendelea kupeleka na kutumia mijadala ya kidini kufikia malengo yao ya kisiasa.

translation.en: In January 2019, Saudi Minister of Islamic Affairs Abdullatif Ibn Abdulaziz Al-Sheikh condemned the Arab uprisings of 2011 and 2012, describing them as poisonous and destructive to the Arab and Muslim human.
translation.swa: Januari 2019, Waziri wa Masuala ya Uislamu Saudia ndugu Abdullatif Ibn Abdulaziz Al-Sheikh alikemea machafuko ya Waarabu ya 2011 na 2012, akiyaelezea kama yenye sumu na uharibifu kwa Waarabu na binadamu wa Kiislamu.

translation.en: In an implicit reference to criticism targeted at the kingdom after Khashoggi's murder, the Minister denounced what he described as unjust attacks from the enemies of Islam and accused Muslims who are critical of the kingdom and its policies of spreading sedition, bringing discord, and inciting against their rulers and leaders.
translation.swa: Katika rejea thabiti ya ukosoaji uliolenga Ufalme baada ya mauaji ya Khashoggi waziri alikemea kile alichokielezea kama  mashambulizi yasiyo ya haki kutoka kwa maadui wa Uislamu na akawatuhumu Waislamu wanaokosoa Ufalme na sera zake kwaa kueneza uchochezi, kuleta mafarakano na uchochezi dhidi ya watawala na viongozi wao.

translation.en: Reflecting on the link between Wahhabism and political oppression, Saudi human rights activist Yahya Assiri, who lives in exile in London, tweeted on January 13
translation.swa: Akiangazia kuhusu uhusiano baina ya Uwahhabi na ukandamizaji wa kisiasa, mwanaharakati wa haki za binadamu huko Saudia, Yahya Assiri, ambaye anaishi uhamishoni huko London, alitwiti hapo Januari 13

translation.en: Oppression is a comprehensive system, and [in our country] it is enabled by religion.
translation.swa: Ukandamizaji ni mfumo endelevu na (katika nchi yetu) unawezeshwa na dini

translation.en: When Ibn Saud and Ibn Abd al-Wahhab allied, Saudi Arabia and Wahhabism grew as a malignant twin.
translation.swa: Wakati Ibn Saud na Ibn Abd al-Wahhab walipoungana, Saudi Arabia na Uwahhabi waliongezeka na kuwa mapacha wakubwa sana.

translation.en: Our country will not survive unless we get rid of the Saudi Wahhabi oppression.
translation.swa: Nchi yetu haitaweza kuhimili labda tutokomeze ukandamizaji wa Saudia na Wahhabi.

translation.en: As we have said this, others, with a good intention, have said that Wahhabism is a religious movement, while it is purely political
translation.swa: Kama ambavyo tulisema hili, wengine, wenye nia njema walishasema kwamba Uwahhabi ni harakati za kidini wakati kwa ukweli ni harakati za kisiasa.

translation.en: But the voices of people like Assiri are silenced in Saudi Arabia.
translation.swa: Lakini sauti za watu kama vile Assiri zimenyamazishwa nchini Saudi Arabia.

translation.en: Another such voice is that of Abdullah Al-Hamid, one of the founders of the now-dissolved Saudi Civil and Political Rights Association (ACPRA), who is currently behind bars.
translation.swa: Sauti nyingine kama hiyo ni ya Abdullah Al-Hamid ambaye yupo gerezani sasa na ni mmoja wa waanzilishi wa Chama Cha Haki za Kiraia na Kisiasa cha Saudia ambacho hakipo tena.

translation.en: Al-Hamid is serving eleven years in prison for his human rights activities, on charges that include breaking allegiance to and disobeying the ruler, and inciting disorder by calling for demonstrations.
translation.swa: Al-Hamid anatumikia kifungo cha miaka kumi na moja gerezani kwa sababu ya harakati zake za kutetea haki za Binadamu, alihukumuwa kwa makosa ya  kutokutii watawala na uchochezi kwa kuitisha maandamano.

translation.en: He was convicted in 2013 by the infamous Specialized Criminal Court, established to try terror-related cases but often used to go after human rights activists.
translation.swa: Alihukumiwa mwaka 2013 na mahakama Maarufu ya Makosa Maalumu ya Jinai, iliyoundwa kwa ajili ya makosa ya kigaidi lakini mara nyingi hutumika kuwahukumu wanaharakati wa haki za binadamu.

translation.en: Rights groups reported that Al-Hamid began a hunger strike on 17 February.
translation.swa: Vikundi vya Haki vimeripoti kuwa  Al-Hamid alianza mgomo wa kula kuanzia Februari 17.

translation.en: In a statement attributed to him and published by the MBS MeToo human rights platform, Al-Hamid announced that hes demanding the release of imprisoned human rights activists and political prisoners.
translation.swa: Katika ujumbe uliokuwa umeandikwa naye na kuchapishwa na jukwaa la Haki za binadamu la MBS Mimi Pia, Al-Hamid alitamka kuwa anataka kachiliwa huru kwa wanaharakati wote wa Haki za binadamu na wafungwa wa kisiasa walio magerezani.

translation.en: Abdullah Al-Hamid.
translation.swa: Abdullah Al-Hamid.

translation.en: Photo from his Goodreads account.
translation.swa: Picha kutoka akaunti yake ya Goodreads.

translation.en: In addition to his human rights activism, Al-Hamid is a poet and an academic.
translation.swa: Kwa kuongezea katika harakati zake za Haki za Binadamu, Al-Hamid pia ni mshairi na mwanazuoni.

translation.en: In his writings, he has used Islamic texts and traditions to call for democratic reforms, advocate for human rights, and to critique the religious institutions that enable repression in Saudi Arabia such as the Council of Senior Scholars, the kingdoms highest religious body which advises the king on religious matters.
translation.swa: Katika maandiko yake, ametumia vitabu vya Kiislamu na vya kiutamaduni kuitisha mabadiliko ya kidemokrasia, akilenga haki za binadamu na akikosoa taasisi za kidini ambazo zinawezesha ukandamizaji Saudi Arabia kama vile Baraza la Mawalii Wakuu ambalo ni chombo kikuu cha kidini katika ufalme ambapo humshauri mfalme katika masuala ya kidini.

translation.en: He once accused the Council of serving to support those who steal the peoples money, dignity and freedom and of playing a role in harming citizenship, plurality, tolerance and producing violence and extremism.
translation.swa: Mara moja alilituhumu Baraza hilo kutumika kuunga mkono Wale wanaoiba fedha za wananchi, utu wa watu na uhuru wao na kuwajibika katika nafasi ya kuwaumiza raia kwa pamoja na kuondoa uvumilivu na kuzalisha vurugu na misimamo mikali.

translation.en: He also has advocated for a modern religious discourse that embraces a consultative rule and he opposed what he described as the common religious discourse in the kingdom which calls for prayer behind a unjust Imameven if he violated [one's] freedom, justice and equality.
translation.swa: Pia alizungumza kuhusu mijadala ya kisasa ya kidini ambayo inakumbatia utawala shirikishi na alipinga alichokielezea kama mijadala ya kawaida ya kidini katika ufalme ambayo hufanya sala nyuma ya Iman asiyetenda hakihata kama anavunja haki, uhuru na usawa wa mtu mwingine.

translation.en: Crackdown on independent clerics
translation.swa: Ukandamizaji wa Wahubiri huru

translation.en: While silencing those who challenge the government's official discourse, Saudi Arabia has also taken a hard line against clerics who are not sufficiently supportive of the Crown Prince's policies and actions.
translation.swa: Wakati wakiwanyamazisha wale wanaoikosoa mijadala ya maafisa wa serikali, Saudi Arabia pia imechukua hatua kali dhidi ya Wahubiri ambao hawaungi mkono ipasavyo sera na vitendo vya Mwana Mfalme.

translation.en: Saudi clerics Sheikh Salman Al-Awda, Ali Al-Omari and Sheikh Awad Al-Qarni were all arrested in September 2017 on various charges that include their alleged ties to the Muslim Brotherhood.
translation.swa: Wahubiri wa Saudi kama vile Sheikh Salman Al-Awda, Ali Al-Omari na Sheikh Awad Al-Qarni walikamatwa Septemba 2017 kwa makosa mbalimbali ambayo yaliwahusisha na kikundi cha Muslim Brotherhood.

translation.en: Rights groups say the charges were brought on because the clerics did not vocally support the severance of diplomatic and economic ties with Qatar by Saudi Arabia and its allies.
translation.swa: Vikundi vya Haki za binadamu vinasema kuwa mashitaka yao yaliletwa kwa sababu Wahubiri hao hawakuunga mkono kwa maneno  Saudi Arabia kuvunja ushirika wake wa kibiashara na wa kidiplomasia na Qatar na washirika wake.

translation.en: And all three may face the death penalty.
translation.swa: Na wote watatu wanaweza wakahukumiwa kifo.

translation.en: At 62, Sheikh Salman Al-Awda is a prominent cleric with a massive social media following, not only in Saudi Arabia but across the Arab region.
translation.swa: Akiwa na miaka 62, Sheikh Salman Al-Awda ni muhubiri muhimu akiwa na wafuasi wengi katika majukwaa ya mitandao ya kijamii, sio Saudi Arabia Pekee bali ukanda wa Arabuni wote.

translation.en: The combined number of his followers on Instagram, Facebook, Twitter and YouTube is more than 22 million.
translation.swa: Idadi ya wafuasi wake ikiunganishwa kutoka Instagram, Facebook, Twitter and YouTube ni zaidi ya milioni 22.

translation.en: He previously expressed support for the Arab uprisings of 2011 and called for democratic reforms in the kingdom and the region.
translation.swa: Hapo mwanzo alishawahi kuunga mkono machafuko ya Waarabu mwaka 2011 na aliitisha mabadiliko ya kidemokrasia katika Ufalme na katika Ukanda wote.

translation.en: Amnesty International and other human rights groups linked his arrest to a tweet posted on 8 September, in which he reacted to news reports of a potential reconciliation between the nations.
translation.swa: Shirika la Haki za Binadamu na makundi mengine ya haki za Binadamu walihusianisha kukamatwa kwake na chapisho moja la 8 Septemba katika ukurasa wake wa twita, ambapo aligusia  habari kuhusu mapatano muhimu baina ya mataifa.

translation.en: In the second part of the tweet, he wrote: May God harmonize between their hearts for what is good for their people.
translation.swa: Katika sehemu ya pili ya bandiko lake twita, aliandika: Mungu alete amani katika mioyo yao kwa kile kilicho chema kwa watu wao.

translation.en: Ali Al-Omari is a religious scholar and the chairman of 4Shbab, a youth-focused Islamic TV channel.
translation.swa: Ali Al-Omari ni mwanazuoni wa masuala ya dini na mwenyekiti wa 4Shbab, kituo cha runinga cha Kiislamu kinacholenga vijana.

translation.en: In contrast to others, he was not vocal on political issues in the Kingdom.
translation.swa: Tofauti na wenzake, sio mzungumzaji wa masuala ya kisiasa katika ufalme.

translation.en: He even once tweeted in support of the Kingdoms leaders, and posted a tweet praying for Bin Salmans success when he was appointed crown prince back in June 2017.
translation.swa: Na mara moja alishawahi ku-tweet akiwaunga mkono viongozi wa ufalme na aliandika bandiko akiomba kwa ajili mafanikio ya Bin Salman alipoteuliwa kuwa mrithi wa kiti cha mfalme hapo Juni 2017.

translation.en: Sheikh Awad Al-Qarni faces a number of accusations that include supporting the Muslim Brotherhood, outlawed in Saudi Arabia, and slandering the Kingdom, its policies and its systems.
translation.swa: Sheikh Awad Al-Qarni amekuwa akipokea tuhuma mbalimbali ikiwamo kuwaunga mkono kikundi cha Muslim Brotherhood, kukiuka sheria za Saudi Arabia, kuusingizia ufalme, kanuni zake na sheria zake na mfumo wake.

translation.en: Several other clerics are also currently behind bars in Saudi Arabia.
translation.swa: Wakutubi wengine kadhaa wako magerezani kwa sasa huko Saudi Arabia.

translation.en: Some have called for democratic reforms in the kingdom, like Al-Awda, while others voiced opposition to Bin Salmans policies or social reforms.
translation.swa: Baadhi wameitisha mabadiliko ya kidemokrasia katika Ufalme kama vile Al-Awda, wakati wengine walipaza sauti wakimpinga Bin Salman na sera  zake au mabadiliko ya kijamii.

translation.en: Others like al-Omari previously expressed support to Saudi rulers and the Crown Prince.
translation.swa: Wengine kama vile al-Omari hapo nyuma alishawahi kuunga mkono watawala wa Saudi Arabia na Mrithi wa Kiti cha Mfalme.

translation.en: What these cases confirm is that under Bin Salmans de facto-rule, silence is no longer enough.
translation.swa: Kinachothibitishwa na kesi hizi ni kuwa chini ya utawala wa Bin Salman, ukimya hautoshi tena.

translation.en: Beyond a mandate to stamp out independent voices  the words of anyone who is not writing in service of the Kingdom's leadership or political agenda  clerics must go the extra mile and outwardly praise the Crown Prince and Saudi leadership.
translation.swa: Zaidi ya muhuri wa mamlaka kunyamazisha sauti huru -maneno ya yeyote ambaye hayaandiki kwa ajili ya mamlaka ya ufalme au ajenda yake ya kisiasa- wahubiri lazima waende mbali zaidi na kumsifia hadharani mrithi wa kiti cha ufalme na uongozi wa Saudia.

translation.en: The opinions and ideologies of those prisoners of conscience currently behind bars in Saudi Arabia, including womens rights defenders, human rights defenders, Shia protesters and religious clerics, may vary.
translation.swa: Mitazamo na itikadi za wafungwa wa hisia kwa sasa ziko kifungoni huko Saudi Arabia, ikiwamo mpigania haki za wanawake, mpigania haki za binadamu, waandamanaji wa Kishia na wahutubu wa kidini, zinaweza kutofautiana.

translation.en: But under the de facto rule of Bin Salman, these individuals are all subject to injustices at the hands of Saudi authorities including arbitrary detention, solitary confinement, torture, and enforced disappearance.
translation.swa: Lakini chini ya utawala wa Bin Salman ndugu wote hawa wamehukumiwa chini ya mkono dhalimu wa mamlaka za Saudia ikiwamo vizuizi holela, vifungo vya siri, mateso, and kupotea kwa kukusudia.

translation.en: To legitimise and whitewash these acts of oppression, Saudi rulers never hesitate to use religion as a cover-up.
translation.swa: Kuhalalisha na kusafisha matendo ya unyanyasaji, watawala wa Saudia hawakawii kutumia dini kama kinga.

translation.en: According to the Cuban government, 20,000 doctors attended 113 million Brazilians in the last five years.
translation.swa: Kulingana na serikali ya Cuba, madaktari wapatao 20,000 waliwahudumia Wabrazili milioni 113 kwa kipindi cha miaka mitano.

translation.en: Image: Agência Brasil, CC BY 3.0
translation.swa: Picha na: Agência Brasil, CC BY 3.0

translation.en: Thousands of Brazilians could be left without healthcare as Cuba begins pulling out 8,400 doctors who have been stationed in the country's smallest and remotest towns for the past five years.
translation.swa: Maelfu ya Wabrazili wanaweza kubaki bila huduma za afya kwa sababu Cuba imeanza kuwaondoa zaidi ya madaktari 8,400 ambao walikuwa wamepangiwa kazi katika miji midogo ya mbali na ya ndani sana ya nchi kwa miaka mitano.

translation.en: In an official statement dated November 14, Havana announced it will end its agreement with Brazil as a response to president-elect Jair Bolsonaro's public comments about the program, which it deemed threatening and depreciative.
translation.swa: Katika taarifa ya rasmi ya Novemba 14, Havana ilitangaza kuwa itakatiza makubaliano yake na Brazili kutokana na maoni ya wazi ya Rais Jair Bolsonaro kuhusu mpango huo ambapo wanadhani kuwa yanaonesha vitisho na uonevu..

translation.en: On multiple occasions over the course of the presidential campaign, Bolsonaro has disputed the skills of the Cuban doctors and criticized the agreement's terms.
translation.swa: Mara kadhaa katika kampeni za Urais, Bolsonaro alikosoa utandaji wa madaktari kutoka Cuba na kuukosoa mpango huo.

translation.en: Launched in 2013 by former president Dilma Rousseff, the program Mais Médicos (More Doctors) sought to widen healthcare access in Brazil's most vulnerable towns, some of which never had a resident doctor before.
translation.swa: Mpango huo ulizinduliwa mwaka 2013 na rais wa zamani Dilma Rousseff, ukiwa na jina Mais Médicos (Madaktari zaidi) ukiwa na lengo la kupanua upatikanaji wa huduma za afya katika maeneo duni zaidi nchini Brazili ambapo baadhi yake hayajawahi kuwa na mganga mkazi.

translation.en: It opened thousands of job posts in those areas, offering salaries of around 3,500 dollars per month plus a stipend for housing and meals (for comparison, Brazil's minimum wage is currently around 300 dollars per month).
translation.swa: Ilifungua mlango wa ajira katika maeneo hayo ikitoa mshahara wa karibu dola 3,500 kwa mwezi pamoja na posho kwa ajili nyumba na chakula (ukilinganisha na kima cha chini cha mshahara wa Brazili ambapo ni chini ya dola 300 kwa mwezi)

translation.en: The program gave preference to Brazilian doctors, but after they've signed up for only six percent of the job openings, the remaining vacancies were filled by Cuban doctors who were brought in through a deal signed by Brazil's Ministry of Health and Havana and mediated by WHO's Pan American Health Organisation.
translation.swa: Mpango huo ulitoa upendeleo kwa madaktari wa Brazili lakini baada ya kuajiriwa kwa asilimia sita tu ya ajira zilizokuwepo, nafasi nyingine zilijazwa na madaktari wa Cuba ambao waliletwa kwa mkataba uliosainiwa na Wizara ya Afya ya Brazili na Havana kwa usimamizi wa shirika la afya duniani chini ya taasisi yake ya Pan American Health Organisation.

translation.en: By the agreement's terms, Brazil doesn't hire the Cuban doctors directly: instead, it pays the Cuban government, who recruits, manages and compensates them as civil servants  with a salary that is around 25 percent of what Brazil would pay them had they been hired individually.
translation.swa: Kwa makubaliano ya mkataba huo, Brazili haiwaajiri madaktari wa Cuba moja kwa moja badala yake inailipa serikali ya Cuba ambayo iliwapa mafunzo, kuwaongoza na kuwafidia madaktari hao kama watumishi wa umma kwa mshahara wa asilimia 25 ya kile Brazili ingewalipa kama ingewaajiri wenyewe.

translation.en: Cuban doctors attending some of the most vulnerable BraziliansThese are the people that Bolsonaro sent away with his disastrous declarations.
translation.swa: Madaktari wa Cuba wakiwahudumia Wabrazili wenye hali mbaya kabisahawa ndio watu Bolsonaro aliowafukuza kwa tamko lake la kikatili.

translation.en: Photos by Araquém Alcântara
translation.swa: Picha na Araquém Alcântara

translation.en: The deal met plenty of criticism since the first doctors began to arrive.
translation.swa: Mpango huo ulikumbana na ukosoaji mwingi tangu walipofika madaktari wa awali.

translation.en: They were booed in airports by massive crowds and were called slaves in protests led by Brazilian medical associations.
translation.swa: Walizomewa katika viwanja vya ndege na umati wa watu na waliitwa watumwa katika maandamano yaliyoongozwa na chama cha Madaktari wa Brazili.

translation.en: Bolsonaro himself, at the time a congressman at the Chamber of Deputies, went to the Supreme Court demanding the program's suspension.
translation.swa: Bolsonaro mwenyewe wakati akiwa mbunge katika chemba ya Wasaidizi, alikwenda Mahakama Kuu akitaka mpango huo usitishwe.

translation.en: Both during his time as congressman and the presidential race, he repeatedly said that the program was slave work.
translation.swa: Katika nyakati zote mbili kama mbunge na katika kampeni zake za uraisi alirudia kusema kuwa mpango huo ulikuwa kazi ya utumwa.

translation.en: He's promised to send the doctors back to Cuba with the strike of a pen so that they could assist the the members of the Workers Party who will soon be sent to Guantanamo.
translation.swa: Aliahidi kuwarudisha madaktari Cuba kwa mkwaju wa kalamu wakawasaidie wanachama wa chama cha wafanyakazi ambao watapelekwa huko Guantanamo hivi karibuni.

translation.en: In a TV interview in July 2018, he said that no one has any proof of whether [the Cuban doctors] have any knowledge of medicine.
translation.swa: Katika mahojianio kwenye Tv hapo Julai 2018, alisema kuwa hakuna mtu mwenye ushahidi kuwa [madaktari wa Cuba] wana ujuzi wa utabibu.

translation.en: In its official pull out statement, Havana's said:
translation.swa: Katika taarifa yake rasmi ya kujitoa, Havana ilisema:

translation.en: The Brazilian people  who made the More Doctors program a success, who trusted the Cuban doctors from the beginning, who appreciated the respectful, sensitive and professional treatment they received  will understand who is responsible for our doctors being unable to continue providing support in the country.
translation.swa: Watu wa Brazili walioufanya mpango wa Madaktari Zaidi kufanikiwa, waliowaamini madaktari wa Cuba tangu awali, waliothamini na kuiheshimu huduma hii nyeti na ya kitaalamu wataelewa ni nani anawajibika kwa madaktari wetu kushindwa kuendelea kutoa huduma kwao.

translation.en: Bolsonaro responded on his social media channels that Havana simply didnt want to accept new terms: to relay the full salary back to its doctors and that they'd validate their medical diplomas in Brazil through an exam.
translation.swa: Bolsonaro alijibu katika mitandao yake ya kijamii kuwa Havana haikutaka kufuata masharti mapya: hawakutaka mshahara wote wapewe madaktari na Diploma zao za udaktari kuhakikiwa nchini Brazili kupitia mitihani.

translation.en: He called it an irresponsible decision by the Cuban dictatorship for disregarding the impact it would have on the lives of Brazilians.
translation.swa: Aliuita uamuzi wa Cuba kuwa uamuzi usio wa kuiajibikaji wa dikteta wa Cuba kwa kutokujali madhara yatakayotokea katika maisha ya Wabrazili.

translation.en: As journalist Leonardo Sakamoto writes, this could lead to the first social crisis in Bolsonaros government, and one that's unfolding even before he takes office.
translation.swa: Kama mwanahabari Leonardo Sakamoto alivyoandika, hili litaleta mgogoro wa kwanza wa kijamii katika utawala wa Bolsonaro na hili lilijionesha hata kabla hajachukua ofisi.

translation.en: Cubans make up 45 percent of the More Doctors professionals.
translation.swa: Cuba hutengeneza asilimia 45 ya watu wenye taaluma ya utabibu.

translation.en: Around 28 percent of Brazil's cities served by the program only count with one resident Cuban doctor.
translation.swa: Karibu asilimia 28 ya miji ya Brazili huudumuwa na mpango ambapo kuna mganga mkazi mmoja tu wa Cuba.

translation.en: Around 90 percent of the doctors working in indigenous areas in Brazil are Cubans.
translation.swa: Karibu asilimia 90 ya madaktari wanaofanya kazi katika maeneo ya vijijini huko Brazili ni Wacuba.

translation.en: Brazil problems, Cuban solutions
translation.swa: Matatizo ya Brazili, suluhu kwa Cuba.

translation.en: Five years ago, Brazil had a deficit of 54,000 doctors in its public health system.
translation.swa: Miaka mitano iliyipita, Brazili ilikuwa na upungufu wa madaktari 54,000 katika hospitali zake za umma.

translation.en: The country had 1,8 doctors for every 1,000 inhabitants.
translation.swa: Nchi ilikuwa na daktari 1,8 kwa wakazi 1000.

translation.en: For comparison, that rate is currently of 2,5 in the United States and 7,5 in Cuba.
translation.swa: Kwa kulinganisha na wastani  wa sasa wa 2,5 kwa Marekani na 7,5 kwa Cuba.

translation.en: Small towns in Brazil have always struggled to attract medical professionals, who complain about the lack of infrastructure.
translation.swa: Miji midogo ya Brazili imekuwa ikipambana kuwavutia watu wenye taaluma ya utabibu, ambao hulalamika kuhusu ukosefu wa miundo mbinu.

translation.en: Brazil also doesn't train enough doctors to serve its 200-million population.
translation.swa: Pia Brazil haisomeshi madaktari wa kutosha kuhudumia idadi wa watu Milioni 200.

translation.en: The small socialist nation, on the other hand, has doctors to spare.
translation.swa: Kwa upande mwingine, Taifa dogo la kisoshalisti lina daktari wa kutosha.

translation.en: Currently, Cuba has 50,000 health workers stationed in 67 countries.
translation.swa: Kwa sasa Cuba ina madaktari elfu 50,000 waliosambazwa katika nchi 67.

translation.en: Leasing of medical experts is Cuban's main export: they generate 11 billion US dollars in revenue to the state per year, more than tourism does.
translation.swa: Kukodisha madaktari ndio biashara kubwa ya Cuba: hutengeneza  dola za Marekani bilioni 11 katika pato la Taifa kwa mwaka, ni zaidi ya unavyofanya utalii.

translation.en: Cuban doctors arriving in Brazil in 2013.
translation.swa: Madaktari wa Cuba wakiwasili nchini Brazili mwaka 2013.

translation.en: Photo by Valter Campanato/Agência Brasil, CC BY 3.0
translation.swa: Picha na Valter Campanato/Agência Brasil, CC BY 3.0

translation.en: Cuba has sent its first medical brigade abroad in 1963, after the independence war in Algeria.
translation.swa: Cuba ilituma nje kikosi chake cha kwanza cha madaktari mwaka 1963, baada ya vita vya uhuru uko Algeria.

translation.en: Since then, according to a story by Radio Ambulante, almost 500,000 Cuban physicians have worked in Africa, Asia, and the Americas.
translation.swa: Kuanzia hapo, kupitia simulizi za Radio Ambulante, karibu matabibu 500,000 wa Cuba wameshafanya kazi Afrika, Asia na Marekani.

translation.en: Over the years, a few Cubans have told the Brazilian press that they felt exploited.
translation.swa: Baada ya miaka mingi, Wacuba wachache wameweza kuviambia vyombo vya habari vya Brazili kuwa walijisikia kunyonywa.

translation.en: Some have joined lawsuits against both governments as well as the WHO.
translation.swa: Baadhi yao wamefungua mashtaka dhidi ya serikali na WHO.

translation.en: Others have reported threats made by their government.
translation.swa: Wengine wametoa taarifa za vitisho kutoka katika serikali yao.

translation.en: However, many said in a podcast by Radio Ambulante that, even with Havana's retention of 75 percent of the wages, they don't think the salary is unfair.
translation.swa: Hata hivyo, wengi wamesema katika  mahojiano na Radio Ambulante kuwa, pamoja na Havana kuchukua asilimia 75 ya mishahara yao, hawaoni kama mshahara huo haukuwa wa haki.

translation.en: The results
translation.swa: Matokeo

translation.en: A study by the Federal University of Minas Gerais, which interviewed 14 thousand patients in 700 cities one year after More Doctors began, revealed a high level of satisfaction with the program: 85 percent said that healthcare in their regions were better or a lot better.
translation.swa: Utafiti uliofanywa na Chuo cha Federal cha Minas Gerais, ambapo waliohojiwa wagonjwa elfu 14 katika miji 700 mwaka mmoja baada ya mpango wa Madaktari Zaidi kuanza ilionyesha kuridhishwa kwa kiwango kikubwa na mpango huo ambapo, asilimia 85 walisema kuwa huduma za afya katika miji yao ilikuwa nzuri au nzuri sana.

translation.en: The participants highlighted poor infrastructure and the lack of medicines as unresolved problems.
translation.swa: Washiriki walionesha upungufu wa miundombinu na ukosefu wa dawa kama matatizo ambayo bado hayajapata ufumbuzi.

translation.en: Another study from Fundação Getúlio Vargas (FGV) shows that the program helped the government to reduce a third of its expenses with hospitalizations.
translation.swa: Utafiti mwingine kutoka Fundação Getúlio Vargas (FGV) unaonesha kuwa mpango huu uliiwezesha serikali kupunguza theluthi ya matumizi yake ya watu kulazwa Hospitali.

translation.en: Débora Mazetto, one of the economists who led the study, told BBC Brazil:
translation.swa: Débora Mazetto, mmoja ya wachumi walioongoza utafiti huo aliiambia BBC Brazil:

translation.en: There has been an improvement on the quality of the services offered to the population.
translation.swa: Kumekuwa na maboresho ya huduma zinazotolewa kwa jamii.

translation.en: Can you imagine a community that never had a doctor?
translation.swa: Je unaweza kuifikiria jamii ambayo haijawahi kuwa na daktari kabisa?

translation.en: With the rising numbers of appointments in areas that were complete unassisted before, it's now possible to identify and treat diseases faster, avoiding unnecessary hospitalizations.
translation.swa: Kuongezeka kwa waajiriwa katika maeneo ambayo yalikuwa yametelekezwa kwanza, imekuwa rahisi kugundua magonjwa na kuyatibu haraka na kuepuka kulazwa kusipo na sababu.

translation.en: What next?
translation.swa: Ni nini kitafuata?

translation.en: Since November 14, over 200 doctors have already returned to Cuba.
translation.swa: Tangu Novemba 14, zaidi ya madaktari 200 wamesharudi Cuba.

translation.en: The Pan American Health Organization expects that all of them will have returned by December 12.
translation.swa: Ifikapo Disemba 12, Wataalamu wote wa Taasisi ya Pan American Health Organization watakuwa wamesharudi.

translation.en: In many public clinics, people have found themselves without medical care this past week or were told that they'd only have a doctor available once a week from now on.
translation.swa: Katika kliniki nyingi za umma, watu wamejikuta wapo wenyewe bila msaada wa kitabibu  kwa wiki nzima iliyopita au waliambiwa daktari atakuwepo kwa wiki mara moja kuanzia sasa.

translation.en: Although the Brazilian government claims that 92 percent of the spots left vacant by the Cubans have already been filled, newspaper Folha de S. Paulo said this number might not mean much at the end of the day:
translation.swa: Ingawa serikali ya Brazili inadai kuwa asilimia 92 ya nafasi zilizoachwa wazi na Wacuba zimeshazibwa, gazeti la Folha de S. Paulo lilisema kuwa mwisho wa siku, namba hiyo inaweza isimaanishe chochote:

translation.en: In 2017, the Health Ministry opened a call to select Brazilians to More Doctors.
translation.swa: Mwaka 2017, Wizara ya Afya ilifungua mlango wa kuchaguwa waBrazili kwa ajili ya mpango wa Madaktari Zaidi.

translation.en: In total, 6,285 applied to 2,320 openings, but only 1,626 showed up to work.
translation.swa: Kwa ujumla watu 6,285 waliomba kazi katika nafasi 2,320 zilizokuwepo lakini ni 1,626 ndio walioripoti katika vituo vyao.

translation.en: Around 30 percent left their jobs before completing one year on them.
translation.swa: Karibu asilimia 30 waliacha kazi kabla ya kumaliza mwaka mmoja katika nafasi zao.

translation.en: As with many social programs in Brazil, More Doctors did have its gray areas, but it also dramatically changed public health in regions that were completely forgotten by the Brazilian state.
translation.swa: Kama mipango mingi ya kijamii ilivyo nchini Brazili, Madaktari Zaidi ulikuwa na kasoro zake lakini pia ilibadilisha haraka huduma za afya kwa umma katika maeneo ambayo yalikuwa yamesahauliwa kabisa na serikali ya Brazili.

translation.en: Perhaps the greatest challenge so far for the next government-elect is to learn from its mistakes and where it got it right.
translation.swa: Labda changamoto kubwa ambayo serikali ijayo inapaswa ijifunze wapi ilikosea na pale ilipofanya sawa.

translation.en: How, and if, Bolsonaros government will ensure healthcare is available in those regions is still to be seen.
translation.swa: Ni kwa namna gani, na ikiwa serikali ya Bolsonaro itahakikisha huduma za afya katika maeneo hayo zinapatikana na zinaonekana.

translation.swa: Baghdad.

translation.swa: Picha ya  MohammadHuzam [CC BY-SA 4.0 (https://creativecommons.org/licenses/by-sa/4.0)].

translation.en: Human rights groups and activists are urging the Iraqi parliament to withdraw a controversial cybercrime bill that would greatly restrict freedom of expression online, if adopted.
translation.swa: Makundi ya  Haki za Binadamu na Wanaharakati wanashauri Bunge la Irak kutupilia mbali Muswada wa makosa ya Mtandaoni ambao utazuia sana uhuru wa kutoa maoni mtandaoni kama utapitishwa.

translation.en: The bill imposes long prison sentences for speech-related offences that are only vaguely defined in the text of the bill.
translation.swa: Muswada unaweka hukumu ya kifungo kirefu cha gerezani kwa makosa yanayotokana na kauli ambazo hazikuelezwa vizuri katika mswada huo.

translation.en: Article 3 prescribes a lifetime prison sentence and steep fines for those convicted of using computers and the internet to undermine the independence, the integrity and safety of the country, or its supreme economic, political, military, or security interests or to provoke sectarian strife, disturbing the security and public order, or harming the reputation of the country.
translation.swa: Ibara ya 3 inatamka kifungo cha Maisha jela na faini kali kwa wale wanaokutwa na hatia kwa kutumia kompyuta na mtandao  kudhoofisha uhuru,  uadilifu na amani ya nchi, au Uchumi wake, Siasa, jeshi au maslahi ya nchi au  kusababisha ugomvi wa kidini, kuvuruga amani na utulivu, au kuharibu heshima ya nchi.

translation.en: Articles 4 and 6 impose the same punishments for those convicted of promoting terrorist acts and ideas (Art.4) or publish[ing] or broadcast[ing] false or misleading facts with the intention of weakening confidence in the electronic financial system (Art.6.)
translation.swa: Ibara ya 4 na 6 zinaweka adhabu kama hiyo kwa wale watakaokutwa na hatia ya kuchochea  vitendo vya kigaidi na kuwa na mawazo ya namna hiyo (Ibara 4) au Kuchapisha au kutangaza taarifa za uongo au za kupotosha  zenye nia ya kudhoofisha uimara wa mfumo wa fedha wa kielektroniki  (Ibara ya 6.)

translation.en: Earlier this year, the Gulf Centre for Human Rights warned:
translation.swa: Mapema mwaka huu, kituo cha Haki za Binadamu cha Gulf kilitahadharisha :

translation.en: Without a clear and explicit definition of terrorism, it would be easy to use the law to liquidate the resources of political opponents and other activists.
translation.swa: Bila kuwepo maana iliyo wazi ya ugaidi, itakuwa rahisi kutumia sheria hiyo kufilisi rasilimali za wapinzani wakisiasa na wanaharakati wengine.

translation.en: Internet-related rights are already on shaky ground in Iraq.
translation.swa: Haki za mtandaoni tayari zinakiukwa Irak.

translation.en: Last summer, authorities responded to protests denouncing corruption and dire living conditions in Basra and other cities by shutting down the internet.
translation.swa: Majira ya kiangazi yaliyopita, mamalaka zilijibu  maandamano kukemea rushwa na Maisha ya anasa katika Basra na miji mingine kwa kuzima  mtandao.

translation.en: If adopted, the bill will only make it harder for Iraqis to exercise their rights to communicate, speak freely and access information online.
translation.swa: Kama utapitishwa, mswada huo utafanya iwe vigumu kwa Wairaki kutumia haki zao za kuwasiliana, kuongea kwa uhuru na kupata habari mtandaoni.

translation.en: Earlier this month, nine human rights groups including AccessNow, Amnesty International and the the Iraqi Observatory for Human Rights published a statement urging the Iraqi parliament to withdraw the bill:
translation.swa: Mapema mwezi huu, makundi tisa ya haki za binadamu pamoja na AccessNow, Amnesty International na waangalizi wa haki za binadamu walichapisha  kauli ya kuliomba bunge la Irak kutupilia mbali mswaada huo.

translation.en: the law will result in Internet users becoming fearful of exercising their fundamental rights and freedoms online, and will empty the right to freedom of expression of its substance.
translation.swa: Sheria hii itawafanya watumiaji wa mtandao kuwa waoga katika kutumia haki zao za msingi na uhuru wa kutumia mtandao na itaondoa haki ya kutoa maoni.

translation.en: The law would also have far-reaching effects on the enjoyment of the rights to freedom of information as well as the right to participation in public affairs in Iraq.
translation.swa: Pia, sheria ina athari kubwa katika kufurahia haki na uhuru wa habari na haki ya kushiriki katika mambo ya umma katika nchi ya Irak.

translation.en: The parliament was scheduled to debate the bill on March 14, but it was later removed from the day's schedule.
translation.swa: Bunge lilitazamia kujadili mswada huo tarehe 4 Machi, lakini baadaye uliondolewa.

translation.en: On Twitter, the official account for the Iraqi Council of Representatives thanked those who contacted it to criticise some laws, but did not specify which laws.
translation.swa: Katika akaunti ya Twita ya Afisa wa Baraza la Bunge la Irak aliwashukuru  wale wote waliofanya mawasiliano ili kukosoa baadhi ya sheria, lakini hawakuweka bayana ni sheria zipi.

translation.en: Rights groups and activists welcomed this response, but they remain wary.
translation.swa: Makundi ya haki za binadamu na wanaharakati walipokea jibu hilo kwa furaha, lakini bado wana wasiwasi.

translation.en: Small victory: Campaigning by human rights activists, journalists on #Iraq and local and Intl NGOs successfully removed the draft cybercrime law from @parliamentiqs schedule.
translation.swa: Ushindi mdogo: Kutokana na kampeni iliyofanywa na wanaharakati wa haki za binadamu, waandishi wa habari wa Irak ndani na nje na Mashirika yasio ya kiserikali kufanikiwa kuondolewa kwa rasimu ya uharifu mtandaoni kutoka ratiba ya Bunge .

translation.en: Next step, withdraw the draft law altogether!
translation.swa: hatua inayofuata nikuondolewa kwa rasimu ya sharia kwa pamoja!

translation.en: It remains unclear if the parliament will introduce changes to the bill or when it will be scheduled for debate again.
translation.swa: Haijaeleweka vizuri kama Bunge litaufanyia marekebisho mswada huo au kuupanga tena ili ujadiliwe

translation.en: Since December 2018, protests in Sudan that sparked over the tripled price of bread have turned into nationwide protests against the nearly three-decade rule regime of Omar Al Bashir.
translation.swa: Tangu Disemba 2018, maandamano yaliyoanza kwa sababu ya ongezeko la bei ya mkate yamekuwa ya kitaifa yakiupinga uongozi wa Omar Al Bashir uliodumu karibu miongo mitatu.

translation.en: Finally, on Thursday, April 11, 2019, Bashir was forced to step down.
translation.swa: Mwishowe, siku ya Alhamisi 11 Aprili 2019, Bashir alilazimishwa kujiuzulu.

translation.en: AL-BASHIR IS OUT, WE DID IT !!!
translation.swa: AL-BASHIR AMETOKA, TUMEFANIKIWA !!!

translation.en: #Sudan
translation.swa: #Sudan

translation.en: Bashir's government has used repressive tactics and measures to quell the protests.
translation.swa: Serikali ya Bashir ilitumia mbinu kandamizi kuzima maandamano hayo.

translation.en: More than 40 protesters have been killed, hundreds detained and tortured.
translation.swa: Zaidi ya waandamanaji 40 wameuawa, mamia wakiwekwa vizuizini na kuteswa.

translation.en: The brutal response did not stop women from placing themselves firmly at the heart of the protests.
translation.swa: Pamoja na mashambulizi ya kikatili, wanawake hawakuwa nyuma kwa kujiweka imara katikati ya moyo wa maandamano hayo.

translation.en: There is no amount of beating or detention that could make us stop.
translation.swa: Hakuna kiwango cha vipigo au vizuizi vingeweza kutufanya tuache maandamano.

translation.en: These women and many more like them, are leading the huge protests against Sudan's President Omar al-Bashir.#SudanProtests
translation.swa: Wanawake hawa na wengine kama hawa, wanaongoza maandamano makubwa dhidi ya Rais wa Sudan Omar Al Bashiri.#MaandamanoSudan

translation.en: Today in Sudan we walk for women.
translation.swa: Leo nchini Sudan tunaandamana kwa ajili ya wanawake.

translation.en: Incarcerated women.
translation.swa: Wanawake waliovifungoni.

translation.en: Revolutionary women.
translation.swa: Wanawake Wanamapinduzi.

translation.en: Oppressed women.
translation.swa: Wanawake waliokandamizwa.

translation.en: Refugee women.
translation.swa: Wanawake ambao ni wakimbizi.

translation.en: War torn women, raped, battered and beat women.
translation.swa: Wanawake walioharibiwa na vita, walibakwa, waliopigwa na kunyanyaswa.

translation.en: Women who are too loud and too brave for a country made for men.
translation.swa: Wanawake ambao wanasauti kubwa na ya ujasiri kwa ajili ya nchi iliyojengwa kwa ajili ya wanaume.

translation.en: They lead the march chanting a Zagrouda, an ululation commonly used by women in the Arab world to express celebration.
translation.swa: Waliongoza maandamano hayo wakiimba Zagrouda, namna ya ushangiliaji ambao hufanywa na wanawake katika ulimwengu wa Waarabu kuonesha furaha.

translation.en: Zagrouda (or the womens chant) has become the calling code for every protest in the street.
translation.swa: Zagrouda (au wimbo wa wanawake) umekuwa ndio ishara ya kuita watu katika maandamano yoyotehuko mitaani kwa sasa.

translation.en: When people hear these womens voices, they know its the revolution call and that its time to start their march.
translation.swa: Watu wakisikia sauti hizi za wanawake, wanajua ni sauti ya mapinduzi na ndio muda wa kuanza maandamano.

translation.en: During the month of March, women wore the traditional white thobe in support of the protests and women's rights.
translation.swa: Wakati wa mwezi Machi, wanawake walivaa nguo nyeupe za kitamaduni,  thobe katika kuwaunga mkono waandamanaji na haki za wanawake.

translation.en: Social media platforms filled with pictures of female protesters wearing the white robe, using the hashtag  #whitemarch (#_)
translation.swa: Majukwaa ya mitandao ya kijamii yalijaa picha za waandamanaji wa kike wakiwa wamevaa nguo nyeupe, wakitumia hashitagi #Maandamanomeupe (#_)

translation.en: Happy International Womens Day.
translation.swa: Heri ya Siku ya Wanawake Kimataifa.

translation.en: Impact Hub Khartoum Family
translation.swa: Familia ya Kitovu cha mabadiliko Khartoum

translation.en: Women who protest regularly face police brutality.
translation.swa: Wanawake ambao huandamana mara nyingi hupambana na ukatili wa polisi.

translation.en: Authorities have fired tear gas and live ammunition and have even threatened with rape.
translation.swa: Mamlaka zimeshawafyatulia gesi za kutoa machozi na risasi za moto na walishawahi kuwatishia kuwabaka.

translation.en: Women have also reportedly been beaten, their faces have been branded and their hair cut off inside detention centers.
translation.swa: Imeripotiwa wanawake wanapigwa, wanawekwa alama usoni na nywele zao kukatwa wakiwa ndani ya vituo vya mahabusu.

translation.en: Every day new footage of Sudanese women getting beaten and humiliated circulates on social media:
translation.swa: Kila siku video mpya za wanawake wa Kisudani wakiwa wanapigwa na kudhalilishwa zimekuwa zikisambazwa katika mitandao ya jamii:

translation.en: Excessive brutality against elderly and women by police force in Khartoum North
translation.swa: Ukatili wa kutisha dhidi ya wazee na wanawake unaofanywa na polisi huko Kaskazini mwa Khartoum

translation.en: But the same hashtags are also used to show the bravery of women in Sudan.
translation.swa: Lakini pia hashitagi hizo hizo zimekuwa zikitumika kuonesha ushujaa wa wanawake wa Sudan.

translation.en: #SupportSudan
translation.swa: #UngamkonoSudan

translation.en: Video showing a Sudanese girl throwing tear gas canister back at the security forces.
translation.swa: Video ikimuonesha msichana wa Kisudani akirusha kopo la gesi ya machozi kuwarudishia vyombo vya Ulinzi.

translation.en: #Sudan ese girls and women have shown bravery beyond belief during the #Sudanuprising.
translation.swa: #WasichanawaKisudani na wanawake wameonesha ujasiri kinyume na matarajio wakati wa #MaandamanoSudan.

translation.en: This week, a photo and a video from the protests have gone viral.
translation.swa: Wiki hii, picha na video kutoka kwenye maandamano imesambaa mitandaoni.

translation.en: A 22-year-old engineering and architecture student named Alaa Salah raised her right arm as she led the crowd in a chant called Thawra (Arabic for revolution).
translation.swa: Msichana wa miaka 22, mwanafunzi wa uhandisi anayeitwa Alaa Salah aliinua mkono wake wa kuume huku akiongoza umati wa watu kuimba Thawra (Kiarabu linamaanisha Mapinduzi).

translation.en: The video and photo would end up going viral and Sudanese activists are now referring to her as Kandaka, the title given to Nubian queens of ancient Sudan.
translation.swa: Video na picha zingeweza kuishia kuenea mtandoni lakini wanaharakati wa Sudani wameanza kumwita Kandaka, jina walilopewa malkia wa Wanubi wa Sudani ya kale.

translation.en: Dont know her name, but this Woman in #Sudan is leading rallies, standing on car roofs, and pleading for change against autocratic Bashir.
translation.swa: Simfahamu jina lake, lakini huyu mwanamke katika #Sudan anaongoza maandamano, akiwa amesimama juu ya gari na akihimiza kuhusu mabadiliko dhidi ya dikteta Bashir.

translation.en: Here she is singing Thawra (Revolution).
translation.swa: Hapa akiimba Thawra (Mapinduzi).

translation.en: Illustrations shared on social networks transformed Salah into the Sudanese Statue of Liberty.
translation.swa: Michoro iliyoshirikiswa katika mitandao ya kijamii imemgeuza Salah kuwa Mnara wa Uhuru wa Sudan.

translation.en: If one day I have a #daughter, I want her to be just like her #AlaaSalah 22 year old engineering and architecture student chanting and leading protest in #Khartoum she is now a symbol of #Sudanese #Revolution and became the voice of #WomenRevolutions #Sudan #WomenLove #Peace
translation.swa: Siku moja nikajaliwa kupata #mtotowakike, ninataka awe kama Salah #AlaaSalah mwenye miaka 22 na mwanafunzi wa Uhandisi akiimba na kuongoza maandamano huko #Khartoum kwa sasa amekuwa alama ya #Mapinduzi #Sudan na amekuwa sauti ya #MapinduziYaWanawake wa #Sudan #UpendoWaWanawake #Amani

translation.en: From the streets to the screen
translation.swa: Kutoka mtaani mpaka Runingani

translation.en: Behind the screen, Facebook groups once dominated by conversations about marriage and crushes are now used to expose police brutality.
translation.swa: Nyuma ya runinga, ni vikundi vya Facebook ambavyo vilishawahi kutawaliwa na mijadala kuhusu ndoa na michepuko, kwa sasa vinatumika kuonesha ukatili wa polisi.

translation.en: The women in these groups disclose videos and pictures of abusive security forces.
translation.swa: Wanawake katika makundi haya wametoa video na picha za mamlaka katili za ulinzi.

translation.en: When the identity is revealed, the agent concerned is often beaten up and chased out of town.
translation.swa: Huwa Wakishatambulika, muhusika hupigwa na hufukuzwa nje ya mji.

translation.en: The impact of these groups is remarkable  many security agents are now hiding their faces.
translation.swa: Athari za makundi haya imeonekana  maajenti wengi wa usalama kwa sasa wanaficha nyuso zao.

translation.en: The Sudanese authorities have tried to block social media in the country, but the women bypass the blockade by using Virtual Private Networks (VPN), which can hide a user's location.
translation.swa: Mamlaka za Sudani zimejaribu kuzima mitandao ya kijamii nchini, lakini wanawake walivuka kikwazo hicho kwa kutumia (VPN) Virtual Private Networks, ambapo huficha eneo la mtumiaji.
