translation.en: Female painters, digital artists, and musicians have produced works of art to complement street protests.
translation.swa: Wachoraji wa kike, wapiga picha na wanamuziki walitengeneza kazi za sanaa kupongeza waandamanaji mtaani.

translation.en: They use art to honor the endurance of the people, especially women.
translation.swa: Walitumia sanaa kuenzi uvumilivu wa watu, hasa wanawake.

translation.en: They make art to document the events and portraits of the victims and depict the reality of living under an oppressive system.
translation.swa: Walitumia sanaa kutunza matukio na picha za wahanga na kuonesha uhalisia wa kuishi chini ya mamlaka kandamizi.

translation.en: Women are front, left and center of the revolution.
translation.swa: Wanawake wako mstari wa mbele, kushoto na ni kitovu cha mapinduzi.

translation.en: When people started protesting, they were like, Women should stay at home.
translation.swa: Wakati watu walipoanza maandaman, walikuwa kama wanasema wanawake wanatakiwa kubaki nyumbani.

translation.en: But we were like  no said Islam Elbeiti a 24-year-old jazz bass player.
translation.swa: Lakini ilikuwa kama tumesema hapana  alisena Islam Elbeiti mwanamuziki wa Jazz mwenye miaka 24.

translation.en: Fighting for women's rights in Sudan
translation.swa: Kupigania haki za wanawake Sudan

translation.en: On March 12, the emergency court of appeals in Sudan, amid pressure from families of the women who rallied outside the courthouse, scrapped the flogging punishment of nine female Sudanese protesters that were sentenced to 20 lashes and one month in prison for rioting.
translation.swa: Machi 12 mahakama ya dharura ya Sudan ilikutana na msukosuko wa maandamano nje ya mahakama kutoka kwa familia za wanawake hao, na kuahirisha adhabu ya viboko kwa wanawake tisa ambao walikuwa wamehukumiwa viboko 20 na kifungo cha mwezi mmoja kwa kosa la kuandamana.

translation.en: Flogging is a common form of punishment particularly for women in Sudan  they risk flogging for crimes like indecent clothing or adultery.
translation.swa: Kuchapwa viboko ni mojawapo ya adhabu hasa kwa wanawake huko Sudan, na hutolewa kwa makosa kama vile kuvaa nguo zisizo za heshima au uzinzi.

translation.en: In 2014, a woman was sentenced to death for marrying a non-Muslim, which is considered adultery.
translation.swa: Mwaka 2014, mwanamke mmoja, alihukumiwa kifo kwa kosa la kuolewa na mwanaume asiye muislamu, kitendo kinachochukuliwa kama uzinzi.

translation.en: In 2015, a woman was lashed 75 times for marrying a man without her father's consent.
translation.swa: Mwaka 2015, mwanamke huyo alichapwa viboko 75 kwa kosa la kuolewa bila idhini ya baba yake.

translation.en: In 2017, 24 women were arrested for wearing trousers, a violation of the country's strict Shari'a Law.
translation.swa: Mwaka 2017, wanawake 24 walikamatwa kwa kosa la kuvaa suruali, ikiwa ni kinyume na sheria kali za Sharia.

translation.en: Sometimes the brutality goes beyond flogging: Many Sudanese women have been sentenced to death by stoning.
translation.swa: Wakati mwingine ukatili huu huwa zaidi ya viboko: Wanawake wengi wa Sudan wamehukumiwa kifo kwa kupigwa mawe.

translation.en: According to Reuters, Bashir defended his position on strict adherence to Shari'a law in Sudan in 2011:
translation.swa: Kukingana na Reuters, Bashir aliitetea nafasi yake kwa kuikubali Sharia nchini Sudani mwaka 2011:

translation.en: We want to present a constitution that serves as a template to those around us.
translation.swa: Tunataka tuwe na katiba ambayo inakidhi mahitaji yetu na wale wanaotuzunguka.

translation.en: And our template is clear, a 100 percent Islamic constitution, without communism or secularism or Western (influences).
translation.swa: Na mahitaji yetu yako wazi, katiba ya Kiislamu kwa asilimia 100% bila kuchanganya mambi ya ujamaa, au mambo ya dunia au umagharibi (ustaarabu)

translation.en: The Sudanese Penal code, which is based on an interpretation of the Shari'a (Islamic Law) allows girls as young as 10 to get married, and states that a woman's rape by her husband cannot be qualified as such.
translation.swa: Vifungu vya adhabu nchini Sudan ambavyo hutafsiriwa kutoka kwenye Sharia (Sheria ya Kiislamu) inaruhusu wasichana wenye miaka 10 kuolewa, na inasema kuwa mke kubakwa na mumewe haiwezi kuchukuliwa kuwa ni kosa.

translation.en: On top of that, women have to face morality laws that chain them and oppress them on a daily basis.
translation.swa: Pamoja na hayo, wanawake wanakumbana nasheria za maadili ambazo zinawafunga na kuwakandamiza katika maisha yao ya kila siku.

translation.en: For this reason, Sudanese women are on the front lines of the protests, fighting for change.
translation.swa: Kwa sababu hizi, wanawake wa Sudan wako mstari wa mbele katika maandamano wakipigania mabadiliko.

translation.en: Cyclone Idai devastates Zimbabwe, Malawi, Mozambique and South Africa with massive flooding, rocks, and mudslides.
translation.swa: Kimbunga Idai kimefanya uharibifu Zimbambwe,, Malawi, Mozambique na Afrika Kusini kikisababisha mafuriko makubwa, kungoka mawena matope kuporomoka.

translation.en: Image of flooding in Mozambique, shared widely on social media.
translation.swa: Picha ya mafuriko katika nchi ya Msumbiji, iliyotumwa kwenye mitandao ya kijamii.

translation.en: Tropical Cyclone Idai has left a devastating trail of destruction and death after sweeping through Mozambique, Malawi and Zimbabwe in Southern Africa.
translation.swa: Kimbunga aina Idai kinachosababishwa na hali ya kitropiki kimeacha uharibifu mkubwa na vifo baada ya kuzikumba nchi za kusini mwa Afrika za Msumbiji, Malawi na Zimbambwe.

translation.en: At least 162 people have lost their lives so far in the devastating storm across region.
translation.swa: Hadi sasa inakadiriwa katika nchi hizo  watu 162 wamepoteza Maisha katika kimbunga hicho.

translation.en: In Mozambique, the city of Beira has been nearly entirely wiped out.
translation.swa: Kimefanya uharibifu mkubwa karibu jiji lote la Beira, nchini Msumbiji.

translation.en: At least 89 people have died in Zimbabwe alone, amid fears of a higher figure, in Manicaland's Chimanimani district, located 406 kilometers east of Zimbabwe's capital, Harare, as homes and bridges were swept away by a tropical storm that began on Friday.
translation.swa: Inakadiliwa  watu 89  wamekufa katika nchi ya Zimbabwe tu, huku kukiwa na hofu ya takwimu ya juu katika eneo la Manicaland ya wilaya  Chimanimani ambayo ipo kilometa  406 mMashariki mwa mji mkuu wa Harare, Zimbabwe huku nyumba na madaraja yakiwa yamebebwa na dhoruba iliyoanza Ijumaa.

translation.en: More than 300 people are missing according to the government.
translation.swa: Kutokana na taarifa ya serikali zaidi ya watu 300 hawaonikani

translation.en: The United Nations in Zimbabwe said that more than 8,000 people have been affected by the flooding in the eastern parts of the country.
translation.swa: Umoja wa Mataifa katika Zimbabwe ulisema kuwa zaidi ya watu 8,000 wameathiliwa na mafuriko katika pande za mashariki mwa nchi hiyo.

translation.en: Sadly lives have been lost and properties destroyed, United Nations Zimbabwe said in a tweet:
translation.swa: Inasikitisha Maisha ya wtu yamepotea na mali zimeharibiwa, Umoja wa Mataifa Zimbambwe ulituma ujumbe wake kupitia twiita:

translation.en: According to the government, Cyclone Idai hit the Ngangu Township are in Chimanimani the hardest where most lives were lost.
translation.swa: Kutokana na taarifa ya serikali, kimbunga Idai kilipiga sana mji wa Ngangu katika Chimanimani ambapo watu wengi wamepoteza maisha.

translation.en: Over a hundred houses were damaged by falling mud and rocks.
translation.swa: Zaidi ya nyumba elfu moja ziliharibiwa kwa kuangukiwa na udongo na mawe.

translation.en: The storm originated in the Indian Ocean and led to a torrential rainstorm which commenced in Mozambique on Thursday, with wind speeds of about 160 kilometers per hour, reportedly causing ocean waves of up to 9 meters high.
translation.swa: Kimbuka hicho kilitokea katika bahari ya Hindi na kuambatana na mvua nyingi iliyoanza kunyesha Msumbiji Alhamisi ikiambatana na upepo uliovuma kwa mwendokasi wa kilometa 160 kwa saa, inalipotiwa ulisababisha mawimbi ya bahari yenye ukubwa wa meta  kwenda juu.

translation.en: The police and military have been deployed to assist in the evacuation of victims.
translation.swa: Jeshi  na polisi vimetumika kusaidia katika uokoaji wa majeruhi.

translation.en: Visibility, according to the Information ministry, has significantly improved and this will help airforce helicopters to evacuate more people.
translation.swa: Kutokana na taarifa ya Waziri,  mvua imeacha kuonyesha na hali ya kuonekana wazi ni nzuri  na hii itasaidia jeshi la anga kutumia helikopita kuokoa watu zaidi.

translation.en: Local government minister July Moyo said that bodies are currently being seen floating in rivers and nothing much can be done at the moment.
translation.swa: July Moyo, Waziri wa mambo ya ndani alisema  kwamba miili inaonekana ikiwa inaelea katika mito na hakuna linguine linaloweza kufanyika kwa sasa.

translation.en: Roads, bridges and telephones are currently cut off and hundreds of homes destroyed.
translation.swa: Barabara, madaraja na miundombinu ya simu kwa sasa vimekatika na mamia ya nyumba zimeharibika.

translation.en: Country director for the International Red Cross (IRC) Zimbabwe Paolo Cernuschi said the IRC teams in Zimbabwe are trying to reach communities affected by the cyclone but the infrastructure damage is severe and the teams couldn't reach Chimanimani or Chipinge.
translation.swa: Paolo Cernuschi, Mkurugenzi wa nchi wa shirika la msalaba mwekundu International (IRC) katika Zimbabwe alisema timu ya IRC katika Zimbabwe inajaribu kuzifikia jamii zilizoathiriwa na Kimbunga lakini uharibifu wa miundombinu ni mkubwa sana na timu hiyo imeshindwa kufika Chimanimani au Chipinge.

translation.en: Urgent road repairs in progress so we will try again in the morning, said Cernuschi.
translation.swa: Kuna matengenezo ya haraka ya barabara yanaendelea, kwa hiyo tutajaribu tena kesho Asubuhi, alisema Cernuschi.

translation.en: The Zimbabwe government held an inter-ministerial committee on Sunday morning and subsequently set up 10 subcommittees to deal with hard-hit areas.
translation.swa: Siku ya Jumapili asubuhi, serikali ya Zimbambe ilikutana na Kamati ya wizara zote, na baadayae iliunda Kamati ndogodogo 10 zitakazoshughulikia maeneo yaliyoharibiwa sana.

translation.en: Committees will deal with areas related to food security, resource mobilization, safety and shelter, transport, water and sanitation among other critical areas.
translation.swa: Kamati zitashughulikia maeneo ya chakula, rasilimali fedha, usalama na malazi, usafiri, maji na usafi wa mazingira.

translation.en: An official with the Meteorological Services Department said that the cyclone has weakened greatly and shifted from eastern to northeastern areas of Zimbabwe.
translation.swa: Afisa wa Idara ya huduma za hali ya hewa alisema kwamba kimbunga kilidhoofishwa na kuhamia kutoka mashariki kuelekea maeneo ya kusini ya Zimbabwe.

translation.en: Up to 200 millimeters of rainfall was recorded in Chipinge [located in eastern Zimbabwe], 118 millimeters north of Chipinge, and 102 millimeters in Buhera [southeastern Zimbabwe], said the official.
translation.swa: Hadi mililita 200 za mvua zimenyesha Chipinge [eneo lililopo mashariki mwa Zimbabwe], 118 mililita kaskazini mwa Chipinge, na 102 mililita katika Buhera [eneo la kusini mwa Zimbabwe], Afisa alisema .

translation.en: He warned that the eastern highlands of the country should still expect floods due to the torrential rains and advised the public to avoid traveling there.
translation.swa: Alitahadharisha kuwa nyanda za juu mashariki mwa nchi bado zinategemewa kuwa na mafuriko kutokana na mvua nyingi inayonyesha na alishauri umma kuepuka kusafiri kule

translation.en: Not much precipitation was expected on Monday, with light rainfall and better weather conditions expected to commence on Monday.
translation.swa: Hakuna ukungu wala mvua vilivyotegemewa siku ya Jumatatu hata hivyo hali ya hewa nzuri inategemewa kuanza.

translation.en: Recovery efforts will be long term and relief efforts are underway.
translation.swa: Juhudi za kurekebisha uharibifu zitahitajika kwa muda mrefu na harakati za kutoa misaada kwa waathirka zinaendelea.

translation.en: Screenshot of a TV5Monde anchor (right) discussing 2018 general election contestants Felix Tshisekedi (center) and Joseph Kabila (left).
translation.swa: Picha iliyopigwa kutoka kwenye  TV5Monde ikionesha (kutoka kulia) wagombea katika uchaguzi mkuu 2018 wakijadili  Felix Tshisekedi (Katikati) na Joseph Kabila (kushoto).

translation.en: Via YouTube.
translation.swa: Kupitia  YouTube.

translation.en: The Democratic Republic of Congos constitutional court announced last month Felix Tshisekedi as the country's newly elected president, rejecting a legal challenge filed by runner-up Martin Fayulu who claims the vote was fraudulent.
translation.swa: Mwezi Januari mahakama ya Jamhuri ya kidemokrasia ya Congo ilimtangaza Felix Tshisekedi kuwa ni Rais mteule mpya wa Congo, ikitupilia mbali shauri  lililofunguliwa na mshindi wa pili Martin Fayulu ambaye alidai kulikuwepo ulaghai katika kura.

translation.en: The DR Congo held fiercely contested general elections in late December 2018 after the incumbent, President Joseph Kabila, who ruled for 18 years, was constitutionally barred from running for a third term.
translation.swa: Mwishoni mwa mwezi Disemba mwaka jana Jamhuri ya Kidemokrasia ya Kongo ilikuwa na uchaguzi mkuu uliokuwa na upinzani mkubwa baada ya Rais wa wakati huo Joseph Kabila kuitawala Kongo kwa miaka 18 na kukosa sifa kikatiba ya kugombea  nafasi ya urais kwa kipindi cha tatu.

translation.en: The election was anticipated to be the DR Congos first democratic transfer of power in 59 years of independence, but has been mired in controversy since the December 30 vote.
translation.swa: Uchaguzi huo ulitabiriwa kuwa  wa kwanza wa kubadilishana madaraka kidemokrasia kwa miaka 59 tangu Kongo ipate uhuru, lakini uchaguzi huo ulighubikwa na mabishano tangu siku ya kupiga kura tarehe 30 Disemba.

translation.en: Frontrunner Martin Fayulu of the Engagement for Citizenship and Development party.filed a court challenge claiming the votes to be rigged against him.
translation.swa: Mgombea aliyetegemewa kuibuka na ushindi Martin Fayulu wa chama cha uzalendo na Maendeleo alishtaki mahakamani akidai kura zake ziliibiwa.

translation.en: He and others believe a deal was made by Tshisekedi of the Union for Democracy and Social Progress, or UDSP, and President Kabila of the ruling Common Front for Congo party, or FCC.
translation.swa: Yeye na wanachama wake waliamini ni mpango uliofanywa kati ya Tshisekedi wa chama cha  Umoja wa Demokrasia na Maendeleo ya wananchi, au UDSP na Rais Joseph Kabila wa chama kinachotawala cha Umoja wa Wakongo au FCC.

translation.en: On January 19, 2019, the court rejected Fayulus request for failure to prove his assertions beyond a reasonable doubt.
translation.swa: Tarehe 19 Januari 2019, Mahakama ilitupilia mbali madai ya Fayulu kwa kushindwa kuthibitisha madai yake bila kutia shaka.

translation.en: According to the Independent National Electoral Commission, Tshisekedi received 38.5 percent of the vote while Martin Fayulu, of the Lamuka opposition alliance, obtained 34.7 percent and loyal hardliner Emmanuel Ramazani Shadary garnered 23.8 percent.
translation.swa: Kutokana na Tume Huru ya Uchaguzi,  Tshisekedi  alipata asilimia 38.5  ya kura wakati Martin Fayulu wa umoja wa vyama vya upinzani Lamuka, alipata asilimia  34.7 na Mwaminifu  Emmanuel Ramazani Shadary alivuna asilimia 23.8.

translation.en: Voter participation was less than half at around 47.6 percent.
translation.swa: Mahudhurio ya wapiga kura yalikuwa ni asilimia 47.6 chini ya nusu ya wapiga kura wote.

translation.en: Following the announcement, celebrations commenced at party headquarters in Kinshasa, the capital.
translation.swa: Baada ya kutangazwa, shangwe za sherehe zilianzia makao makuu ya chama katika mji mkuu Kinshasa.

translation.en: Among several heads of state in Africa, South African President Cyril Ramaphosa congratulated Tshisekedi and the United Republic of Tanzania's President John Magufuli also tweeted his congratulations.
translation.swa: Miongoni mwa marais wa nchi za Afrika; Rais wa Afrika ya Kusini Cyrill Ramaphosa alimpongeza Tshisekedi na Rais wa Jamhuri ya Muungano wa Tanzania John Magufuli alituma ujumbe wake wa kumpongeza kupitia twiita.

translation.en: Despite initial disagreement among African Union members about the election outcome, the AU has welcomed Tshisekedi, who gave his maiden speech to the union on February 10 to warm reception.
translation.swa: Ingawa kulikuwa na kutokukubaliana na matokeo ya uchaguzi miongoni mwa wanachama wa Umoja wa Afrika, Umoja huo (AU) umempongeza na kumkaribisha Tshisekedi ambaye alitoa hotuba yake ya kwanza kwa umoja huo tarehe 10 Februari kushukuru ukaribisho.

translation.en: But two months after the disputed elections, many fear that this transition of power was staged carefully to ensure that Kabila holds onto power through backstage agreements with Tshisekedi.
translation.swa: Lakini miezi miwili baada ya uchaguzi huo wa mgogoro, wengi wanahofia kwamba kubadilishana madaraka kulifanywa kwa umakini kuhakikisha kwamba  Kabila anaendelea kuwa madarakani  kupitia makubaliano aliyoyafanya na Tshisekedi.

translation.en: Who is Tshisekedi?
translation.swa: Tshisekedi ni nani?

translation.en: Félix Antoine Tshilombo Tshisekedi was born in Léopoldville on June 13, 1963.
translation.swa: Félix Antoine Tshilombo Tshisekedi alizaliwa Léopoldville tarehe  13 Juni, 1963.

translation.en: His father, Etienne Tshisekedi, dominated Congolese politics as the founder of UDPS  the largest opposition party.
translation.swa: Baba yake ni Etienne Tshisekedi, ambaye alitawala sana siasa za Kongo kama mwanzilishi wa chama cha  UDPS  ambacho ni chama kikubwa cha upinzani.

translation.en: Due to his fathers opposition politics, the family was exiled internally to their home town, Kasai, and in the 1980s,
translation.swa: Kutokana na siasa za upinzani za baba yake, familia uliwekwa   uhamishoni kwa nguvu katika mji walimokuwa wanaishi wa Kasai miaka ya 1980.

translation.en: Tshisekedi traveled with his father to Belgium, where he earned a diploma in accounting in 1987.
translation.swa: Baadaye Tshisekedi alisafiri na baba yake kuelekea Ubelgiji , ambapo alihitimu stashahda ya uhasibu mwaka 1987.

translation.en: He earned several other degrees between 1991-2001 and worked in marketing.
translation.swa: Kati ya miaka ya 1991-2001 alipata shahada mbalimbali na kufanya kazi katika idara ya masoko.

translation.en: While in Belgium, Tshisekedi turned to politics, like his father, and became the national secretary for external relations of the UDPS in 2008.
translation.swa: Wakati yuko Ubelgiji aliingia kwenye siasa kama baba yake na akawa Katibu wa Taifa wa mahusiano ya Kimataifa wa chama cha UDPS  mwaka 2008.

translation.en: In November 2011, he planned to represent the city of Mbuji Mayi in Kasai but did not take his seat, citing a deceitful election.
translation.swa: Mwezi Novemba 2011, aligombea kuwa mwakilishi wa mji wa Mbuji Mayi katika Kasai lakini alikataa kutumikia nafasi yake akidai kulikuwa na udanganyifu katika uchaguzi.

translation.en: His father was supposed to take on a leadership role as Kabila transitioned out of power, but upon his fathers death on February 1, 2017, son Felix Tshisekedi was elected to lead the UDPS, thrusting into him a powerful leadership role.
translation.swa: Baba yake alitarajiwa kuchukua majukumu ya madaraka wakati Kabila akimaliza muda wake lakini kwa kifo chake kilichotokea tarehe 1 Februari, 2017, kijana wake Felix Tshisekedi alichaguliwa kuiongoza UDPS, akiaminiwa kuwa na uwezo wa kuongoza.

translation.en: The people's soldier  opposition woes linger
translation.swa: Askari wa watu  Maskitiko ya wapinzani yaendelea

translation.en: Tshisekedis victory may bring peace to the DRC or explode into turmoil, depending on whether or not Fayulu, who firmly rejected the election results, can accept this transition of power.
translation.swa: Ushindi wa Tshisekedi unaweza kuleta amani katika Jamhuri ya Kidemokrasia ya Kongo au kulipua machafuko kutegemea Fayulu, ambaye  dhahiri aliyakataa matokeo ya uchaguzi , kama atakubali au kukataa serikali hii ya mpito.

translation.en: Fayulu called the election results a constitutional coup detat and electoral swindle.
translation.swa: Fayulu aliyaita matokeo ya uchaguzi  Mapinduzi ya katiba na  uchaguzi wa ghilibu.

translation.en: In a January 14 statement from the Roman Catholic Church, one of the few trusted institutions in DR Congo, they said:
translation.swa: Tarehe 14 Januari Kanisa la Romani Katoliki ambalo ni taasisi inayoheshimiwa sana katika Jamhuri ya Kidemokrasia ya Kongo, ilisema:

translation.en: The results of the presidential election published by [the electoral commission] do not match those collected by our observer mission.
translation.swa: Matokeo ya uchaguzi wa Rais yaliyotangazwa na [tume ya uchaguzi] hayaendani na yale tuliyokusanya kwa kutumia waangalizi wetu.

translation.en: It is no secret that you have elected me president, Fayulu announced to the public, considering himself the only legitimate president of DR Congo.
translation.swa: Sio siri mmenichagua kuwa Rais, Fayulu aliutangazia umma, akijiona yeye kama Rais halali wa Jamhuri ya kidemokrasia ya Kongo.

translation.en: Fayulu has been involved in campaigns for multi-party democracy and organized protests to this effect in 2016 and 2017.
translation.swa: Fayulu amekuwa akihusika sana katika kampeni na amekuwa akiratibu na kuongoza maandamano ya kudai kuanzishwa kwa demeokrasia ya vyama vingi miaka ya 2016 na 2017.

translation.en: Francesca Bomboko, director of Berci International, a research and consulting group in DR Congo, told the BBC that Fayulu has often shown up at protests to oppose Kabila.
translation.swa: Francesca Bomboko ambaye ni Mkurugenzi wa Berci International, kikundi cha utafiti na ushauri katika Jamhuri ya Kidemokrasia ya Kongo aliimbia BBC kuwa Fayulu amehusika sana kumpinga Kabila.

translation.en: Fayulu has reportedly said that the Congolese call him [the] people's soldier.
translation.swa: Fayulu amewaambia kwamba wakongo wanamwita  askari wa watu .

translation.en: When Fayulu was nominated as the joint opposition candidate for 2019,  Albert Moleka, Etienne Tshisekedi's former chief of staff, told the BBC that Fayulu could become the new Etienne Tshisekedi, saying hes the one who embodies the real opposition.
translation.swa: Fayulu alipochaguliwa kuwa mgombea wa vyama vya upinzani, Albert Moleka, mfanyakazi mwandamizi wa Etienne Tshisekedi, aliiambia BBC kwamba  Fayulu anaweza kuwa  Etienne Tshisekedi mpya, akisema  ni yeye ambaye anafaa kuunganisha upinzani .

translation.en: With the support of former vice president Jean-Pierre Bemba and Moise Katumbi, the former governor of the mineral-rich Katanga province, Fayulu seems to be rising in influence and power in DR Congo politics.
translation.swa: Akiungwa mkono na makamu wa Rais wa zamani Jean-Pierre Bemba na Moise Katumbi, gavana wa zamani wa jimbo la Katanga lenye utajiri wa madini, Fayulu anaonekana kuwa na nguvu na ushawishi katika siasa za Jamhuri ya Kidemokrasia ya Kongo.

translation.en: With no full support from party ranks, Tshisekedis victory came as a surprise.
translation.swa: Akiwa hana kuungwa mkono sana kutoka kwenye chama chake, ushindi wa Tshisekedi ulipatikana kwa mshangao.

translation.en: According to the International Crisis Group, the UDSP split into several factions, some of which rejected the transfer of leadership to Etienne's son Tshisekedi.
translation.swa: Kutokana na kikundi kinachohusika na migogoro kimataifa, UDSP iligawanyika katika makundi, baadhi walimkataa kumpa madaraka Tshisekedi ambaye ni mtoto wa Etienne.

translation.en: Felix Tshisekedi is also somewhat of a novice in the political arena.
translation.swa: Felix Tshisekedi pia ni mchanga sana katika nyanja hii ya siasa.

translation.en: Tshisekedi has been criticized for his lack of charisma and political experience in high office, drawing his political legitimacy from his father, according to Simon Allison of the Mail & Guardian.
translation.swa: Tshisekedi amekosolewa kwa kutojaliwa kipaji  na kutokuwa na uzoefu wa nafasi za juu katika kisiasa, anapata kuungwa mkono kisiasa kutokana na uwezo na sifa ya   baba yake, hii ni kutokana na Simon Allison wa  Mail & Guardian.

translation.en: On the other hand, Tshisekedi is more diplomatic, conciliatory and attentive to people, a member of the Congolese opposition said.
translation.swa: Kwa upande mwingine, Tshisekedi ni mwanadiplomasia, mtu wa maridhiano na msikivu wa watu, alisema mwanachama wa chama cha upinzani cha Kongo .

translation.en: He has promised to build a nation of unity, peace and security.
translation.swa: Ameahidi kujenga nchi ya Amani, Utulivu na Umoja.

translation.en: Tshisekedi said on January 20 that the court's confirmation of his win was a victory for the entire country.
translation.swa: Tarehe 20 Januari Tshisekedi alisema kwamba ushindi wake  kuthibitishwa na mahakama ni ushindi wa nchi nzima.

translation.en: It is Congo that won.
translation.swa: Ni Kongo iliyoshinda.

translation.en: I am engaged in a campaign to reconcile all Congolese.
translation.swa: Nimeingia kwenye kampeni ya kuwasuluhisha wakongo wote.

translation.en: Congo wont be of division, hatred or tribalism.
translation.swa: Kongo haitagawanyika, wala haitakuwa ya chuki na ukabaila.

translation.en: It will be a reconciled Congo, a strong Congo focusing on development, peace and security.
translation.swa: Itakuwa Kongo yenye maelewano, Kongo yenye nguvu inayolenga Maendeleo, amani na utulivu.

translation.en: Patrick Litanga, a Ph.D. student at American University in Washington DC., speaking to Al Jazeera, observed that Tshiesekedis win may be the beginning of a new political landscape:
translation.swa: Patrick Litanga, mwanafunzi wa Udaktari katika chuo kikuu cha Marekani katika mji wa Washington DC., akiwa anaongea na shirika la utangazaji la  Al Jazeera, alisema  kwamba ushindi wa Tshisekedi unaweza kuwa mwanzo wa historia mpya ya siasa:

translation.en: Felix Tshisekedi will be the first president in the Congolese political history since the time of Prime Minister Patrice Lumumba to face a serious countervailing power.
translation.swa: Felix Tshisekedi atakuwa Rais wa kwanza katika historia ya Kongo tangu kipindi cha Waziri Mkuu Patrice Lumumba kukabiliana na mihimili ya serikali yenye ukinzani mkali.

translation.en: We may be witnessing the genesis of political checks and balances.
translation.swa: Tunaweza kushuhudia mwanzo wa siasa za mihili ya dola kudhibitiana ili kuzuia matumizi mabaya ya madaraka.

translation.en: DR Congos future hinged on difficult past
translation.swa: Yajayo ya Jamhuri wa Kidemokrasia ya Kongo Yanakwazwa na historia yake mbaya

translation.en: DR Congo gained independence in 1960.
translation.swa: Jamhuri ya Kidemokrasia ya Kongo ilipata uhuru mwaka 1960.

translation.en: Since then, citizens have been subjected to numerous human rights violations such as extrajudicial killings; torture, sexual and gender-based violence including rapes and abductions.
translation.swa: Tangu hapo, wananchi wamekuwa wahanga wa ukiukwaji wa haki za binadamu kama vile mauaji holela, mateso na ukiiukwaji wa kijinsia pamoja na ubakaji na utekaji.

translation.en: Uppsala Conflict Data Project concluded that Laurent Kabilas government saw the next three highest conflict death rates respectively, with 13,884 in 1998, 8,019 in 1999, and 7,537 in 2000.
translation.swa: Mradi wa kukusanya taarifa ya migogoro Uppsala ilihitimisha kuwa serikali ya Laurent kabila ilishuhudia miaka mitatu yenye kiwango cha hali ya juu ya vifo vilivyosababishwa na migogoro, mwaka 1998 kulikuwa na vifo vipatavyo 13,884, mwaka 1999, vifo 8,019 na mwaka 2000  kulikuwa na vifo 7,537.

translation.en: Will the new epoch of Felix Tshisekedi government end the turmoil or stir up it?
translation.swa: Je, serikali mpya ijayo ya Felix Tshisekedi itamaliza machafuko au itayachochea?

translation.en: Lets wait.
translation.swa: Tusubiri.

translation.en: Ahmed Hussein-Suale Divela [Image credit: Committee to Protect Journalists]One month after Ghanaian investigative journalist Ahmed Hussein-Suale Divela was shot dead in his car in Madina, Ghana, activists are calling for answers and insights into the circumstances of his gruesome death.
translation.swa: Ahmed Hussein-Suale Divela [Picha na: Kamati ya Kulinda Waanadishi wa Habari]Mwezi mmoja baada ya ya kupigwa risasi akiwa kwenye gari yake huko Madina nchini Ghana, Ahmed Hussein-Suale Divela, Mgana aliyekuwa mwandishi  wa habari za kiuchunguzi, wanaharakati wanahitaji majibu na maelezo ili kujua  mazingira ya kifo chake cha kutisha.

translation.en: The group United Press for Development staged a peaceful solidarity walk in Accra in mid-February as a message to police that Divelas killers have not yet been identified or convicted.
translation.swa: Kikundi cha Maendeleo ya Umoja wa Waandishi wa Habari kilifanya matembezi ya mshikamano na amani  katikati  ya mwezi Februari mjini Accra kutoa ujumbe kwa jeshi la polisi kwamba wauaji wa Divela hawajajulikana na kushtakiwa.

translation.en: They say that walks will continue until the group gets answers.
translation.swa: Wanasema matembezi hayo yataendelea hadi kikundi hicho kipate majibu.

translation.en: Divelas killing calls attention to press freedom in Ghana where violent killings of journalists are actually rare, according to the Committee to Protect Journalists.
translation.swa: Mauaji ya Divela yanatoa tahadhari kwa uhuru wa waandishi wa habari nchini Ghana ambapo mauaji ya kikatili ya waandishi wa habari ni nadra; hayo ni kutokana na  Kamati ya Kulinda Waandishi wa Habari .

translation.en: Yet, Kofi Asante, the groups organiser, says that his group recorded 31 journalists being murdered in Kumasi, some of them were killed in 2018 and the irony is Ghana has been accredited as the number one country in press freedom in Africa and 23rd in the world.
translation.swa: Hata hivyo, mhamasishaji wa kikundi, Kofi Asante anasema kwamba kikundi chake kina orodha ya wanahabari 31 waliouliwa , Kumasi, baadhi yao waliuawa mwaka 2018 na imegeukia  Ghana yenye sifa kuwa nchi ya kwanza Afrika katika kutoa uhuru wa habari na ya 23 ulimwenguni.

translation.en: Who was Ahmed Hussein-Suale Divela?
translation.swa: Je, Ahmed Hussein-Suale Divela alikuwa ni nani?

translation.en: Ahmed Hussein-Suale Divela worked with Tiger Eye Private Investigations, an investigative journalism outlet led by Anas Aremeyaw Anas.
translation.swa: Ahmed Hussein-Suale Divela alifanya kazi katika gazeti la  Wakala wa uchunguzi wa habari za siri la Tiger eyes lililoongozwa na  Anas Aremeyaw Anas.

translation.en: Their unconventional and controversial approach to investigative journalism has exposed many high profile people across Africa.
translation.swa: Mbinu yao isiyo ya kawaida katika kufanya uandishi wa habari za kiuchunguzi ziliiwezesha kuweka wazi habari za watu wazito na wenye wasifu  mkubwa katika Afrika.

translation.en: Divela had recently contributed to investigative work that exposed Kwesi Nyantakyi, former president of Ghanas football association, also a former member of FIFAs General Council, accused of accepting a bribe of $65,000 USD.
translation.swa: Hivi karibuni Divela alihusika katika habari ya kiuchunguzi ambayo iliweka wazi habari juu ya Rais wa zamani wa shirikisho la mpira la Ghana Kwesi Nyantakyi ambaye pia alikwa ni mjumbe wa Halmashauri kuu ya FIFA ya kutuhumiwa kupokea rushwa ya dola za kimarekani 65,000.

translation.en: FIFA's adjudicatory council gave Nyantakyi a lifetime ban from all football-related activities.
translation.swa: Baraza la maamuzi la FIFA lilimuhukumu Nyantakyi  Maisha  kutojishughulisha na masuala yanahusu mpira wa miguu.

translation.en: Anas announced the murder of Divela in a tweet that included an attached video showing Ghanaian parliament member Kennedy Agyapong speaking live on TV in May 2018:
translation.swa: Anas alitangaza kuuawa kwa Divela kupitia twita ambayo iliambatana na video inayoonesha mjumbe wa bunge la Ghana Kennedy Agyapong akiongea mbashara kwenye runinga mwezi Mei 2018:

translation.en: In September 2018, Divela told the Committee to Protect Journalists via WhatsApp that some powerful figures in Ghana sought to harm him after an image of him was published on NET 2 TV station in May 2018 by Agyapong.
translation.swa: Mwezi  September 2018, Divela aliiambia Kamati ya Kulinda Waandishi wa Habari  kupitia  WhatsApp kwamba baadhi ya watu wenye nguvu  katika nchi ya Ghna walikuwa wanamtafuta ili kumdhuru baada ya sura yake kuonekana kwenye kituo cha runinga cha NET 2 TV mwezi Mei 2018 na Agyapong.

translation.en: Since my image was published and [the] public was incited against me [] many people have attempted [to attack me].
translation.swa: Tangu sura yangu ionekane na umma ulinichukia [] watu wengi wamejaribu [kunishambulia].

translation.en: These criminals after us are people who are [] associated with powers that be in Ghana and can do anything and get away with it.
translation.swa: Vitendo hivi vya jinai juu yetu ni vya watu ambao [] wana nguvu katika Ghana na wanaweza kufanya lolote na kutokamatwa.

translation.en: Indeed, it [has] been hinted in some quarters that the very man who published [my image] said he was doing everything possible to quell [my] existence.
translation.swa: Ni kweli, ilizungumzwa katika baadhi ya mitaa kwamba mtu yule yule ambaye alichapisha [sura yangu] alisema alikuwa anafanya lolote liwezekanalo aniue  .

translation.en: MPs words have power
translation.swa: Maneno ya mbunge yana nguvu

translation.en: Agyapong, a member of the ruling New Patriotic Party, has served as an MP for 19 years.
translation.swa: Agyapong, ambaye ni mwanachama wa chama tawala kipya cha Wazalendo, amekuwa mbunge kwa miaka 19.

translation.en: In his fight against corruption, Agyapong is known for making bribery allegations against corrupt political officials  especially those within his own party.
translation.swa: Katika mapambano yake dhidi ya rushwa, Agyapong anajulikana kwa kutengeneza mashtaka ya rushwa dhidi ya wanasiasa ambao ni wala rushwa hasa wale wa ndani ya chama chake .

translation.en: A debate ignited over whether or not Agyapongs remarks on live TV directed at Divela may have provoked his murder:
translation.swa: Mjadala ulipamba moto hasa kuhusu maoni ya Agyapong aliyoyatoa mbashara kwenye runinga kama ndiyo yamepelekea kuuawa kwa Divela:

translation.en: The boy is very dangerous.
translation.swa: Kijana huyo ni hatari sana.

translation.en: He lives here in Madina.
translation.swa: Anaishi hapa Madina.

translation.en: If you meet him somewhere, break his ears.
translation.swa: Kama ukikutana naye mahali, pasua masikio yake.

translation.en: If he ever comes to this premises [sic], I'm telling you, beat him.
translation.swa: Kama akitokea maeneo haya, nawaambia, mpigeni.

translation.en: Agyapong justified his actions and said his comments were not meant to provoke harm and referred to a skirmish. Divela allegedly once had with one of Agypongs staff members.
translation.swa: Agyapong alithibitisha matendo yake na alisema maoni yake hayakumaanisha kusababisha madhara wala mvutano. Divela  aliyasema hayo akiwa na mfanyakazi anayefanya kazia na Agypong.

translation.en: In another video, Agyapong suggests that Anas is actually a prime suspect in Divelas death.
translation.swa: Katika  video nyingine  , Agyapong anapendekeza kwamba Anas ni mshukiwa  mkuu katika kifo cha Divela.

translation.en: He offered to pay a 100,000 Ghanaian Cedi reward (about 19,000 US dollars) for anyone who finds Divelas killers as proof that he did not call for his murder.
translation.swa: Aliahidi kulipa  zawadi ya fedha ya Ghana ipatayo 100,000  (about sawa na US dollars)  kwa yeyote ambaye atakayewapata wauwaji wa Divela iwe uthibitisho kuwa hakushiriki katika mauaji yake.

translation.en: Agyapong left Ghana after police questioned him  he strongly denied that he was fleeing Ghana or that he has been identified as a suspect.
translation.swa: Agyapong aliondoka Ghana baada ya jeshi la polisi kumhoji   alikanusha vikali  kuwa haikimbii Ghana au hakuthibishwa kuwa mshukiwa.

translation.en: Six people have been arrested and released on bail in connection with Divelas murder.
translation.swa: Watu sita wamekamatwa na kuachiwa kwa dhamana kufuatia mauaji ya Divela.

translation.en: Police stated arrests were based on reasonable suspicion.
translation.swa: Jeshi la polisi lilieleza   kuwekwa nguvuni kwa washukiwa kulikuwa  kunazingatia tuhuma za msingi.

translation.en: However, their identities have not yet been released.
translation.swa: Hata hivyo, vitambulisho vyao, bado vimeshikiliwa.

translation.en: Dangerous journalism
translation.swa: Uandishi wa habari hatarishi

translation.en: Tiger Eyes Investigations had been receiving death threats for several years and was accused of using unethical techniques that violate journalism ethics.
translation.swa: Wakala wa uchunguzi wa habari za siri Tiger Eyes limekuwa likipokea vitisho kwa miaka kadhaa na lilishtakiwa kwa kutumia mbinu ambazo zinavunja miiko ya uandishi wa habari.

translation.en: While there is no evidence to show that Agyapong had any direct connection to Divela's killing, his words do have power and were spoken on a TV station owned by him.
translation.swa: Wakati hakuna Ushahidi wa kuonesha kumuunganisha Agyapong  moja kwa moja na mauaji ya Divela, maneno yake yana nguvu na yaliongelewa kwenye kituo cha runinga na yeye mwenyewe.

translation.en: A CPJ report reveals that in 2018, about 53 journalists throughout the world were killed, 34 of whom were targeted for murder in reprisal for their work.
translation.swa: Taarifa ya CPJ  inadhihirisha kwamba mwaka 2018, waandishi wa habari wapatao 53 ulimwenguni waliuawa, 34 kati yao waliuawa kwa kuadhibiwa kutokana na kazi azo.

translation.en: Between 2016 and 2017, 102 journalists were killed as a result of their work.
translation.swa: Kati ya mwaka 2016 na 2017, waandishi wa habari 102 waliuwa kutokana na matokeo ya kazi zao.

translation.en: Over one thousand journalists were murdered in the last decade (2006-2017) according to a report by UNESCO.
translation.swa: Zaidi ya waandishi wa habari elfu moja waliuwa  muongo uliopita (2006-2017) hii ni kutokana na  taarifa ya UNESCO  .

translation.en: The high profile assassination of The Washington Post columnist, Jamal Ahmad Khashoggi at the Saudi Arabian consulate in Istanbul on October 2, 2018, by agents of the Saudi government drew global ire.
translation.swa: Kuuliwa kwa mwandishi mashuhuri wa Washington wa Makala,  Jamal Ahmad Khashoggi kwenye ubalozi wa Saudi Arabia nchini Istanbul tarehe 2 mwezi Oktoba, 2018, na mawakala wa serikali ya Saudi iliibua hasira ulimwenguni kote.

translation.en: Awil Dihar Salad, a veteran journalist in Somalia, was killed in December 2018.
translation.swa: Awil Dihar Salad, mwandishi wa habari mkongwe nchini Somalia,  aliuawa  mwezi Disemba, 2018.

translation.en: Salad fled Somalia in 2005, fearing he could be targeted, but later returned and was then murdered.
translation.swa: Salad alikimbia Somalia mwaka 2005, akiogopa kuuwa, lakini baadaye aliporudi aliuwa.

translation.en: Earlier in July 2018, three Russian journalists were killed in the Central African Republic while investigating the activities of the so-called Wagner group, a group of private military contractors.
translation.swa: Mapema mwezi Julai 2018, waandishi wa habari watatu wa Kirusi waliuwa katika Jamhuri ya Afrika ya kati wakati wa shughuli za uchunguzi  wa kikundi kilichoitwa Wagner, kikundi cha makadarasi wa jeshi wa kujitegemea .

translation.en: Engaging in investigative journalism can be like signing a death warrant.
translation.swa: Kujihusisha na uandishi wa habari za kiuchunguzi inaweza kuwa kama kusaini kibali cha kifo.

translation.en: Many African governments operate in opacity and they firmly resist attempts at exposure.
translation.swa: Serikali nyingi za kiafrika haziruhusu na huzuia hasa habari za namna hiyo zisichapishwe.

translation.en: Considering the poor remuneration of journalists, it does not make sense for most journalists take this level of risk.
translation.swa: Fikiria malipo ya chini sana ya waandishi wa habari, haina maana kwa waandishi wa habari wengi kuwa katika hatari hii kubwa.

translation.en: Yet, Divelas death is not forgotten and his work lives on.
translation.swa: Hata hivyo, kifo cha Divela hakitasahaulika ingawa kazi yake itaendelea kuishi.

translation.en: Journalists and activists will keep walking until there is resolve.
translation.swa: Waandishi wa habari na wanaharakati wataendelea kuwa na matembezi hadi ufumbuzi upatikane.

translation.en: A billboard shows Mozambique's president Filipe Nyusi.
translation.swa: Bango lenye picha ya Rais wa Msumbiji Filpe Nyusi Nyusi.

translation.en: Photo by Dércio Tsandzana, used with permission.
translation.swa: Picha na  Dércio Tsandzana, na imetumiwa kwa kibali.

translation.en: In October 2019, Mozambique will elect its next president and its Congress for the sixth time since 1994  and will elect provincial governors for the first time in its history.
translation.swa: Kwa mara ya sita tangu mwaka 1994, Msumbiji itamchagua Rais wake mwingine mwezi Oktoba 2019  na kwa mara ya kwanza itawachagua wakuu wa majimbo.

translation.en: Although the race hasn't officially begun, it is generally expected that the eternal rivals of Mozambican politics will compete: Frelimo, the ruling party since 1994, and the largest opposition party, Renamo.
translation.swa: Ingawa ushindani huo haujafunguliwa rasmi, kwa ujumla inategemwa kwamba upinzani ndani ya siasa za Msumbiji utashindana: Frelimo, chama kinachoongoza serikali tangu 1994 na Renamo ambacho ni chama kikuu cha upinzani.,

translation.en: It will be the first time Renamo will compete without its historic leader Afonso Dhlakama, who has led the party for over four decades.
translation.swa: Itakuwa mara ya kwanza Renamo kupambana bila kiongozi wao wa kihistoria Afonso Dhlakama ambaye amekiongoza chama hicho kwa zaidi ya miongo minne.

translation.en: Dhlakama died on May 3, 2018, following a heart attack.
translation.swa: Dhlakama alifariki tarehe 3 Mei, 2018, kutokana na mshtuko wa moyo.

translation.en: Dhlakama will be remembered as the Renamo leader who signed the General Peace Agreements of 1992 with former President Joaquim Chissano, which set Mozambique on the path towards democracy.
translation.swa: Dhlakama atakumbukwa kama kiongozi wa Renamo ambaye alisaini Makubaliano ya amani na Rais wa zamani Joaquim Chissano mwaka 1992 ambayo yaliiweka Msumbiji katika mstari kuelekea Demokrasia.

translation.en: To succeed him, Renamo has chosen Ossufo Momade after he was elected by a party congress held in June 2018 in Gorongosa, the Renamo base located in the central Sofala province.
translation.swa: Ili kushinda, Renamo imemchagua Ossufo Momade baada ya kupendekezwa na mkutano mkuu wa chama uliofanyika Gorongosa mwezi Juni mwaka 2018, katika jimbo la kati la Sofala ambapo ndio ngome ya Renamo.

translation.en: He will probably be the Renamo candidate in October, and will likely compete with the current president, Frelimo's Filip Nyusi, and Daviz Simango  who presides another opposition party, the Democratic Movement of Mozambique (MDM).
translation.swa: Yamkini, ndiye atakuwa mgombea wa Renamo mwezi Oktoba, na inawezekana akapambana na Rais wa sasa Filip Nyusi ambaye anatoka chama Frelimo na Daviz Simangoambaye anatoka chama kingine cha upinzani cha Demokrasia Msumbuji (MDM).

translation.en: MDM was founded in 2009 and along with Renamo and Frelimo are the only parties that have representatives in the Assembly of the Republic or hold municipal offices.
translation.swa: MDM ilianzishwa mwaka 2009 sambamba na Renamo na Frelimo ndiyo vyama ambavyo vina wawakilishi katika Bunge la Jamhuri au kuongoza manispaa.

translation.en: Daviz Simango has run, and lost, two previous presidential elections.
translation.swa: Daviz Simango amegombea urais na kushindwa katika chaguzi mbili zilizopita za urais.

translation.en: The October vote will also happen amid a ceasefire signed in 2016 between an armed branch of Renamo and government forces, who have in recent years skirmished with each other in Mozambique's countryside.
translation.swa: Upigaji kura wa mwezi Oktoba unaweza kutokea katikati ya  makubaliano ya kusitisha mapigano  yaliyosainiwa kati ya jeshi la Renamo na majeshi ya  serikali mwaka 2016, ambapo hivi karibuni pande hizo zimevutana maeneo ya pembezoni mwa Msumbiji.

translation.en: In February 2019, the National Elections Commission (CNE) warned the public about the lack of financial resources to organize the nationwide poll.
translation.swa: Mwezi Februari, 2019, Tume ya taifa ya uchaguzi (CNE) ilitahadharisha umma juu ya ukosefu wa rasilimali fedha kwa ajili ya kuratibu uchaguzi nchi nzima.

translation.en: Key dates
translation.swa: Tarehe muhimu

translation.en: 01/04  15/05: Voter registration
translation.swa: 01/04  15/05: uandikishaji wa wapiga kura

translation.en: 31/08 a 12/10: Campaign
translation.swa: 31/08 a 12/10: kuanza kwa kampeni

translation.en: 15/10: Polling day
translation.swa: 15/10: Siku ya kupiga kura

translation.en: Perhaps most significantly of all, this is the first time Mozambicans will elect provincial governors.
translation.swa: Labda muhimu zaidi ni kwamba, hii itakuwa ni mara ya kwanza kwa wanamsumbiji kuchagua  magavana wa majimbo.

translation.en: Previously, they were nominated by the president.
translation.swa: Siku za nyuma, walikuwa wakiteuliwa na Rais.

translation.en: The shift is the result of arduous and lengthy negotiations between  Renamo and the government.
translation.swa: Mabadiliko hayo ni matokeo ya makubaliano mazito na yaliyochukua muda marefu  kati ya Renamo na serikali.

translation.en: While the President hasn't yet sanctioned the law that will provide for this change, it is widely believed he will do so.
translation.swa: Wakati Rais hajaondoa sheria ambayo itaendana na mabadiliko haya, hata hivyo inaaminika kuwa atafanya hivyo.

translation.en: In his annual state of the union speech, Vladimir Putin promised Russians a faster, more reliable internet; it definitely won't be any freer, say experts.
translation.swa: Katika hotuba yake ya mwaka kwa taifa, Vladimir Putin amewaahidi warusi mtandao wnye kasi zaidi na wakuaminika wataalamu wanasema Kuwa hakika hautatolewa bure.

translation.en: On February 20, Vladimir Putin addressed the Russian parliament in his annual state of the union speech.
translation.swa: Februari 20, Vladimir Putin alihutubia bunge la urusi katika  hotuba yake ya mwaka kwa taifa.

translation.en: He pledged massive investments in social programs and civil infrastructure, notably the countys IT backbone:
translation.swa: Ameahidi uwekezaji mkubwa katika miradi ya kijamii na miundombinu hasa kwenye msingi wa teknolojia ya habari:

translation.en: This year we must adopt a master plan for developing the infrastructure of a digital economy, including telecommunications networks, as well as data storage and processing capacities.
translation.swa: Mwaka huu lazima tuwe na mpango madhubuti wa kuendeleza miundombinu ya kiuchumi ya kidigitali, ikiwemo mitandao ya simu, na utunzaji wa taarifa na kasi kubwa ya usambazaji.

translation.en: Here we need to look ahead as well.
translation.swa: Hapa pia, tunapaswa kuangalia mbele.

translation.en: The task for the next few years is to provide universal access to high-speed internet and start using 5G communications networks.
translation.swa: Kazi ya miaka michache ijayo ni kutoa upatikanaji wa mtandao wenye kasi kubwa kwa wote na kuanza kutumia mitandao ya simu yenye nguvu ya masafa ya 5G.

translation.en: Improving internet infrastructure and ensuring that all Russians are online may sound progressive.
translation.swa: Yanaweza yakawa  maendeleo mazuri ikiwa miundombinu ya mtandao imeimarishwa na kuhakikisha kwamba warusi wote wanatumia mtandao.

translation.en: But these developments will come about in an era of unprecedented online information control in Russia.
translation.swa: Lakini maendeleo hayo yatapatikana katika Urusi kipindi cha udhibiti mkubwa wa habari mtandaoni

translation.en: In February, two reports came out that noted a sharp, continuous downwards trend in online freedoms.
translation.swa: Mwezi wa Februari, taarifa mbili zilieleza kwamba uhuru mtandaoni umeendelea kuzorota sana .

translation.en: Indeed, it seems that while more Russians will have access to the internet, it will be an internet governed on the state's increasingly strict terms.
translation.swa: Hakika, inaonekana kuwa wakati Warusi wengi watakuwa na mtandao, utakuwa mtandao unaotawaliwa na masharti.

translation.en: One study compiled by Agora, a human rights group, lays out the different ways the Russian authorities are clamping down on individual users, social networks and online media.
translation.swa: Utafiti mmoja uliofanywa na  Agora, kikundi cha Haki za binadamu, kimeweka wazi njia mbalimbali ambazo mamlaka za Urusi zinazuia watumiaji binafsi, mitandao ya kijamii na vyombo vya habari mtandaoni.

translation.en: The most significant trend, Agora says, has been a wave of laws and regulations that force internet service providers and tech giants to police online content on the Russian government's behalf.
translation.swa: Agora inasema njia zaidi ambayo imekuwa ikitumika ni sheria na kanuni ambazo zinawalazimisha watoaji wa huduma za mtandao na wataalamu wakubwa wa mifumo ya mitandao kulinda na kusimamia maudhui mtandaoni kwa niaba ya serikali ya Urusi.

translation.en: On more than one occasion, internet service providers have been forced to block access to websites for publishing information about court proceedings, or exposing government corruption.
translation.swa: Zaidi ya mara moja, watoaji wa huduma za mtandao walilazimishwa kuzuia upatikanji wa tovuti za kuchapisha habari juu kesi mahakamani, au kuweka wazi rushwa serikalini.

translation.en: In one high-profile case, providers were made to block access to the website of Alexey Navalny, a prominent opposition activist and anti-corruption campaigner.
translation.swa: Katika kesi iliyohusu kigogo mkubwa watoa huduma walilazimika kuzuia upatikanaji wa tovuti ya Alexey Navalny, ambaye ni mwanaharakati mashuhuri wa upinzani na mpiga kampeni ya kuzuia rushwa.

translation.en: Agora's report says:
translation.swa: Ripoti ya Agora inasema:

translation.en: The authorities are paving the way for blocking online services that they see as catalysts for mass protests, while attempting to present this crackdown as simply a requirement to follow national laws.
translation.swa: Mamlaka zimeanzisha njia za kuzuia huduma mtandaoni ambazo wanaziona kama vichocheo vya maandamano ya watu wengi,inakuwa ni sharti la kufuata sheria za nchi wakati wanapotekeleza ukandamizaji huu.

translation.en: Delegating policing and censorship functions to private actors not only minimizes reputational damage, but also ensures more effective control and spending.
translation.swa: Kazi za kulinda na kudhibiti maudhui mtandaoni kufanywa na taasisi binafsi haipunguzi tu  uhalibifu, bali pia huhakikisha uendeshaji na utumiaji mzuri.

translation.en: Agora also notes a sharp increase in restrictions on individual pieces of content: a total of 662,842 items were censored in 2018, in comparison to 115,706 in 2017.
translation.swa: Pia Agora inaona kuna ongezeko kubwa la vikwazo juu ya kutuma maudhui kwa mtu: jumla ya maudhui 662,842 yalidhibitiwa mwaka 2018, ukilinganisha na maudhui 115,706 katika mwaka 2017.

translation.en: This includes blocked websites and individual URLs, online news articles, social media posts deemed extremist or inflammatory etc.
translation.swa: Hii ni pamoja na kufungiwa kwa tovuti, URL za watu binafsi, Makala mtandaoni, jumbe za mitandao ya kijamii zilizonekana kuwa na msimamo mkali au uchochezi n.k.

translation.en: In a rare instance of good news, one of the most infamous items of the Russian criminal code, Article 282 (Incitement of hatred or enmity, as well as abasement of human dignity,) responsible for the majority of prosecutions for online speech, was reined in by an amendment passed in December 2018.
translation.swa: Mifano michache ya habari njema,  ni ibara ya 282 (Uchochezi wa chuki au uadui pamoja na kufedhehesha heshima ya mtu) moja ya vipengele vibaya vya sheria za jinai Urusi, inahusika sana kwa mashtaka juu ya mazumngumzo mtandaoni, ilibadilishwa katika marekebisho  yaliyofanyika mwezi Desemba 2018.

translation.en: This appears to have brought a decline in prosecutions related to online speech.
translation.swa: Hii imefanya mashtaka yanayohusiana na mazungumzo mtandaoni kupungua.

translation.en: However, legal experts are skeptical about the possible liberalization of Russian laws.
translation.swa: Hata hivyo, wataalamu wa sheria wana wasiwasi juu ya uwezekano wa kufanya sheria za Urusi kuwa huria.

translation.en: Agoras report predicts that public prosecutors may shift towards using other, less severe articles in both the criminal and administrative codes to punish dissent.
translation.swa: Taarifa ya Agora inatabiri kuwa  waendesha mashitaka wa serikali wanaweza kubadili na kutumia ibara nyingine za jinai na uendeshaji ambazo sio kali sana kuwaadhibu wapinzani.

translation.en: This could enable them to silence individual users and organizations, while triggering less visible public backlash.
translation.swa: Hii itawasaidia kuwafanya watumiaji binafsi na taasisi kukaa kimya bila kuchochea upinzani kutoka kwa umma.

translation.en: Agora also notes that western IT platforms are increasingly acquiescent towards the demands of the Russian authorities, a trend that Runet Echo covered previously.
translation.swa: Pia Agora inaona kwamba jukwaa la teknolojia ya habari la magharibi linaendelea kuridhia madai ya mamlaka za Urusi, mwenendo ambao huko nyuma Runet Echo aliuzungumzia.

translation.en: Citing Google's Transparency Report, Agora says that in June 2018 Google satisfied 79 percent of all data removal requests from the Russian government, while only 62 percent of similar requests from the US authorities were complied with.
translation.swa: Ikitaja   uwazi wa taarifa ya Google , Agora inasema kwamba mwezi Juni 2018 Google ilithibitisha kutendea kazi asilimia 79 ya maombi ya serikali ya kuondoa habari, wakati maombi kama hayo kutoka kwenye mamlaka za Marekeni ni asilimia 62 tu iliyofanyia kazi.

translation.en: Google's report shows that requests for content removal from the Russian government multiplied by more than five-fold in six months in 2016 from 2,045 in June to 11,164 in December.
translation.swa: Taarifa ya Google inaonesha kuwa maombi ya serikali ya Urusi ya kuondoa maudhui yaliongezeka maradufu kwa zaidi ya mara tano katika miezi sita katika mwaka wa 2016 kutoka 2,045 hadi 11,164 mwezi Desemba.

translation.en: To Google's credit, it didn't comply with any of the 94 removal requests from the Russian government which it classifies under Government criticism.
translation.swa: Pongezi kwa Google, kwa kutokubalina na maombi 94 ya serikali ya Urusi ambayo yaliainishwa kama ukosoaji kwa serikali.

translation.en: Google also provides some examples of the content they're removing, and a significant part of is genuinely dangerous to the public: ads for illegal casinos scamming people out of their hard-earned rubles, violent racist propaganda, online drug markets selling dangerous substances etc.
translation.swa: Pia Google hutoa baadhi ya mifano ya maudhui wanayoyaondoa, na sehemu muhimu ambayo ni hatarishi kwa umma: matangazo kwa ajili ya kamari haramu ambayo hufedhehesha watu waliochuma ruba (sarafu ya urusi) kwa taabu, propaganda mbaya ya ubaguzi,  masoko ya madawa ya kulevya mtandaoni yanayouza madawa hatari, n.k..

translation.en: But Google readily complied with requests for removal of activist videos calling for rallies against corruption  because these rallies were arbitrarily declared unsanctioned and thus in violation of a pointedly restrictive law aimed at stifling public dissent.
translation.swa: Lakini Google walikubaliana na maombi ya kuondoa video za wanaharakati  waliokuwa wakiitisha maandamano dhidi ya rushwa kwa sababu maandamno haya yalitamkwa kiholela kuwa yamezuiliwa na kwa hiyo ni uvunjaji wa sheria ya katazo iliyolenga kukandamiza upinzani wa umma.

translation.en: Twitter, Google and Facebook have all shown that they're willing to remove content or make it unavailable to Russian users upon receiving requests from the Russian authorities to comply with the local laws.
translation.swa: Twitter, Google na Facebook wote wameonesha nia ya kuondoa maudhui au kutopatikana kwa watumiaji wa Urusi  kutokana na kupokea maombi kutoka kwenye mamlaka ya Urusi ili kutii sheria za nchi.

translation.en: There is little indication that the companies take into consideration the exceedingly restrictive nature of some of these laws, or that they are weighing these requests against Russia's constitution.
translation.swa: Kuna dalili kidogo sana kampuni hayo kuangalia chanzo cha kizuizi kwa baadhi ya sheria hizi au hata kupima maombi haya dhidi ya katiba ya Urusi.

translation.en: Another report by the Internet Protection Society (OZI) is even darker in its predictions: its titled The New Year Pessimism, and it notes the longest and sharpest drop of its online freedom of speech index since the measurements began in 2016.
translation.swa: Taarifa nyingine iliyotolewa na jamii inayolinda mtandao  (OZI) inaonesha giza nene katika utabiri wake: Ina kichwa cha habari Mwaka Mpya usio na matumaini, na inaonesha anguko kubwa na la muda mrefu la uhuru wa kutoa maoni mtandaoni tangu kuanza kwa vigezo mwaka 2016.

translation.en: OZI lists seven events that impacted the index in January, all in a negative way: from new pieces of legislation to landmark cases, such as the prosecution of Yana Antonova, a pediatric surgeon in Krasnodar, who was targeted for sharing a video by Open Russia, an activist media outlet declared an undesirable organization.
translation.swa: OZI inaorodhesha matukio saba ambayo yaliadhiri uhuru wa kuongea mwezi Januari: kuanzia baadhi ya vifungu vipya vya sheria hadi mashauri ya kihistoria, kama vile mashtaka  ya Yana Antonova, bigwa wa upasuaji wa Watoto wa Krasnodar, ambaye alishtakiwa kwa kutumiwa video na Open Russia, mtandao wa kijamii wa kiharakati uliotangazwa kuwa taasisi isiyofaa.

translation.en: Being associated with an undesirable organization  the government-mandated list also includes the National Endowment for Democracy and the Open Society Foundation  is an offence punishable by a law introduced in 2015 by a range of penalties, from a heavy fine to a prison term.
translation.swa: Kwa kuwa na mahusiano na taasisi isiyofaa   pia orodha ya serikali  inajumuisha taasisi ya majaliwa ya demokrasia ya taifa na msingi wa jamii iliyowazi   ni kosa linalostahili adhabu na sheria iliyoanzishwa 2015 ikiwa na adhabu mbalimbali, kuanzia faini kubwa hadi kifungo gerezani.

translation.en: Sharing a Facebook video also counts as collaborating with an undesirable organization, which Antonova learned the hard way.
translation.swa: Hata pia kutumiana video kupitia Facebook kunahesabiwa kama kushirikiana na taasisi isiyofaa kama iliyomkumba Antonova.

translation.en: The OZI report also emphasized the potential damage of the Klishas bill, which came as part of the package of restrictive pieces of legislation currently reviewed by the Russian parliament.
translation.swa: Pia, taarifa ya OZI ilisistiza uharibifu mkubwa uliosababishwa na muswada wa Klishas, ambao uliletwa kama sehemu ya sheria zenye vizuizi ambazo sasa zinafanyiwa marekebisho na Bunge la Urusi.

translation.en: Named after its author, senator Andrey Klishas, the bill aims to create a sovereign infrastructure for the Russian internet, ostensibly to shield it from foreign interference.
translation.swa: Ukiwa na jina la mwandishi aliyeuandika, Senator Andrey Klishas, muswada huo unalenga kujenga miundombinu huru  kwa mtandao wa Urusi , hasa kuulinda usingiliwe na wageni.

translation.en: The other, an anti-fake news bill also co-authored by Klishas, is even more controversial and almost universally condemned by experts.
translation.swa: The other,  Muswada wa kupambana na habari za uongo nao uliandikwa na Klishas nao pia una utata sana  na umelaumiwa karibu na wataalamu ulimwenguni kote.

translation.en: Yet both passed in the first reading thanks to the overwhelming majority that the ruling United Russia party holds in the parliament.
translation.swa: Hata hivyo miswada yote ilipitishwa iliposomwa kwa mara kwanza, shukrani kwa chama tawala cha Umoja wa Urusi kilizuia kutokana na kuwa na wabunge wengi katika bunge.

translation.en: It seems that the Russian government is finally confident in its ability to control online activity  so confident that it can now offer internet access to all Russians, without fearing the consequences.
translation.swa: Inaonekana serikali ya Urusu inatumaini nguvu yake ya kudhibiti shughuli za mtandaoni-kiasi kwamba sasa inawahakikishia utoaji na upatikanaji wa mtandao kwa Warusi wote, bila kuhofia mabaya yanayoweza kutokea.

translation.en: The following post is originally written by Holmes Chan and published on Hong Kong Free Press on 21 of Feburary, 2019.
translation.swa: Ujumbe ufuatao uliandikwa na Holmes Chan na kuchapishwa na vyombo vya habari vya Hong Kong tarehe 21 ya mwezi Februari, 2019.

translation.en: The edited version is republished on Global Voices under a content partnership agreement.
translation.swa: Toleo lililohaririwa lilichapishwa tena na Global Voices chini ya maudhui ya mkataba wa ushirikiano.

translation.en: Singaporean activist Jolovan Wham has been handed a 16-day jail sentence for refusing to pay a fine for a public talk he hosted with Hong Kong democracy activist Joshua Wong via Skype in 2016.
translation.swa: Jolovan Wham, mwanaharati Msingapore amehukumiwa kifungo cha siku 16 kwenda jela kwa kukataa kulipa faini kwa kosa la kufanya mazungumzo ya wazi na Joshua Wong, mwanaharakati wa kidemokrasia kupitia mtandao wa Skype mwaka 2016.

translation.en: He is out on bail pending appeal.
translation.swa: Yupo nje kwa dhamana wakati akisubiri rufaa yake.

translation.en: Wham is an activist known for his campaigns promoting the rights of migrant workers, free speech in Singapore, and reform of the countrys laws on detention and the death penalty.
translation.swa: Wham ni mwanaharakati anayejulikana kwa kampeni zake za kutetea haki za wafanyakazi wa kigeni, uhuru wa kutoa maoni katika Singapore na mageuzi ya sheria za nchi za kuwekwa kizuizini na hukumu ya kifo.

translation.en: Last month, Wham was convicted of illegal assembly over a November 2016 forum he hosted on the topic of civil disobedience and social movements, which featured Joshua Wong and local media activists.
translation.swa: Mwezi uliopita, Wham alikuwa  ameshtakiwa kwa kufanya mkutano haramu  kwa kuwa mwenyeji wa jukwaa la Novemba 2016 liliokuwa na mada juu ya uasi wa raia na harakati za kijamii ambao ulihudhuriwa na Joshua Wong na wanaharakati wa vyombo vya habari vya ndani.

translation.en: Wham was told by police that he needed a permit for Wong to speak, but he went ahead without one.
translation.swa: Wham aliambiwa na polisi kwamba anahitaji kuwa na kibali cha kuruhusu Wong kuzungumza, lakini aliendelea bila kuwa nacho.

translation.en: On 21 February, the court fined Wham S $2,000 (USD $1476) for organising a public assembly without a police permit.
translation.swa: Tarehe 21 Februari, Wham alipigwa faini na mahakama S $2,000 (sawa na dola za kimarekani 1476) kwa kuandaa mkutano wa wazi bila kibali cha polisi.

translation.en: He also received a fine of S $1,200 (USD $886) for failing to sign a police statement.
translation.swa: Pia alipigwa faini ya S $1,200 (sawa na dola za kimarekani 886) kwa kushindwa kutia saini maelezo ya polisi.

translation.en: Singaporean media reported that Wham chose not to pay the fine, and that the court sentenced him to 16 days in prison for failure to pay the fine.
translation.swa: Vyombo vya habari vya Singapore vililipoti  kwamba Wham alikataa kulipa faini, na mahakama ikamhukumu siku 16 kwenda jela kwa kushindwa kulipa faini.

translation.en: Aside from illegal assembly, Wham was also charged for refusing to sign his police witness statement.
translation.swa: Sambamba na mkutano haramu, pia Wham alishtakiwa kwa kukataa kutia saini maelezo ya ushahidi uliotolewa na polisi.

translation.en: He said at the time that he chose not to sign because he was not given a copy.
translation.swa: Wakati anakataa kutia saini alisema kuwa hakupewa  nakala ya maelezo hayo.

translation.en: Wham intends to appeal the judges decision.
translation.swa: Wham anatarajia kukata rufaa kupinga maamuzi ya Jaji.

translation.en: He has been released on a bail of S $8,000 (USD $5,906), according to media reports.
translation.swa: Ameachiwa kwa dhmana ya S $8,000 (sawa na dola za kimarekani 5,906), hii ni kutokana na ripoti za vyombo vya habari.

translation.en: The forum in question was organised by Community Action Network, a non-governmental group concerned with freedom of expression in the city-state.
translation.swa: Mkutano unaohojiwa uliandaliwa na Mtandao wa Jumuia kwa Vitendo ambao ni shirika lisilo la kiserikali linalojihusisha na uhuru wa kutoa maoni katika mji mkuu wa nchi.

translation.en: According to Wham, the police told him it was compulsory to get a work permit and police permit if any of the participating speakers were not from Singapore  even if they spoke remotely via video link.
translation.swa: Wham alisema kuwa polisi walimwambia ilikuwa ni lazima kupata kibali cha kazi na cha polisi kwa wazungumzaji watakao hudhuria ambao hawatoki Singapore- hata kama watazungumza wakiwa mbali kupitia kiunganishi cha video.

translation.en: After the event, Wham was questioned by police for 45 minutes.
translation.swa: Baada ya tukio, Wham alihojiwa na polisi  kwa muda wa dakika 45.

translation.en: He was finally charged in November 2017, but the case did not come before a judge until January 2019.
translation.swa: Hatimaye alishtakiwa  mwezi Novemba 2017, lakini shauri halikuletwa mahakamani hadi Januari 2019.

translation.en: Joshua Wong told HKFP that Whams prosecution was an embarrassment and a terrible injustice, and that he deeply regretted the judgment.
translation.swa: Joshua Wong aliiambia chombo huru cha Hong Kong (HKFP) kuwa mashtaka ya Wham ni aibu na ukosefu wa haki wa kutisha, na anasikitika kwa hukumu hiyo.

translation.en: Jolovan generously invited me to share and exchange my experience in Hong Kongs fight for freedom and justice with the Singaporean community  the irony is not missed here that Jolovan has become a subject of injustice as a result.
translation.swa: Jolovan alinikaribisha kwa ukarimu ili kubadilishana na Jumuia ya Singapore uzoefu nilionao juu ya harakati za kupigania uhuru na haki katika Hong Kong- inashangaza matokeo yake ni kwamba  Jolovan amekuwa muhusika wa udharimu.

translation.en: Id like to express my respect and admiration for Jolovans perseverance of his values, and my wish for the Singaporean people to one day be able to enjoy true freedom and democracy.
translation.swa: Ningependa kueleza heshima na pongezi zangu kwa uvumilivu wa Jolovan na matamanio yangu kwa watu wa Singapore ni kuwa siku moja waweze kufurahia uhuru na demokrasia ya kweli.

translation.en: Stretching of the law
translation.swa: Upindishwaji wa sheria

translation.en: Singaporean journalist and Global Voices collaborator Kirsten Han, who was also a guest speaker at Whams forum, decried the sentence as outrageous.
translation.swa: Waandishi wa Singapore na mshiriki kutoka Global Voices Kirsten Han ambaye alikuwa pia msemaji kwenye Jukwaa la Wham alilaani na kusema hukumu ni ya kikatili.

translation.en: [The forum] posed no threat to public order whatsoever, and the stretching of the law to declare a forum illegal simply because a non-Singaporean Skyped in shows how broad Singapores public order laws are, and how they can be used to restrict Singaporeans civil libertiesTheres no sentence that Id consider fair, because he should never have been charged.
translation.swa: [Mkutano] haukuwa na madhara yoyote juu ya amani na utulivu wa watu ila ni upotoshaji wa sheria kwa kutangaza kuwa mkutano haramu kwa sababu tu mtu asiye Msingapore alizungumza kwa kiunganishi cha video, hii inaonesha sheria  za Singapore zilivyo na namna zinzavyotumiwa kuzuia uhuru wa raia wa SingaporeAsingehukumiwa kama hukumu ingezingatia haki.

translation.en: Han also disputed the prosecutions account of events.
translation.swa: Pia, Han alipinga sababu zilizotolewa za kumshtaki.

translation.en: According to Channel NewsAsia, the prosecution argued in court that thousands were invited to the forum and 366 people indicated they were interested in attending.
translation.swa: Kutokana na chombo cha habari cha NewsAsia, Mashtaka yalieleza  kuwa watu maelfu walikuwa wamealikwa na watu 366 walionesha wangehudhuria mkutano huo.

translation.en: However, Han said the event only had slightly more than 60 attendees and was pretty standard.
translation.swa: Hata hivyo, Han alisema tukio lile lilihudhuriwa na watu waliozidi kidogo 60 na lilikuwa la kiwango kizuri.

translation.en: The venue wasnt that big anyway, she added.
translation.swa: Hata ukumbi haukuwa mkubwa aliongeza.

translation.en: Blogger Malele Paulo also known as King Faipopo.
translation.swa: Bloga Malele Paulo ambaye anajulikana kama mfalme Faipopo.

translation.en: Source: Facebook
translation.swa: Chanzo: Facebook

translation.en: Samoan police arrested Australia-based blogger Malele Paulo on 8 February while he was visiting the country to attend his mothers funeral.
translation.swa: Askari wa Samoa walimkamata  bloga Malele Paulo aishie Australia tarehe 8 Februari wakati akitembelea nchi hiyo kuhudhuria mazishi ya mama yake.

translation.en: Malele is a known critic of the government who writes under the pen name King Faipopo.
translation.swa: Malele ambaye huikosoa sana serikali kwa jina la kalamu ya Mfalme Faipopo.

translation.en: The police confirmed that Malele was arrested for making false statements with the intention of causing harm to a member of our Samoan communities reputation.
translation.swa: Askari wamethibitisha kwamba Malele alikamatwa kwa kutoa kauli za uongo kwa nia ya kumwuumiza mjumbe wa jumuia ya heshima ya Samoa.

translation.en: In August 2018, Prime Minister Tuilaepa Sailele Malielegaoi filed a defamation complaint against Malele, which appears to have set the stage for his arrest after he entered the country in early February.
translation.swa: Mwezi Agosti 2018, Waziri Mkuu Tuilaepa Sailele Malielegaoi alisajili mahakamani malalamiko ya kukashfiwa dhidi ya Malele na yamesababisha kukamatwa kwake alipoingia nchini mapema mwezi Februari.

translation.en: He was released on bail on 9 February, and was able to attend his mothers funeral.
translation.swa: Awali Malele  aliachiwa  kwa dhamana tarehe 9 Februari, na kwa sababu hiyo aliweza kuhudhuria mazishi ya mama yake.

translation.en: In 2013, Samoa withdrew libel from its criminal law as a media reform initiative.
translation.swa: Mwaka 2013, Samoa iliondoa sheria dhidi ya maandishi yenye lengo la kukashfu  katika sheria yake ya jinai kama mkakati wa mageuzi ya sheria ya vyombo vya habari.

translation.en: But the change didn't last long.
translation.swa: Lakini mabadiliko hayo hayakudumu.

translation.en: At the end of 2017, the parliament of the Polynesian island nation unanimously voted to revive its criminal libel law after Prime Minister Tuilaepa Sailele Malielegaoi said it is needed to fight ghostwriters and troublemakers, despite opposition from media freedom advocates.
translation.swa: Mwishoni mwa mwaka 2017, Bunge la nchi ya kisiwa cha Polynesian walipiga kura bila kupingwa juu ya kurudisha sheria yake ya jinai ya maandishi ya kukashfu  baada ya waziri mkuu Tuilaepa Sailele Malielegaoi kusema  inapaswa kupambana na waandishi waongo na wakorofi, licha ya upinzani mkali kutoka kwa mawakili wa vyombo vya habari.

translation.en: The Tuilaepa government said the law will be used against anonymous bloggers and Facebook users who spread lies and misinformation.
translation.swa: Serikali ya Tuilaepa ilisema sheria hiyo itatumika dhidi ya mabloga na watumiaji wa Facebook wasiojulikana ambao wanasambaza uongo na habari za upotoshaji.

translation.en: The prime minister cited this law in his complaint against Malele, whom he accused of posting false information about him and Samoan politics.
translation.swa: Waziri Mkuu alirejea sheria hii katika malalamiko yake dhidi ya Malele ambaye ameshitakiwa kwa kutuma habari za uongo juu yake na siasa za Samoa.

translation.en: Malele reportedly wrote on his blog that Tuilaepa committed murder, corruption, theft, and gun smuggling.
translation.swa: Ililipotiwa kuwa Malele aliandika kwenye Blogi yake kwamba Tuilaepa alifanya mauaji, wizi, rushwa na biashara ya magendo ya usafirishaji ya silaha.

translation.en: Tuilaepa insisted that he is not against citizens expressing their views:
translation.swa: Tuilaepa alisisitiza kuwa hayupo dhidi ya wananchi wanaotoa mawazo yao:

translation.en: I am not prohibiting anyone from exercising their freedom of speech or freedom of expression but I take issue when the rights of the innocent, like myself are violated through lies and deceit.
translation.swa: Sizuii yeyote kutumia haki yake ya uhuru wa kutoa mawazo au uhuru wa kujieleza bali nachukua hatua pale haki za watu wasio na hatia, kama mimi, zinapovunjwa kupitia uongo na  udanganyifu.

translation.en: This kind of lying and attacking members of the community through social media is what the law was designed to prevent.
translation.swa: Sheria iliundwa kuzuia aina hii ya kuongopa na kushambulia wajumbe wa jumuia kupitia vyombo vya habari.

translation.en: After Tuilaepa filed the defamation complaint, his government sought the extradition of Malele from Australia.
translation.swa: Baada ya Tuilaepa kusajili mahakamani malalamiko ya kukashfiwa, serikali yake inatafuta namna ya kumrudisha Malele nchini kutoka Australia.

translation.en: A police statement concerning Malele's arrest also cautioned the public to avoid making defamatory statements on social media:
translation.swa: Pia, kauli ya polisi juu ya kukamatwa kwa Malele ilitahadharisha umma kuepuka kutoa kauli za kukashfu kupitia vyombo vya habari:

translation.en: The damage that defamatory statements on social media outlets and cyber bullying has done to several members of the community is a matter that these laws are designed to address.
translation.swa: Maumivu yaliyosababishwa kupitia vyombo vya habari kwa baadhi ya wajumbe wa jumuia ni suala ambalo sheria hizi zimeundwa kwa ajili hiyo.

translation.en: Where complaints are laid with the police, we will do our best to assist those being victimised on social media platforms by false statements.
translation.swa: Tutajitahidi kufanya kadri ya uwezo wetu kuwasaidia wale wanaothiriwa na kauli za uongo kwenye majukwaa ya vyombo ya vya habari pindi tu  polisi wanapoleta malalamiko.

translation.en: Pacific Freedom Forum Chair Bernadette Carreon of Palau described Maleles arrest as an attack on freedom of speech:
translation.swa: Mwenyekiti wa baraza la uhuru wa Pacific Bernadette Carreon wa Palau alieleza juu ya kukamatwa kwa Malele kama shambulio dhidi ya uhuru wa kutoa maoni:

translation.en: Focus on fighting corruption, not freedom of speech.
translation.swa: Lenga kupambana na rushwa na sio uhuru wa kutoa maoni.

translation.en: New legislation, based on old criminal libel laws from colonial times, forces Samoa leaders to look backwards, not forwards.
translation.swa: Sheria mpya, ambayo imetokana na sheria ya zamani ya maandishi ya kukashfu, tangu ukoloni, imewasukuma viongozi wa Samoa kugeuka na kuangalia nyuma badala ya kuangalia mbele.

translation.en: Another critic of the government, blogger Ole Palemia, criticized the decision to arrest Malele:
translation.swa: Bloga Ole Palemia ambaye ni mkosoaji mwingine wa serikali, alikosoa  uamuzi wa kumkamata Malele:

translation.en: What the people need to know and always remember is that corrupt PM Tuilaepa and all the politicians are public figures therefore they are subjected to public criticism  that's what you call democracy.
translation.swa: Kitu ambacho watu mara nyingi hukumbuka na wanachotaka kujua ni kwamba mla rushwa waziri Mkuu Tuilaepa na wanasiasa wote ni viongozi wa umma kwa hiyo wanapaswa kukosolewa na umma  hiyo ndiyo inayoitwa demokrasia.

translation.en: Maleles arrest has sparked intense debates in Samoa.
translation.swa: Kukamatwa kwa Malele kumeibua mjadala mkali katika Samoa.

translation.en: A news report surveyed the views of some citizens who expressed concern about the timing of the arrest while others agreed with the defamation case and urged critics to show respect to the countrys prime minister.
translation.swa: Taarifa ya habari iliyotafiti  maoni ya baadhi ya wananchi ambao walieleza juu ya kukamatwa kwa Malele na wengine walikubalina na kesi hiyo ya kukashfu na wakashauri wakosoaji kuwa na heshima kwa waziri mkuu wa nchi.

translation.en: Malele is scheduled to appear before the court on 5 March.
translation.swa: Malele amepangiwa kufikishwa mahakamani tarehe 5 Machi.

translation.en: The 2019 Nigerian presidential candidates [Collage by Nwachukwu Egbunike].Nigeria, Africa's most populous nation, will hold presidential elections on February 16, 2019.
translation.swa: Wagombea wa kiti cha Urais wa Nigeria mwaka 2019 [Picha zimechanganywa na Nwachukwu Egbunike].Naijeria, nchi ya Afrika yenye watu wengi zaidi watafanya uchaguzi wake wa Rais hapo Februari 16, 2019.
