translation.en: Muhammadu Buhari
translation.swa: Muhammadu Buhari

translation.en: The incumbent candidate of the All Progressive Congress, Buhari won the 2011 presidential election after defeating former president Goodluck Jonathan.
translation.swa: Mgombea anayemaliza muda wake kutoka chama cha Maendeleo kwa watu wote. Buhari alishinda kiti cha Uraisi mwaka 2011 baada ya kumshinda rais wa zamani Goodluck Jonathan.

translation.en: Buhari's ascendance to power was based on his integrity and perceived ability to curb corruption and the Boko Haram militancy.
translation.swa: Kuibuka kwa Buhari madarakani kulitokana na uadilifu wake na kudhaniwa kuwa angeweza kutokomeza rushwa na wanamgambo wa Boko Haram.

translation.en: However, under his watch, Nigeria has witnessed continued insecurity with pastoral conflicts between herders and farmers as herders from the north move further south in search of arable lands.
translation.swa: Hata hivyo, chini ya uongozi wake Nigeria imeendelea kushuhudia uvunjifu wa amani na migogoro baina ya wafugaji na wakulima ambapo wafugaji kutoka kaskazini wamesogea kusini zaidi wakitafuta ardhi ya malisho.

translation.en: Also, human rights have taken a nose drive in his administration, with impunity and corruption at the highest levels of government.
translation.swa: Pia, haki za binadamu zimevunjwa sana katika utawala wake, ukatili na rushwa vimeonekana katika ngazi za juu za serikali.

translation.en: Atiku Abubakar [Image from Campaign Organisation Website].
translation.swa: Atiku Abubakar [Picha kutoka katika tovuti ya Kampeni].

translation.en: Atiku Abubakar
translation.swa: Atiku Abubakar

translation.en: Abubakar is the former vice president and candidate of the Peoples Democratic Party.
translation.swa: Abubakar ni makamu wa rais wa zamani na mgombea wa Chama cha Demokrasia kwa Watu.

translation.en: He has tried in the past to win presidential elections but has not been successful.
translation.swa: Amekuwa akijaribu kwa mara mbili mfululizo lakini hakufanikiwa kushinda urais kwa mara zote.

translation.en: However, his campaign received a major boost with the reconciliation with his boss, former President Olusegun Obasanjo  who had described Buhari's administration as a failed government.
translation.swa: Hata hivyo kampeni zake zimepata kuungwa mkono baada ya kupatanishwa na bosi wake, Rais wa zamani Olusegun Obasanjo  ambaye ameuelezea uongozi wa Buhari kama serikali iliyoshindwa.

translation.en: As vice president, Abubakar oversaw the privatization and sale of hundreds of loss-making and poorly managed public enterprises.
translation.swa: Kama makamu wa raisi Abubakar alisimamia ubinafsishwaji na uuzwaji wa mashirika ya Umma yaliyokuwa yakiendeshwa kwa hasara.

translation.en: A few other presidential hopefuls to watch are:
translation.swa: Wagombea wengine ambao wana matumaini kuwaangalia ni:

translation.en: Oby Ezekwesili [Image released by campaign organizers as media resource]
translation.swa: Oby Ezekwesili [picha ilitolewa na mwangalizi wa kampeni kwa ajili ya media]

translation.en: Obiageli [Oby] Ezekwesili
translation.swa: Obiageli [Oby] Ezekwesili

translation.en: Ezekwesili, the only major female candidate in this year's race, served as the minister of solid minerals and later education during the presidency of Olusegun Obasanjo between 1999 to 2007.
translation.swa: Ezekwesili, mwanamke pekee katika kinyang'anyiro cha mwaka huu, alishawahi kuwa waziri wa madini na kisha waziri wa elimu katika kipindi cha Olusegun Obasanjo kati ya 1999 mpaka 2007.

translation.en: She was also former vice president of the Africa division of the World Bank from May 2007 to May 2012.
translation.swa: Pia alikuwa makamu wa Raisi wa Benki ya Dunia divisheni ya Afrika kuanzia Mei 2007 mpaka Mei 2012.

translation.en: Ezekwesili has been at the forefront of the call to rescue about 200 school girls who were abducted by the Boko Haram militant Islamic group in 2014.
translation.swa: Ezekwesili amekuwa mstari wa mbele katika kupambana kuwaokoa wasichana 200 wa shule ambao walitekwa na kikundi cha wanamgambo wa Kiislamu wa Boko Haram mwaka 2014.

translation.en: She is a co-founder of the #BringBackOurGirls (BBOG) Movement.
translation.swa: Ni mwanzilishi mwenza wa kampeni ya #WarudisheniMabintiZetu (BBOG).

translation.en: She is also the presidential flag-bearer of the Allied Congress Party of Nigeria.
translation.swa: Pia ni mpeperusha bendera ya Urais kwa chama cha Washirika Cha Nigeria.

translation.en: Kingsley Moghalu [Image from campaign website].
translation.swa: Kingsley Moghalu [Picha kutoka katika tovuti ya kampeni].

translation.en: Kingsley Moghalu
translation.swa: Kingsley Moghalu

translation.en: Moghalu is a professor of international business and public policy at the Fletcher School of Law and Diplomacy at Tufts University in Massachusetts, USA.
translation.swa: Moghalu ni profesa wa biashara za kimataifa na sera za umma huko Fletcher shule ya sheria na Diplomasia katika chuo kikuu cha Tufts huko Massachusetts, Marekani.

translation.en: Moghalu had previously worked in the United Nations from 1992 to 2008.
translation.swa: Hapo kabla Moghalu alifanya kazi na umoja wa mataifa kuanzia mwaka 1992 hadi 2008.

translation.en: He was deputy governor of the Central Bank of Nigeria from 2009 to 2014, where he led extensive reforms in the Nigerian banking system after the global financial crisis.
translation.swa: Alikuwa naibu gavana wa Benki kuu ya Nigeria kuanzia mwaka 2009 hadi 2014, ambapo aliongoza mabadiliko makubwa katika mfumo wa benki wa Nigeria baada ya mgogoro wa kiuchumi wa dunia.

translation.en: He is the candidate of the Young Progressive Party.
translation.swa: Ni mgombea wa Chama cha Maendeleo ya Vijana Nigeria.

translation.en: Omoyele Sowore [Screen shot from CNBCAfrica interview, Dec 13, 2018].
translation.swa: Omoyele Sowore [Picha kutoka kwa skrini wakati wa mahojiano na kituo cha CNBCAfrica, Dec 13, 2018].

translation.en: Omoyole Sowore
translation.swa: Omoyole Sowore

translation.en: Sowore is the founder and publisher of SaharaReporters (SR), an investigative online newspaper.
translation.swa: Sowore ni muanzilishi na mchapishaji wa Wanahabari wa Sahara (SR), ambalo ni gazeti la habari za uchunguzi la mtandaoni.

translation.en: SR has been described as Africa's Wikileaks.
translation.swa: SR imekuwa ikielezewa kuwa kama mtandao wa Wikileaks ya Afrika .

translation.en: This human rights activist is running under the banner of African Action Congress.
translation.swa: Mwanaharakati huyu wa haki za binadamu anagombea chini ya bendera ya African Action Congress.

translation.en: The race is on for Nigeria's future
translation.swa: Mbio hizi ni kwa ajili ya maisha yajayo ya Nigeria

translation.en: Buhari and Abubakar are the major contenders in this race.
translation.swa: Buhari na Abubakar ndio wagombea wakuu katika uchaguzi huu.

translation.en: Both men have been constants in the political arena in Nigeria.
translation.swa: Wanaume hawa wameshakuwa katika uwanja wa siasa za Nigeria kwa muda mrefu.

translation.en: On the other hand, Ezekwesili, Moghalu, Sowore, the third force, are a  group making their first entry into the partisan political space.
translation.swa: Kwa upande mwingine, Ezekwesili, Moghalu, Sowore, ambao ndio nguvu ya tatu ndilo kundi linaloingia katika siasa za kusaidiana kwa mara ya kwanza.

translation.en: Buhari will be running on the gains of his administration over the past three years and must contend with the fact that Nigeria was recently ranked as the poverty capital of the world.
translation.swa: Buhari atakuwa ananadi mafanikio ya utawala wake kwa kipindi cha miaka mitatu na ni lazima agombee akiwa na ukweli kuwa Nigeria ilitangazwa kama mji mkuu wa umaskini wa dunia.

translation.en: The Punch newspaper described Buharis parochial appointments as unprecedented and has left the country deeply divided.
translation.swa: Gazeti la the Punch lilielezea uteuzi wa kujuana wa Buhari kama usio wa kawaidana ameiacha nchi ikiwa imegawanyika sana.

translation.en: His fight against corruption appears selective and punitive.
translation.swa: Vita yake dhidi ya rushwa ilionekana yenye upendeleo na uonevu.

translation.en: The recent move to try the Chief Justice of the Federation  so close to the presidential election  was described by the Nigerian Bar Association as a pattern of consistent assault on the heads of the two independent arms of government by the Buhari administration.
translation.swa: Hatua yake ya hivi karibu  ya kumshitaki Jaji mkuu wakati uchaguzi umekaribia ilitafsiriwa na chama cha Majaji kuwa ni muendelezo wa mashambulizi dhidi ya wakuu wa taasisi mbili huru za serikali chini ya utawala wa Buhari.

translation.en: Abubakar, on the other hand, is riding on the gains of multiple lucrative business interests.
translation.swa: Kwa upande mwingine Abubakar yeye anajinadi kwa sera za mafanikio ya faida nyingi zilizotokana na biashara.

translation.en: However, he has an uphill task considering the power of incumbency of his major opponent.
translation.swa: Hata hivyo ana kikwazo kikubwa cha kuwaza kuhusu nguvu ya mpinzani wake mkuu anayemaliza muda wake.

translation.en: Whoever wins the 2019 elections will face enormous challenges like the strengthening the economy, internal security, restructuring power and power devolution, and ethnoreligious politics.
translation.swa: Hata hivyo, yeyote atakayeshinda uchaguzi wa 2019 atakumbana na changamoto nyingi ikiwamo kuimarisha uchumi, usalama wa ndani, kupanga mamlaka upya na kupunguza mamlaka ya viongozi , na kuondoa siasa za kidini na kikabila.

translation.en: Editor's note: An earlier version of this post stated that there are 35 presidential candidates and has been updated to reflect that there are 73 presidential candidates.
translation.swa: Angalizo la Mwandishi: Nakala ya mwanzo ya chapisho hili lilieleza kuwa kuna wagombea 35 wa urais na imehuishwa na kuonesha kuwa wapo wagombea wa Urais 73.

translation.en: Eissa Muhamad, from Niger, has been stranded at the Bole International Airport in Addis Ababa, Ethiopia, for two months now.
translation.swa: Eissa Muhamad, kutoka Niger, amekwama kwenye uwanja wa ndege wa Kimataifa wa Bole huko Addis Ababa, Ethiopia, kwa miezi miwili sasa.

translation.en: Photo by Eissa Muhamad, used with permission.
translation.swa: Picha na Eissa Muhamad, imetumika kwa ruhusa.

translation.en: Eissa Muhamad, from Niger, says he has been stranded in the transit section of Bole International Airport in Addis Ababa, Ethiopia, for more than two months, starting on November 6, 2018.
translation.swa: Eissa Muhamad, kutoka Niger, amesema kuwa amekwama katika uwanja wa ndege wa kimataifa wa Bole kwa miezi miwili katika eneo la wasafiri kuanzia Novemba 6, 2018.

translation.en: Muhamad, 24, was deported from Israel where he lived for eight years as a migrant.
translation.swa: Muhamad mwenye miaka 24, alisafirishwa kutoka Israel ambapo aliishi huko kwa miaka nane kama muhamiaji haramu.

translation.en: I met Muhamad on December 12, 2018, at Bole International Airport while in transit in Addis Ababa.
translation.swa: Nilikutana na Muhamad mwezi Disemba 12, 2018 kwenye uwanja wa ndege wa kimataifa wa Bole nikiwa eneo la wasafiri Addis Ababa.

translation.en: Muhamad tells me he has been deported twice from Israel in 2018.
translation.swa: Muhamad aliniambia kwa mwaka 2018, ameshasafirishwa mara mbili kutoka Israel.

translation.en: When he returned to Niger the first time, Muhamad's Israeli travel documents were still valid, so he turned around and booked another flight back to Israel.
translation.swa: Aliporudi Niger kwa mara ya kwanza, nyaraka zake za kusafiria za Israel bado zilikuwa halali hivyo alikata tiketi nyingine na kurejea Israel.

translation.en: When he arrived in Israel, authorities confiscated his travel documents and deported him again back to Niger.
translation.swa: Alipofika Israel, mamlaka walichukua nyaraka zake za kusafiria na kumsafirisha tena kumrudisha nyumbani kwao Niger.

translation.en: When Muhamad returned to Niger the second time, authorities requested proof of citizenship but he failed to produce valid documents, either Israeli or Nigerien, to support his citizenship.
translation.swa: Muhamad aliporudi Niger kwa mara ya pili, mamlaka za huko walihitaji uthibitisho wa uraia wake lakini alishindwa kuthibitisha kwa nyaraka halali za Ki-Israel au za Ki-Niger zinazoonesha uraia wake.

translation.en: Muhamad remained in Nigerien custody for eight days before being deported back to Israel via Ethiopia on an Ethiopian Airlines flight.
translation.swa: Muhamad alibaki mikononi mwa mamlaka za Niger kwa siku nane kabla hajasafirishwa tena kuelekea Israel kupitia Ethiopia kwa ndege ya shirika la ndege la Ethiopia.

translation.en: When he arrived at Bole International Airport in Ethiopia, Ethiopian authorities, in collaboration with the Israeli government,  prevented him from boarding his connecting flight to Israel.
translation.swa: Alipofika uwanja wa ndege wa kimataifa wa Bole huko Ethiopia,  mamlaka za Ethiopia kwa kushirikiana na serikali ya Israel walimzuia kupanda ndege ya kuunganisha kuelekea Israel.

translation.en: They informed him that Israel was not willing to accept him, and since then, he has been stranded inside the airport, stuck between Niger and Israel.
translation.swa: Walimwambia kuwa, serikali ya Israel haipo tayari kumpokea na kuanzia hapo amekwama ndani ya uwanja wa ndege na amebaki njia panda kati ya Israel na Niger.

translation.en: I slept on the chairs, sometimes I slept in the mosque, I didnt take [a] shower for two months because [the] airport [has] no place for a shower, I only wash my face, my hands and my legs, thats all.
translation.swa: Nilikuwa nalala kwenye viti, wakati mwingine nalala msikitini na sikuoga kwa miezi miwili kwa sababu ndani ya uwanja wa ndege hakuna sehemu ya kuogea, niliosha uso wangu, mikono na miguu pekee.

translation.en: Muhamad has attempted to contact the Niger embassy in Addis Ababa, but because he was not able to provide valid documents to prove his Niger citizenship, Muhamad says they were unable to assist him.
translation.swa: Muhamad anasema alishajaribu kuwasiliana na ubalozi wa Niger huko Addis Ababa lakini kwa sababu hakuweza kuonyesha nyaraka halali kuthibitisha uraia wake, walishindwa kumsaidia.

translation.en: As of 2018, Israel currently has 34,000 African migrants who undertook perilous journeys to Israel in search of a better life.
translation.swa: Kwa ilivyokuwa mwaka 2018, kwa sasa Israel ina wahamiaji wa Kiafrika 34,000 ambao walichukua safari za hatari wafike Israel kutafuta maisha bora.

translation.en: But Israel claims many are economic migrants who have put a strain on the economy.
translation.swa: Lakini Israel inalalamika kuwa wengi wao ni wahamiaji wa kiuchumi ambao wanakwamisha uchumi wa Israel.

translation.en: Opting to stay meant jail time and significantly fewer resettlement options.
translation.swa: Kuchagua kubaki inamaanisha kifungo gerezani au chaguo hafifu la makazi.

translation.en: Prime Minister Benjamin Netanyahu and the right-wing Likud party remain focused on targeting those deemed infiltrators.
translation.swa: Waziri Mkuu Benjamin Netanyahu na chama cha mrengo wa kulia cha Likud wamebaki kuwalenga wale wambao wanahisiwa kuwa wamejipenyeza.

translation.en: Israel Democracy Institute study says 66 percent of Israelis support government policies to deport African immigrants.
translation.swa: Utafiti wa Taasisi ya Demokrasia ya Israel unasema kuwa asilimia 66 ya Waisraeli wanaunga mkono utaratibu wa serikali wa kuwarudisha makwao wahamiaji wa Afrika.

translation.en: Muhamad claims that he was legally living in Israel and worked in a factory, and told me the government took away his residency status and threw him out of the country.
translation.swa: Muhamad anadai kuwa alikuwa akiishi Israel kihalali na alikuwa akifanya kazi kwenye kiwanda na anadai kuwa serikali ilimnyang'anya hadhi yake ya kupata makazi na kumtupa nje ya nchi.

translation.en: Ethiopian authorities have not arrested Muhamad and have provided meals for him while staying at the airport.
translation.swa: Mamlaka za Ethiopia haijamkamata Muhamad na imekuwa ikimpatia chakula kwa kipindi chote alichokaa ndani ya uwanja wa ndege.

translation.en: Technically, Ethiopia is a signatory to the 1951 Convention relating to the Status of Refugees and the 1967 Protocol as well as the 1969 Organization of African Unity (OAU) Convention Governing the Specific Aspects of Refugee Problems in Africa, and nearly all refugees entering Ethiopia are granted asylum on a prima facie basis, but Muhamad told me he is not willing to apply for asylum in Ethiopia.
translation.swa: Kitaalamu, Ethiopia ni moja ya watia saini wa azimio la 1951 kuhusu hadhi ya wakimbizi na Protokali ya 1967 na pia 1969 Azimio la Umoja wa Afrika kuhusu utawala wa mambo ya msingi kuhusu matatizo ya wakimbizi barani Afrika na karibu wakimbizi wote wanaoingia Ethiopia hupewa hifadhi kwa msingi wa prima facie, lakini Muhamad aliniambia kuwa hana mpango wa kuomba hifadhi nchini Ethiopia.

translation.en: In this video interview, Muhamad explains to me what it has been like to stay trapped at the airport in Addis Ababa without a clear idea of the future:
translation.swa: Katika mahojiano ndani ya video hii, Muhamad ananieleza jinsi anavyojisikia baada ya kukwama uwanja wa ndege huku akiwa hajui mustakabali wa maisha yake ya baadaye:

translation.en: Screen capture from a video of the Russian Ambassador giving his speech by Africa Guinee TV on YouTube [in French]On January 9, 2019, Alexander Bregadze, the Russian Federation's ambassador to the Republic of Guinea, sent his New Year's compliments to Alpha Condé, president of the West African country.
translation.swa: Picha ya Skrini kutoka katika video ya Balozi wa Urusi akihutubia katika kituo cha runinga cha Africa Guinee TV huko YouTube [kwa Kifaransa]Hapo Januari 9, 2019, Alexander Bregadze, Balozi wa Shirikisho la Urusi kwa Jamuhuri ya Guinea alituma salamu za Mwaka mpya kumpongeza Rais Alpha Condé, wa nchi hiyo ya Afrika Magharibi.

translation.en: He filmed the video greeting in Conakry, the capital, where his diplomatic office is located  and in his speech, broached a particularly sensitive subject  the possibility of Guineans changing the constitution to allow President Condé to seek a third term after his current tenure expires in 2020:
translation.swa: Alirekodi video hiyo ya salamu akiwa huko Conakry, mji mkuu, ambapo ndipo ofisi yake ya kidiplomasia ipo-na katika hotuba yake, alilenga jambo la msingi, uwezekano wa Wa-Guinea kubadilisha katiba yao na kumruhusu Rais Condé kugombea kwa kipindi cha tatu baada ya muhula wake kuisha hapo 2020:

translation.en: Since Guinea has become the Guinea of Alpha Condé, it is truly on the march.
translation.swa: Tangu Guinea imekuwa Guinea ya Alpha Condé, kwa kweli imekuwa katika mwendo.

translation.en: Mr. President, you are a beacon to the youth of your country.
translation.swa: Mheshimiwa Rais, wewe ni kielelezo kwa vijana wa nchi hii.

translation.en: Unfortunately, the principle of political succession, which dominates many constitutions in the world, not all happily, entrenches an attitude of payback: It's our turn now, we must run the country
translation.swa: Bahati mbaya, utaratibu wa kukabidhiana madaraka, ambayo imetawala katiba nyingi duniani, sio wote wanafurahia kuweka msingi wa mtazamo wa kulipa fadhila: Ni muda wetu sasa, lazima tuiendeshe nchi.

translation.en: But constitutions are neither dogma, Bible, nor Quran.
translation.swa: Lakini katiba sio Biblia au Msahafu .

translation.en: Constitutions adapt themselves to reality, he continued in Condé's presence, making it clear that reality did not adapt itself to constitutions: Even for Christians, there's the New Testament and the Old.
translation.swa: Katiba zijiakisi katika uhalisia, aliendelea kusema mbele ya Condé, akiweka wazi kuwa, uhalisia haujajiakisi katika Katiba yenyewe: Hata kwa Wakristo, kuna Agano Jipya na Agano la Kale.

translation.en: According to the ambassador, all is well in Guinea.
translation.swa: Kulingana na balozi, mambo yote ni sawa ndani ya Guinea.

translation.en: And yet, the facts reflect another reality.
translation.swa: Lakini hata hivyo hali halisi inaonesha ukweli mwingine.

translation.en: Teachers went on a general strike this year that lasted three months, unemployment is growing nationwide, and Guinea was found to be the chief country of origin for illegal migrants entering Europe in 2018, with a staggering statistic of 13,068 people.
translation.swa: Waalimu waliingia katika mgomo wa pamoja mwaka huu ambao ulidumu kwa miezi mitatu, ukosefu wa ajira umeongezeka maradufu na imegundulika kuwa wahamiaji wengi haramu wanaoingia huko Ulaya kwa mwaka 2018 asili yao ni nchini Guinea, takwimu zikioneshwa wanakaribia watu 13,068.

translation.en: Yet, the ambassador went on:
translation.swa: Bado balozi aliendelea kusema:

translation.en: Before our eyes, Guinea is becoming the most electrified country in Africa.
translation.swa: Mbele ya macho yetu, Guinea inakuwa nchi iliyosambaa huduma ya umeme zaidi Afrika.

translation.en: Year after year, the roads between Conakry and the regions are getting easier to drive.
translation.swa: Mwaka hadi mwaka barabara kati ya Conakry na mikoani zinarahisha usafirishaji.

translation.en: In an article for the newspaper Vision Guinée, journalist Pathé Bah writes that Ousmane Kaba, a former strategic adviser of President Condé, acknowledged in a public intervention:
translation.swa: Katika makala ya gazeti la Vision Guinée, mwandishi wa habari Pathé Bah aliandika kuwa Ousmane Kaba, mshauri wa mipango wa zamani wa Rais Condé, alifahamika kwa kusimamia maslahi ya umma:

translation.en: Guinea is in darkness.
translation.swa: Guinea iko gizani.

translation.en: There is no electricity in our country.
translation.swa: Hakuna umeme katika nchi yetu.

translation.en: That is why I have fought for the money to build Kaleta [a hydroelectric power station] on the Konkouré [river].
translation.swa: Ndiyo maana nilipigania fedha za kujenga Kaleta [kinu cha kufulia umeme wa maji] katika mto Konkouré.

translation.en: We are fighting to get many reservoirs on the Konkouré, because it takes the country forward.
translation.swa: Tunapambana kupata mgawo mkubwa kwa ajili ya Konkouré, kwa sababu unaipeleka nchi mbele.

translation.en: As for the country's economy, the finance minister estimates the level of growth at 5.8 percent for 2018, with an inflation rate of 8 percent.
translation.swa: Na kwa uchumi wa nchi, waziri wa fedha alikadiria kiwango cha ukuaji kuwa kwa asilimia 5.8 kwa mwaka 2018, kukiwa na mfumuko wa bei wa asilimia 8.

translation.en: The African Development Bank reckons that Guinea marked growth in the gross domestic product (GDP) of 6.6 percent in 2016 and 6.4 percent in 2017  but that didn't stop the ambassador from declaring exaggerated numbers to indicate growth:
translation.swa: Benki ya Maendeleo ya Afrika ilihakiki kuwa Guinea imefikia kukua kwa pato la ndani kwa asilimia 6.6 kwa mwaka 2016 na asilimia 6.4 kwa mwaka 2017  lakini hilo halikumzuia balozi kutangaza namba zilizokuzwa tu ili kuonesha uchumi unakua:

translation.en: Over the last few years, we have seen an increase of between 10.5 percent in 2016, and from 6 to 7 per cent in 2018, with a forecast of 7 percent in 2019  Do you know many countries in Africa which are doing better?
translation.swa: Kwa miaka michache iliyopita, tumeona ongezeko la kukua kwa uchumi kati ya asilimia 10.5 mwaka 2016 na kuanzia asilimia 6 hasi 7 asilimia kwa mwaka 2018 likiwa na matarajio ya asilimia 7 kwa mwaka 2019.Mnafahamu ni nchi ngapi za Afrika zinazofanya vyema?

translation.en: The ambassador added road conditions to his litany of praise for the president.
translation.swa: Balozi aliongezea hali ya barabara katika litania yake ya sifa kwa Raisi.

translation.en: However, Alimou Sow, an eminent Guinean blogger, shared a contradictory experience on his blog:
translation.swa: Hata hivyo, Alimou Sow, bloga maarufu wa Guinea alishirikisha habari yenye ukinzani katika blogu yake:

translation.en: I've been up since daybreak to confront, alone, what is judged to be the most difficult stretch, Conakry-Kindia  135 kilometers, which one could complete, a few years ago, in a little under two hours by the stopwatch.
translation.swa: Nimekuwa macho tangu kulipopambazuka nikipambana mwenyewe na barabara inayosadikiwa kuwa korofi zaidi ya kutoka Conakry kwenda Kindia kilomita 135, ambapo miaka michache iliyopita ungetumia chini ya masaa mawili ukipima muda.

translation.en: Now, you must add two more hours to crawl the same distance, turned into a dream route for an endurance rally à la Paris-Dakar, so perilous is the state of the road.
translation.swa: Sasa, lazima uongeze japo saa nyingine mbili kutambaa umbali ule ule, na imegeuka kuwa barabara ya ndoto kwa ajili ya mbio za magari za uvumilivu za à la Paris-Dakar, ni hatari sana kwa hali hiyo ya barabara.

translation.en: In 2016, members of the Guinea Bloggers Association launched a campaign to draw attention to the state of the country's roads, and show their exasperation via the hashtag #montronsnosroutes [let's show our roads].
translation.swa: Mwaka 2016, wanachama wa chama cha mabloga wa Guinea, walianzisha kampeni ya kuamsha uelewa kuhusu hali ya barabara  za nchini na walionesha kukasirishwa kwao kwa kutumia hashtagi #montronsnosroutes [tuoneshe barabara zetu].

translation.en: The Guinea Bloggers Association will start a campaign to denounce the state of the road in Guinea.
translation.swa: Chama cha Mabloga Guinea wataanzisha kampeni kukemea hali ya barabara za Guinea.

translation.en: The idea is to share a photo on social media with the #ShowOurRoads hashtag.
translation.swa: Wazo kuu ni kushirikisha picha katika mitandao ya kijamii zikiwa na kauli mbiu #TuonesheBarabaraZetu.

translation.en: Launch image for the de Guinea Bloggers Association's campaign #montronsnosroutes.
translation.swa: Picha ya ufunguzi wa kampeni ya Chama cha Mabloga wa Guinea #montronsnosroutes.

translation.en: Used with permission.
translation.swa: Imetumika kwa ruhusa.

translation.en: The Russian ambassador's speech has caused embarrassment to both civil society and the diplomatic community.
translation.swa: Hotuba ya Balozi wa Urusi imeleta fadhaa kwa jamii na jumuiya za kiraia na zile za kidiplomasia.

translation.en: Guinea's opposition leader, Cellou Dalein Diallo, castigated the diplomat's attitude in these terms, quoted by Balla Yombouno in the newspaper Le Djely:
translation.swa: Kiongozi wa upinzani wa Guinea, Cellou Dalein Diallo, amekosoa mtazamo wa mwanadiplomasia huyo kwa kuelezea, imenukuliwa na Balla Yombouno katika gazeti la Le Djely:

translation.en: He has been manipulated by Alpha Condé himself.
translation.swa: Amekuwa akiendeshwa na Condé mwenyewe.

translation.en: And we know that he is the representative of a great nation, a great country which actively participated in the decolonisation of the African continent, and which has had an exemplary relationship with Guinea in respect of the principle of non-interference in internal affairs [] We will be striving to contact the Russian government to press this position
translation.swa: Na tunajua kuwa yeye ni mwakilishi wa nchi kubwa, nchi yenye nguvu iliyoshiriki kikamilifu katika kuuondoa ukoloni barani Afrika, na ambayo imekuwa na uhusiano wa mfano na Guinea kwa kuheshimu kanuni ya kutokuingilia masuala ya ndani ya nchi.Tunapambana kuwasiliana ma serikali ya Urusi ili kuweka msisitizo katika eneo hilo

translation.en: Speaking on behalf of civil society activists, Gabriel Haba, president of the Citizen Action Brigade, expressed  indignation sparked by the ambassador's support; journalist Ibrahima Sory Barry posted about it for Aminata.com:
translation.swa: Akiongea kwa niaba ya wanaharakati wa mashirika ya kijamii, Gabriel Haba, Rais wa Brigedi ya Hatua za Kiraia, alielezea  hasira iliyoamshwa na balozi kwa kuunga mkono huko; mwanahabari Ibrahima Sory Barry aliandika katika mtandao wa Aminata.com:

translation.en: The question of political succession is a question of sovereignty.
translation.swa: Suala la kupokezana madaraka kisiasa ni suala huru.

translation.en: And sovereignty belongs to the people.
translation.swa: Na uhuru uko kwa wananchi.

translation.en: It is not part of an ambassador's role to dictate Guinea's fate.
translation.swa: Sio sehemu ya majukumu ya balozi kusimamia majaliwa ya Guinea.

translation.en: It is an interference in our country's internal affairs.
translation.swa: Hii ni kuingilia mambo ya ndani ya nchi yetu.

translation.en: The civil society organisation Cellule Balai Citoyen (Citizen's Sweep Up) published a press release, which read in part:
translation.swa: Shirika la Juimiya ya Kiraia Cellule Balai Citoyen (Citizen's Sweep Up) walitoa waraka kwa vyombo vya habari uliokuwa unasomeka hivi kwa sehemu:

translation.en: Guinea is at risk of an unprecedented embarassment which is liable to unleash a sociopolitical impetus for a third term in violation of the current constitution and indeed, the ethics of democratic governance.
translation.swa: Guinea ipo katika hatari ya aibu ambayo haijawahi kutokea na hii ni endapo kutachomekwa kipindi cha tatu kutokana na msukumo wa kisiasa na kijamii na kuvunja katiba iliyopo na hakika taratibu za utawala wa kidemokrasia.

translation.en: This increasingly palpable attempt could give rise to political violence with serious human rights violations in our country, which is still struggling to make good the heavy legacy of this kind from independence to our own time.
translation.swa: Majaribio yanayoonekana kuongezeka yanaweza kuamsha vurugu za kisiasa yakiwa na uvunjifu mkubwa wa haki za binadamu katika nchi yetu, ambayo bado inapambana kujiweka kumbukumbu nzuri na nzito ya urithi tangu uhuru mpaka sasa.

translation.en: On Facebook, writer and commentator Ibrahim Marie Sanoh wrote:
translation.swa: Huko Facebook, mwandishi na mtoa maoni Ibrahim Marie Sanoh aliandika:

translation.en: It's pretty peculiar that it takes a foreigner to pay tribute to the Guinean regime's feats, and plead for it to be given more years to make the country the most electrified in the world's most industrial continent, while the people who have brought it to power manifest a cruel indifference and have nothing to say.
translation.swa: Ni namna ya kipekee na inayopendeza kuona raia wa kigeni akitoa mchango wake katika uongozi wa Guinea kwa kuomba uongozi huo upewe miaka zaidi ili kuifanya nchi hiyo iwe nchi iliyosambaa umeme kuliko nchi zote za bara lenye viwanda vingi zaidi duniani, wakati watu waliouweka uongozi huo madarakani wanatendwa kikatili na hawana la kusema .

translation.en: Meanwhile, the behaviour of other ambassadors attracted the attention of Guinean blogger Nouhou Baldé:
translation.swa: Wakati huo huo, tabia za mabalozi wengine zilivuta hisia za bloga wa Guinea Nouhou Baldé:

translation.en: This declaration is so serious that the silence of the rest can't so easily excuse it.
translation.swa: Azimio hili ni hatari kiasi kwamba ukimya wa mabalozi wengine hauwezi ukachukuliwa kirahisi.

translation.en: All the more so as some of those who have spoken up since (the Moroccan ambassador, the representative of the World Bank) have said the same as  that is to say, no better than  their Russian counterpart.
translation.swa: Wote ni sawa tu hata na wale waliozungumziwa (balozi wa Morocco na mwakilishi wa Benki ya Dunia..) wamesema yaleyale, hivyo ni kusema hawana utofauti na mwenzao,  balozi wa Urusi.

translation.en: No one has disassociated themselves from this declaration and no embassy has published a communiqué
translation.swa: Hakuna hata mmoja aliyejiengua katika tamko hilo na hakuna ubalozi ulishatoa waraka kuhusu jambo hilo.

translation.en: On January 14, security forces dispersed a demonstration outside the Russian embassy, which civil society organisations had organised in protest over the ambassador's comments.
translation.swa: Hapo Januari 14, mamlaka za ulinzi zilitawanya  maandamano yaliyoandaliwa nje ya ubalozi wa Urusi na  mashirika ya kiraia yakipinga kuhusu maoni ya balozi.

translation.en: Olusegun Obasanjo, former President of Nigeria.
translation.swa: Rais Mstaafu wa Naijeria Olusegun Obasanjo.

translation.en: ]As Nigeria prepares for another presidential election in February, retired military generals turned politicians are key to understanding Nigeria's political space.
translation.swa: ]Wakati Nigeria wakijiandaa na uchaguzi mwingine wa Rais mwezi wa pili, maafisa wa jeshi wastaafu waliogeuka kuwa wanasiasa wamekuwa kielelezo cha kuelewa uelekeo wa siasa za Nigeria.

translation.en: Nigeria has been ruled by either former generals or those who have their support since 1999 when democratic governance returned.
translation.swa: Naigeria imekuwa ikiongozwa na labda Jenerali Mstaafu au wale wanaoungwa mkono na majenerali hao tango 1999 pale mfumo wa serikali ya kidemokrasia uliporejea.

translation.en: The recent public feud between former President Olusegun Obasanjo and the incumbent President Muhammadu Buhari  both retired military dictators  has a great impact on next month's elections.
translation.swa: Mgongano wa wazi wa hivi karibuni kati ya Rais wa zamani  Olusegun Obasanjo na Rais anayemaliza muda wake Muhammadu Buhari  wote wakiwa Madikteta wastaafu wa jeshi  una mchango mkubwa katika uchaguzi wa mwezi wa pili.

translation.en: In a rare open letter to Buhari, Obasanjo has accused him of plans to rig the 2019 elections.
translation.swa: Katika barua ya wazi isiyo ya kawaida kwa Buhari, Obasanjo alimtuhumu kwa kupanga kuiba kura katika uchaguzi wa 2019.

translation.en: He wrote:
translation.swa: Aliandika:

translation.en: Democracy becomes a sham if elections are carried out by people who should be impartial and neutral umpires, but who show no integrity, acting with blatant partiality, duplicity and imbecility.
translation.swa: Demokrasia hukosa maana kama uchaguzi utafanywa na watu ambao wanatakiwa wasiwe na upendeleo na wawe na maamuzi yasiyoegemea upande wowote lakini wanaonyesha kutokuwa na uaminifu wakitenda kwa upendeleo bila kificho tena kwa kurudia rudia na kwa upumbavu.

translation.en: Obasanjo insisted that Buhari would not deliver free, fair, credible and peaceful elections and warned that what is happening under Buharis watch can be likened to what we witnessed under Gen. Sani Abacha.
translation.swa: Obasanjo alisisitiza kuwa Buhari anaweza asiitishe uchaguzi huru na wa haki na akaonya kuwa yanayotokea wakati wa Buhari yanaweza yakawa kama tuliyoshuhudia wakati wa Jenerali Sani Abacha.

translation.en: In 1998, Sani Abacha, a military dictator, had called for general elections but it became obvious that Abacha had no intention of handing power over to civilians.
translation.swa: Mwaka 1998, Sani Abacha, Dikteta wa kijeshi, aliitisha uchaguzi mkuu lakini ilikuwa wazi hakuwa mpango wa kukabidhi madaraka kwa wananchi.

translation.en: The five political parties at the time endorsed Abacha as their sole presidential candidate.
translation.swa: Vyama vitano vya siasa kwa wakati huo vilimsimamisha Abacha kama mgombea wao pekee wa Urais.

translation.en: Now deceased, Abacha became infamous for his repression of human rights and corruption.
translation.swa: Abacha ambaye kwa sasa ni marehemu amekuwa sio maarufu miongoni mwa wananchi kwa sababu alikandamiza haki za binadamu na alikula rushwa.

translation.en: Obasanjo alleged that Buhari was towing the same path as Abacha in mad desperation.
translation.swa: Obasanjo alidai kuwa Buhari anapita njia ile ile ya Abacha ndani ya ukichaa wa kukata tamaa.

translation.en: Shehu Garba, the media assistant to President Buhari, dismissed Obasanjo's letter:
translation.swa: Shehu Garba, afisa habari msaidizi wa Rais Buhari, aliipuzia barua ya Obasanjo:

translation.en: The elections starting in February will be free and fair as promised the nation and the international community by President Buhari.
translation.swa: Uchaguzi unaoanza mwezi Februari utakuwa huru na haki kama Rais Buhari alivyouhaidi umma na jumuiya za kimataifa.

translation.en: Obasanjo, the letter writer?
translation.swa: Obasanjo, mwandishi wa barua?

translation.en: Olusegun Obasanjo, former military head of state (1976-1979) and later Nigerias democratically elected president (1999-2007), has consistently criticized successive governments in Nigeria.
translation.swa: Olusegun Obasanjo, Mwanajeshi na mkuu wa jeshi mstaafu (1976-1979) na baadaye Rais wa Naijeria aliyechaguliwa kidemokrasia (1999-2007), amekuwa akizikosoa mara kwa mara serikali za Nigeria zilizokuja baada yake.

translation.en: Last year, Obasanjo had advised Buhari not to seek re-election as president but to consider a deserved rest at this point in time and at this age.
translation.swa: Mwaka jana, Obasanjo alimshauri Buhari asitafute kipindi cha pili cha Urais katika uchaguzi unaokuja badala yake afikirie kupumzika kwa kuwa anastahili kwa sababu ya nyakati na pia umri.

translation.en: This advice caused ripples in Nigeria because Obasanjo was a strong supporter of the Buharis candidacy during the 2015 presidential elections.
translation.swa: Ushauri huu ulileta mgawanyiko nchini Naijeria kwa sababu Obasanjo alimuunga mkono mkuu Buhari wakati wa uchaguzi wa Rais 2015.

translation.en: Prior, Obasanjo had scolded Goodluck Jonathan in a public letter written in 2013, Obasanjo accused Jonathan of driving the country to the precipice and allowing deceit, corruption and mutual distrust to tear at the fabric of the nation.
translation.swa: Hapo kabla Obasanjo alimkosoa Rais Goodluck Jonathan katika barua ya wazi aliyoiandika mwaka 2013, Obasanjo akimtuhumu Jonathan kuipeleka nchi katika uharibifu kwa kuruhusu udanganyifu, rushwa na kutokuaminiana kuchana vazi la taifa.

translation.en: Ironically, Obasanjo had also supported Jonathan's election in 2011.
translation.swa: Cha kushanza ni kuwa pia  Obasanjo aliunga mkono uchaguzi wa Jonathan hapo 2011.

translation.en: And in 2007, he promoted the election of Jonathan Goodluck's predecessor, Umaru Musa YarAdua.
translation.swa: Na mwaka 2007, alichochea kuchaguliwa kwa mtangulizi wa Jonathan, Umaru Musa YarAdua.

translation.en: However, Obasanjo went against YarAdua when the latter became sick and did not hand properly hand over power to Jonathan, his then deputy.
translation.swa: Hata hivyo, Obasanjo alikwenda kinyume na YarAdua alipougua na hakukabidhi mamlaka ipasavyo kwa Jonathan, aliyekuwa Makamu wake wakati huo.

translation.en: Former Nigerian President Goodluck Jonathan with newly sworn-in President Muhammadu Buhari during his inauguration ceremony on May 29, 2015.
translation.swa: Rais Mstaafu wa Nigeria Goodluck Jonathan akiwa na Rais mpya aliyeapishwa Rais Muhammadu Buhari katika sherehe za kuapishwa kwake Mei 29, 2015.

translation.en: Public Domain photo from the US State Department.
translation.swa: Picha za Masijala ya Umma kutoka Idara Nchi-Marekani.

translation.en: Retired generals never rest in Nigeria
translation.swa: Majenerali waliostaafu Nigeria huwa hawapumziki

translation.en: Nigerias political landscape is held by retired generals or their cronies.
translation.swa: Mazingira ya siasa za Nigeria yameshikiliwa na majenerali wastaafu wa jeshi au maswaiba zao.

translation.en: Obasanjo, for instance, has been instrumental in the emergence of Nigerian presidents from 2007 to 2015.
translation.swa: Kwa mfano Obasanjo, amekuwa kiungo kikubwa katika kupatikana kwa maraisi wa Nigeria kuanzia 2007 mpaka 2015.

translation.en: However, unlike civilians  YarAdua and Jonathan  who he promoted and also criticized, Buhari is somewhat different.
translation.swa: Hata hivyo ukiacha raia YarAdua na Jonathan  ambao aliwaunga mkono na kisha kuwakosoa, kwa namna fulani Buhari ni tofauti.

translation.en: Although Obasanjo supported Buharis election in 2015, he cannot fully take the praise alone.
translation.swa: Ingawa Obasanjo aliunga mkono uchaguzi wa Buhari 2015, hawezi akachukua heshima hiyo mwenyewe.

translation.en: This is because Buharis ascendance to power was made possible by his allegiance with Bola Tinubus defunct Action Congress of Nigeria (ACN).
translation.swa: Na hii ni kwa sababu kuingia madarakani kwa Buhari iliwezekana kwa sababu alifanya ushirikiano na marehemu Bola Tinubu wa chama cha Action Congress of Nigeria (ACN).

translation.en: Buharis Congress for Progressive Change (CPC) later merged with ACN, in February 2013, to form the All Progressive Congress (APC) .
translation.swa: Baadaye Chama cha Buhari Congress for Progressive Change (CPC) kiliungana na ACN, mwezi Februari 2013, na kuunda Chama cha Maendeleo kwa Wote (APC) .

translation.en: In addition, Buhari a former military head of state (1983-1985) is a member of the club of retired generals who have dominated Nigerias political space.
translation.swa: Kwa kuongezea, Buhari alikuwa Mkuu wa jeshi mstaafu (1983-1985) ni mwanachama wa klabu ya Majenerali wastaafu ambao wameshikilia ulimwengu wa siasa za Nigeria.

translation.en: Therefore, as harsh as Obasanjos reprimand might sound, a lot depends on the dynamics of the power block to which they both belong.
translation.swa: Kwa hiyo, haijalishi karipio la Obasanjo ni kali namna gani, mengi yatategemea mwenendo wa mfumo wa mamlaka nzima ambapo wote ni wahusika.

translation.en: Obasanjo is not alone, however, in his criticism of Buhari.
translation.swa: Hata hivyo Obasanjo hayupo mwenyewe katika kumkosoa Buhari.

translation.en: Theophilus Danjuma, a retired general, had in March last year accused the Nigerian armed forces of aiding the ongoing killings in Nigeria.
translation.swa: Theophilus Danjuma, ambaye ni Jenerali Mstaafu wa jeshi mwezi Machi mwaka jana alilituhumu jeshi la Nigeria kufadhili mauaji yanayoendelea nchini Nigeria .

translation.en: Danjuma, a former chief of army staff and later minister of defense, chastised the military for taking sides in the pastoral/farmer crisis in the country, but especially in his home state of Taraba.
translation.swa: Danjuma, ambaye ni mkuu wa majeshi mstaafu na baadaye akawa waziri wa ulinzi alilaumu jeshi kwa kuwa na upendeleo katika mgogoro baina ya Wakulima na wafugaji nchini, na hasa huko nyumbani kwake, Jimbo la Taraba.

translation.en: Similarly, Danjuma recently raised an alarm about plans to use the police and soldiers to manipulate the 2019 elections.
translation.swa: Vilevile, hivi karibuni Danjuma alitoa tahadhari kuhusu mipango ya kutumia wanajeshi na polisi kuendesha uchaguzi wa 2019.

translation.en: Similarly, in February last year, former military head of state Ibrahim Babangida publicly advised President Buhari not to stand for re-election, arguing that 21st century Nigeria needs to tap younger generations.
translation.swa: Vile vile, Februari mwaka jana, mkuu wa jeshi mstaafu Ibrahim Babangida alimshauri hadharani Rais Buhari kutokugombea tena katika uchaguzi huu akisema kuwa katika karne hii ya 21, Nigeria inahitaji kizazi kipya .

translation.en: He believes that there comes a time in the life of a nation when personal ambition should not override national interest.
translation.swa: Anaamini kuwa zitakuja nyakati katika maisha ambapo maslahi binafsi hayawezi kupindua maslahi ya Taifa.

translation.en: But it may be a while before Nigeria gets a civilian president who has no links or backing from the retired generals club.
translation.swa: Lakini itachukua muda kidogo mpaka Nigeria ije ipate Rais wa Kiraia ambaye ahusiani au hana ushirika na klabu ya Majenerali wajeshi wastaafu..

translation.en: The lie of the land April 8, 2009  courtesy Elizabeth Donoghue Flickr account(CC BY-NC-ND 2.0)
translation.swa: Anguko la ardhi hapo April 8, 2009  Picha na hisank ya Elizabeth Donoghue  katika akaunti ya Flickr (CC BY-NC-ND 2.0)

translation.en: Ten years ago, on Saturday 7 February 2009, Victoria experienced catastrophic bushfires which killed 173 people, injuring more than four hundred and destroying over two thousand homes.
translation.swa: Miaka kumi iliyopita siku ya Jumamosi 7 Februari 2009, Victoria ilipatwa na janga la nyika kuwaka moto ambapo watu 173 waliuawa na zaidi ya mia nne kujeruhiwa na makazi zaidi ya elfu mbili kuharibiwa na moto huo.

translation.en: Seven people died later as the result of their injuries.
translation.swa: Watu saba walifariki baadaye kutokana na majeraha.

translation.en: During the week of the 2019 anniversary, Victorians have remembered Black Saturday, with mainstream media presenting many personal stories of the fires.
translation.swa: Katika Juma la maadhimisho hayo kwa mwaka 2019, wakazi wa Victoria waliikumbuka Jumamosi Nyeusi  , kwa vyombo vikubwa vya habari kuonesha habari nyingi za watu binafsi kuhusu moto huo.

translation.en: ABC Melbourne, the local arm of the national broadcaster, commemorated the victims by sharing stories from survivors.
translation.swa: ABC Melbourne, chombo cha habari cha huko kilikumbuka wahanga kwa kushirikisha habari za manusura wa janga hilo.

translation.en: Others have shared their memories online.
translation.swa: Wengine walishirikisha kumbukumbu zao mitandaoni.

translation.en: On her blog, The small Adventurer, Indya recounts losing her home and shares the impact of the fires on her life since that day:
translation.swa: Indya, katika blogu yake ya Mtembezi Mdogo, alielezea jinsi alivyopoteza makazi yake na akashirikisha madhara ya moto ule katika maisha yake kuanzia wakati ule:

translation.en: Ten entire years, and I still dont think one single day has passed without me mentioning  or at least thinking about  the fires.
translation.swa: Miaka kumi yote imepita lakini sidhani kama ipo siku moja inapita bila mimi kutamka au kufikiria kuhusu moto.

translation.en: [] I am also still really, really nervous around things like ovens, stoves, heaters, and even lighters.
translation.swa: [] Hakika bado nina kihoro na nina wasiwasi ninapokuwa karibu na vitu vya moto kama vile oveni, hita na hata viberiti.

translation.en: As a baker, you can imagine how difficult having those fears is when Im going to take something out of the oven, and suddenly something doesnt move the way I expect it to or something like that, and I instantly freeze up and freak out.
translation.swa: Kama muokaji unaweza kuona ni kwa kiasi gani napata tabu nikiwa na hofu hizo hasa ninapoenda kutoa kitu kwenye oveni halafu ghafla jambo linaenda kinyume na matarajio au kitu kingine kama hicho huwa napata hofu ya ghafla na kufadhaika.

translation.en: [] Tomorrow I will be thinking of all those who had it much worse than me, and hoping that the people who are still alive and lost so much more are doing okay.
translation.swa: [] Kesho nitakuwa nawaza kuhusu wote waliopatwa na mabaya kuliko mimi na naamini kuwa wale walio hai bado na waliopoteza vitu vingi wanaendelea vyema.

translation.en: But, I will also be thinking about myself, and allowing myself to feel whatever I happen to feel, because my feelings are valid too.
translation.swa: Lakini pia nitakuwa natafakari juu yangu na kuruhusu kujisikia vyovyote nitakavyojisikia kwa sababu hisia zangu ni sahihi pia.

translation.en: My fear and sadness is valid too, and always have been, it just took me a while to realise it.
translation.swa: Hofu yangu na huzuni ni sahihi pia na imekuwa hivyo mara zote imekuwa hivyo ila nilichelewa kutambua hilo.

translation.en: Dianne McNamara posted only the second tweet on this account:
translation.swa: Dianne McNamara aliposti ujumbe pekee wa pili katika ukaunti hii akisema:

translation.en: 10 years on.
translation.swa: miaka 10 sasa.

translation.en: My heart and soul changed forever.
translation.swa: Moyo wangu na roho yangu vilibadilika milele.

translation.en: As always, my thoughts are with every person affected by Black Saturday.
translation.swa: Kama kawaida mawazo yangu yako na wahanga wote wa Jumamosi Nyeusi.

translation.en: I am forever grateful for the help my family and I received from those on and off the mountain.
translation.swa: Nitashukuru milele kwa msaada mimi na familia yangu tuliopokea kutoka kwa walio juu na nje ya milima.

translation.en: I was luckier than some.
translation.swa: Nilikuwa na bahati kuliko baadhi ya watu.

translation.en: Melbourne lawyer Georgia was fifteen at the time.
translation.swa: Mwanasheria wa Melbourne, Georgia alikuwa na miaka kumi na tano wakati huo.

translation.en: She summed up the feelings of many:
translation.swa: Aliwakilisha hisia za wengi:

translation.en: 10 years since my dad jumped in the car with my neighbour and headed towards the devastating fires to rescue my neighbours parents.
translation.swa: Ni miaka 10 tangu baba yangu arukie kwenye gari na jirani yetu wakiwahi kwenda kuwaokoa wazazi wa jirani yetu.

translation.en: 10 years since those same fires took so many lives, so many homes, so many animals and so many livelihoods.
translation.swa: Miaka 10 tangu moto huo huo uyachukue maisha ya watu wengi, makazi mengi na maisha ya wanyama wengi.

translation.en: We will never forget #BlackSaturday
translation.swa: Hatutaisahau #JumamosiNyeusi

translation.en: Robin Steenberg shared a devastating memory:
translation.swa: Robin Steenberg alishirikisha kumbukumbu ya kusikitisha:

translation.en: 10 years ago, my best man, and his family, perished in the Black Saturday Fires, north of Melbourne, Australia.
translation.swa: Ni miaka 10 iliyopita rafiki yangu na familia yake waliangamia katika moto ule wa Jumamosi Nyeusi , Kaskazini mwa Melbourne, Australia.

translation.en: Still feels like yesterday.
translation.swa: Bado naona ni kama jana tu.

translation.en: Our thoughts go out for there Families.
translation.swa: Fikra zetu ziendee familia zote.

translation.en: RIP My dear friends.
translation.swa: Lala mahala pema peponi rafiki zangu.

translation.en: Many people are connecting the Black Saturday tragedy to current extreme weather conditions that are wreaking havoc in other parts of the country.
translation.swa: Watu wengi wanaunganisha janga la Jumamosi Nyeusi na hali mbaya ya hewa ya sasa ambayo inaleta madhara katika maeneo mengine ya nchi.

translation.en: Another natural disaster with extraordinary flooding has hit Northern Queensland following record rainfall.
translation.swa: Janga lingine la asili la mafuriko limeikumba ukanda wa Kaskazini mwa Queensland ikifuatiwa na mvua.

translation.en: Blair Drysdale gave some sense of the impact in inland areas:
translation.swa: Blair Drysdale alielezea baadhi ya madhara katika maeneo ya bara:

translation.en: This is a mates farm north of Julia Creek in North Queensland, his whole farm is like this.all 150,000 acres.
translation.swa: Hili ni shamba la Julia Creek huko North Queensland, shamba lake lote ni kamahekari 150,000. pic.twitter.com/dv2k6kzqDn

translation.en: The situation in the coastal city of Townsville was also extreme.
translation.swa: Hali katika mji wa Pwani wa Townsville hali ilikuwa mbaya pia.

translation.en: Video news agency Ruptly documented the torrents:
translation.swa: Kampuni ya uzalishaji video ya Ruptly ilirekodi mafuriko hayo:

translation.en: #Townsville hit by record flooding as dam gates opened#Australia pic.twitter.com/zYjFtnIjke
translation.swa: #Townsville umekumbwa na mafuriko kama milango ya bwawa imefunguliwa#Australia pic.twitter.com/zYjFtnIjke

translation.en: Melburnian Ann Moorfield made the connection:

translation.swa: Hatimaye, Adrian Cutts aliangazia ukuaji wa mitandao ya kijamii tangu siku ya Jumamosi Nyeusi:

translation.swa: Kama bahati, kesho pia itakuwa miaka 10 tangu WaAustralia wengi wajue Twita ilikuwa nini.

translation.en: Black Saturday was the turning point for Twitter in this country, from when it was perceived to be a untested medium, to becoming a part of our lives.
translation.swa: Jumamosi Nyeusi ilikuwa mwanzo wa mageuzi ya Twita katika nchi hii, kuanzia pale ilipokuwa inachukuliwa kama njia ya mawasiliano isiyo na uhakika na sasa imekuwa sehemu ya maisha yetu.

translation.en: Survivors who lost relatives and houses rest outside following the June 5 attack in the village of Naunde in Cabo Delgado, Mozambique.
translation.swa: Manusura waliopoteza ndugu zao na nyumba zao wakiwa wamejipumzisha kufuatia shambulizi la Juni 5 katika kijiji cha Naunde huko Cabo Delgado, Msumbiji.

translation.en: Photo by Borges Nhamire, used with permission.
translation.swa: Picha na Borges Nhamire, imetumika kwa ruhusa.

translation.en: Mozambican journalist Amade Abubacar was arrested on January 5, while reporting on a trend of violent attacks on small villages in Mozambique's province of Cabo Delgado.
translation.swa: Mwandishi wa habari wa Msumbiji Amade Abubacar alikamatwa hapo Januari 5 wakati akiripoti kuhusu mashambulizi na vurugu katika vijiji vidogo vya jimbo la Cabo Delgado huko Msumbiji.

translation.en: Located in northern Mozambique, Cabo Delgado is rich with natural resources, such as ruby, charcoal and natural gas, found in the Rovuma Basin.
translation.swa: Ukiwa Kaskazini mwa Msumbiji, Cabo Delgado ina ukwasi wa mali asilia kama vile makaa ya mawe, rubi na gesi asilia vinavyopatikana huko bonde la Rovuma.

translation.en: Some observers say the group coordinating the attacks intends to begin trafficking these resources.
translation.swa: Baadhi ya waangalizi wanasema kuwa kikundi kinachoendesha mashambulizi hayo walikusudia kuchukua mali hizo.

translation.en: Since October 2017, multiple attacks have been carried out in different districts of Cabo Delgado by what appears to be the same rogue group.
translation.swa: Tangu Oktoba 2017, mashambulizi kadhaa yameshafanywa katika wilaya tofauti za Cabo Delgado na inayodhaniwa kuwa yanafanywa na kikundi hicho hicho cha waasi.

translation.en: Many media have reported on the attacks, but state officials have been unwilling to comment on or confirm evidence in these cases.
translation.swa: Vyombo vingi vya habari vimeripoti kuhusu mashambulizi hayo lakini viongozi wa serikali wameshindwa kutoa maelezo kuhusu jambo hilo au kuthibitisha ushahidi wa matukio haya.

translation.en: In 2018, more than one hundred people were prosecuted together in relation to these crimes.
translation.swa: Mwaka 2018, zaidi ya watu mia moja walishitakiwa pamoja kwa kuhusishwa na matukio hayo ya kihalifu.

translation.en: Their trial is expected to end this year.
translation.swa: Kesi zao zinatarajiwa kufikia mwisho mwaka huu.

translation.en: #FreeAmade: campaign to release Mozambican journalist
translation.swa: #MwachieniAmade: Ni kampeni inayotaka mwandishi wa habari wa Msumbiji kuachiliwa huru.

translation.en: Amade Aoubacar works with the Mozambican Social Communication Institute and as a journalist with news site Zitamar and the local radio station, Nacedje.
translation.swa: Amade Abubacar anafanya kazi na Chuo cha Mawasiliano ya Jamii cha Msumbiji na ni mwandishi wa habari wa tovuti ya habari ya Zitamar na kituo cha redio cha Nacedje.

translation.en: The journalist was arrested and detained by Mozambican federal police on January 5, while photographing survivors of an attack in Cabo Delgado.
translation.swa: Mwandishi huyo alikamatwa na kuwekwa kizuizini na Jeshi la Polisi la Msumbiji hapo Januari 5 wakati akiwapiga picha manusura wa mashambulizi huko Cabo Delgado.

translation.en: Amade was then taken to a military quarter of the Defense Forces of Mozambique in the district of Mueda, despite not being a member of the armed forces.
translation.swa: Amade alipelekwa kwenye kambi ya jeshi la ulinzi la Msumbiji katika wilaya ya Mueda, pamoja na kwamba yeye sio mwanajeshi.

translation.en: After a few weeks, he was transferred to a civilian prison to legalize his detention in Pemba, capital of Cabo Delgado .
translation.swa: Baada ya wiki chache, alihamishiwa katika gereza la kiraia kuhalalisha kuwepo kwake kizuizini huko Pemba, makao makuu ya Cabo Delgado .

translation.en: After he arrived at the civilian prison, Amade contacted the Mozambican Order of Lawyers and reported having experienced torture at the hands of Mozambican armed forces, who he says beat him and deprived him of food.
translation.swa: Baada ya kufikishwa kwenye gereza la kiraia, Amade aliwasiliana na Chama cha wanasheria wa Msumbiji na kutoa taarifa kuwa amekuwa akiteswa mikononi mwa wanajeshi, ambapo alisema humpiga na kumnyima chakula.

translation.en: Many individuals and media freedom groups have spoken out in his Abubacar's defense, saying that his arrest and detention have threatened the exercise of free expression.
translation.swa: Watu wengi na vikundi huru vya vyombo vya habari vimepaza sauti kumtetea Abubacar wakisema kuwa kukamatwa kwake na kuwekwa kizuizini ni kutishia na utekelezaji wa uhuru wa kujieleza.

translation.en: The Media Institute of Southern Africa, which monitors media rights and activities in the region, spoke out strongly against Amade's detention:
translation.swa: Taasisi ya Habari Ukanda wa Kusini mwa Afrika ambayo husimamia haki na shughuli za vyombo vya habari katika Ukanda huu, imelaani vikali kushikiliwa kwa Amade:

translation.en: Abubacars prolonged detention by the military is a violation of his rights as well as his arrest under unconfirmed charges.
translation.swa: Kuendelea kushikiliwa kwa Abubacar Na jeshi ni uvunjaji wa haki zake pia kukamatwa kwake bila mashtaka rasmi.

translation.en: The Mozambican government is setting a bad precedent in the violation of free expression and access to information in the region.
translation.swa: Serikali ya Msumbiji inaweka historia mbaya ya kuvunja haki za uhuru wa kujieleza na Uhuru wa kupata habari katika ukanda huu.

translation.en: Amnesty International also released a statement:
translation.swa: Shirika la haki za Binadamu Pia walitoa tamko:

translation.en: Amade Abubacar is a respected journalist who was recording testimony from people who fled deadly attacks in Cabo Delgado when he was arrested by police.
translation.swa: Amade Abubacar ni mwandishi anayeheshimika ambaye alikuwa akirekodi shuhuda za watu waliokimbia mashambulizi huko Cabo Delgado alipokamatwa na polisi.

translation.en: This is the latest demonstration of contempt coming from Mozambican authorities and directed at freedom of expression and freedom of the press [authorities] view journalists as a threat and [thus they] are treated as criminals.
translation.swa: Hii ni dharau ya hivi karibuni kutoka kwa mamlaka za Msumbiji na zimeelekezwa katika uhuru wa kujieleza na uhuru wa vyombo vya habari [mamlaka] zinawaona wanahabari kama maadui na hivyo wanatendwa kama wahalifu.

translation.en: The campaign has also spread on Twitter, with the creation of hashtags like #FreeAmade to advocate for the liberation of Amade.
translation.swa: Kampeni hii imeenea pia huko Twita na imeundiwa hashtagi kama vile #MfungueniAmade kutaka uhuru wa Amade.

translation.en: @UNHumanRights demands immediate release of journalist #AmadeAbubacar
translation.swa: @UNHumanRights imetaka kufunguliwa haraka kwa mwandishi huyo wa habari #AmadeAbubacar

translation.en: Arbitrary detention was no longer enough, they had to torture him, make him sleep with handcuffs at the military base without give him food.
translation.swa: Kuwekwa kizuizini holela haikutosha, wamemtesa na kumlaza huku amevaa pingu katika kambi ya jeshi bila kumpa chakula.

translation.en: This is terrible.
translation.swa: Hii ni mbaya sana.

translation.en: #FreeAmade #CaboDelgado
translation.swa: #MfungueniAmade #CaboDelgado

translation.en: Angela Quintal, coordinator of the Africa program for the Committee to Protect Journalists, cast blame on the president of Mozambique:
translation.swa: Angela Quintal, coordinator wa Mpango wa Afrika kwa Kamati ya Kuwalinda Wanahabari, alimtupia lawama Rais wa Msumbiji:

translation.en: #Mozambique: Today, Jan 30, is the 25th day journalist #AmadeAbubacar remains detained simply because of his journalism.
translation.swa: #Msumbiji: Leo ni Jan 30, ni siku ya 25 mwandishi wa habari #AmadeAbubacar akiwa bado kizuizini kwa sababu tu ya uandishi wake wa habari.

translation.en: One would think that President @FNyusi has enough on his plate without having to waste resources on jailing an innocent man #FreeAmade https://t.co/giF8zFnaCY
translation.swa: Mtu anaweza kudhani kuwa Rais @FNyusi ana mambo mengi sana mkononi kuanza kupoteza rasilimali kwa kumfungia mtu asiye na hatia #MwachieniAmade https://t.co/giF8zFnaCY

translation.en: Nyerere Square in Dodoma, the capital of Tanzania, and home of the parliament, Bunge.
translation.swa: Viwanja vya Nyerere Square jijini Dodoma, makao makuu ya Tanzania, lilipo bunge.

translation.en: Photo by Pernille Bærendtsen, used with permission.
translation.swa: Picha ya Pernille Bærendtsen, imetumiwa kwa ruhusa.

translation.en: On January 29, when the Tanzanian parliament (Bunge) assembled in Dodoma for its first session of 2019, an owl flew into the building, perched on the ceiling and observed the assembly from above.
translation.swa: Mnamo Januari 29, wakati  Bunge la Tanzania likiendelea na kikao chake jijini Dodoma, huu ukiwa ni mkutano wake wa kwanza kwa mwaka 2019, bundi alitua kwenye jengo hilo, akijishikiza kwenye paa na kulitazama bunge akiwa kwa juu.

translation.en: The incident drew national attention and provoked questions from social media users and newspapers.
translation.swa: Tukio hili lilivutia hisia za watu wengi nchini humo na kuibua maswali hasa katika mitandao ya kijamii na magazeti.

translation.en: What could the presence of an owl in parliament mean?
translation.swa: Swali kubwa likiwa: je, kutua kwa bundi kwenye jengo la bunge kulibeba maana yoyote?

translation.en: The owl has been spotted twice inside the halls of parliament in the city of Dodoma.
translation.swa: Bundi alionekana mara mbili jana ndani ya ukumbi wa Bunge jijini Dodoma.

translation.en: Bad omen?
translation.swa: Ishara mbaya?

translation.en: the regional weekly, The East African, proposed.
translation.swa: gazeti la kila wiki, The East African, lilipendekeza.

translation.en: The British blogger and media analyst, Ben Taylor, went further:
translation.swa: Mwanablogu wa Uingereza na mchambuzi wa vyombo vya habari, Ben Tylor, alidadisi zaidi:

translation.en: The owl that entered parliament signalled the coming death of Tanzanian democracy?
translation.swa: Bundi kuingia bungeni kumeashiria ujio wa kifo cha demokrasia ya Tanzania?

translation.en: Cartoon by Samuel Mwamkinga (Joune), used with permission.
translation.swa: Katuni imechorwa na Samuel Mwamkinga (Joune), imetumiwa kwa ruhusa.

translation.en: Tanzanian cartoonist, Samuel Mwamkinga (Joune), later illustrated the incident with a reference to the British term a group of owls based on the Greek perception that owls are wise (illustration used with permission).
translation.swa: Mchora katuni wa Tanzania, Samuel Mwamkinga (Joune), aliliweka tukio hilo katika mchoro akilifananisha na neno la Kiingereza kundi la bundi likibeba maana ya Kigiriki kwamba bundi wana hekima (picha imetumiwa kwa ruhusa).

translation.en: The owl is, however, seen as an omen of death and misfortune in Tanzania.
translation.swa: Bundi, hata hivyo, anaonekana kama ishara ya kifo na mikosi nchini Tanzania.

translation.en: And  the owl was determined to stay in Bunge, according to The Citizen:
translation.swa: Inavyoonekana  bundi huyo alikusudia kukaa Bungeni, kwa mujibu wa gazeti la The Citizen:

translation.en: The owl, a nocturnal bird, could not leave  despite several attempts by parliament officials to evict it.
translation.swa: Bundi, ndege anayependa kuruka usiku, hakuondokapamoja na majaribio kadhaa ya maafisa wa bunge kumtoa.

translation.en: Owls are not unusual in Tanzania, and neither is Tanzanians inclination toward superstition.
translation.swa: Bundi ni ndege maarufu nchini Tanzania, na si ajabu ndege hawa kuhusishwa na masuala ya ushirikina.

translation.en: A 2010 survey found that 93 percent of Tanzanians believe in witchcraft.
translation.swa: Mwaka 2010  utafiti uliwahi kuonesha kuwa asilimia 93 ya wa-Tanzania wanaamini ushirikina.

translation.en: No ordinary parliament session
translation.swa: Kikao kisicho cha kawaida

translation.en: For this particular session, the presence of the owl offered a symbolism, even for the nonsuperstitious, which was too stark to be ignored.
translation.swa: Kikao hiki cha Bunge, uwepo wa bundi ulikuwa alama isiyo ya kupuuza, hata kwa wasioamini ushirikina

translation.en: On the agenda for Tanzanias first parliamentary session of 2019 were the proposed amendments of the Political Parties Act, which has followed a months-long, intense debate in an increasingly unstable political climate.
translation.swa: Agenda ya kikao cha kwanza cha Bunge cha mwaka 2019 ilikuwa ni mapendekezo ya marekebisho ya Sheria ya Vyama vya Siasa, iliyotanguliwa na mjadala mzito ulioendelea kwa takribani mwezi mzima katika mazingira ya kisiasa yanayoonekana kuendelea kuwa tete.

translation.en: Tanzania made history in 1992 as one of the first countries in Africa to establish a multiparty system, which allowed opposition parties.
translation.swa: Tanzania iliweka historia  mwaka 1992 kuwa miongoni mwa nchi za mwanzo barani Afrika kuanzisha mfumo wa vyama vingi vya siasa, ulioruhusu kuundwa kwa vyama vya upinzani.

translation.en: The Political Parties Act (here with proposed amendments) was also introduced in 1992 and has been amended over time with the latest amendment in 2009.
translation.swa: Sheria ya Vyama vya Siasa  (hapa ikiwa na mabadiliko yanayopendekezwa)  ilitungwa mwaka 1992 na imekuwa ikirekebishwa mara kwa mara na mabadiliko ya  mwisho kabla ya haya yalifanyika mwaka 2009.

translation.en: With the owl perching above the assembly, Tanzanian parliamentarians agreed to amend the act  a step that critics regard as a serious weakening of the multiparty system in Tanzania, and thus also democracy.
translation.swa: Wakati bundi akiwa ametua kwenye jengo la Bunge, wabunge wa Tanzania walikubali kurekebisha sheria hiyo  hatua ambayo wakosoaji wanaiona kama itadhoofisha sana mfumo wa vyama vingi nchini Tanzania, na hivyo kuathiri mwenendo wa demokrasia nchini.

translation.en: In short, the renewal of the act provides more authority to the government-appointed registrar to not only deregister political parties but also to issue punishments in the form of imprisonment if a political party, for instance, carries out civic education related to voter registration and other politically-motivated activities, according to Reuters.
translation.swa: Kwa kifupi, mabadiliko ya sheria yanampa mamlaka makubwa zaidi msajili wa vyama vya siasa aliyeteuliwa na serikali si tu kuvifutia usajili vyama vya siasa lakini pia kutoa adhabu ikiwa ni pamoja na kifungo jela ikiwa chama cha siasa, kwa mfano, kitatoa elimu ya uraia kwa wapiga kura na kuendesha shughuli nyingine zenye mrengo wa kisiasa, kwa mujibu wa Reuters.

translation.en: Several media quoted Zitto Kabwe, leader of the opposition party ACT-Wazalendo, who already back in August 2017 criticized the proposed amendment of the act, predicting it may undermine political rights.
translation.swa: Vyombo kadhaa vya habari vimemnukuu Zitto Kabwe, kiongozi wa chama cha upinzani ACT-Wazalendo, ambaye  mwezi Agosti 2017 alinukuliwa akikosoa mabadiliko hayo ya sheria, akidai kuwa yangefifiisha haki za kisiasa nchini humo.

translation.en: Kabwe then compared it to the Media Services Bill 2016, which set the free and independent media back.
translation.swa: Kabwe aliifananisha sheria hiyo na Muswada wa Huduma za Habari wa 2016, ambao unadaiwa kurudisha nyuma uhuru wa vyombo vya habari.

translation.en: Now, Kabwe calls attention to the inherent contradiction caused by the amendment of the Political Parties Act:
translation.swa: Sasa, Kabwe anaangazia mkanganyiko unaosababishwa na mabadiliko hayo ya Sheria ya Vyama vya Siasa:

translation.en: You cant have a constitution that allows freedom of association then give someone powers to revoke that freedom of association.
translation.swa: Huwezi kuwa na katiba inayoruhusu uhuru wa watu kukusanyika na kisha uwape mamlaka baadhi ya watu kupokonya uhuru huo.

translation.en: Kiongozi wa chama Cha @ACTwazalendo Ndugu @zittokabwe akielezea mahusiano ya Demokrasia na Maendeleo kwa kutumia Takwimu za @WorldBank #PoliticalPartiesBill pic.twitter.com/IwNln6Wl68
translation.swa: Kiongozi wa chama Cha @ACTwazalendo Ndugu @zittokabwe akielezea mahusiano ya Demokrasia na Maendeleo kwa kutumia Takwimu za @WorldBank #PoliticalPartiesBill pic.twitter.com/IwNln6Wl68

translation.en: Tanzania's declining democracy under the rule of President Magufuli has been a recurring topic in the media, including a popular topic for satire.
translation.swa: Kuzorota kwa demokrasia Tanzania chini ya utawala wa Rais Magufuli imekuwa mada isiyoisha na hujirudia mara kwa mara kwenye vyombo vya habari, na pia imekuwa ikijitokeza mara kwa mara kwa waandishi wa kejeli.

translation.en: On January 30, Fatma Karume, Chair Woman of Tanganyika Law Society, tweeted a cartoon by the Kenyan cartoonist Gado (September 22, 2017) pointing to the role of Tanzanias President Magufuli and the death of democracy:
translation.swa: Mnano Januari 30, Fatma Karume, Mwenyekiti wa Chama cha Wanasheria wa Tanganyika (TLS), alitwiti katuni ya mchora katuni maarufu wa Kenya Gado (Septemba 22, 2017)akionesha wajibu wa Rais wa Tanzania, Magufuli na kifo cha demokrasia:

translation.en: Good morning everyone.
translation.swa: Habari za asubuhi ndugu zangu.

translation.en: Have a lovely day.
translation.swa: Muwe na siku njema

translation.en: In recent years, Tanzania has turned increasingly authoritarian in its legislation, resulting in less space for critical political opponents and independent media.
translation.swa: Katika miaka ya karibuni, Tanzania imegeuka kwa kasi  kuwa nchi yenye sheria za kiimla  zinazosababisha kuminywa kwa fursa kwa wanasiasa wa upinzani kufanya siasa sambamba na vyombo vya habari.

translation.en: Now, critics say the amended Political Parties Act will make it more difficult to practice politics that are critical of the president and Chama Cha Mapinduzi (The Party of the Revolution), in power since independence in 1961.
translation.swa: Sasa, wakosoaji wanasema Sheria ya Vyama vya Siasa itafanya iwe vigumu zaidi kwa wanasiasa kufanya siasa za kumkosoa Rais na Chama cha Mapinduzi kilichoshika dola tangu mwaka 1977.

translation.en: Opposition is essential for a vibrant democracy.
translation.swa: Upinzani ni muhimu kwa demorasia hai.

translation.en: A strong opposition will check up on government and challenge it.
translation.swa: Upinzani imara huisimamia serikali na kuipa changamoto.

translation.en: If there is no opposition, diversity of citizen needs are unlikely to be represented well.
translation.swa: Katika mazingira ambayo upinzani haupo, ni wazi mahitaji tofauti ya raia hayawezi kuwakilishwa ipasavyo.

translation.en: In 15 tweets, doctoral student Rachel McLellan walked readers through possible consequences of the new act, and characterizes a situation where a critical opposition will find itself cornered:
translation.swa: Kwa kutumia twiti 15, mwanafunzi wa udaktari Rachel McLellan aliwapitisha wasomaji wake kwenye ucmabuzi unaoangazia hali inayoweza kujitokeza kufuatia sheria hii mpya, na anaonesha mazingira ambayo chama cha upinzani kinachoonesha uhai kinaweza kujikuta kikibanwa:

translation.en: So most of your ways of convincing voters are gone.
translation.swa: Kwa hiyo njia za kuwashawishi wapiga kura wenu zimezibwa.

translation.en: What do you do if you're an opp party?
translation.swa: Unafanyaje unapokuwa mpinzani?

translation.en: Go back to the drawing board and come up with new strategies, right?
translation.swa: Nenda ubaoni na uje na mbinu mpya, sivyo?

translation.en: Well, this bill introduces unprecedented oversight powers to the Parties Registrar that make that v difficult 5/n
translation.swa: Muswada huu unampa nguvu kubwa zisizodhibitiwa Msajili wa Vyama vya Siasa inayofanya ubunifu huo uwe mgumu

translation.en: Superstitious or not  those critical of Tanzania's authoritarian turn found some wicked relief in the presence of the owl and the unsuccessful attempts to chase it away.
translation.swa: Iwe ni ushirikina au la  wale wanaokosoa mwelekeo wa Tanzania kuwa nchi ya kiimla walitafsiri vibaya uwepo wa bundi bungeni hasa iliposhindikana kumfukuza.

translation.en: The owl remained.
translation.swa: Bundi alibaki.

translation.en: Speaker of the Parliament, Job Ndugai, tried to tweak traditional belief with a pragmatic explanation:
translation.swa: Spika wa Bunge, Job Ndugai, alijaribu kuondoa imani hiyo kwa maelezo chanya:

translation.en: Honourable Members of Parliament, we have been seeing an owl in this House since morning but in the tradition of people of Dodoma, an owl that is seen during daytime cannot have any effect on anyone.
translation.swa: Waheshimiwa Wabunge, tumekuwa tukimwona bundi hapa bungeni tangu asubuhi lakini kwa mila ya watu wa Dodoma, bundi anayeonekana mchana hawezi kuwa na madhara yoyote.

translation.en: This means that we have nothing to worry about its presence.
translation.swa: Maana yake ni kwamba tusiogope uwepo wa bundi huyu.

translation.en: For the critical, however, there is nothing pragmatic about the new act.
translation.swa: Kwa wakosoaji, hata hivyo, hakuna maelezo mengine chanya ya sheria hiyo mpya.
